Chapter 1401
Together!
No one expected Ye Xuan to challenge Zhen Wu and White Robe!
One against two!
Was Ye Xuan crazy?
Although Ye Xuan was a genius, Zhen Wu and the white-robed man could be said to be the strongest people in the Dao Court who had achieved the Dao.
And now he wanted to fight one against two?
Zhen Wu looked at Ye Xuan without saying a word.
Beside him, White Robe kept silent with his eyes closed.
Ye Xuan smiled. "Why, are you refusing?"
Zhen Wu looked at Ye Xuan in silence.
At this moment, Bai Dizi's voice suddenly sounded in Zhen Wu's mind. "This person must have something to rely on!"
Zhen Wu said in a low voice, "But this is also our chance!
A chance to kill him!
Isn't that right? "
Bai Dizi was silent.
If Zhen Wu and White Robe joined forces, they would have a chance to kill Ye Xuan!
But if they couldn't kill him!
It was very likely that Ye Xuan would reach Dao Defense!
At this moment, White Robe suddenly opened his eyes. "Why think so much?
Let's just fight! "
As his voice fell, he suddenly rushed forward. The next moment, a silver light appeared half an inch between Ye Xuan's eyebrows!
The reason why it didn't pierce through was because a sword had pierced the body of that spear!
Seeing that his attack had missed, White Robe suddenly swept his spear horizontally.
Swoosh!
With a sweep, space was torn apart!
Ye Xuan blocked it with his sword.
Boom!
Under the spear, Ye Xuan instantly retreated hundreds of feet away!
But just as he stopped, a silver spear pierced through the air.
Ye Xuan straightened his sword and slashed forward.
Boom!
A wave of sword light exploded in the field!
Ye Xuan retreated hundreds of feet again!
Before he stopped, a shadow suddenly appeared in front of him. Then, a silver spear instantly reached his throat!
As fast as lightning!
Ye Xuan's expression was calm. Just as the spear was about to pierce his throat, his body suddenly leaned back, and at the same time, the sword in his hand suddenly flew out.
Chi!
The sword brought with it a sword light that looked like a crescent moon.
White Robe suddenly withdrew his spear and slammed it down.
Boom!
Ye Xuan's sword was directly hit, and the powerful force sent the sword flying. Ye Xuan himself took the opportunity to retreat a thousand feet away. The moment he stopped, he stretched out his right hand, and the sword that was sent flying by the white robe landed firmly in his palm.
In the distance, the white-robed man stood with a spear in his hand. He was dressed in white robes and had a silver spear in his hand. He looked like a god of war.
Zhen Wu did not intervene.
Whether it was him or White Robe, both of them had their own pride!
As long as Ye Xuan didn't play any dirty tricks, they wouldn't choose to gang up on Ye Xuan!
Arrogance!
They had fought countless battles in their lives, so why would they fear Ye Xuan?
At this moment, White Robe suddenly took a step forward. With each step, he struck with his spear. The space in front of Ye Xuan suddenly cracked open. Following that, a silver light flashed out!
The spear arrived before the man!
Ye Xuan did not block it. Instead, he stabbed with his sword!
This time, he chose to fight head-on!
Boom!
The sword light shattered, and Ye Xuan retreated more than ten feet. However, White Robe also retreated more than three hundred feet with his spear!
Ye Xuan actually gained the upper hand in this head-on confrontation!
Not far away, Bai Dizi frowned slightly. "How is this possible …"
At this moment, Zhen Wu suddenly said, "His strength is different from before!"
Strength!
Ye Xuan's current strength was naturally different from before!
He had absorbed the blood of the entire Naga Dragon clan!
He now possessed the strength of the Naga Dragon clan!
In terms of pure strength, perhaps only Jia Lou could compete with him!
At this moment, Bai Dizi's voice suddenly sounded in Zhen Wu's mind. "When he fights with White Robe later, if you ambush him, how confident are you of killing him?"
Hearing this, Zhen Wu frowned slightly. He looked at Bai Dizi. "What do you mean!"
Bai Dizi's face was extremely gloomy. "Zhen Wu, I know you have your pride, but you have to know that this Ye Xuan …"
Zhen Wu suddenly shook his head. "Bai Dizi, I know that in your heart, you have always wanted Ye Xuan to die. I also want him to die. However, I will not ambush him.
Now, it is a fair battle between him and White Robe. "
Bai Dizi stared at Zhen Wu. "Zhen Wu, don't be pedantic!
I beg you! "
Zhen Wu looked at Ye Xuan in the distance and said softly, "It's not pedantic. It's the bottom line!"
Bai Dizi still wanted to say something. At this moment, Ye Xuan suddenly rushed towards White Robe with his sword in hand.
Bai Dizi's face was extremely ugly.
If Zhen Wu suddenly ambushed him, he had a high chance of killing Ye Xuan!
However, Zhen Wu was too pedantic!
Bottom line?
Bai Dizi also wanted to have a bottom line. However, between the bottom line and Daoting's life and death, he chose the latter.
As if he had thought of something, he suddenly looked at a Sir God on his right. At this moment, Zhen Wu's voice suddenly rang in his head. "Bai Dizi, I, Daoting, am I a sore loser?"
Bai Dizi looked at Zhen Wu. Zhen Wu said softly, "Even if we lose, let us lose with some dignity, okay?"
Bai Dizi was silent.
Zhen Wu said again, "Let them fight. If White Robe loses, I won't say anything if you choose to gang up on him. But now, let them fight fairly. I believe that White Robe will choose the same."
Bai Dizi was still silent.
Zhen Wu looked at Bai Dizi. "Daoting is my belief. I will fight for this belief until the end. I know that Daoting is your belief too. However, we cannot throw away our bottom line for our belief!"
Bai Dizi sighed softly.
Zhen Wu did not say anything else. He looked into the distance. At this moment, Ye Xuan and White Robe's battle was very intense!
Actually, he was feeling rather emotional!
Back when Ye Xuan had just gone to Celestial Abyss, Ye Xuan was not his match. But now, Ye Xuan's strength was no weaker than his and White Robe's!
Ye Xuan's growth was really too fast!
Boom!
At this moment, an explosion suddenly sounded. Under everyone's gaze, White Robe was forced back nearly a hundred feet by Ye Xuan's sword.
White Robe had just stopped when he suddenly soared into the sky. The next moment, he held the silver spear in his hand and threw it at Ye Xuan.
The spear was like a raging dragon emerging from the sea, piercing through heaven and earth!
Below, Ye Xuan's expression was calm. Before the spear reached him, the space around him was already distorted!
The momentum of the spear was too strong!
When the spear arrived above Ye Xuan, Ye Xuan suddenly transformed into a ray of light that shot into the sky.
Bang!
A world shaking explosion suddenly resounded, and then the space in an area of over 100km cracked apart!
In midair, Ye Xuan held his sword firmly against the spear!
The energy within the spear hadn't vanished completely!
The glow on Ye Xuan's sword was growing dimmer and dimmer!
Right at this moment, White Robe suddenly appeared in the sky above the spear, and then he stomped his right foot against the tip of the spear.
Bang!
Ye Xuan descended straight down from midair while the tip of the spear was constantly pressing against the tip of Ye Xuan's sword. So, White Robe's energy was ceaselessly suppressing Ye Xuan!
Right at this moment, Ye Xuan suddenly stomped his right foot against the ground. In the next moment, the Sword Domain suddenly appeared here. At the same time, he swiftly slashed his sword forward.
Bang!
Ye Xuan stopped. In the next moment, White Robe retreated explosively by 300m!
After White Robe stopped, he gazed at Ye Xuan with eyes that were filled with battle intent!
Fight!
Ye Xuan's eyes were filled with battle intent as well!
Since he'd absorbed the dragon's blood and cultivated his body into the Dao Body, he'd rarely fought. But now, he wanted to fight to his heart's content!
Ye Xuan walked towards White Robe with his sword in hand!
His blood started to surge within him.
However, he didn't release the energy of his bloodline!
Not only did he not release the energy of his bloodline, he didn't even expose his Dao Body!
White Robe gazed at Ye Xuan from afar while he held the silver spear tightly in his right hand. The silver spear in his hand started to tremble violently, and a monstrous aura enveloped the surroundings!
The aura of the spear was overwhelming!
Right at this moment, Ye Xuan suddenly vanished on the spot. White Robe's face was expressionless as he suddenly stabbed the spear in his right hand forward.
Bang!
A ray of sword light was forced to stop by this spear strike!
The space around White Robe and Ye Xuan transformed into nothingness at this moment, whereas, White Robe and Ye Xuan separated from each other at this moment, and both of them retreated explosively by over 1km.
As Ye Xuan was flying backwards, a flying sword suddenly slashed towards White Robe!
White Robe stabbed forward in midair.
Bang!
The flying sword was blocked. However, in the next moment, Ye Xuan suddenly appeared in front of the flying sword. He grabbed the sword and slashed forward with great force.
When this strike descended, the expressions of everyone here changed drastically!
Including White Robe!
Dao Sword!
This strike wasn't an ordinary sword technique any longer, but a Dao Sword!
It was also the first time Ye Xuan had executed a Dao Sword since he'd cultivated the Dao Sword!
This strike shook the heavens and the earth!
White Robe's eyes revealed a solemn expression for the first time as he stood before Ye Xuan. He held the spear with both hands and swiftly swept it horizontally, causing a strand of domineering spear energy to sweep out. But in the next moment, this spear energy was directly slashed into pieces by Ye Xuan's strike!
Bang!
Under the gazes of everyone, White Robe instantly retreated explosively by 3km, whereas, the space in an area of 3km in front of Ye Xuan had been transformed into nothingness!
This strike had forcefully obliterated this expanse of space!
Nearby, a wisp of blood slowly seeped out from the corner of White Robe's mouth.
Moreover, countless cracks had appeared on the silver spear in his hand!
The surroundings suddenly fell silent!
White Robe was at a complete disadvantage in this collision!
In the distance, Ye Xuan walked slowly towards White Robe with his sword in hand.
Meanwhile, a trace of viciousness flashed through White Robe's eyes, and then he suddenly leaped up. At this moment, his entire body became illusory, and the silver spear in his hand suddenly trembled violently!
At a disadvantage, Ye Xuan suddenly leaped up and slashed with his sword!
Dao Sword!
With this slash, the space around Ye Xuan instantly became illusory!
Meanwhile, White Robe suddenly stabbed down with his spear.
It was a tit for tat!
Both of them had executed their strongest attacks!
Bang!
As soon as the spear and sword came into contact, the space in an area of over 100km around the southern gate was forcefully obliterated. On the other hand, Ye Xuan and White Robe retreated explosively, and they retreated for over 10km!
As soon as Ye Xuan stopped, the space in an area of 3km behind him was instantly transformed into nothingness!
Ye Xuan was first stunned, and then he hurriedly fell to the ground. He held his chest with both hands as if he was about to die!
Actually, he was completely fine because his body had forcefully withstood all the force of White Robe's attack!
However, he didn't want to expose his Dao Physique!
In the distance, White Robe was quite heavily injured as well. However, he didn't fall, and he stood there with his spear in hand.
Meanwhile, White Robe suddenly charged towards Ye Xuan with his spear in hand!
Obviously, he wanted to put an end to Ye Xuan right away!
Now that Ye Xuan was heavily injured, it was the best time to kill him!
Under everyone's gazes, Ye Xuan clutched his chest as blood flowed incessantly from his mouth, and he seemed to be on the verge of death.
White Robe was getting closer and closer to Ye Xuan …
...







Chapter 1402
Just as White Robe was several feet away from Ye Xuan, White Robe suddenly stopped!
White Robe stared at Ye Xuan, "Stop pretending!"
Ye Xuan did not react and still looked like he was about to die!
White Robe just stared at Ye Xuan, he did not choose to attack again!
After a moment, seeing that White Robe did not attack, Ye Xuan sat up. He looked at White Robe and thought it was a pity!
This guy actually did not fall for it!
White Robe looked at Ye Xuan, "If you were really that weak, you would not have come to challenge me!"
Saying that, he slowly closed his eyes, "Ye Xuan, if you want to kill me, there is only one way, and that is to kill me openly. You want to kill me?
Then you might be thinking too much! "
Ye Xuan chuckled, "Then I will kill you openly!"
As soon as he finished speaking, he suddenly leaped up with his sword in hand, and then he swiftly slashed down!
Dao Sword!
At the same time that the sword slashed down, a mysterious force suddenly enveloped White Robe!
Sword Domain!
White Robe was expressionless as he stabbed out with his spear!
Boom!
Heaven and earth trembled!
Under everyone's gaze, White Robe retreated rapidly!
Not far away, Bai Dizi and the others did not look good.
Because Ye Xuan could already suppress White Robe!
He did not rely on battle techniques, but purely on strength and that Dao Sword!
If it were anyone else, they would definitely not be able to continuously use such a powerful sword technique, but Ye Xuan could!
Because his fleshly body was really strong enough!
The battle became more and more intense, and the blood in Ye Xuan's body gradually boiled. However, he was still suppressing his bloodline power!
This bloodline power was too abnormal. Unless it was a desperate situation, he would usually not use it!
In the distance, Bai Dizi suddenly looked at Zhen Wu, "He is getting stronger as he fights!"
Zhen Wu was silent.
He also realized this problem!
Ye Xuan was getting stronger as he fought!
In other words, Ye Xuan had just broken through. Right now, Ye Xuan was using battle to stimulate his potential!
Bai Dizi said softly, "If this continues, I don't know if White Robe will lose, but I do know that this Ye Xuan will become stronger and stronger. He might even reach the Dao Manipulation Realm!"
Obviously, he still wanted Zhenwu to sneak up on Ye Xuan!
Now that Ye Xuan was being forced by the white-robed man, as long as Zhenwu chose to launch a sneak attack, there was a great chance that he could kill Ye Xuan.
In the field, only Zhen Wu had a good chance to kill Ye Xuan!
Zhen Wu fell silent.
Bai Dizi sighed softly. "Zhenwu, I know you're proud, but have you ever thought that once this person reaches the Imperial Dao, even a Dao Ancestor wouldn't be able to kill him so easily!
You have to know that he has yet to unleash his full strength. Putting everything else aside, he has yet to use the power of his bloodline. What does this mean?
It means that once he uses the power of his bloodline, White Robe will most likely lose. "
Zhen Wu slowly closed his eyes!
And the sword in his hand kept trembling!
Bai Dizi continued, "Zhenwu, if we don't get rid of Ye Xuan today, I, Daoting, will be destroyed by this person in the future!
Ye Xuan is a despicable person. There's no need for us to talk about fairness with him!
Moreover, he is challenging you and White Robe. There's nothing wrong with you making a move! "
After a long silence, Zhen Wu looked at Ye Xuan in the distance and said softly, "If I make a move, it means that I, Daoting, will lose the last bit of pride and dignity!"
Bai Dizi was about to speak when Zhen Wu suddenly said, "Bai Dizi, do you know why the Great Dao collapsed all those years ago?"
Bai Dizi looked at Zhen Wu. Zhen Wu said softly, "Because we are unscrupulous!
Our Dao Court is unscrupulous in everything we do. It is because of Ru Chu that the world has appeared.
Qingcheng, Ye Clan, Ancestral Hall.
"Ancestors, Ye Xuan has no talent, no virtue … From now on, Ye Xuan's position as Crown Prince will be replaced by Ye Lang."
The one who spoke was an old man in a black robe.
Not far behind the old man stood a youth with a faint smile on his face.
This person was Ye Lang.
On both sides were the Ye Clan's Elders.
"Why!?"
At this time, a timid voice suddenly rang out in the ancestral hall.
Everyone turned to look and saw a little girl standing at the door. She was about 12 or 13 years old, and her hands were tightly gripping the hem of her skirt. Her face had a sickly pallor, and she looked a little weak. There was even a hint of fear in her eyes.
This little girl was called Ye Ling, Ye Xuan's younger sister. When she heard that the clan wanted to remove Ye Xuan, she rushed over despite her illness.
The black-robed old man frowned, "Ye Ling, what are you doing!?"
The little girl called Ye Ling bowed to the people in the ancestral hall, and said timidly, "Great Elder, my brother Ye Xuan is a Crown Prince, why did you discard him for no reason?"
The Great Elder looked at Ye Ling coldly, "This is a matter of the clan, why are you interrupting?
Leave! "
Ye Ling was obviously afraid, not daring to look at the Great Elder, but she did not leave. Instead, she plucked up her courage and entered the ancestral hall. She bowed again to the Elders on both sides, "Dear Elders, my brother is fighting with the Li Clan over the mining rights at Nanshan. He is fighting for the clan, and we don't know if he's dead or alive. Yet, the clan is using a groundless excuse to discard his position. This is really unfair."
"Impudent!"
The Great Elder suddenly raged, "Discard him or not, it's not up to a little girl like you to decide.
Men, drag her away! "
At this moment, the new Crown Prince Ye Lang suddenly laughed, "You should be flogged thirty times as a warning to others!"
The Great Elder said coldly, "Then flog thirty times!"
Soon, two guards of the Ye Clan rushed in.
Ye Ling clenched her fists, and said angrily, "This is unfair! My brother has risked his life for the clan for so many years, even now he is fighting for the clan, but the clan is so unfair to him …"
One of the guards glanced at the new Crown Prince Ye Lang, and he knew that this was his chance to show off.
The guard sneered, "Young Master Ye Lang inherits the position of Crown Prince, it's everyone's wish, why are you shouting?" As he said this, he raised his hand and slapped Ye Ling's face.
Slap!
A crisp slap sounded, and the right side of Ye Ling's face instantly turned red and swollen, but she did not cry, and just covered her cheek tightly.
Ye Lang looked at the guard, and smiled, "What's your name?"
The guard hurriedly bowed, "I'm Zhang Mu, greeting the Crown Prince."
Ye Lang nodded, "You're not bad. After I become the Crown Prince, I need ten guards, so you can be my guard from now on."
Hearing this, Zhang Mu was overjoyed, and hurriedly bowed deeply, "I'm willing to go through fire and water for the Crown Prince, even if I have to die ten thousand times!"
Ye Lang nodded slightly, "Drag him out, this person is disturbing the ancestral hall, don't show mercy, understand?"
Zhang Mu glanced at Ye Lang, and when he saw the murderous intent in Ye Lang's eyes, he understood.
Immediately, he grabbed Ye Ling's hair and dragged her out.
At this moment, Zhang Mu seemed to have seen something, and suddenly stopped.
In the ancestral hall, everyone turned their heads to look outside.
Not far from the ancestral hall, a young man was walking towards the ancestral hall. The young man was wearing a tight-fitting robe, and the robe was tattered, and there was blood everywhere.
This person was Ye Xuan, who had rushed back from the South Mountain!
Seeing Ye Xuan, Ye Lang's mouth curled into a cold smile.
Inside the ancestral hall, the Elders frowned.
The Great Elder narrowed his eyes, and his expression was frighteningly gloomy. No one knew what he was thinking.
From afar, when Ye Xuan saw Zhang Mu dragging Ye Ling, his face turned savage, "Who gave you the guts to touch my sister?"
When Zhang Mu saw Ye Xuan, his face changed, and he quickly looked at Ye Lang. Just as he was about to speak, Ye Xuan suddenly leaped in front of him like a ferocious tiger. Before the latter could react, Ye Xuan's fist landed on his face.
Peng!
Zhang Mu felt a wave of dizziness, and he stumbled and fell.
However, Ye Ling did not stop there. He charged towards Zhang Mu again. At this time, Ye Lang suddenly roared, "Ye Xuan, he's my man, how dare you …"
Ye Xuan suddenly stepped on Zhang Mu's chest.
Pu!
Zhang Mu spat out a mouthful of blood.
Seeing this, Ye Lang's face turned ugly. Ye Xuan lifted his head and looked at him, "Your man?"
As he spoke, he stepped on Zhang Mu's face.
Zhang Mu's face turned into a bloody mess, as he screamed, "Prince, save, save me …"
Ye Xuan did not care about Zhang Mu, as he walked to Ye Ling's side. Seeing Ye Ling's appearance, Ye Xuan felt as though his heart was being sliced by a knife. He clenched his fists, and his entire body trembled.
When Ye Ling saw Ye Xuan, her tears flowed out, "Brother, it hurts, it hurts …"
Hearing this, Ye Xuan's expression turned savage. In the next instant, he charged in front of Zhang Mu, and kicked Zhang Mu's head.
Peng!
Qingcheng, Ye Clan, Ancestral Hall.
"Ancestors, Ye Xuan has no talent, no virtue … From now on, Ye Xuan's position as Prince shall be replaced by Ye Lang."
The one who spoke was an old man in black robes.
Not far behind the old man, there was a youth with a faint smile on his face.
This person was Ye Lang.
On both sides were the Ye Clan's Elders.
"Why!?"
At this time, a timid voice rang out in the ancestral hall.
Everyone turned to look and saw a little girl standing at the door. She was about 12 or 13 years old, and her hands were tightly gripping the hem of her skirt. Her face had a sickly pallor, and she looked a little weak. There was even a trace of fear in her eyes.
This girl was called Ye Ling, and she was Ye Xuan's younger sister. When she heard that the clan wanted to remove Ye Xuan, she disregarded her illness and rushed over.
The black-robed old man frowned, "Ye Ling, what are you doing!?"
The little girl called Ye Ling bowed to the people in the ancestral hall, and said timidly, "Great Elder, my brother Ye Xuan is a Prince, why did you discard him for no reason?"
The Great Elder looked at Ye Ling coldly, "This is a matter of the clan, why are you interrupting?
Leave! "
Ye Ling was clearly a little fearful. She did not dare to look the Great Elder in the eye, but she did not leave. Instead, she mustered up her courage and walked into the ancestral hall. She bowed to the elders on both sides of the hall and said, "Elders, my brother is currently fighting with the Li family for the mining rights of the mine in Nanshan. He is now fighting for the family, and it is unknown whether he is alive or dead. However, the family has used a groundless excuse to remove his position as the Crown Prince.
"Impudent!"
The Great Elder suddenly raged, "Discard him or not, it's not up to a little girl like you to decide.
Men, drag her away. "
At this time, the new Prince, Ye Lang, suddenly laughed, "You should be flogged 30 times as a warning to others!"
The Great Elder replied coldly, "Then flog her 30 times!"
Soon, two guards of the Ye Clan rushed in.
Ye Ling clenched her fists and said angrily, "This is unfair. My brother has risked his life for the clan for so many years. Even now, he is risking his life for the clan. The clan is so unfair to him …"
One of the guards glanced at the new Prince, Ye Lang. He knew that this was his chance to shine.
The guard sneered, "Young Master Ye Lang inherits the position of Prince. What are you yelling about?" As he spoke, he raised his hand and slapped Ye Ling's face.
Slap!
A crisp slap sounded, and the right side of Ye Ling's face instantly swelled up. However, she did not cry. She only held her cheek tightly.
Ye Lang looked at the guard and smiled, "What's your name?"
The guard hurriedly bowed, "Subordinate Zhang Mu greets the Prince."
Ye Lang nodded, "You're not bad. After I become the Prince, I will need 10 guards. You can be my guard from now on."
Hearing this, Zhang Mu was overjoyed. He hurriedly bowed deeply, "This subordinate is willing to go through fire and water for the Prince!"
Ye Lang nodded, "Drag him away. This person is disturbing the ancestral hall. Don't hold back. Understood?"
Zhang Mu glanced at Ye Lang. When he saw the murderous intent in Ye Lang's eyes, he understood.
He immediately grabbed Ye Ling's hair and dragged her out.
At this moment, Zhang Mu seemed to see something and suddenly stopped.
In the ancestral hall, everyone turned their heads to look outside.
Not far from the ancestral hall, a young man was walking towards the ancestral hall. The young man was wearing a tight-fitting robe. The robe was tattered and covered in blood.
The young man was Ye Xuan, who had rushed back from Nanshan!
Seeing Ye Xuan, Ye Lang's lips curled into a sinister smile.
Inside the ancestral hall, the Elders frowned.
The Great Elder narrowed his eyes, his face dark and gloomy. No one knew what he was thinking.
From afar, when Ye Xuan saw Zhang Mu dragging Ye Ling, his face turned savage. "Who gave you the guts to touch my sister?"
When Zhang Mu saw Ye Xuan, his face changed. He hurriedly looked at Ye Lang and was about to speak. At this time, Ye Xuan was like a ferocious tiger leaping in front of him. Before the latter could react, Ye Xuan's fist landed on his face.
Peng!
Zhang Mu felt a wave of dizziness, and he stumbled and fell.
However, Ye Ling did not stop there. He charged towards Zhang Mu again. At this time, Ye Lang suddenly roared, "Ye Xuan, he's my man! How dare you …"
Ye Xuan suddenly stepped on Zhang Mu's chest.
Pu!
Zhang Mu spat out a mouthful of blood.
Seeing this, Ye Lang's face turned ugly. Ye Xuan looked up at him and snarled, "Your man?"
As he spoke, he stepped on Zhang Mu's face.
Zhang Mu's face turned into a bloody mess, as he screamed, "Prince, save, save me …"
Ye Xuan did not care about Zhang Mu, as he walked to Ye Ling's side. Seeing Ye Ling's state, Ye Xuan felt as though his heart was being cut by a knife. He clenched his fists, and his entire body trembled.
When Ye Ling saw Ye Xuan, her tears flowed, "Brother, it hurts, it hurts …"
Hearing this, Ye Xuan's expression turned savage. In the next instant, he charged in front of Zhang Mu and kicked Zhang Mu's head.
Peng!







Chapter 1403
Behind Bai Dizi stood a middle-aged man.
It was the Daoting Dao Ancestor!
Bai Dizi said, "Dao Ancestor, Zhenwu …"
The Dao Ancestor said, "This is his choice. Respect it!"
Bai Dizi sighed.
With Zhenwu's departure, the Daoting's strength was greatly reduced!
The Dao Ancestor looked into the depths of the starry sky. "Did you find the plain-dressed woman?"
Bai Dizi said, "Divine Wind and the others have been found!
But both of them are dead!
It seems that the plain-dressed woman is stronger than we imagined! "
The Dao Ancestor was silent.
Bai Dizi said, "Our top priority now is to deal with Mu Niannian!
She has lost her memory and has no strength. Now is the best time to kill her! "
Mu Niannian!
The Dao Ancestor turned to look in the direction of the Five-Dimensional Universe and said, "We should have destroyed her body and the Five-Dimensional Universe!"
As for that woman, he was also afraid of her.
It was that woman who had destroyed his body with less than 30% of her strength!
30% of her strength!
He had to admit that he was a little shocked at that time.
He was at the Dao Attainment Realm. Moreover, he was at the peak of the Dao Attainment Realm.
However, that woman had easily destroyed his body with only 30% of her strength!
In fact, during this period of seclusion, he had been thinking about how strong that woman was.
There was no answer!
There was no path above the Dao Attainment Realm.
At least for him, there was no path!
After a long time, the Dao Ancestor suddenly said, "Get ready!
I will go find that person! "
With that, he turned and left.
In the field, Bai Dizi was silent for a long time, then said softly, "Zhenwu, the Daoting Realm will become better!
The order of the Great Path will also be restored! "
With that, he turned and left.
....
The Dao Ancestor came to the Dao Tomb. On a mountain peak, the Dao Ancestor came to a cave.
The Dao Ancestor looked at the cave and said, "Senior Brother, are you still in seclusion?"
The stone door of the cave suddenly opened and a middle-aged man walked out!
Lord!
The Lord of the Dao Tomb!
If there were outsiders here, they would definitely be shocked!
Because the Dao Ancestor called him Senior Brother!
In fact, very few people knew that the Lord was once a Daoting. However, he later parted ways with the Daoting!
The Lord looked at the Dao Ancestor and smiled, "Junior Brother, how have you been?"
The Dao Ancestor was expressionless. "Looks like you didn't break through again!"
The Lord laughed, "It doesn't matter!"
The Dao Ancestor smiled and said, "Do you really not care?"
The Lord raised his head and looked deep into the starry sky. He smiled and said, "Junior Brother, during my seclusion, I suddenly realized something. It's meaningless!"
The Dao Ancestor frowned slightly. "What's meaningless?"
The Lord laughed, "Daoting battles with you are meaningless!"
The Dao Ancestor looked at the Great Lord. "What do you mean?"
The Lord laughed. "How strong do you think Mu Niannian is?"
The Dao Ancestor was silent.
Mu Niannian!
Just how strong was this woman?
He didn't know!
That woman's strength could be said to have exceeded his understanding!
The Lord continued, "Even if I subvert your Daoting, what's the point?
The Three Thousand Great Daos are just ants to some people in this world. "
Then, he looked at the Dao Ancestor and smiled, "I want to go to other places to see how big the universe is. I also want to see the strong from other places!
What about you? "
The Dao Ancestor was silent.
The Lord laughed, "I know that you want to kill Ye Xuan and that woman. Moreover, you want the Dao Scriptures!
Ye Xuan now has five scrolls, your Dao Court has two, and the Dao Tomb has one. If you get all of them, you will have eight Dao Scriptures. However, the last one is in the Saha World. Can you get it?
The Dao Ancestor whispered, "What if you get it?"
The Lord was silent.
Dao Scriptures!
What did it mean to gather the Dao Scriptures?
It meant to awaken the Dao Spirit …
One had to say, it was very tempting!
The Dao Ancestor looked at the Lord, "Senior Brother, aren't you tempted?"
The Lord laughed and didn't say anything.
The Dao Ancestor said, "Senior Brother, if we gather the Dao Scriptures and awaken the Dao Spirit, we will be able to reach the next level."
The Lord was silent.
The Dao Ancestor said, "Don't you want to see the complete version of the Dao Scriptures?"
The Lord looked at the Dao Ancestor, "That Ye Xuan is not simple!"
The Dao Ancestor smiled, "His biggest support is that Mu Niannian. That person has lost her memory. If we want to kill her, it will be easy, isn't it?"
The Lord asked, "What about the person behind him?"
The Dao Ancestor was silent.
Because until now, the Daoting still didn't know who was behind Ye Xuan.
The Lord smiled and said, "Let's not talk about the others. Let's talk about the woman in the plain dress. Junior Brother, what level do you think she is?"
The Dao Ancestor said, "Senior Brother, you have actually made a decision, right?"
The Lord smiled, "What decision?"
The Dao Ancestor looked at the Lord, "You will not give up on the Dao Scriptures!"
The Lord laughed, "Junior Brother, you have no choice because you have already become enemies with Ye Xuan. However, I have a choice because I have a good relationship with Ye Xuan in the Dao Tomb!
What do you think? "
The Dao Ancestor smiled, "Senior Brother, you said that you want to leave. Where are you going?
To the Ancient God Abyss? "
The Lord said, "Can't I?"
The Dao Ancestor looked at the Lord, "Are you going there to rely on others?"
The Lord's smile slowly disappeared.
The Dao Ancestor smiled and said, "Senior Brother, at this level, you and I can be said to have reached our limits. Although we are all geniuses, the Dao Attainment Realm is our limit. Not to mention us, wasn't Master the same back then?
To us, there is only one way to change our fate and reach the next level. That is to gather all the Dao Scriptures and awaken the Dao Spirit. What do you think? "
The Lord smiled, "You want me to join forces with you!"
The Dao Ancestor looked at the Lord, "Yes!"
The Lord chuckled, "Junior Brother, do you know that greed can kill people?"
The Dao Ancestor was expressionless, "If we can't reach the next level, how long do you and I have to live?
Ten thousand years?
A thousand years? "
The Lord was silent.
The Dao Ancestor continued, "One more thing. Senior Brother, don't you want to know why Mu Niannian is so strong?
He doesn't have the complete Dao Scripture but his wealth is above the Dao Realm. I believe that you must be curious too, right? "
The Lord smiled, "I am indeed curious!"
The Dao Ancestor said, "It's easy to figure it out. Just capture this person, right?"
The Lord did not speak. He slowly walked to the side of the cliff. No one knew what he was thinking.
The Dao Ancestor continued, "Senior Brother, you are worried about the person behind him!"
The Lord smiled, "Shouldn't I be worried?"
The Dao Ancestor said, "Everything has its risks!"
The Lord said softly, "This is a little risky!"
The Dao Ancestor was about to speak when the Lord said, "As far as I know, Ye Xuan has an agreement with the Dao Tomb. After he obtains the Dao Scripture, he will share it with the Dao Tomb!"
The Dao Ancestor's face darkened, "Senior Brother, do you really believe it?"
The Lord looked at the Dao Ancestor, "Why wouldn't I believe it?
After Ye Xuan obtained the Dao Scripture, he was very generous. He shared the five Dao Scriptures with the people around him! "
The Dao Ancestor said, "It's just to buy people's hearts!"
The Lord laughed, "Buy people's hearts?
Junior Brother!
You are still the same as before. You like to look at people with prejudice!
Sometimes, is it so difficult to admit the excellence of others? "
The Dao Ancestor was expressionless.
The Lord said, "Junior Brother, I am different from you. You have no way out because if you don't kill Ye Xuan, Ye Xuan will destroy your Daoting!
As for me, I have no reason to be enemies with him!
Why should I be enemies with him?
My Dao Tomb has already formed a good relationship with him. Why should I turn this good relationship into a bad one?
Of course, I am also tempted by what you said. Gather all the Dao Scriptures, awaken the spirit of the Dao, and reach a higher level!
However, even if I am tempted, there is no need for me to be enemies with Ye Xuan.
Why?
Because after Ye Xuan gathers all the Dao Scriptures, I don't think there will be any problem with him sharing it! "
As he said this, he looked at the Dao Ancestor and smiled, "It might be difficult for you to share it. However, I don't think there will be any difficulty for Ye Xuan to share it!
This person has a pure heart and values relationships. Most importantly, he doesn't care about the Dao Scriptures.
When he gathers all eight scrolls, I will give him the one from my Dao Tomb. I believe that it won't be difficult for him to share the complete version of the Dao Scripture. What do you think? "
The Dao Ancestor smiled, "It seems that Senior Brother thinks that I, Daoting, will definitely lose this battle!"
The Lord shook his head, "That is not what I am concerned about. What I am concerned about is what choice I should make to maximize my benefits!"
As he said this, he looked at the sky and smiled, "I will not help Ye Xuan fight you. Although he is worth befriending, I do not want to be involved in this whirlpool. After all, he is a person with the Cause of Disaster. It is better to stay away from him!
Also, I will not help you fight him. You are an ingrate. It is better to help him than to help you. After all, Ye Xuan is a person who values relationships more than you. "
As he said this, he looked at the Dao Ancestor and smiled, "I will wait and see!"
The Dao Ancestor smiled, "What if I win?"
The Lord blinked, "If you win, will you be able to gather all the Dao Scriptures?
Junior Brother, don't forget that I also have the Dao Scriptures. You win!
If you want to gather all the Dao Scriptures, you have to beg me! "
The Dao Ancestor looked at the Lord and did not speak.
The Lord smiled, "For the sake of my dead Master, I will give you a piece of advice. It is not scary to make mistakes, but it is scary to make mistakes again and again!
Mu Niannian has been resurrected. Ye Xuan's hatred for the Daoting is not that great!
Admit defeat and form a good relationship with the Fifth Dimension. I believe that it should not be a big problem. After all, Mu Niannian is alive. For Ye Xuan, as long as Mu Niannian is not dead, anything can be discussed.
As for the Dao Scriptures … If it is yours, then it is yours. If it is not, then don't force it! "
The Dao Ancestor looked at the Lord and smiled, "Senior Brother, do you know why you lost to me?"
Without waiting for the Lord to answer, the Dao Ancestor said, "Because I fight. I fight for everything. Since I have set foot on this path, I must fight!
Watch carefully. This time, I will fight with Ye Xuan! "
As he said this, he turned around and disappeared into the horizon.
On the mountain peak, the Lord was silent for a moment. Then, he shook his head and smiled, "Fight your sister!"
.....







Chapter 1404
The Five-Dimensional Universe!
Ye Xuan returned to the Five-Dimensional Universe. At this moment, his heart was extremely heavy!
Lord True Martial had reached the Dao Attainment Realm!
This was one disaster after another for the Five-Dimensional Universe!
He was also extremely depressed. How did that guy reach the Dao Attainment Realm?
Could it be that his battle with White Robe inspired that guy?
Thinking of this, Ye Xuan could not help but shake his head and sigh.
This trip to the Daoting Realm was a huge loss!
Inside the hall.
Ye Xuan had just entered the Sword Hall when he saw Guan Yin!
Beside Guan Yin was a man in black. It was Li Zuo.
Ye Xuan was stunned when he saw Li Zuo, then hurriedly said, "Senior Li Zuo, you're back so soon?"
Li Zuo said solemnly, "I called two people, both at the peak of the Dao Attainment Realm. However, they will need thirty thousand Fortune Divine Crystals for each attack. Is there a problem?"
Ye Xuan smiled. "No problem!"
What he lacked the least now were Fortune Divine Crystals!
Li Zuo nodded slightly. "That's good!
They are all in the dark. If you need them, they can attack at any time!
Of course, if the Five-Dimensional Universe has no chance of winning, they will not fight to the death. They will choose to leave! "
Ye Xuan nodded. "Understood!"
After all, they were here to make money, not to fight to the death!
Of course, he only needed them to help him hold back a few of the Daoting Realm's core powerhouses!
Li Zuo nodded and did not say anything else. He quietly left!
Ye Xuan looked at Guan Yin. Guan Yin smiled. "Aro, Jiu, An Lanxiu, and Wenxiu have all come out!"
Ye Xuan was about to speak when a woman walked in!
It was Zhang Wenxiu!
Seeing Zhang Wenxiu, Guan Yin smiled and retreated.
She knew that Ye Xuan and Zhang Wenxiu had a special relationship!
Ye Xuan looked at Zhang Wenxiu and smiled. "Congratulations!"
Zhang Wenxiu had reached the Dao Validation realm!
Zhang Wenxiu walked over to Ye Xuan and sized up Ye Xuan. "Let's spar?"
Ye Xuan laughed and said, "You really want to beat me?"
Zhang Wenxiu rolled her eyes at Ye Xuan. She walked to the side and sat down. "Looks like I won't be able to defeat you!"
Ye Xuan sat beside Zhang Wenxiu. "Wenxiu, how's the Academy?"
Zhang Wenxiu smiled and said, "It's getting better and better. The current academy is several times bigger than before!
The Headmaster of the Academy only teaches every day. She is very relaxed! "
Ye Xuan turned to look at Zhang Wenxiu. "What about you?
What are your plans for the future? "
Zhang Wenxiu looked at Ye Xuan and did not say anything.
Ye Xuan blinked. "Did I say something wrong?"
Zhang Wenxiu did not say anything. She stood up and left!
Ye Xuan quickly grabbed Zhang Wenxiu's hand. Zhang Wenxiu tried to break free, but Ye Xuan's physical strength was too strong. She could not break free at all.
Ye Xuan asked softly, "What's wrong?"
Zhang Wenxiu was expressionless and did not say anything.
Ye Xuan caressed Zhang Wenxiu's hand and said softly, "I know that I have neglected you these days. I, Ye Xuan, am not a heartless person. But you also know that too many things have happened in the Fifth Dimension!"
Zhang Wenxiu did not say anything.
She knew that ever since Mu Niannian left, Ye Xuan had shouldered too much!
Now, the safety of the entire Fifth Dimension was on Ye Xuan's shoulders.
Ye Xuan said again, "If I am not wrong, Daoting might be risking his life!"
Zhang Wenxiu looked at Ye Xuan. "What are your plans?"
Ye Xuan smiled. "What plans can I have?
Of course, I will fight them to the death! "
Zhang Wenxiu was silent.
Ye Xuan held Zhang Wenxiu's hand and said softly, "I can't promise you anything because I might die tomorrow!"
Zhang Wenxiu shook her head. "I don't need you to promise me anything."
Ye Xuan smiled. "If we live, we live together. If we die, we die together!
What I owe you in this life, I will repay you in my next life! "
Zhang Wenxiu said calmly, "If you lose, will Daoting let you have a next life?"
Ye Xuan laughed. "That's true!
They will definitely annihilate my soul! "
Zhang Wenxiu looked at Ye Xuan with a complicated look in her eyes. "You have matured a lot!"
She still remembered the Ye Xuan of the past. At that time, Ye Xuan was sloppy and not serious at all!
But now, Ye Xuan was the Master of the Fifth Dimension!
As if she thought of something, Zhang Wenxiu suddenly grabbed Ye Xuan's hand. "Do you know?
I have been a little worried these days. I am not worried about Daoting, but worried about you. I am worried that you are walking too fast! "
Ye Xuan blinked. "I am walking too fast?"
Zhang Wenxiu nodded. "You are walking too fast!
So fast that I can't keep up with you! "
Ye Xuan fell silent.
Zhang Wenxiu looked at Ye Xuan. "It is not just me. They all have this worry."
Ye Xuan smiled. "I have to walk fast!"
Zhang Wenxiu nodded. "I understand!"
Ye Xuan took out a storage ring and placed it in Zhang Wenxiu's hand. "There are one million Fortune Divine Crystals and some treasures that you can use!"
Zhang Wenxiu did not refuse. She put away the storage ring and said, "If there is anything, we will all bear it together. Don't bear it alone, understand?"
Ye Xuan nodded. "Okay!"
Zhang Wenxiu looked at Ye Xuan. "Even if we die, we will die together.
Of course, it is best if we can live!
After all, you still owe me so much! "
Ye Xuan held Zhang Wenxiu's hand tightly and smiled. "I will repay what I owe you in this lifetime!"
Zhang Wenxiu suddenly threw herself into Ye Xuan's arms. She closed her eyes and shook her head. "Men smell so bad!"
Then, she turned and left.
Inside the hall, Ye Xuan was silent.
At this time, a middle-aged man suddenly appeared in the hall.
The person who had come was the High Lord!
Ye Xuan looked at the Lord. "Senior, are you the Lord of the Dao Tomb?"
The Lord smiled. "How did you guess?"
Ye Xuan said, "There is only one Dao Ancestor that can make me feel threatened. The other one is the Lord!"
The Lord laughed. "Ye Xuan, there is more than one Dao Ancestor in the Daoting realm!"
Ye Xuan smiled. "I was just guessing, but it seems like I was right!"
Looking at Ye Xuan, the Lord said, "I am here to talk about cooperation with you!"
Ye Xuan said, "Senior, please speak!"
The Lord laughed and said, "You are a straightforward person, so I won't beat around the bush!
What I mean is simple. This time, the Dao Tomb will not interfere in the matter between you and the Daoting. "
Ye Xuan said, "Senior, please continue!"
The Lord continued. "If you can gather all eight Dao Scriptures, I will give you the one in the Dao Tomb. You can summon the Dao Spirit!
But in return, I want to see the complete Dao Scripture!
Is there a problem? "
Ye Xuan smiled. "Senior, I have discussed this with Senior Rahu. We have reached an agreement!"
The Lord looked at Ye Xuan. "I just want to confirm!"
Ye Xuan said, "Senior, don't worry. If I can gather all nine Dao Scriptures, I will let you have a look!"
The Lord smiled. "Thank you!"
He turned to leave.
At this moment, Ye Xuan suddenly said, "Sir, can we talk about something else?"
The Lord turned to Ye Xuan. "You are trying to trick me!"
Ye Xuan was speechless.
The Lord smiled. "Although I know you are trying to trick me, I am willing to listen to you. Consider it as giving you face!
After all, I still have to give you face! "
Ye Xuan looked at the Lord. "Senior, I want to borrow a few people from you!"
The Lord blinked. "I said!
The Dao Tomb will not interfere! "
Ye Xuan smiled. "Senior, Sister Nian has reached the Dao Realm!"
The Lord's smile froze.
Ye Xuan said, "Sister Nian and I are very close!"
He looked at the Lord. "Senior, do you want to make a bet?"
The Lord was silent.
He knew what Ye Xuan meant!
If Ye Xuan won and Mu Niannian regained his memory, he could ask Mu Niannian for guidance!
If he could ask Mu Niannian for guidance, the complete Dao Scripture would be nothing!
Why would Mu Niannian teach him?
It was simple!
Ye Xuan!
If Ye Xuan spoke up for him, it would be simple!
Who didn't know the relationship between Ye Xuan and Mu Niannian?
A moment later, the Lord suddenly said, "I will give you six Dao Defense Peak Stage powerhouses. I have secretly trained these six people. Even Luo Hou doesn't know of their existence.
Their strength is second only to Luo Hou and the Heavenly King! "
Then, six black-robed people appeared behind him.
All six of them were Dao Defense Peak Stage powerhouses.
The Lord looked at Ye Xuan. "Now, the six of them will listen to your orders."
Ye Xuan said, "Thank you!"
The Lord suddenly laughed, "Can you tell me the truth?"
Ye Xuan said with a smile, "What do you mean?"
The Lord smiled. "For example, your true background!
And the people behind you! "
Ye Xuan shook his head. "Senior, you won't believe me even if I tell you!"
The Lord smiled. "How can I believe you if you don't tell me?"
Ye Xuan thought for a moment. "Actually, I am the Son of the Plane of the Nine-Dimensional Universe!"
The Lord blinked. "Scram!"
Then, he turned and disappeared.
Inside the palace, Ye Xuan shook his head.
His own background?
In fact, he didn't even know!
Ye Xuan gazed at the six of them, and then he pointed with his finger. Six spatial rings descended before them, and every single one of them contained 100,000 Divine Fortune Crystals!
The six of them glanced at the spatial rings. Meanwhile, one of the black-robed figures hesitated for a moment before he said, "Young Master Ye, you're too kind!"
Ye Xuan smiled. "The battle with the Daoting is of utmost importance to the Five-Dimensional Universe. I hope that all of you can help me when the time comes. If I, Ye Xuan, am able to survive, then I, Ye Xuan, will definitely reward all of you handsomely!"
The black-robed figure in the lead put the spatial rings away. "We'll do our best."
Ye Xuan nodded. "Thank you!
All of you hide yourselves for now. I'll ask all of you to lend a hand when the time comes! "
The six of them nodded, and then they vanished without a trace.
Ye Xuan walked out of the palace, and he looked up into the depths of the starry sky. No one knew what he was thinking.
Meanwhile, Nian Nian suddenly appeared by Ye Xuan's side. She took Ye Xuan's hand and said softly, "I still can't remember anything!"
She'd been trying hard to recall the past, but she couldn't!
Ye Xuan withdrew his gaze, looked at Nian Nian, and smiled. "If you can't remember, then don't think about it!
This time, I'll protect you. "
Nian Nian looked at Ye Xuan and didn't say anything.
Ye Xuan continued. "Just like how you protected me last time …"
Nian Nian looked up at Ye Xuan. "What if you can't win?"
Ye Xuan smiled. "Then I'll die with Nian Nian!
This time, if we live, then we'll live together. If we die, then we'll die together! "
...
Ancient God Abyss.
An old man stood silently at the top of a pyramid. He looked up into the depths of the starry sky, and his eyes were filled with confusion!
This person was Su Zhe!
Ever since he'd met the woman in the plain dress, he'd been deeply affected!
He'd already achieved the Dao. Originally, he'd thought that he was already standing at the peak of martial arts in this world. However, the appearance of the woman in the plain dress made him understand that he hadn't reached the peak at all. In fact, he was still a long way from the true peak!
That woman was so strong that it made people feel hopeless!
How could there be such a powerful person in this world?
At this moment, an old man suddenly appeared beside Su Zhe.
This person was Su Ke, who'd come into contact with Ye Xuan in the depths of the Dark World!
Su Zhe withdrew his gaze. "How's the investigation going?"
Su Ke said in a low voice. "It's clear. The young man I met in the Dark World is the brother of the woman in the plain dress!"
In fact, he didn't know the woman in the plain dress. When she came to the Ancient God Abyss, he wasn't there.
When he returned to the Ancient God Abyss and heard about the woman in the plain dress, he felt a lingering fear. Because he'd met Ye Xuan!
At that time, he'd almost attacked Ye Xuan … Every time he thought about it, he felt a lingering fear.
That mysterious woman had almost destroyed the Ancient God Abyss!
After the lingering fear, he rejoiced. This was because he'd formed a good relationship with Ye Xuan.
At this time, Su Zhe asked, "That young man is in the Fifth Dimension?"
Su Ke nodded. "Yes!
However, his current situation doesn't seem to be good! "
Su Zhe looked at Su Ke. "What do you mean?"
Su Ke said in a low voice. "According to what I know, that Daoting wants to attack him!"
Su Zhe was stunned. "Daoting wants to attack him?"
Su Ke nodded. "Young Master Ye has five Dao Scriptures. Moreover, he seems to have a blood feud with Daoting!
Now that Daoting Dao Ancestor has come out, he's about to attack the Fifth Dimension. "
Su Zhe said softly, "This Daoting … His strength isn't that great, but his guts are really big!"
As he said this, he looked at Su Zhe. "Don't they know how strong that senior is?"
Su Ke said in a low voice. "According to my investigation, they've investigated that senior. The two people that senior killed were from Daoting."
Su Zhe frowned. "Then why do they still dare to cause trouble for Young Master Ye?"
Su Ke smiled bitterly. "That senior only used one sword to kill them. Therefore, they don't know her true strength … They might have misunderstood her strength!"
Su Zhe was silent.
That senior only used one sword to kill, but Daoting didn't know that she only used one sword to kill Dao Realm cultivators!
Forget about Dao Realm cultivators, even if he was in front of her, he wouldn't be able to withstand one sword!
Su Ke suddenly asked, "Should we help?"
Su Zhe smiled. "Of course we should help!
That senior values this Young Master Ye so much. If we can form a good relationship with this Young Master Ye, it'll be the same as forming a good relationship with that senior! "
As he said this, he paused and then said, "That senior might be training this Young Master Ye. Therefore, we shouldn't rush to intervene. If Young Master Ye is in danger, it won't be too late for us to intervene."
Su Ke nodded. "Alright!
I'll go to the Fifth Dimension now! "
Su Zhe suddenly said, "Bring some people with you!"
Su Ke looked at Su Zhe. "How many people?"
Su Zhe thought for a moment and said, "Just in case, bring ten Dao Realm cultivators with you!
If there are any changes, inform me immediately. "
.....
