If there are, can you share how you got rich?
I'm about to go to the sea!







Chapter 1405
In the Fifth Dimension.
On this day, somewhere in the Fifth Dimension, the starry sky suddenly split open. Then, a middle-aged man walked out!
Dao Ancestor!
The moment the Dao Ancestor appeared in the starry sky of the Fifth Dimension, all living beings in the Fifth Dimension felt a formless power!
A Dao Realm expert!
Behind the Dao Ancestor were Bai Dizi and the others.
Almost all the Daoting experts were here!
The Dao Ancestor suddenly said, "Set up the array!"
As soon as he said that, seven Godly Lords suddenly appeared in seven different directions. The next moment, the constellations moved and a huge starlight array covered the entire starry sky!
Seven Stars Divine Array!
In the depths of the starry sky, the power of countless stars continuously gathered towards this array.
This was the most powerful array of the Daoting experts. It could borrow the power of thousands of stars!
At this moment, Ye Xuan suddenly appeared in front of the Dao Ancestor.
The Dao Ancestor looked at Ye Xuan. "Aren't you the young master of the Whirling Sect?
Now, you can call the experts of the Whirling Sect to save you!
Or, you can call the woman in the plain dress behind you! "
Ye Xuan nodded. "Okay!"
After saying that, he took out the Qiankun Gourd. "Immortal Gourd, call some people over!"
There was no response!
Ye Xuan said in a deep voice, "Immortal Gourd, don't play dead. Call some people over to help!"
At this moment, Immortal Gourd suddenly said, "Kid, I can call people over. I really can. However, if the people I call over know that you have so many Dao scriptures, hehe …"
Ye Xuan threw Immortal Gourd into the World Prison Pagoda.
As if thinking of something, Ye Xuan spread out his hands and the blood in his body started to tremble!
Bloodline power!
Seeing this scene, the Dao Ancestor's expression changed subtly!
Ye Xuan's bloodline had always been a mystery!
Who was this guy's son?
At this moment, Ye Xuan suddenly raised his head and roared, "Ancestor Summoning!"
Ancestor Summoning!
Everyone: "…"
The Daoting and the other experts' expressions were extremely strange!
This guy wanted to summon his ancestor?
The Dao Ancestor's expression gradually turned solemn. He did not dare to underestimate Ye Xuan's bloodline.
As soon as Ye Xuan's voice fell, a blood-red light suddenly shot up from his body. In an instant, the entire starry sky turned blood-red. It was extremely terrifying!
The expressions of the experts from the Dao Palace turned solemn when they witnessed this scene.
It looked a little scary!
When Ye Xuan shouted 'Ancestral Summoning', in a distant part of the starry sky, a man in green suddenly stopped. He turned his head and frowned. "What is he doing?"
Beside the azure-robed man, a spear-wielding woman asked, "What's wrong?"
The blue-clothed man had a strange expression. "He's summoning his ancestor!"
The woman: "…"
The azure-clothed man shook his head. "You even summoned your ancestor!
He wants to ascend to the heavens! "
The woman said, "Maybe he ran into some trouble!"
The green-robed man pulled the woman's hand and walked away. "Ignore him!"
The woman was about to speak when the azure-clothed man suddenly stopped. He turned his head and frowned. There was killing intent in his eyes.
The woman asked, "What's wrong?"
The azure-clothed man said, "Nianxue is in trouble!"
The woman was about to speak when the azure-clothed man said, "Wait for me. I'll be back soon!"
With that, he disappeared on the spot.
The woman: "…"
At the side, the horned little girl suddenly said, "The daughter is her biological daughter. The son must have been picked up!"
...
In the Five-Dimensional Universe, Ye Xuan looked at the starry sky without any reaction.
Ye Xuan frowned. He tried again, but there was still no response.
Ye Xuan's expression darkened!
Damn it!
Summoning his ancestor didn't work!
This was a little awkward!
At this moment, the Dao Ancestor suddenly said, "Ye Xuan, I'll give you a chance to live. Are you leaving?"
Ye Xuan looked at the Dao Ancestor. "Dao Ancestor, why are you still saying such nonsense to me at a time like this? Are you retarded?"
The Dao Ancestor was about to speak when Ye Xuan suddenly said, "Jia Lou!"
As soon as he finished speaking, a black shadow flashed out of Ye Xuan's body. In the next moment, a huge dragon that was tens of thousands of meters long appeared in the starry sky!
Jia Lou!
At this moment, Jia Lou had already cultivated a Dao Body!
When he saw Jia Lou, the Dao Ancestor's expression changed.
He looked at Ye Xuan. "Jia Lou, you …"
Ye Xuan looked at Jia Lou. "Hold him back!"
In the sky, Jia Lou dove directly towards the Dao Ancestor.
This charge caused the starry sky to tremble as if it was about to shatter. It was extremely shocking.
When they saw this scene, the expressions of the Daoting experts changed.
This pressure was not weaker than the Dao Ancestor's at all!
A trace of hostility flashed in the Dao Ancestor's eyes. He lightly stomped his right foot and shot into the sky. In the sky, he punched out.
This punch caused the entire starry sky to become illusory!
Boom!
The entire starry sky suddenly trembled violently. Then, Jia Lou was blasted back. However, her strong body had withstood all the power of the Dao Ancestor's punch!
After forcing Jia Lou back with a punch, the Dao Ancestor turned to look at Bai Dizi. "Kill!
Leave no one alive! "
With that, he turned and rushed towards Jia Lou again.
Below, Bai Dizi suddenly said, "Get out of the formation!"
As soon as he finished speaking, the Seven Star God Formation suddenly trembled violently. In the next moment, the energy of countless stars converged to form a huge blade, and the space around the huge blade instantly became illusory as soon as it appeared!
This huge blade contained endless power of the stars!
In the sky, Bai Dizi suddenly roared, "Kill!"
The seven Divine Lords pointed at Ye Xuan below as soon as they finished speaking.
Chi!
The huge blade of stars tore through the sky from the center of the formation. Wherever the blade passed, space was directly torn and shattered!
Ye Xuan had to receive this attack. If he did not, the huge blade of stars would enter the Fifth Dimension and destroy the Fifth Dimension's Origin!
However, Ye Xuan did not dodge and allowed the huge blade of stars to slash into his body.
Boom!
Under everyone's gaze, the huge blade of stars was directly absorbed by Ye Xuan!
Ye Xuan's aura skyrocketed!
Seeing this scene, all the experts on the Daoting stage were stunned.
Bai Dizi looked at Ye Xuan in disbelief and said with a trembling voice, "You … you can even absorb the power of the stars …"
With that, he roared like a madman, "Ye Xuan!
Ah ah ah ah!
Is there anything that you can't absorb? "
...
At that moment, Bai Dizi was indeed very aggrieved!
Ye Xuan could absorb Sword Qi, Turbid Qi, and Death Qi. But now, Ye Xuan could even absorb the power of the stars!
Was this guy a black hole?
He could absorb anything!
Below, Ye Xuan greedily took a deep breath, an intoxicated expression on his face.
After absorbing the power of the stars, he felt that his cultivation level had improved a lot!
It was really a great supplement!
Ye Xuan looked at Bai Dizi, cupped his fists, and said with a smile, "Thank you!"
Hearing this, Bai Dizi's face twitched. This was killing people!
Ye Xuan looked up at Jia Lou and the Dao Ancestor. Jia Lou had already been suppressed by the Dao Ancestor. Obviously, Jia Lou's strength was inferior to the Dao Ancestor's. However, with Jia Lou's powerful physical body, the Dao Ancestor could not do anything to her for a while!
Ye Xuan withdrew his gaze and looked at White Robe. "Little Seven!"
As his voice fell, a sword light suddenly broke through the air from afar!
Not far away, White Robe frowned slightly. He suddenly turned his head and stabbed out with his spear.
Bang!
White Robe was blasted over 100m back!
White Robe stared fixedly at Little Seven who had appeared in front of him. "You've become stronger again!"
He'd fought Little Seven the last time, and Little Seven wasn't so strong at that time!
Little Seven didn't waste his breath at all. He charged at White Robe with his sword in hand.
White Robe stomped his right foot on the ground, and then he vanished on the spot. In an instant, numerous sounds of slicing resounded.
After White Robe was stopped, Ye Xuan looked at Bai Dizi and the others. Bai Dizi was about to speak when Ye Xuan suddenly waved his right hand. In an instant, over 100,000 energy swords appeared around him.
The expressions of Bai Dizi and the others changed drastically when they witnessed this scene.
Ye Xuan suddenly pressed his fingers together and pointed forward. "Slash!"
As soon as he finished speaking, over 100,000 energy swords tore through the air, and it was an extremely magnificent sight!
Right at this moment, a white haired old man suddenly appeared in front of Bai Dizi and the others. The white haired old man opened his palm, and a white square mirror appeared in his hand. In the next moment, a strand of dazzling white light suddenly erupted from the mirror!
Bang!
Ye Xuan's foul energy was completely obstructed by the white light, and it was gradually dispersed!
Ye Xuan frowned when he witnessed this scene. What sort of mirror is that?
It's actually able to disperse my foul energy!
However, the white mirror in the white haired old man's hand was slowly becoming illusory as well!
Ye Xuan didn't retract his foul energy because he noticed that the white haired old man's mirror was on the verge of vanishing!
Right at this moment, the white haired old man suddenly put the mirror away, and then he transformed into an afterimage that shot explosively towards Ye Xuan!
Hiss!
His body tore through space, and the space in an area of over 3km was even split apart into spiderwebs by the white haired old man's body. It was an extremely shocking sight!
Moreover, the foul energy hadn't even approached the white haired old man when it was blasted away by a powerful force!
Ye Xuan's expression instantly became solemn when he witnessed this scene!
A Dao Attainment Realm expert!
The white haired old man was actually an expert at the Dao Attainment Realm!
Meanwhile, the white haired old man had arrived in front of Ye Xuan, and then he smashed his fist forward.
This punch was very simple, yet it contained an extremely overbearing and violent force. This violent force seemed as if it could destroy the entire Fifth Dimension, and it was extremely terrifying!
At the instant that the white haired old man struck out with his fist, some of the foul energy in the space around Ye Xuan was instantly transformed into nothingness. It wasn't just the foul energy, even the space around Ye Xuan was shattered and obliterated at this moment!
The might of this punch was sufficient to shatter the heavens and the earth!
Ye Xuan didn't dodge. He was unable to dodge this punch, so he could only take it head-on.
Ye Xuan took a step forward, drew his sword, and slashed.
Dao Sword!
His sword slashed out, and sword light shot out like a waterfall.
Rumble!
An expanse of sword light shattered, and Ye Xuan instantly retreated explosively by over 1km. As soon as he stopped, the space behind him had been transformed into nothingness!
Ye Xuan gazed at the white haired old man with a solemn expression.
This old man was much stronger than the white-robed old man and Zhen Wu!
The white haired old man glanced at Ye Xuan, then turned his head to look at Bai Dizi. Bai Dizi understood and looked down at the Fifth Dimension. "Kill!"
As soon as his voice fell, the Daoting experts behind him rushed toward the Fifth Dimension.
This time, they didn't just want to kill Ye Xuan, but also the entire Fifth Dimension.
As long as the Fifth Dimension was not destroyed, Mu Niannian wouldn't die. Therefore, they had to destroy the entire Fifth Dimension to avoid any future troubles.
At this moment, sword cries suddenly resounded from below, and the next moment, hundreds of sword lights collided from below!
Sword Sect!
More than 300 Swordsman directly rushed into the starry sky.
Although the Daoting experts had a higher realm than the Swordsman from the Sword Sect, these Swordsman didn't have the slightest bit of fear in their eyes.
Fight!
In the eyes of all the Swordsman, there was only fighting spirit!
Senior Sister Lu, who was in the lead, pointed her sword at the Daoting experts. "Fight to the last man!
Kill! "
As soon as her voice fell, she directly turned into a sword light and rushed out.
Hundreds of Swordsman attacked at the same time. In an instant, sword qi swept across the entire starry sky with terrifying momentum!
Bai Dizi was expressionless. "Courting death!"
These Swordsman's battle prowess wasn't bad, but the difference between their realms and the Daoting experts was too big!
One had to know that the weakest Daoting experts were Dao Validation experts. Moreover, the majority of Daoting experts were Dao Defense experts.
What was important was that these people had all stayed in the Celestial Abyss before, so their combat experience was quite rich.
If these Swordsman were all Dao Validation experts, perhaps there would be a fight. Unfortunately, these Swordsman were mostly Self Release experts!
At this moment, six mysterious experts suddenly rushed toward Bai Dizi and the others. They were the six people that the Lord had given to Ye Xuan. Apart from them, there were also Li Zuo and the other two. All three of them were at the peak of Dao Defense!
Nine super Dao Defense Realm experts!
Seeing these nine people, Bai Dizi's expression changed subtly. However, these nine people wouldn't be able to change the outcome of the battle!
At this moment, Ye Xuan, who was not far away, suddenly opened his palm. The next moment, twelve black shadows flew out from his palm. Then, twelve enormous Naga Dragon souls appeared in the starry sky!
As soon as the twelve Naga Dragon souls appeared, Bai Dizi's expression changed!
It wasn't just Bai Dizi, the white-haired old man who stood before Ye Xuan frowned as well!
These twelve Naga Dragon souls were over 10km tall, and they emanated extremely powerful dragon energy. Even though they were only dragon souls, their auras were extremely powerful, and they were merely inferior to the two Dao Attainment Realm experts and Jia Lou!
The white-haired old man stared fixedly at Ye Xuan, "What's your relationship with the Naga Dragons!?"
Ye Xuan looked at the white-haired old man and smiled, "Take a guess!"
The white-haired old man didn't speak.
Ye Xuan is becoming more and more mysterious!
Suddenly, the twelve Naga Dragon souls swooped down towards Daoting and the other experts!
The twelve Naga Dragon souls swooped down in unison as if they intended to crush this expanse of the starry sky. At this moment, the entire starry sky trembled as if it was on the verge of collapse. It was an extremely shocking sight.
Ye Xuan was slightly shocked as well because he hadn't expected the Naga Dragon souls to be so strong!
The twelve Naga Dragon souls were sufficient to resist a few dozen Dao Attainment Realm experts!
At the same time, An Lanxiu and the others had arrived.
An Lanxiu, Aro, A 'Jiu, Situ, Zhang Wenxiu, Lian Wanli, and the others had attained the Dao Validation Realm. Even though they were only at the Dao Validation Realm, they didn't feel any pressure when resisting Dao Attainment Realm experts!
Bai Dizi's face instantly fell when he witnessed this scene!
The overall strength of the Fifth Dimension was still inferior to Daoting, but it wasn't as weak as Daoting thought either!
The current Fifth Dimension was completely capable of fighting Daoting!
As if he'd thought of something, Bai Dizi suddenly turned to look at the white-haired old man in the distance, "Elder Mi, kill Ye Xuan first!"
The white-haired old man looked at Ye Xuan, and then he slowly clenched his right hand. At this moment, the space around him instantly became illusory.
In the distance, Ye Xuan slowly closed his eyes, and a powerful strand of killing intent gradually spread out from within him.
Meanwhile, the white-haired old man suddenly vanished on the spot. Meanwhile, Ye Xuan suddenly opened his eyes, and they were completely blood red!
Ye Xuan suddenly roared furiously, "Kill!"
As soon as he finished speaking, he slashed down with his sword.
This strike wasn't just a Dao Sword, it also contained killing intent!
An expanse of blood red light suddenly erupted in front of him. In an instant, Ye Xuan retreated explosively by over 1km, and he'd just stopped when the white-haired old man suddenly appeared in front of him. After that, the white-haired old man smashed his fist towards Ye Xuan's stomach!
This punch could destroy the heavens and the earth!
However, at this moment, Ye Xuan actually didn't dodge at all and allowed the punch to strike his chest.
Bang!
Ye Xuan's figure was blasted flying, but at the instant he flew, a sword stabbed into the white-haired old man's left shoulder.
Soul Suppressing Sword!
Bang!
A powerful soul force directly enveloped the white-haired old man, causing his expression to change drastically. His reaction was extremely fast, and his right hand abruptly pulled out the Soul Suppressing Sword. At the same time, his entire figure retreated hundreds of meters.
After stopping, the white-haired old man's body turned illusory, and his entire person was extremely abnormal. However, his soul gradually returned to normal.
After all, he was a Dao Attainment Realm expert, so it was impossible for his soul to be shattered by a single slash from the Soul Suppressing Sword!
After the white-haired old man's soul calmed down, he lifted his head to look at Ye Xuan in the distance. There was a trace of seriousness in his eyes. In that instant just now, he'd almost fallen for Ye Xuan's Dao!
If he hadn't reacted fast enough, his soul would've been severely injured!
Other than that, he'd also noticed something else, and that was Ye Xuan's physical body!
Ye Xuan had forcefully taken a punch from him, but Ye Xuan was still standing normally!
The white-haired old man unwaveringly stared at Ye Xuan. "Your physical body is unexpectedly strong to this extent!"
In the distance, Ye Xuan slowly closed his eyes. In his heart, he felt that it was a pity. That sword just now had almost seriously injured the old man's soul!
He'd still underestimated a Dao Realm expert!
Ye Xuan opened his eyes and looked around. At this moment, the experts of the Fifth Dimension and the Daoting experts were already in full swing. Because of the twelve Naga Dragon souls, the Fifth Dimension's side was not too disadvantaged!
However, the situation was not good for the Fifth Dimension, because Jia Lou couldn't beat the Dao Ancestor!
At this moment, Jia Lou was completely suppressed. If it weren't for her physical body being too strong, she would have already been killed.
At this moment, the Dao Ancestor suddenly punched Jia Lou. He didn't follow up with another attack. Instead, he looked down at Ye Xuan and said fiercely, "Ye Xuan, today, you and that Mu Niannian must die. No one can protect the two of you!"
As his voice faded, he opened his palm and roared, "Great Dao Restoration!"
As his voice faded, the starlight in the entire starry sky was annihilated!
On the other side, the white-haired old man slowly clenched his right hand, and a powerful fist force locked onto Ye Xuan. It should be said that the entire starry sky was enveloped by this fist force!
Fist Dao!
Obviously, the two of them wanted to join forces to kill Ye Xuan first!
As long as they killed Ye Xuan, the entire Fifth Dimension would instantly collapse!
How terrifying would it be if two Dao Realm experts joined forces?
At this moment, in the starry sky, the Dao Ancestor suddenly slapped down with his palm.
A palm print swept down from the starry sky!
Boom!
The entire starry sky trembled as if there was a huge earthquake!
In front of Ye Xuan, the white-haired old man suddenly took a step forward and punched out.
Boom!
A fist print that could destroy heaven and earth headed straight for Ye Xuan. Wherever the fist print passed, the starry sky was destroyed!
...







Chapter 1406
In the starry sky, Ye Xuan was like a floating page in the ocean in front of these two forces. He seemed so frail!
At this moment, Ye Xuan's expression was surprisingly calm.
Could he beat them?
He definitely couldn't!
Ye Xuan could at most fight one Dao Attainment Realm expert. He definitely couldn't fight two Dao Attainment Realm experts working together. After all, he was only at the Dao Validation Realm!
Even with a Dao Body, he couldn't beat two Dao Attainment Realm experts!
But he couldn't retreat!
Ye Xuan wasn't a pedantic person. In the past, he would have chosen to flee if he couldn't beat them.
But at this moment, he had no way out!
Because the Five-Dimensional Universe was behind him!
His family and friends were behind him!
Nian Nian was behind him!
If he retreated, everyone would die!
Since he couldn't retreat, he could only fight!
He had to fight even if he couldn't beat them!
At this point, the blood in Ye Xuan's body suddenly trembled. Gradually, powerful bloodline power surged out of his body.
Killing intent and bloodline power!
The Executing Heaven Sword in Ye Xuan's hand became a sword spirit. Ye Xuan suddenly took a step forward and slashed with his sword!
Dao Sword!
A Dao Sword that was enhanced by killing intent and bloodline power!
The power of this sword shook the starry sky!
Bang!
As soon as Ye Xuan slashed with his sword, a blood-colored sword light suddenly exploded in front of him. In an instant, Ye Xuan retreated thousands of meters.
Although he was strong, he couldn't resist the power of two Dao Attainment Realm experts!
In the sky, the Dao Ancestor was about to attack again when Jia Lou slammed into him!
A trace of viciousness flashed in the Dao Ancestor's eyes as he punched.
Bang!
Jialou was sent flying by the punch, and many parts of her body had already begun to slowly crack!
After sending Jia Lou flying, the Dao Ancestor looked down at Ye Xuan. At this moment, Ye Xuan slowly stood up. Although he hadn't fought with his life on the line, his powerful body had held on!
Although he was injured, it wasn't fatal!
The Dao Ancestor looked down at Ye Xuan, his eyes cold. "Overconfident ant!"
As soon as he finished speaking, he suddenly slapped his palm forward, and the space in front of Ye Xuan directly shattered layer by layer!
Ye Xuan suddenly leaped up and slashed forward with his sword in both hands.
Boom!
With a slash, the space in front of Ye Xuan was slashed into nothingness. At this time, the Dao Ancestor suddenly appeared in front of Ye Xuan. He pointed a finger at Ye Xuan. This finger directly touched the tip of Ye Xuan's sword.
Boom!
Ye Xuan flew out instantly, but the Dao Ancestor's entire arm also cracked at this moment!
The Dao Ancestor frowned slightly when he saw that. He looked at the sword in Ye Xuan's hand in the distance with a grim look in his eyes.
This sword was actually able to injure him!
As soon as Ye Xuan stopped, the white-haired old man suddenly appeared behind him, and the white-haired old man directly punched at Ye Xuan's head. If this punch hit, even if Ye Xuan had a Dao Body, he would probably be seriously injured.
Both the white-haired old man and the Dao Ancestor didn't hold back at all!
Their goal was to kill Ye Xuan!
Ye Xuan's reaction was extremely fast. At the instant the old man punched, he suddenly turned around and blocked with his sword.
Boom!
Ye Xuan's entire body directly retreated thousands of meters away!
And before he could stop, the Dao Ancestor appeared in front of him again!
Ye Xuan's pupils suddenly constricted, and he slashed with his sword.
Boom!
A wave of blood-red sword light suddenly exploded, and Ye Xuan was sent flying again!
As soon as he was sent flying, the Ancestral Lord suddenly approached him and threw a punch at Ye Xuan's face. Although it was just a simple punch...
Although it was just a simple punch, this punch was even more powerful than some Divine Skills!
At the level of experts like the Dao Ancestor, every punch and finger contained their own Dao, which was not something that some Divine Skills and Martial Skills could compare to.
Seeing this punch coming, Ye Xuan didn't dodge, and let the Dao Ancestor's punch hit his body. However, at this moment, his sword also slashed on the Dao Ancestor's head.
Boom!
The sword light shattered, and Ye Xuan flew out again. This time, he flew thousands of meters away!
And the Dao Ancestor forcibly withstood Ye Xuan's sword!
This was because a golden light had appeared around him, and it was this golden light that had withstood Ye Xuan's sword just now!
The Dao Ancestor looked coldly at Ye Xuan in the distance. "Do you think you're the only one who has a life-saving method?
You …. "
Right at this moment, Ye Xuan suddenly leaped up, and then he suddenly slashed his sword down towards the Dao Ancestor!
The moment he struck with his sword, the white-haired old man not far away suddenly disappeared. Immediately after, a fist mark appeared behind Ye Xuan. However, at this moment, a woman appeared behind Ye Xuan.
An Lanxiu!
An Lanxiu suddenly stabbed her spear forward.
Bang!
An Lanxiu was blasted 3km back, and as soon as she stopped moving, a wisp of blood seeped out from the corner of her mouth.
She hadn't cultivated a Dao Body, so she was utterly unable to endure the strength of an expert at the Dao Realm!
On the other hand, Ye Xuan's sword slashed towards the Dao Ancestor in the distance, but it was stopped by the Dao Ancestor as well!
Even though his Dao Sword was formidable, it was too difficult to kill a Dao Ancestor!
Meanwhile, An Lanxiu retreated to Ye Xuan's side, and she spoke in a low voice. "Are you alright?"
Even though Ye Xuan's bloodline had been activated, he hadn't gone completely berserk!
Even though his strength would increase explosively after going completely berserk, he wouldn't recognize anyone in that state!
So, he didn't dare allow himself to go completely berserk.
Ye Xuan wiped off the blood on the corner of his mouth. "I can still fight!"
An Lanxiu gazed at the white haired old man. "I'll stop him for you!"
As soon as she finished speaking, she was about to attack. However, Ye Xuan suddenly grabbed her hand.
An Lanxiu gazed at Ye Xuan, and Ye Xuan shook his head. "No!"
An Lanxiu didn't possess a Dao Body, so she was utterly unable to endure the white haired old man's strength.
Just that strike from before had already heavily injured An Lanxiu!
An Lanxiu was just about to speak when the Dao Ancestor suddenly vanished on the spot. After that, a formidable force swept towards Ye Xuan and An Lanxiu.
On the other side, the white haired old man had suddenly vanished on the spot as well.
Hiss!
The space behind Ye Xuan and An Lanxiu suddenly collapsed layer by layer.
An Lanxiu suddenly turned around. She didn't retreat but advanced instead, and she charged forward and stabbed her spear forward!
The spear was like a dragon that pierced through the heavens and the earth!
Meanwhile, a fist smashed directly onto An Lanxiu's spear ….
Bang!
The spear shook violently while An Lanxiu instantly retreated explosively. During the process of her retreat, her entire body suddenly became ethereal. In the next moment, she suddenly smashed her fist forward. As soon as her fist shot forward, countless afterimages suddenly appeared here, and all of these afterimages punched out at the same time!
The white haired old man who intended to follow up with another attack had suddenly stopped, and then he smashed his fist forward.
Bang!
The afterimages that covered the sky instantly vanished, and at this moment, a spear tore through the sky towards them.
The white haired old man frowned slightly as he punched once more, and the might of this punch was peerlessly domineering.
Bang!
The spear shattered into pieces, and An Lanxiu instantly retreated 3km away.
The white haired old man was just about to attack again when Jia Lou suddenly appeared in front of An Lanxiu. She glanced at An Lanxiu and said, "Let's attack together!"
As soon as she finished speaking, she charged directly towards the white-haired old man!
An Lanxiu stomped her right foot and transformed into a streak of white light that shot towards Bai.
The white-haired old man charged forward.
Meanwhile, Ye Xuan had already started fighting with that Dao Ancestor!
Ye Xuan was still suppressed, but without the help of the white-haired old man, the Dao Ancestor could only suppress Ye Xuan!
Because Ye Xuan's body was too strong!
Moreover, Ye Xuan had four domains. With the help of the four domains and the power of his bloodline, although he was suppressed, he could contend with the Dao Ancestor!
On the other side, the Lord had been paying attention to the battlefield in the starry sky.
Beside the Lord were Yan Yaoyao, Luo Hou and the others.
Luo Hou looked at Ye Xuan in the distance and said softly, "This person is truly a peerless genius!
To actually resist a Dao Ancestor for so long at the Dao Corroboration realm! "
Chi Yaoyao spoke abruptly, "His body is strong. If his body wasn't strong enough, he would have perished a long time ago!"
Luo Hou was quite curious, "What's his body?
Why is it so strong? "
As he spoke, he gazed at Yan Yaoyao.
Yan Yaoyao shook her head, "Don't look at me, I don't know either!"
She gazed at the Lord as she spoke, "The Lord is knowledgeable. Do you know what his body is?"
The Lord shook his head, "I've never seen such a strong body. It can even resist the strength of a Dao Attainment Realm expert!"
Meanwhile, Luo Hou spoke abruptly, "Those two women can't resist the Daoting Lord Mi."
Yan Yaoyao gazed at An Lanxiu and Jialou. Even though they were strong, they were still being suppressed by Lord Mi.
Ye Xuan wasn't suppressing them either!
If this continued, then Ye Xuan's side would lose sooner or later!
Meanwhile, Ah Ku spoke abruptly, "Have all of you noticed? Ye Xuan's aura is growing stronger and stronger!"
Everyone gazed at Ye Xuan. Even though Ye Xuan was being suppressed, his aura was growing stronger and stronger!
The Lord suddenly smiled, "Interesting. This fellow might be breaking through during the battle!"
Yan Yaoyao spoke softly, "Will the Dao Ancestor give him that chance?"
The Lord shook his head, "Once this fellow reaches the Dao Attainment Realm, it'll be impossible for the Dao Ancestor to kill him alone!
Even if he joins forces with Lord Mi, it'll be difficult to kill Ye Xuan! "
Chi Yaoyao spoke, "So they're going to use their trump card?"
The Lord nodded, "They should be!"
Ah Ku spoke abruptly, "Lord, if we help Ye Xuan now, wouldn't it be easy to destroy the Daoting Realm?"
The Lord smiled without a word.
Yan Yaoyao spoke softly, "If it's so easy to destroy the Daoting Realm, then you're underestimating the Daoting Realm!"
Ah Ku frowned, "Why? Do they have a stronger trump card?"
Yan Yaoyao looked at the Lord. The Lord smiled, "You'll be shocked!"
Ah Ku spoke in a low voice, "Then why aren't they using the Daoting Realm?"
Chi Yaoyao replied, "If I'm not wrong, they're saving it to deal with the people behind Ye Xuan Realm!"
Ah Ku glanced around and spoke softly, "Will the people behind Ye Xuan Realm appear?"
The Lord smiled, "Who knows?"
At this moment, Ye Xuan, who was not far away, suddenly forced the Tao Ancestor back with a sword strike.
Everyone looked at Ye Xuan in the distance. Ye Xuan stood there with his sword in hand, exuding a powerful aura!
He was about to break through!
Ye Xuan greedily took a deep breath, the blood in his body surging. Powerful auras gushed out of his body, causing the entire starry sky to boil!
Opposite Ye Xuan, the Dao Ancestor was expressionless, "Want to break through?
You're dreaming! "
As soon as he spoke, something appeared on the battlefield. The expressions of everyone in the Fifth Dimension changed drastically.
Chi Yaoyao and the others also changed drastically …
...
