Chapter 1407
The reason Chi Yaoyao and the others were shocked was because two figures had appeared behind Ye Xuan.
These two figures were actually at the Dao Completion Realm!
Another two at the Dao Completion Realm!
Daoting didn't only have two at the Dao Completion Realm, but four!
When they saw this scene, many experts of the Fifth Dimension already felt despair!
If there were only two at the Dao Completion Realm, then the Fifth Dimension could still fight them. But now, there were four. How could they fight?
They couldn't fight at all!
The two Dao Completion Realm experts charged at Ye Xuan as soon as they appeared!
Obviously, they didn't want to give Ye Xuan any chance!
This was normal, because no one knew what would happen if Ye Xuan reached the Dao Resistance Realm!
The best way was to kill him before he broke through!
Nearby, when they saw the two Dao Attainment Realm experts and the Dao Ancestor charge towards Ye Xuan, the expressions of An Lanxiu and the other women instantly changed, and they charged directly towards Ye Xuan. However, it was utterly too late!
Because the speed of the Dao Ancestor and the two Dao Attainment experts was simply too fast!
The Lord and the others were also looking at Ye Xuan.
If the person behind Ye Xuan didn't appear, then Ye Xuan would basically be gone!
Right at this moment, the three Dao Ancestors who were charging at Ye Xuan seemed to have noticed something. Their expressions changed drastically, and they retreated like madmen!
Om!
An ear piercing sword howl suddenly resounded!
The Lord's eyes narrowed. "This …"
Not far away, over a dozen strands of sword qi were circling around Ye Xuan.
This wasn't Ye Xuan's sword qi!
It was the sword qi that Ye Xuan had brought out of the Dark Realm. Who was the owner of this sword qi?
It was Situ Tingyun!
Besides the green-clothed man, she was the strongest in the Sword Dao in the Sword Sect!
Even though these strands of sword qi were ownerless, they were still very powerful!
In the distance, the three Dao Ancestors had extremely solemn expressions!
It was especially so for the Dao Ancestor. His expression was unprecedentedly solemn.
He had seen such a powerful Sword Qi once before, from Mu Niannian.
And now, he saw it again!
And this Sword Qi was clearly not Mu Niannian's Sword Qi!
In other words, behind Ye Xuan, there was a powerful Swordsman who was no weaker than Mu Niannian!
On the other side, Qing Yaoyao suddenly said, "The sword qi in the dark world vortex!"
Rahu nodded. "I didn't expect him to be able to use this Sword Qi … This guy is too mysterious!"
The Lord looked at the Sword Qi and fell into deep thought.
Not far away, Ye Xuan closed his eyes. At this moment, he felt that he had reached a critical point.
The breakthrough was imminent!
At that moment, the nearby Dao Ancestor suddenly said, "This Sword Qi has no owner!"
Ownerless Sword Qi!
In other words, if the Sword Qi was destroyed, there would be nothing left!
The Dao Ancestor was about to make a move when Ye Xuan suddenly opened his eyes. "How do you know it has no owner?"
The Dao Ancestor stared at Ye Xuan. "If it has a owner, why don't you let the Sword Qi's owner come out?"
Ye Xuan smiled. "Dao Ancestor, aren't you thinking too highly of yourself?
Are you worthy of letting the Sword Qi's owner come out? "
The Dao Ancestor was expressionless. "Ye Xuan, at this point, is there any use in using words?
If you have someone, then call them out! "
Ye Xuan laughed. "Dao Ancestor, are you afraid?"
The Dao Ancestor looked at Ye Xuan and was about to speak. At that moment, a Dao Attainment expert suddenly said, "He's stalling for time!"
Stalling for time!
The Dao Ancestor narrowed his eyes. At this moment, Ye Xuan's aura was unprecedentedly powerful!
He was about to break through!
The Dao Ancestor suddenly said, "Destroy the Sword Qi first!"
With that, he charged at Ye Xuan!
The other two Dao Fulfilment experts also rushed over!
Meanwhile, the Sword Qi around Ye Xuan slashed out! Hiss!
Hiss! Hiss! Hiss!
Over a dozen Sword Qi tore through the starry sky. It was extremely terrifying!
It had to be said that the Dao Ancestor and the other two Dao Attainment experts were suppressed by the Sword Qi!
Even the Dao Ancestor and the other two Dao Attainment experts didn't dare to go head-on against the Sword Qi!
On the other side, the Lord said softly, "A single Sword Qi that hasn't been destroyed for tens of thousands of years, and it's so powerful …. It's ridiculously powerful!"
Luo Hou and the others didn't look too good!
They were supposed to be the strongest experts in this world. But after seeing the Sword Qi, they suddenly realized that they were really weak!
Not only was the Sword Qi indestructible for tens of thousands of years, but it was also so powerful!
Peak?
What they thought was the pinnacle was just a joke to some people!
It was like that to Mu Niannian, and it was the same to the Sword Qi's owner!
In the distance, after the Dao Ancestor and the other two Dao Attainment experts were stalled by the Sword Qi, Ye Xuan began to break through to the Dao Attainment Realm!
He had to reach the Dao Attainment Realm. Once he did, his overall strength would undergo a qualitative transformation!
At this moment, the Dao Ancestor and the other two Dao Attainment experts were burning with anxiety!
If Ye Xuan reached the Dao Attainment Realm, Ye Xuan wouldn't be able to fight against the three of them alone. However, once he reached the Dao Attainment Realm, he would become an unknown variable.
Who knew what would happen after he reached the Dao Attainment Realm?
Not far away, the Dao Ancestor and the other two Dao Attainment experts began to use their full strength. Although the Sword Qi suppressed the three Dao Ancestors, it was becoming more and more illusory.
After all, it was ownerless Sword Qi that could be consumed and destroyed.
On the other side, the battle between the experts of the Fifth Dimension and the experts of the Dao Court was in full swing. The experts of the Fifth Dimension were at a slight disadvantage, but because of the twelve Naga Dragon souls, the experts of the Fifth Dimension were only at a slight disadvantage.
This was because the twelve Naga Dragon souls were really too powerful!
In order to deal with the twelve Naga Dragon souls, the Daoting had mobilized a total of twenty-six Divine Sovereigns. Moreover, these twenty-six Divine Sovereigns were being suppressed by the twelve Naga Dragon souls!
In addition, Li Zuo and the other two Dao Ancestors were also extremely powerful. The three of them were forcefully holding back eleven Divine Sovereigns!
It could be said that it would be difficult to determine the victor between the two sides in a short period of time.
However, the situation was becoming more and more disadvantageous for Ye Xuan's side. This was because two of Ye Xuan's dozen Sword Qis had already disappeared!
Although the Sword Qis were powerful, they were ownerless. If they were consumed too much, they would completely disappear.
Now, the Dao Ancestors and the other two Dao Ancestors were madly consuming these Sword Qis!
On the other side, Luo Hou said softly, "He's about to break through!"
Just as he finished speaking —
Boom!
In the distance, a powerful aura suddenly erupted from Ye Xuan's body. Wherever this aura passed, the surrounding starry sky trembled.
Dao Attainment Realm!
Seeing that Ye Xuan was breaking through, Luo Hou shook his head, "This guy breaks through like eating. It's really infuriating to compare oneself with others!"
The Lord smiled, "He risked his life!"
Chi Yaoyao suddenly said, "Does the Daoting still have a trump card?"
The Lord looked at Chi Yaoyao and smiled, "You want to help!"
Chi Yaoyao said softly, "Why not?"
The Lord smiled, "If we help Ye Xuan, even if the Daoting has a trump card, we can still destroy the Daoting!
Of course, we will just have to pay a price! "
Chi Yaoyao looked at the Lord, "Does the Lord not choose to help because you have other concerns?"
The Lord looked at the faraway Ye Xuan and said softly, "He is a whirlpool. If we get too involved, it will be difficult for us to escape in the future."
Chi Yaoyao was silent.
She knew that the Lord was talking about the reason for Ye Xuan's misfortune.
The Lord was worried about this!
At this moment, the Lord suddenly smiled, "Let's wait and see!"
In the distance, after Ye Xuan broke through, he waved his right hand and the ten sword energies suddenly flew back in front of him!
Seeing this, the Dao Ancestor and the others' expressions became even uglier.
It wasn't because of Ye Xuan's breakthrough, but because Ye Xuan could control the ten sword energies!
After all, these ten sword energies weren't Ye Xuan's own sword energies!
Ye Xuan greedily took a deep breath!
Dao Defense Realm!
After reaching the Dao Defense Realm, he felt that everything was different!
His divine soul, divine sense, strength, and his own body, everything had undergone earth-shattering changes!
As if thinking of something, Ye Xuan suddenly looked at the Dao Ancestor. The next moment, he appeared in front of the Dao Ancestor and slashed down with his sword!
Dao Sword!
And four more domains!
The Dao Ancestor narrowed his eyes, took a step forward, and pointed out with a finger.
Head-On!
At this moment, Ye Xuan's sword fell.
Boom!
Under the gazes of everyone!
The Dao Ancestor was instantly pushed over 1km back, and his right index finger had been severed by Ye Xuan's attack. Besides that, his right arm had split open and blood sprayed from it!
The expressions of everyone here became solemn when they witnessed this scene!
The Lord frowned slightly as well. Isn't Ye Xuan's strength a little too exaggerated after he attained the Dao Defense Realm?
He'd injured a Dao Ancestor with a single strike of his sword!
Meanwhile, Yan Yaoyao suddenly said, "It's his body!"
The Lord gazed at Ye Xuan and spoke softly, "What formidable physical strength!
What cultivation technique does he cultivate? His body is actually so strong! "
Ye Xuan's combat strength had risen by so much mainly because of his physical body!
Dao Defense!
Now, Ye Xuan hadn't just attained the Dao Defense Realm in terms of physical body, his cultivation had as well!
It wasn't as simple as one plus one!
The Dao Ancestor stared fixedly at Ye Xuan from afar, and he was extremely shocked!
How could Ye Xuan's combat strength be so great after attaining the Dao Defense Realm?
The Dao Ancestor restrained his thoughts and glanced at the two others, "Let's attack together!"
As soon as he finished speaking, he charged forward!
The other two experts at the Dao Formation Realm attacked as well!
Three experts at the Dao Formation Realm attacked together!
Ye Xuan took a step forward and slashed with his sword.
Bang!
His attack blasted the Dao Ancestor back, but it only took a moment for two fists to smash against Ye Xuan's chest and head!
Bang!
Ye Xuan's figure was instantly blasted flying, and he flew for over 3km!
After he stopped moving, Ye Xuan felt dizzy. Meanwhile, the two Dao Formation Realm experts appeared in front of him again. Ye Xuan's expression changed slightly, and he swung his sword horizontally.
Bang!
An expanse of sword light exploded apart, and then Ye Xuan was blasted flying again. Meanwhile, the Dao Ancestor suddenly appeared in front of Ye Xuan, and he suddenly swung his fist at Ye Xuan!
Bang!
The starry sky trembled as his fist smashed forward.
Meanwhile, Ye Xuan suddenly opened his palm, and then Situ Tingyun's 10 strands of sword energy suddenly slashed forward!
The Dao Ancestor's expression changed drastically when he witnessed this scene, and he immediately retreated explosively!
The other two Dao Formation Realm experts hurriedly retreated as well!
Situ Tingyun's sword energy was capable of killing them!
Ye Xuan wiped off the blood on the corners of his mouth with a solemn expression on his face.
Even though he'd attained the Dao Defense Realm, he was still unable to fight three enemies by himself!
Should I activate the energy of my bloodline?
Ye Xuan slowly closed his eyes!
The energy of his bloodline had gone completely berserk, and it was his final trump card!
The Dao Ancestor stared fixedly at Ye Xuan from afar, and he was even more shocked by Ye Xuan's physical body!
Ye Xuan had just suffered the full forced attacks of two Dao Formation Realm experts, yet he was still alive and well!
What sort of physical body is this?
Meanwhile, one of the Dao Formation Realm experts by the Dao Ancestor's side spoke abruptly, "We can't delay any longer!
If we continue to delay, then both our forces and the Fifth Dimension will suffer heavy losses!
Moreover, I'm afraid an unexpected event might occur! "
The Dao Ancestor turned around to look. At this moment, the experts of the Fifth Dimension were locked in battle with the experts of the Daoting Realm!
If this continued, then both sides would suffer heavy losses!
After all, the Daoting Realm had another enemy, and it was the Dao Tomb!
As for the three of them, although they could defeat Ye Xuan, Ye Xuan had the Sword Qi and Ye Xuan's powerful physical body, so they wouldn't be able to kill Ye Xuan in a short period of time!
Thinking to this point, the Dao Ancestor looked at Ye Xuan. "Ye Xuan, I originally prepared a big gift for the woman behind you, but since she won't appear, then I'll give it to you!"
As he spoke, he opened his palm, and the next moment, a golden light soared into the sky from the thirty-fourth layer of the Daoting Realm. In the blink of an eye, this golden light appeared in the starry sky of the Fifth Dimension.
In an instant, the entire starry sky trembled.
Inside that golden light was a God's Seal!
Inside that God's Seal, an illusory figure gradually condensed. As this illusory figure condensed, a formless pressure enveloped the entire Fifth Dimension!
Under this pressure, everyone felt like they were suffocating!
Even Ye Xuan felt a tightness in his chest at this moment, as if there were several mountains pressing down on him.
On the other side, the Lord's expression also became incomparably solemn. "The head of the Three Thousand Great Daos …"
.....







Chapter 1408
Three Thousand Great Daos!
The Three Thousand Great Daos represented three thousand different Great Daos. Of course, there were far more than three thousand Great Daos in the world.
And among these Great Daos, there were strong and weak ones!
The first was the Great Dao of Destiny!
The foremost of the Three Thousand Great Daos!
The Dao Ancestor didn't control the Great Dao of Destiny. However, someone in the Daoting had once controlled the Great Dao, and that person was the founder of the Daoting!
Daoting's strongest trump card was not the two hidden Dao Realm powerhouses, but the God's Seal!
That was because the Daoting Ancestral Souls were inside!
This was Daoting's last resort!
Originally, he was saving it for the mysterious woman in a plain dress behind Ye Xuan.
However, the woman in a plain dress didn't show herself. For the sake of swiftly killing Ye Xuan, he could only utilize this trump card first!
In the distance, Ye Xuan stared at the silhouette within the God's Seal. Although his countenance was calm, his heart was thundering with rage. Dammit, he's summoning the ancestor again?
At this moment, everyone stopped what they were doing!
There was no need to fight!
If Ye Xuan's side didn't have a heavyweight expert, then it would be over!
It didn't take long for a woman to appear within the seal!
The woman was dressed in a long black robe. Her features were picturesque, and she held a black folding fan in her hand.
After the woman appeared, she looked around and looked at the Dao Ancestor. However, as if she had discovered something, she suddenly turned to look at Ye Xuan below.
Seeing this scene, the Dao Ancestor's expression suddenly changed. My ancestor knows this Ye Xuan?
Ye Xuan was slightly stunned. This Daoting Ancestor knew him?
In the air, the woman looked at Ye Xuan. "Dao Form!"
Dao Body!
Upon hearing this, Ye Xuan's expression instantly changed!
Damn it, this woman doesn't recognize me, but she recognizes my Taoist form!
The woman suddenly smiled and said, "Interesting, I didn't expect someone to have cultivated a Dao Body!
How interesting! "
On the other side, the Dao Ancestor bowed slightly to the woman. "Ancestor, what is this Dao Body?"
The woman glanced at the Dao Ancestor. "Did you summon me?"
The Dao Ancestor quickly nodded.
The woman turned to look at Ye Xuan. She gently tapped the folding fan in her right hand on the palm of her left hand and said with a smile, "You are also a protector!"
Ye Xuan said nothing.
The Dao Ancestor's expression changed drastically. Just as he was about to speak, the woman suddenly said, "To be able to cultivate a Dao Body and possess a Disaster Cause … Young man, you are not simple at all!"
Ye Xuan hurriedly said, "To tell you the truth, I am the young sect master of Whirling Sect!"
The woman blinked. "Whirling Sect?
Are you sure? "
Ye Xuan said seriously, "Of course!"
The woman smiled and said, "It just so happens that I am acquainted with the Whirling Sect's Sect Leader. Let me ask him!"
As she spoke, she turned her head and kissed him.
Below, Ye Xuan: "…"
After a while, the woman turned her head and looked at Ye Xuan. "The Whirling Sect's Sect Master said that there's no such person as you!"
Ye Xuan hesitated for a moment and said, "Why don't we change the topic?"
The woman was stunned, and then she cracked a smile. It was like a hundred flowers blooming, causing the starry sky to pale in comparison.
At the side, the Dao Ancestor said in a low voice, "Ancestor, this person is a great enemy of my Daoting. I …"
The woman looked at the Dao Ancestor. "Don't speak for now!"
The Dao Ancestor: "…"
The woman turned to look at Ye Xuan and said with a smile, "Not only did you cultivate a Dao Body, you were also able to live until now despite having a Disaster Cause … The most important thing is the power of your bloodline. Your bloodline is the strongest power I have ever seen!
！”
Ye Xuan hurriedly took out the Sword Spirit and the sword at the top of the pagoda. "Senior, why don't you take a look at this!"
The woman glanced at the two swords and said with a smile, "Are you threatening me?"
Ye Xuan shook his head. "Senior, not only do you Daoting want to destroy me, but you also want to destroy my Five-Dimensional Universe. Now, you have even invited you out … Tell me, who is threatening who?"
The woman turned to look at the Dao Ancestor. "You want to destroy this universe?"
The Dao Ancestor's expression was somewhat ugly.
The woman asked with a smile, "As the guardian of the Great Dao, shouldn't you be maintaining the balance and peace of the universe?"
The Dao Ancestor's expression became even uglier.
The woman looked at the Dao Ancestor and the others below and said with a smile, "It seems that you have turned the Three Thousand Great Dao into your personal tools!"
Hearing this, the expressions of all the Daoting powerhouses below became extremely ugly!
What a heart-wrenching remark!
The woman looked at Dao Ting and the others. "The Great Dao once chose all of you. It's obvious that all of you are outstanding in some way. However, from the looks of it now, all of you are still going with the flow and have forgotten your original intentions!"
The Dao Ancestor suddenly said, "Ancestor, this Ye Xuan is a great enemy of the Daoting. This person once swore to destroy the Daoting, I …"
The woman looked at the Dao Ancestor and said with a smile, "Can you tell me why he did this?"
The Dao Ancestor was speechless.
The woman said again, "Everything has a reason. Why did he want to destroy the Daoting? Can you tell me?"
The Dao Ancestor was speechless.
At this time, Ye Xuan suddenly said, "Why don't I tell you!"
The woman looked at Ye Xuan and said with a smile, "That's fine too!"
Ye Xuan nodded. He told the whole story of the grudge between him and the Daoting without adding any details.
The atmosphere in the surroundings had become slightly strange!
This woman was originally called out by the Daoting to deal with Ye Xuan. But now, this woman was listening to Ye Xuan talk about the Daoting …
Whose ancestor was this?
The Dao Ancestor's face was gloomy. No one knew what he was thinking.
On the other side, Rahu looked at the Great Lord. "Great Lord, this …"
The Great Lord said softly, "The Dao Ancestor has miscalculated!
Back then, the Great Dao Guardians of that generation were all impartial … Those people were righteous and paid attention to fairness in everything. Because of this, there were all kinds of orders in that era … "
As he said that, he looked at the Dao Ancestor. "He thought that the Daoting ancestor would help him, but that's not the case. The Daoting ancestor paid more attention to right and wrong.
And this matter is obviously the Daoting is not in the right.
So, there's going to be a good show! "
At this time, Ye Xuan stopped in the distance.
The woman turned to look at the Dao Ancestor. "Did this little friend Ye slander the Daoting?"
The Dao Ancestor did not say anything.
The woman suddenly waved her right hand.
Smack!
Under everyone's shocked gazes, the Dao Ancestor was sent flying with a slap!
He flew more than 10,000 feet, and when he came to a stop, his fleshly body became illusory!
He shattered his body with a slap!
Seeing this scene, everyone's expression changed!
Ye Xuan's expression also changed. Damn, how could this woman be so strong?
If he were to be slapped, wouldn't his Daoist Physique be destroyed?
The woman turned to look at Ye Xuan and said with a smile, "This matter is the Daoting's fault. On behalf of the Daoting, I apologize to you and the entire Fifth Dimension!"
Everyone: "…"
Ye Xuan was also dumbfounded.
The enemy's biggest boss apologized to him?
What was going on?
Ye Xuan hesitated for a while and then said.
"Why?
Shouldn't you be helping the Daoting? "
The woman shook her head. "Logically, I should be helping the Daoting!
But, the Daoting is not in the right! "
Ye Xuan looked at the woman. "You're being reasonable?"
The woman said with a smile, "Why not?
The Three Thousand Great Daos are a kind of order. As the guardian of the order, if you are unreasonable, who will obey the order? "
Ye Xuan shook his head. "In today's world, only fists matter, not reason!"
The woman looked at Ye Xuan. "Then, are you interested in rebuilding the order?"
Ye Xuan looked at the woman. "Do you want me to be the Daoting Master?"
The woman said with a smile, "Can't I?"
Ye Xuan shook his head. "Senior, my mind is in a mess right now!"
The boss of the Daoting Master actually wanted him to be the Daoting Master!
What was going on?
The woman said with a smile, "Do you have five Daoist scriptures on you?"
Ye Xuan nodded.
The woman said again, "There should be two Daoting Masters. With these two, you have seven!"
At this moment, the Lord suddenly said with a smile, "My Dao Tomb also has one. With this one, Young Master Ye has eight!"
The woman looked at the Lord. The Lord bowed slightly. "Greetings, Ancestor!"
The woman said with a smile, "You used to be a Daoting Master?"
The Lord nodded. "Yes!
However, I rebelled later on!
Because Daoting is not the Daoting I once thought of.
Of course, this has nothing to do with Ancestor. I admire what Ancestor did just now. "
The woman smiled and looked at Ye Xuan. "As long as you nod, you can have eight Daoist scriptures. So, what do you think?"
Ye Xuan looked at the woman. "Why did you choose me?"
The woman blinked and said playfully, "Do you want to hear the truth or a lie?"
Ye Xuan thought for a while and said, "Lie first!"
The woman said with a smile, "You are a rare genius. With you, we can revitalize Daoting and rebuild order …"
Ye Xuan smiled. "What about the truth?"
The woman looked at Ye Xuan. "You have many backers!"
Ye Xuan was speechless.
The woman said again, "It is not particularly difficult to revitalize Daoting. However, it is very difficult to gather all the Daoist scriptures and summon the Great Dao Spirit. To restore the 3,000 Great Dao and rebuild order, we must gather all the Daoist scriptures and summon the Great Dao Spirit.
However, ordinary people cannot do this. "
Ye Xuan was puzzled. "Why is it so difficult?"
The woman said with a smile, "There are three difficulties. First, the last Daoist scripture is in Whirling World. That place is not something you can provoke now.
Second, many people will not let you gather all the Daoist scriptures. For example, Whirling World, Dark Abyss and Ancient God Abyss … If these forces know that you have eight Daoist scriptures, they will be jealous. Once they are jealous, you will be in danger!
Third, even if you gather all eight Daoist scriptures, the Great Dao Spirit may not recognize you. It might even kill you! "
Ye Xuan was puzzled. "Why would it kill me?"
The woman shook her head. "You will know this in the future!
I can only tell you that it is very difficult to gather all the Daoist scriptures and get the Great Dao Spirit's recognition! "
Ye Xuan said in a deep voice, "Senior, do you think I can get the Great Dao Spirit's recognition?"
The woman blinked. "I don't know if she will recognize you. However, I know that she will not dare to kill you!"
Ye Xuan frowned. "Why?"
The woman said, "Because you have many backers!"
Ye Xuan was speechless.
....
PS: Don't say that I am threatening you. If you don't give me the ticket, I will castrate myself!







Chapter 1409
Many backers!
Ye Xuan was speechless. What was she talking about?
In the starry sky, the woman smiled and said, "What if I don't agree?"
Ye Xuan looked at the woman and said, "What if I don't agree?"
The woman blinked her eyes and said, "You will agree!"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "Why?"
The woman said, "Because you have no reason to refuse!"
Ye Xuan shook his head and said, "I only want to protect the Five-Dimensional Universe!"
The woman smiled and said, "If you want to protect the universe behind you, then become the Daoting Master and you will be able to protect it better!"
Ye Xuan pointed at the Daoting experts in the distance and said, "They will not accept me!"
The woman pointed at herself and said, "I approve of you!"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "Then can you make them approve of me?"
The woman asked, "If I approve of you, will they dare to not approve of you?"
Ye Xuan was silent.
The woman said again, "Young man, I don't have much time left!"
Ye Xuan looked at the woman and she continued, "While I am still here, I can help you. Therefore, you must make a decision!"
Ye Xuan was silent.
The woman smiled and said, "I still have about a quarter of an hour. Want to walk with me?"
Ye Xuan thought about it and said, "Okay!"
The woman and Ye Xuan walked towards the starry sky in the distance.
In the field, the Daoting experts looked at each other in dismay.
The Dao Ancestor who only had his soul left had a gloomy expression and no one knew what he was thinking.
In the distant starry sky, the woman pointed and said, "In the distant starry sky, there is a mysterious force called the Ancient God Abyss. The weakest in this force is the Dao Attainment Realm and there are experts above the Dao Attainment Realm!"
Ye Xuan said in a deep voice, "Are they outside the Dao Scripture?"
The woman shook her head and said, "They are within the Dao Scripture!"
Ye Xuan frowned and said, "Experts above the Dao Attainment Realm are also within the Dao Scripture?"
The woman nodded and said, "Yes."
Ye Xuan was silent.
He had underestimated this Dao scripture!
The woman continued: "This power has been fighting against a mysterious power all year round. This mysterious power is called Dark Abyss. This place is very terrifying because a monstrous genius once appeared in this place. This person is called Second Brother Dao. Back then, he created a Dark Scripture based on the Dao Scripture!"
Ye Xuan frowned. "Secret scripture?"
The woman nodded, "It was created according to the Dao Scripture … The people of the Dark World all cultivate the Dark Scripture. As far as I know, they have two goals. First, they want to destroy the Dao Scripture Martial Arts Civilization and make the Dark Scripture Martial Arts Civilization the only one. Second, they want to destroy the Great Dao Spirit."
As she spoke, she looked at Shen Xiang. "Do you know why the Dao Scripture is divided into nine parts?"
Ye Xuan shook his head.
The woman replied: "Because the Dao Scripture was destroyed by the people of the Dark Abyss!"
Ye Xuan was speechless.
The woman suddenly asked, "Are you willing to give up on the Dao scriptures?"
Ye Xuan was silent.
The woman smiled and said, "Looks like you are not willing to give up!
Actually, if I were you, I wouldn't give up either.
Why?
Because even if you give up, they might not let you go!
In this world, being weak is a mistake and a sin! "
Ye Xuan gave a thumbs up. "Senior's words are brilliant!"
The woman laughed and gently fanned Ye Xuan's head. "Don't play tricks!
I told you so much because I want to tell you that you will always be the Dao Scripture. One day, you will face the Dark Abyss!
If you become the Lord of the Daoting, the forces you control will become even stronger. After all, the Daoting's overall forces are still very strong, right? "
It's very strong, right? "
Ye Xuan was silent.
The woman continued: "Moreover, if you become the Lord of the Daoting, you will immediately have two Dao Scriptures!
Apart from that, I can give you a surprise! "
Ye Xuan was curious. "Surprise?"
The woman smiled and said, "It is in the 34th Heaven of the Daoting!"
Ye Xuan looked at the woman. "Senior, you really want me to become the Lord of the Daoting. Why is that?"
The woman smiled and did not say anything.
Ye Xuan said, "Senior, can you tell me the truth?"
The woman nodded and looked at Ye Xuan. "There is a bad karma between you and the Daoting. I want to turn this bad karma into good karma. Of course, I feel that you are also the hope to save the Daoting. After all, the Daoting now is not the Daoting of the past. However, I feel that even if you cannot restore order to this world, you should be able to make the Daoting better!"
Ye Xuan looked at the woman and did not say anything.
The woman smiled and said, "Otherwise, what do you think I am scheming?"
Ye Xuan shook his head. "I don't know!"
The woman continued to walk forward. "My generation has sacrificed too much for the order of this world. I don't want to see the Daoting continue to decline, and I don't want to see the Daoting perish."
Ye Xuan asked, "Senior, have you fallen?"
The woman smiled and did not say anything.
Ye Xuan asked again, "No?"
The woman smiled and said, "You care a lot about me?"
Ye Xuan was speechless.
The woman stopped and looked at Ye Xuan. "How is it? Have you thought it through?"
Ye Xuan was silent.
At this moment, the woman suddenly said, "Nian Nian!"
Ye Xuan looked at the woman. The woman smiled and said, "That Fifth Dimension Tendo is still alive, right?"
Ye Xuan said in a deep voice, "What do you mean, Senior?"
The woman looked at Ye Xuan. "Do you really think that her death was because of my Daoting?"
Ye Xuan clenched his fists. "What do you mean, Senior?"
The woman smiled and said, "She did not die because of Daoting. She died because of you!"
Ye Xuan stared at the woman. "Why do you say that?"
The woman pointed at Ye Xuan. "The Cause of Calamity!
She has helped you too much!
Not only did she help you too much, but she also forcefully interfered with your Cause of Calamity, helping you block some of the Calamity Karma that originally belonged to you … In short, you just need to understand one thing. The Cause of Calamity on you is not as simple as you think. You want to protect the entire Fifth Dimension, so your Cause of Calamity is very likely to implicate the entire Fifth Dimension! "
Ye Xuan said, "Then, Senior, aren't you afraid that I will implicate Daoting?"
The woman smiled and said, "There are no absolutes in everything!
You can cause the Fifth Dimension and Daoting to perish together, but you can also cause the Fifth Dimension and Daoting to become even more powerful! "
Ye Xuan was silent.
The woman opened her palm, and a God's Seal appeared in her hand. She handed the God's Seal to Ye Xuan. "This is the first of the 3,000 Grand Daos, the Grand Dao of Destiny!
It will fuse with you, allowing you to slowly comprehend the Dao of Destiny. You will also be able to use it to achieve Dao in a short period of time! "
Dao Realm!
Ye Xuan was silent.
The woman continued, "If you want to protect the Fifth Dimension and protect your Sister Nian, you will need to obtain even more power!"
Ye Xuan softly said, "It seems that I am being unreasonable!"
As he spoke, he received the God's Seal.
The woman smiled and said, "It is not unreasonable, but you are very cautious. If I am not wrong, you should be afraid that I will plot against you!
I can also tell you that I am indeed plotting against you! "
Ye Xuan looked at the woman and said, "Senior, will we meet in the future?"
The woman smiled and said, "It is up to you!"
At this moment, Ye Xuan knew that the woman in front of him was not dead!
The woman continued, "Let me tell you a piece of bad news. The Whirling World should already know that you have the Five Dao Scriptures!"
Ye Xuan was struck dumb. Then he asked, "Why?"
The woman looked at Ye Xuan and smiled and said, "Because I have communicated with the Whirling World before. With the strength of the Whirling World, they should be able to sense the aura of the Five Dao Scriptures!
After all, you were so close to me at that time! "
Ye Xuan: "…"
The woman smiled and said, "This is the price you have to pay for deceiving me. Lying has a price!"
Ye Xuan's face was full of black lines.
The woman glanced at her body. At this moment, her body was quickly becoming illusory.
The woman smiled and said, "It is going to disappear!
Do you have any questions?
If there is, I will answer them if I can! "
Ye Xuan asked in a deep voice, "Where is Senior now?"
The woman shook her head, "I can't answer!"
Ye Xuan frowned slightly, "Why?"
The woman smiled and said, "There is no why, I just can't answer!
You can ask the next question.
Of course, you can also choose not to ask! "
Ye Xuan thought for a moment and said, "How should I address you, Senior?"
The woman looked at Ye Xuan and smiled meaningfully, "What do you want to do?"
Ye Xuan hurriedly said, "I don't mean anything else. I just want to ask!
You can't answer this? "
The woman laughed and said, "There is no harm in telling you!
My name is Zhao Zhiqing. Most people call me Qing Zhu. In fact, very few people know my real name! "
Zhao Zhiqing!
Ye Xuan nodded slightly, "I will remember it!"
The woman looked at Ye Xuan and smiled, "I have two bad news. Do you want to hear it?"
Bad news!
Ye Xuan frowned slightly, "What bad news?"
The woman said, "The first bad news is that the Taoist Ancestor ran away!"
Ye Xuan frowned slightly. The woman said softly, "The second bad news is that someone helped him escape. And this person should be someone from the Dark World!
Of course, there is even worse news. The two Taoist scriptures were taken away by the Taoist Ancestor! "
Ye Xuan immediately jumped up, "Senior, why didn't you stop them!"
The woman was a little helpless, "I talked too much with you!"
Ye Xuan, "…"
The woman smiled and said, "Don't be angry!
What is yours is still yours. What is not yours, you can't take it away! "
After saying that, her lower body disappeared.
Ye Xuan said in a deep voice, "Senior, can I call the ancestor in the future?
Can I summon you to help me? "
The woman blinked her eyes, "I'm afraid not!"
Ye Xuan was a little puzzled, "Why?"
The woman smiled and said, "Do you want to hear the truth or a lie?"
Ye Xuan said in a deep voice, "What is the lie?"
The woman said seriously, "The lie is that this is the last clone I left here. But now, this clone will disappear completely. So, you know!"
Ye Xuan was a little curious, "What is the truth?"
The woman looked at Ye Xuan and grinned, "The truth is that I don't want to have too much contact with you. I am afraid of bad luck. So, I refuse your summoning!
Bye bye! "
After saying that, she disappeared.
In the air, Ye Xuan was petrified …
.....







Chapter 1410
In the starry sky, Ye Xuan stood quietly, deep in thought.
It was very dramatic!
He did not expect that he would become the Lord of Daoting.
At this time, the Lord and the others suddenly appeared beside Ye Xuan. The Lord smiled. "Do you feel like it's a dream?"
Ye Xuan nodded. "A little!"
The Lord laughed. "I also feel like it's a dream!"
Just a moment ago, Ye Xuan and Daoting were mortal enemies. Now, Ye Xuan had become the Lord of Daoting.
This Dao Ancestor's Summoning directly killed himself and gave Daoting to Ye Xuan!
This operation was really rare!
Ye Xuan suddenly said. "Senior, is there a big difference between the Daoting of the past and the Daoting of the present?"
The Lord smiled. "There is no comparison at all. The Great Dao was once complete and there was order in the world. Good will be rewarded and evil will be punished … The reason why it could be like this was because the Great Dao Guardians of Daoting were impartial and impartial.
At that time, no one dared to practice favoritism because if they did, not only would they be deprived of their Deity Position, but they would also fall into the evil path of reincarnation.
In that era, the price of doing evil was very high. Therefore, the Great Dao Guardians basically did not dare to do evil. "
Ye Xuan frowned. "Then why did Daoting become like this?"
The Lord said. "Because Qing Zhu and the others disappeared!"
Ye Xuan was puzzled. "Disappeared?
Left? "
The Lord said softly. "They should have left!
Anyway, after that group of people left, the people behind them began to take over Daoting. Unknowingly, Daoting began to slowly deteriorate.
Originally, the Dao Master position of Daoting was for the virtuous, but later on, this position became the private property of some people. They only passed it on to their own sons and it was passed down from generation to generation, including the Dao Ancestor just now. The reason why he could become the Lord of Daoting was because his father was the previous Dao Ancestor! "
Ye Xuan was silent.
The Lord laughed, "Now that you are the Lord of Daoting, you can change Daoting.
Also, be careful of the Dao Ancestor. He should have been rescued by the people from the Dark Abyss! "
An Abyss!
Ye Xuan said solemnly, "The people from the Dark Abyss saved him because of the two scriptures, right?"
The Lord nodded. "Yes!
After that, An Yuan will probably come looking for you! "
Ye Xuan was speechless.
The Lord flicked his finger and a Daoist scripture appeared in front of Ye Xuan. It was the sixth scripture.
The Lord smiled and said, "I'll give it to you!
If you have time, come to the Dao Tomb to play! "
With that, he turned around and left.
Ye Xuan looked at the scripture in his hands, speechless.
The Lord was definitely afraid that the people from the Dark Abyss would come looking for him. That was why he gave the Dao Scripture to him so easily.
An Abyss!
Ye Xuan was silent for a moment before he turned around and left.
Somewhere in the starry sky, Su Ke looked away after Ye Xuan left.
In fact, he had come to the Fifth Dimension a long time ago. However, he did not make a move. He wanted to act at the crucial moment. He did not expect that after the Daoting Ancestor came out, the Daoting Ancestor would stand on Ye Xuan's side!
He did not expect this at all!
Of course, he did not expect that An Yuan would save the Dao Ancestor!
This meant that An Yuan would become enemies with Ye Xuan!
Thinking of this, Su Ke wanted to laugh.
Su Ke suddenly said, "Stay here and protect Young Master Ye. I will return to the Ancient God Abyss."
With that, he turned around and left.
....
On the other side, the Dao Ancestor, who was already a soul body, stood in the starry sky. Not far in front of him stood a middle-aged man in a black robe.
Dao
The Dao Ancestor looked at the middle-aged man in front of him. "An Yuan!"
The middle-aged man smiled. "You guessed it right. You can call me Lian Zun!"
The Dao Ancestor was expressionless. "You saved me for the two scriptures?"
Lian Zun smiled. "Will you give them to me?"
The Dao Ancestor laughed at himself. "Can I refuse?"
With that, he flicked his finger and two scriptures appeared in front of Lian Zun.
Lian Zun did not refuse and kept the two scriptures.
At this moment, the Dao Ancestor suddenly said, "Ye Xuan has five of them!"
Lian Zun glanced at the Dao Ancestor and smiled. "You want us to kill Ye Xuan!"
The Dao Ancestor smiled. "You wanted to go, didn't you?"
Lian Zun looked at the starry sky and said softly, "To be honest, we are here for Ye Xuan!
As far as we know, he is related to the Sword Sect, and the Sword Sect has a blood feud with An Yuan! "
The Dao Ancestor frowned. "Blood feud?"
Lian Zun said softly, "Back then, the Sword Sect's Ancestral Master, that female sword cultivator, not only killed dozens of our Dark Abyss experts, but she also brought her sword to our Dark Abyss …"
At this point, he didn't say anything else.
That incident back then could be said to be the Dark Abyss' humiliation!
The Dao Ancestor looked at Lian Zun. "I have to remind you that there is a little girl by Ye Xuan's side. Her name is Mu Niannian. Her strength is beyond your imagination. If you want to obtain the scriptures and kill Ye Xuan, you must be quick. Otherwise, once she regains her memory and strength, you will be like ants before her!"
Lian Zun said softly, "Are you talking about the Mu Niannian who shattered your body with less than 30% of her strength?"
The Dao Ancestor said, "Yes!"
Lian Zun was silent.
Coming to this place this time, many things and people were beyond his expectations!
Especially Ye Xuan. Ye Xuan's strength shocked him.
Although he was at the Dao Controlling Realm, Ye Xuan could totally become a Dao Realm expert. Most importantly, Ye Xuan's bloodline power and body were too terrifying!
The Dao Ancestor was about to speak, but Lian Zun smiled and said, "You don't have to sow discord. We will kill Ye Xuan because he is not only related to the Sword Sect, but also to the Ancient God Abyss. Therefore, he must die."
He shook his head and smiled. "To be honest, there are too many reasons to kill him!"
The Dao Ancestor slowly closed his eyes.
At this moment, he was the most indignant and aggrieved!
He had been holding back his ultimate move, but he did not expect that it would not only destroy him, but also help Ye Xuan!
Of course, he did not expect that the ancestor of Daoting would not help Daoting, but Ye Xuan!
And he even made Ye Xuan the Master of Daoting!
Every time he thought of this, his liver ached.
Angry!
At this moment, Lian Zun suddenly said, "Dao Ancestor, are you willing to go to the Dark Abyss?
If you are, we will help you to restore your body! "
The Dao Ancestor said softly, "Do I have the right to refuse?"
Lian Zun laughed. "Then we will be on the same side from now on!
Let's go! "
After saying this, he turned and left.
The Dao Ancestor turned and looked at the starry sky of the Fifth Dimension. His eyes gradually turned cold. "Ye Xuan, we will meet again!"
After saying this, he turned and left.
....
Ye Xuan returned to the starry sky of the Fifth Dimension. At this moment, some of the people of Daoting had left. Bai Dizi had also disappeared, but White Robe was still there.
Ye Xuan walked in front of the Daoting experts. Everyone was looking at Ye Xuan.
In fact, at this moment, they were already confused.
They were originally enemies with Ye Xuan, but with the appearance of their ancestor, everything changed!
The ancestor approved of Ye Xuan!
Could it be that they wanted to become enemies with the ancestor?
At this moment, White Robe suddenly walked in front of Ye Xuan. He looked at Ye Xuan without saying a word.
Ye Xuan suddenly smiled. "If you want to stay, you can stay. If you don't want to, you can leave immediately."
None of the Daoting experts moved.
Leave?
Where could they go?
At this moment, Ye Xuan opened his palm. A God's Seal appeared in his hand.
The Great Dao of Destiny!
The expressions of the 3 Dao Completion Realm experts instantly became extremely complicated when they witnessed this scene.
Their ancestor had passed this Great Dao Seal to Ye Xuan!
At this moment, Venerable Mi suddenly said, "Your Excellency … did the ancestor say anything?"
Ye Xuan looked at Venerable Mi. "She said that I should go find her in the future."
Venerable Mi was stunned, then bowed slightly. "This old man is willing to serve Your Excellency as my master!"
The other two Daoting experts bowed slightly as well.
When they saw the three Daoting experts bow, some of the Daoting experts who were watching hurriedly bowed as well.
The strongest three had already expressed their allegiance, so they naturally wouldn't hesitate any longer.
Ye Xuan slowly closed his eyes. "It's time for the Daoting to change!"
Venerable Mi hesitated for a moment and said, "I'm afraid it'll be difficult."
Ye Xuan gazed at Venerable Mi. "Do you want to change?"
Venerable Mi replied, "Rome wasn't built in a single day …"
Ye Xuan smiled. "Do you know why Big Sister Qing is so strong?"
Venerable Mi was stunned. "Big Sister Qing?"
Ye Xuan's expression didn't change. "Yes!
She asked me to call her Big Sister, and she said that she'll protect me from now on!
Is there a problem? "
Venerable Mi replied, "I … I have no problem …"
Ye Xuan glanced at the Daoting experts. Finally, he looked at White Robe. "White Robe, do you think the Daoting should change?"
White Robe looked at Ye Xuan. "You want me to submit?"
Ye Xuan smiled. "I don't want you to submit. However, I want to say that you don't have to fight for me. You can continue to fight for the Daoting."
White Robe was silent.
Ye Xuan asked. "Make your own decision!"
White Robe looked at Ye Xuan. "Bai Dizi asked me to follow you."
Bai Dizi!
Ye Xuan frowned slightly. He looked around. "Where is he?"
White Robe said indifferently, "He knows that you'll kill him, so he ran!"
Ye Xuan was silent.
He really wanted to kill Bai Dizi!
It was this person who had targeted him time and time again!
White Robe continued, "He said that the ancestor chose you for three reasons. First, the ancestor saw the strength of the person behind you. The strength of the person behind you is definitely beyond our imagination. Second, the ancestor wanted to end the bad karma between you and the Daoting, and turn this bad karma into good karma. Third, the ancestor chose you because she wanted you to change the Daoting and rebuild the order of the Great Dao. In other words, she felt that you could change the Daoting and rebuild the order of the Great Dao."
Ye Xuan was silent.
White Robe continued, "He also said that I can not fight for you, but I can continue to fight for the Daoting.
And if you, Ye Xuan, can gather the Dao Scriptures, it will be a great thing for me and the whole of the Daoting!
So … "
Saying that, he looked at Ye Xuan. "I will fight for the Daoting!"
.....







Chapter 1411
Fight for Daoting!
Following White Robe's declaration, the Daoting powerhouses under him also declared their allegiance.
In the Daoting, White Robe's prestige was second only to the Dao Ancestor, especially in the Celestial Abyss, where his White Robe Army was invincible.
And these people were even more loyal to White Robe than to the Dao Ancestor.
With White Robe and the others' submission, the entire Daoting was now truly under Ye Xuan's control.
At this time, Luo Hou and the others walked over. He looked at Ye Xuan and smiled. "Congratulations!"
The current Ye Xuan could be said to be on equal footing with the Dao Tomb Land!
No, with Ye Xuan's participation, the Daoting's strength could completely suppress the Dao Tomb Land!
Ye Xuan smiled. "Senior Luo Hou, the cooperation I've discussed with the Dao Tomb Land is still valid!"
Luo Hou's heart immediately relaxed. He smiled. "That's good!"
Ye Xuan looked up into the depths of the starry sky and said softly, "To Daoting!"
To Daoting!
He did not forget that Zhao Zhiqing had left him a surprise in the 34th Heaven!
Soon, Ye Xuan left the Fifth Dimension with everyone and headed for the Daoting.
In the starry sky, Luo Hou and the others watched Ye Xuan and the others leave with complicated expressions.
They never imagined that Ye Xuan would directly become the master of the Daoting!
Fortunately, Ye Xuan did not become enemies with the Dao Tomb Land. Otherwise, the Dao Tomb Land would be in an awkward situation.
After a moment, Luo Hou said, "Let's go!"
With that, he turned and left with Chi Yaoyao and the others.
...
Daoting.
Ye Xuan once again came to the Daoting. Unlike before, this time, he came openly.
Ye Xuan headed straight for the 34th level of heaven.
On the way, Ye Xuan suddenly asked, "Do you know what's inside the Thirty-fourth Heaven?"
Beside Ye Xuan, Venerated Mi shook his head. "We only know that it is the place where the Great Dao Seal is stored. We don't know anything else."
Ye Xuan looked at Venerable Mi. "You've never been inside?"
Venerable Mi nodded, "I've never entered before!"
Ye Xuan was puzzled. "Why?"
Venerable Mi hesitated for a moment and said, "I wouldn't dare to disturb you, Ancestor!"
Upon hearing this, Ye Xuan understood.
In the hearts of the Daoting people, Zhao Zhiqing's position was still very high.
Soon, Ye Xuan arrived at the entrance to the Thirty-fourth Heaven.
Back then, Sister Nian had come here, but she hadn't entered.
Now that he thought about it, Sister Nian must have felt Zhao Zhiqing's presence.
Sister Nian's strength was definitely not weaker than Zhao Zhiqing's, but at that time, Sister Nian only had less than 30% of her strength. Moreover, Sister Nian's main target was the Dao Ancestor!
Ye Xuan collected his thoughts and walked towards the Thirty-fourth Heaven!
Venerable Mi and the rest did not follow.
Soon, Ye Xuan arrived at the Thirty-fourth Heaven. The entire Thirty-fourth Heaven was empty. There was nothing there.
Ye Xuan was stunned.
Could it be that Zhao Zhiqing was lying to him?
At this moment, not far from Ye Xuan, the space suddenly trembled. Then, a black box floated out of the space.
A box!
Ye Xuan's expression was a little strange. Could this box also contain a little white guy?
Ye Xuan opened the box. Inside the box was a circular black and white seal!
The seal was half black and half white!
Ye Xuan picked up the seal and studied it. He frowned. What was this thing?
Ye Xuan studied it for a long time but still could not figure it out. Hence, he picked up the seal and left the Thirty-fourth Heaven.
Ye Xuan handed the seal to Venerable Mi. "This is?"
When he saw the black and white seal

When the seal appeared, Venerable Mi's expression changed!
Ye Xuan knew that Venerable Mi recognized this black and white seal!

"Dao seal?"
Ye Xuan was curious. "What is a Dao seal?"
Venerable Mi looked at Ye Xuan with a complicated expression. "A Dao seal!"
Ye Xuan asked again, "What's its use?"
Venerable Mi hesitated and shook his head. "I don't know either!"
Ye Xuan was speechless. After talking for so long, this guy still did not know the use of this Dao seal!
Venerable Mi said again, "Although I don't know the use of this item, it is my Daoting treasure. It has a spirit. Young friend, why don't you communicate with it? Perhaps you will gain something!"
The spirit of the Dao seal!
Ye Xuan nodded. He looked at the Dao seal. "Let's talk?"
No response!
Ye Xuan smiled. Then, he put the Dao seal back into the box. At this moment, an angry voice came from the box. "Let me out!"
Ye Xuan smirked. He opened the box and the Dao seal floated out. At the same time, a little boy floated out from the Dao seal.
The little boy looked about five or six years old. He had a pigtail and looked very cute!
Ye Xuan looked at the little boy. "How should I address you?"
The little boy looked at Ye Xuan and did not speak.
Ye Xuan smiled. "I'm Ye Xuan. What about you?"
The little boy snorted. "I'm not telling you!"
Ye Xuan laughed. "I know even if you don't tell me. You're Little Yin, right?"
The little boy frowned. "How did you know!"
Ye Xuan's expression froze. Damn, this guy is really called Little Yin?
Who gave him that name?
He's as good as me!
Little Yin looked at Ye Xuan. "Why did you call me out?"
Ye Xuan blinked and smiled. "I just wanted to ask. Are you strong?"
Little Yin snorted. "Of course I'm strong!"
Ye Xuan pointed at Venerated Mi. "Can you beat him?"
Venerated Mi: "…"
Little Yin looked at Venerated Mi. He hesitated and shook his head. "I can't beat him!"
Ye Xuan chuckled. "Looks like you're not that strong after all!"
Little Yin immediately said angrily, "Who said that?
Let me tell you. I'm very, very strong! "
Ye Xuan shrugged and did not speak. But his expression said: I don't believe you!
Little Yin suddenly put his palms together. The next moment, he turned into a black light and entered between Ye Xuan's brows.
Boom!
Ye Xuan's body trembled violently. The next moment, a powerful aura swept out from his body. This aura was so strong that Venerated Mi and the others around him were forced to retreat!
In an instant, the Daoting experts around Ye Xuan were sent flying thousands of feet away!
A huge black and white Tai Chi diagram appeared beneath Ye Xuan's feet.
At this moment, Ye Xuan was a little confused!
What the hell was this?
Little Yin suddenly said, "You fight him!"
Ye Xuan looked at Venerated Mi in the distance. He opened his palm and the Executing Heaven Sword appeared. As soon as the Executing Heaven Sword appeared, a Tai Chi diagram appeared above Venerated Mi's head. With the appearance of this Tai Chi diagram, Venerated Mi's realm was suppressed to Dao Defense realm!
From Dao Attainment realm to Dao Defense realm!
Meanwhile, Ye Xuan's aura skyrocketed. Although he did not directly reach Dao Attainment realm, his aura skyrocketed endlessly!
It was infinitely close to the Dao Defense realm!
It wasn't just Ye Xuan who was stunned, everyone else here was as well!
What the hell is this?
Why is it so abnormal?
Meanwhile, Venerated Mi spoke abruptly.

"I understand!
It's used for support! "
Ye Xuan fell silent.
He understood it now!
The Seal of the Grand Dao was a divine treasure of support!

Or it should be said that Dao Attainment Realm experts should be afraid of him!

Extremely amazing! "

Ye Xuan blinked and said, "Can't you leave by yourself?"
Little Yin lowered his head slightly. You have that seal on you.

The seal of a god!

Xiao Yin continued, "That woman, she used that broken seal to trap me …"

Ye Xuan smiled, "Of course!"
As soon as he finished speaking, he pointed with a finger, and the violet energy surged towards Little Yin.
Little Yin instantly revealed an intoxicated expression after absorbing the violet energy, and then he gazed at Ye Xuan, "Do you have more?"
Ye Xuan said with a smile, "No more today!"
Little Yin blinked, "You mean there will be more tomorrow?"
Ye Xuan gave him a thumbs up, "Smart!
How about this, you follow me, and I'll give you 30 strands of this violet energy every day, what do you think? "
Little Yin hesitated, and then said, "Do you want me to follow you and help you fight?"
Ye Xuan nodded, "I want you to follow me, but not to help me fight!
You follow me, and when I'm in trouble, you just need to help me a little, what do you think? "
Little Yin looked at Ye Xuan, "Let me think about it, okay?"
Ye Xuan smiled, "I'll give you 50 strands of violet energy every day!
On top of that, I'll give you 1,000 fortune divine crystals every day! "
As he spoke, he took out a pile of fortune divine crystals and placed them in front of Little Yin.
He knew that the Fortune Divine Crystal was useful to these spiritual beasts.
Little Yin glanced at the fortune divine crystals, and he was very tempted!
Ye Xuan smiled, "I'm a good person, and I don't usually fight!"
Revered Mi, "…"
Little Yin looked at Ye Xuan, and he was still a little hesitant.
Ye Xuan suddenly took out a stick of tanghulu and handed it to Little Yin.
Little Yin was a little curious, "What is this?"
Ye Xuan opened the parchment, and then handed it to Little Yin, "Lick it!"
Little Yin hesitated, and then licked the tanghulu. Soon, his eyes widened in disbelief, "What is this?"
Ye Xuan said with a straight face, "Tanghulu!"
Little Yin licked it again, and he was very excited, or rather a little emotional, because he had never eaten something like this before!
A moment later, Little Yin looked at Ye Xuan, and said excitedly, "I can follow you, but you have to give me a stick of tanghulu every day!"
Ye Xuan, "…"
Seeing that Ye Xuan did not speak, Little Yin hurriedly said, "Half will do!
Half a stick, no less! "
Ye Xuan, "…"
At the side, Revered Mi and the others could not bear to watch anymore …
Ye Xuan, devoid of conscience!
