With that, she glanced at Ye Xuan, "Take care!"
With that, she turned and left.
Ye Xuan was silent where he was.
At this moment, Nian Nian appeared beside Ye Xuan. She gently held Ye Xuan's hand, "Is it because of me?"
Ye Xuan shook his head, "It's not because of you, it's because of me."
Nian Nian tilted her head and looked at Ye Xuan, "Why?
Why? "
Ye Xuan said with a smile, "Because I have some good stuff that they all want!"
Nian Nian frowned slightly, "Why?"
Ye Xuan thought for a moment, then said, "Maybe I look easy to bully!"
Nian Nian blurted out, "I'll protect you!"
With that, she was stunned.
Ye Xuan was also stunned. She looked at Nian Nian, "Nian Nian … You …"
Nian Nian was a little confused, "I …"
Ye Xuan hurriedly said, "Did you remember something?"
Nian Nian shook her head, "No!
I … I don't know what happened to me just now. "
Ye Xuan gently rubbed Nian Nian's little head, smiled, "It's fine, it's fine. Let's go, I'll take you to roast fish!"
Hearing this, Nian Nian's eyes lit up, "Okay!"
Ye Xuan laughed, he took Nian Nian's hand and walked into the distance.
Behind the two of them was Venerated Mi.
At this moment, an old man appeared beside Venerated Mi, it was Bai Dizi.
Bai Dizi said softly, "Are you worried?"
Venerated Mi nodded, "But I don't think Dao Master is worried at all!"
Bai Dizi said, "He's not worried, he should have a plan to deal with it!"
Venerated Mi shook his head, "Recently, there have been some mysterious auras appearing in the Fifth Dimension, some of them are so powerful … I'm afraid they've already surpassed Dao Attainment!"
Bai Dizi was silent.
Venerated Mi sighed, "Those six scrolls of Dao Scriptures are really a disaster!"
Bai Dizi glanced at Venerated Mi, "Do you think if we hand them over, An Yuan will let him and the Fifth Dimension go?"
Venerated Mi frowned, "Why not?
Isn't their goal the six scrolls of Dao Scriptures? "
Bai Dizi looked at Venerated Mi, "If you were An Yuan, after snatching Ye Xuan's six scrolls of Dao Scriptures, would you still let him and Mu Niannian live?"
Venerated Mi was silent.
Definitely not!
Because if these two were alive, they would pose too great of a threat!
Thinking of this, Venerated Mi sighed.
Bai Dizi continued, "Whether it's An Yuan or Whirling Sect, they won't let Ye Xuan and Mu Niannian live, just like us!
If we don't kill Ye Xuan and Mu Niannian, once Ye Xuan grows up, or Mu Niannian recovers his memory and strength … At that time, who can withstand their revenge? "
Saying this, he looked at Ye Xuan and Nian Nian in the distance, whispering, "I've dealt with him so many times. This guy is very sinister, let's wait and see!"
Venerated Mi nodded, "That's the only way!"
Bai Dizi said, "I'm going to find Zhen Wu!"
Venerated Mi frowned, "Will he come back?"
Bai Dizi whispered, "I'll try my best to persuade him to come back!"
Saying this, he turned and disappeared into the horizon.
...
Somewhere in the starry sky, Dao Ancestor flew through the sky, his speed reaching the extreme. Wherever he passed, the starry sky trembled.
Looking for the plain-dressed woman!
In fact, he had long wanted to see who this woman was!
Because this woman was too mysterious!
She only needed one sword to kill!
This was the result of their investigation. Other than this, there was no other information!
How strong was she?
No one knew!
But Dao Ancestor knew, he would know soon!
At this moment, Dao Ancestor suddenly looked into the distance, his eyes narrowed, "I finally found you!
Let me see if you can kill me with one sword! "
Saying this, his speed suddenly increased.
.....
PS: Vote?







Chapter 1418
In the endless starry sky, the stars shone brightly, mysterious and tranquil.
How big was the universe?
No one knew!
Even the plain-dressed woman did not know.
She walked from the third dimension to the fifth dimension, but there was still no end to the starry sky.
The starry sky was the same as the path of martial arts. There was no end, and no one knew where it ended!
The vast universe was endless.
The plain-dressed woman walked slowly. She walked very slowly because she could not completely sense that person. To be precise, it was the source of the calamity.
Fate!
Everyone in the world was studying fate, including the owner of the Dao Scripture, but had fate really been studied?
Man conquers nature?
Many people were strong enough to change their fate, but who could be sure that the fate you changed was not your true fate?
In fact, she had tried to forcefully cut off the cause of the calamity on Ye Xuan's body. With her strength, it was not difficult at all to cut off the cause of the calamity. Just one sword was enough.
But she gave up in the end.
Because she realized that if she cut off the cause of the calamity, Ye Xuan would die.
There was only one explanation!
This cause of the calamity had a lot to do with Ye Xuan himself!
Fate was like an invisible hand that controlled everything in the dark.
Her goal was to find out who this giant hand belonged to, find it, and then kill it.
At this moment, a voice came from behind the plain-dressed woman, "I finally found you!"
The plain-dressed woman stopped in her tracks. A man suddenly appeared a hundred feet in front of her.
Dao Ancestor!
The Dao Ancestor looked at the plain-dressed woman and smiled, "It was not easy to find you!"
The plain-dressed woman looked at the Dao Ancestor and did not speak.
The Dao Ancestor chuckled, "I only came this time for one purpose, and that is to see how strong you are!"
"How strong?"
The plain-dressed woman said softly, "You want to know how strong I am?"
The Dao Ancestor looked at the plain-dressed woman, "Yes!"
The plain-dressed woman shook her head, "You will be disappointed!"
The Dao Ancestor frowned slightly, "What do you mean?"
The plain-dressed woman walked towards the Dao Ancestor, "I don't know myself, so how would you know?"
As the voice fell, the plain-dressed woman had already appeared tens of thousands of feet behind the Dao Ancestor.
In the same place, the Dao Ancestor looked into the distance, his eyes empty.
In between his eyebrows, there was a small sword hole!
The plain-dressed woman drew her sword!
She drew her sword!
However, he did not know when she had struck!
When did she do it?
Of course, this was not the main point!
Most importantly, his Daofather was dead!
Moreover, the woman in the plain dress had only used one sword strike!
Even at that moment, the Dao Ancestor still did not know how strong the woman in the plain dress was.
Because she only used one sword!
In the starry sky, the body of the Dao Ancestor became more and more illusory.
He knew that he was going to disappear completely.
At that moment, the Dao Ancestor suddenly smiled.
What are you laughing at?
He laughed at himself for being a frog in a well!
Before coming here, he felt that even if he wasn't a match for the woman in a plain dress, it wouldn't be a problem for him to escape unscathed.
However, only now did he realize how childish his thoughts were!
All this while, whether it was Daoting or An Yuan, they had both placed great importance on the plain-dressed lady. However, at this moment, he realized that they had underestimated her!
Great contempt!
When they faced the plain-dressed lady, they thought that she was at most at the Attainment of Dao. That was because the Attainment of Dao was already the highest realm they could come into contact with.
However, at that moment, he suddenly understood that the woman in the plain dress might be so strong that it was beyond their understanding.
It was very stupid to use their eyes and knowledge to measure the woman in the plain dress. Because no matter how much they valued her, they were actually underestimating her.
She was already so strong that it was beyond their understanding!
He only understood this at the moment of his death!
Apart from that, he also understood why no one knew how terrifying the woman in the plain dress was. It was because those who had seen her might have already died!
As if he thought of something, he said softly, "Ye Xuan … You have such a strong backing, why don't you say it … Isn't this harming others …"
As he said that, he opened his palm and a copper coin slowly floated up.
Soon, a voice rang out in the starry sky. "The woman in the plain dress … isn't that strong …"
This sentence disappeared in the starry sky along with the copper coin. The Dao Ancestor also disappeared along with it.
If he couldn't take revenge, then he would drag a few more people to be buried with him!
He also wanted to drag Ye Xuan to be buried with him, but his strength didn't allow him to!
Since he couldn't drag Ye Xuan to be buried with him, then he could drag others …
...
In the distance, the woman in the plain dress continued to move forward.
To her, what happened just now was just a small interlude. She didn't take it to heart at all.
After an unknown amount of time, the woman in the plain dress suddenly stopped. Not far in front of her, there was a huge city wall. This city wall spanned tens of thousands of miles across the starry sky, almost separating the entire starry sky.
On these city walls, there were statues holding long spears.
Behind the city wall, it was hazy and nothing could be seen.
The woman in the plain dress did not stop and continued to move forward.
Soon, the woman in the plain dress arrived at the city gate. The city gate was open and there was no one guarding it.
The woman in the plain dress continued to move forward. At this moment, a voice floated out from the city gate. "One more step and you will die!"
The woman in the plain dress glanced at the city gate. "You're begging for death!"
After saying that, she had already entered the city gate … A moment later, a bloody head rolled out of the city gate …
Inside the city gate, an angry shout suddenly rang out. "Who are you!?"
There was no response, but another head rolled out of the city gate.
Soon, a powerful aura suddenly shot into the sky from within the city gate. Following that, an ancient voice came from within the city gate, "Who are you … How dare you invade my Xuan City …"
Before the voice faded, another head rolled out from within the city gate.
At this moment, a voice rang out from within the city gate. "Senior, my Xuan City's words just now have offended you. Please forgive me …"
This time, no head rolled out from within the city gate.
A moment later, an incomparably respectful voice rang out from within the city gate. "We respectfully send off senior … Senior, take care …"
...
In the Five-Dimensional Universe.
In the starry sky, the previous master beside Lian Zun suddenly opened his eyes. In the next moment, a copper coin appeared in front of him.
Lian Zun looked at the previous master. "There's news?"
The previous master said softly, "The Dao Ancestor is dead!"
Dead!
Lian Zun frowned slightly. "Did he say anything?"
The previous master said solemnly, "He said that the woman in the plain dress is not that strong!"
Not that strong!
Lian Zun said softly, "Looks like he fought with the woman in the plain dress!"
The previous master was silent.
Lian Zun continued, "Looks like this woman in the plain dress will at most achieve the Dao!
If that's the case, then there's nothing to be afraid of! "
The previous master shook his head. "I still feel that this matter is not simple!"
Lian Zun looked at the previous master. "What do you mean?"
The previous master said solemnly, "I can't say for sure, but I have a bad feeling!"
After a moment of silence, Lian Zun shook his head. "No matter what, it's time to make a move."
As he said that, he looked down at the Five-Dimensional Universe. "If we continue to wait, once that Mu Niannian recovers his memories and strength, it will be troublesome!"
The previous master did not say anything. He raised his head and looked into the depths of the starry sky. He wanted to sense the woman in the plain dress, but he could not sense her at all!
As if he had thought of something, he took out the tortoise shell to make a divination. However, he could not calculate anything!
Lian Zun laughed. "Don't think too much!
As long as she doesn't surpass that level, we can deal with her. "
As he said that, he turned around and opened his palm. A black seal suddenly flew out. In the next moment, the seal directly turned into a pitch-black door. The door stood in the starry sky, and inside the door was a black whirlpool!
A moment later, the space inside the door suddenly trembled. Not long later, a thousand experts with spears and black shields walked out!
Underworld Army!
Among these thousand people, the lowest was at the Dao Validation Realm, and the equipment they were wearing were all top-notch equipment!
Other than these thousand people, there were six black-robed elders beside Lian Zun.
Six Dao Attainment Realm experts!
Including Lian Zun and the previous master, there were a total of eight Dao Attainment Realm experts!
Lian Zun suddenly laughed. "Let's go meet this Young Master Ye!"
After saying that, he disappeared.
Below, in the Five-Dimensional Universe, Ye Xuan, who was playing with Nian Nian, suddenly raised his head. After a moment of silence, he looked down at Nian Nian and said with a smile, "You play by yourself, I have something to do!"
Nian Nian gazed at Ye Xuan. "Alright!"
Ye Xuan grinned and was about to leave when Nian Nian suddenly grabbed his hand.
Ye Xuan looked at Nian Nian and smiled. "What's wrong?"
Nian Nian hesitated for a moment and said, "I'll wait for you!"
Ye Xuan smiled. "Alright!"
Nian Nian gazed at Ye Xuan. "Don't lie to me!"
Ye Xuan roared with laughter. "I definitely won't lie to you!"
As he spoke, he rubbed Nian Nian's little head lightly, and then he transformed into a ray of light that shot into the sky.
In the sky above Dao City, a ray of light descended in front of Lian Zun, and then it dispersed to reveal Ye Xuan's figure.
Lian Zun smiled. "Ye Xuan, we meet again!"
Ye Xuan grinned. "What's your name?"
Lian Zun smiled. "You can call me Lian Zun!"
Ye Xuan thought for a moment and said, "There doesn't seem to be any deep enmity between me and An Yuan!"
Lian Zun nodded. "Indeed!
However, we've taken a liking to the Daoist Scriptures in your possession!
So, can you give us those scrolls of Dao Scriptures? "
Ye Xuan smiled. "I, Ye Xuan, have always been very generous to my loved ones. Why don't you become one of my loved ones?
In that case, I'll give the Daoist Scriptures to you! "
Lian Zun frowned slightly. "Become one of your loved ones?"
Ye Xuan nodded. "Yes!
I'll take you as my son. In that way, aren't we family?
Since we're family, then what harm is there in giving them to you? "
Lian Zun's expression instantly turned cold. "Ye Xuan, do you only know how to use words?"
Ye Xuan chuckled. "You want the Daoist Scriptures yet aren't willing to be my son. Since you're not my son, then why should I give them to you?"
Lian Zun gazed at Ye Xuan. "Kill!"
Meanwhile, Ye Xuan suddenly opened his palm, and a sword appeared there. He roared with laughter, "Lian Zun, why don't we have a fight first?"
Lian Zun chuckled, "I have the advantage in numbers. Why should I fight you in a one on one battle?"
As he spoke, he looked down and his gaze fell on Nian Nian, who was on the street below. "Kill her!"
The true source of his fear was Mu Niannian!
When he heard Lian Zun, an old man at the Dao Attainment Realm charged towards Mu Niannian!
Suddenly, a ray of light appeared in front of the old man.
The old man frowned slightly, and then he raised his fist and swung it.
Bang!
The ray of light didn't shatter, but the old man was pushed over 30m back!
Lian Zun frowned when he witnessed this scene.
Ye Xuan's strength had exceeded his expectations!
Suddenly, Ye Xuan appeared in front of Lian Zun, and then he swung his sword.
Lian Zun's eyes narrowed slightly. Ye Xuan intends to kill me first. But is that even possible?
Suddenly, Lian Zun's expression changed drastically. Because an enormous Tai Chi diagram had suddenly appeared beneath Ye Xuan's feet!
Along with the appearance of the Tai Chi diagram, his cultivation had been forcefully suppressed from the peak of the Dao Attainment Realm to the Dao Control Realm!
He'd been directly suppressed by an entire realm!
Moreover, Lian Zun possessed four Domains!
Four Domains!
Moreover, Ye Xuan's attack was a Dao Sword, a strengthened version of the Dao Sword!
In an instant, Ye Xuan had practically utilized all his trump cards!
At this moment, terror appeared in Lian Zun's eyes. He hadn't expected that Ye Xuan would become so terrifying in an instant. He didn't give it any further thought. He'd lost the initiative, so he didn't even have a chance to dodge. He could only defend passively!
Lian Zun suddenly raised his arms, and a powerful force swept out from within him!
Bang!
Everyone watched as Ye Xuan's sword descended.
Bang!
Lian Zun's body was blasted into pieces!
Lian Zun's soul was about to flee. Meanwhile, Ye Xuan swung his sword with his left hand, and it struck Lian Zun's head. In an instant, Lian Zun's soul was absorbed!
It was an instant kill!
Ye Xuan sheathed his sword, and then he glanced at the dumbstruck crowd, "That's it?
I didn't even get to attack, and he fell! "
Everyone was speechless.
....







Chapter 1419
Silence!
Deathly silence!
No one expected Ye Xuan to kill Lian Zun in seconds!
Lian Zun was at the peak of the Dao Attainment Realm!
Let alone the Dark Abyss experts, even Venerable Mi and the rest on Ye Xuan's side were shocked.
Ye Xuan killed a Dao Attainment Realm expert in seconds!
This was too exaggerated!
In fact, even Ye Xuan himself was shocked!
His goal just now was to heavily injure Lian Zun, but he didn't expect to kill him instead!
Only now did he realize that he had underestimated his own strength all along!
It should be said that he underestimated the power of the Dao seal and Dao scripture!
The main reason he could kill Lian Zun in seconds was because of the Dao seal and Dao scripture!
One must know that the Dao seal not only brought him infinitely close to the Dao Attainment Realm, it also suppressed Lian Zun to the Dao Controlling Realm. Lian Zun no longer had an advantage in terms of cultivation realm!
Coupled with the suppression of his four domains and the element of surprise, Lian Zun was killed!
Ye Xuan collected his thoughts and looked at the Dark Abyss experts, "You guys don't really think I'm weak, do you?"
The ancestor stared at Ye Xuan, "Retreat!"
Retreat!
He now understood that the Dark Abyss had severely underestimated Ye Xuan's strength!
Ye Xuan's cultivation realm did not match his battle power!
"Retreat?"
Ye Xuan's lips curled up, "Do you think this is your home?
You can come and go as you please! "
With that, he drew his sword and charged out.
Venerable Mi and the rest also made their move!
Although the Fifth Dimension had fewer Dao Attainment Realm experts than the Dark Abyss, at this moment, the Fifth Dimension's momentum was like a rainbow!
In terms of momentum, the Fifth Dimension had crushed the Dark Abyss!
Ye Xuan had killed Lian Zun in seconds!
Not to mention the others, even Venerable Mi's confidence soared!
The ancestor did not choose to continue fighting, but retreated to the black door behind him!
Just as the ancestor and the rest were about to retreat, ten powerful auras suddenly appeared in front of the black door!
The one leading them was Su Ke!
In fact, when the Dark World came to the Fifth Dimension, he had been secretly preparing to act at any time!
Su Zhe had given a strict order to not let anything happen to Ye Xuan. However, he had not expected Ye Xuan to kill Lian Zun in a second!
In fact, at that moment, even he himself was stunned!
Did this Young Master Ye take medicine?
He actually became so ferocious!
Amidst his shock, he saw that his teacher and the others were about to retreat. At this time, he no longer remained silent and decisively chose to attack!
If the Ancestor and the others could die here, it would be a great thing for the Ancient God Abyss!
Seeing Su Ke and the others appear, the ancestor's face changed. "Ancient God Abyss, you …"
He did not expect the Ancient God Abyss to hit him when he was down!
Su Ke did not care about the previous teacher, and directly brought the nine people behind him and rushed forward!
Seeing the appearance of Su Ke and the others, Ye Xuan was stunned. He knew Su Ke, but he didn't know the people behind him. This wasn't the main point, the main point was, why would these people come to help him?
Could it be that her charm was too great?
....
On the other side, Xuan Chu and the old man beside her quietly watched as Ye Xuan and the others surrounded and killed the experts from the Dark Abyss.
Actually, both of them were extremely shocked at this moment.
Ye Xuan had just killed a Dao Attainment Realm expert in a second!
It was an instant kill!
Although he had used external items, it was still too terrifying!
Xuan Chu said softly, "We underestimated him!"
The old man was silent.
This was a serious underestimation!
Xuan Chu looked at Su Ke and the others. "These people should be from the Ancient God Abyss!
It seems that the Ancient God Abyss has chosen to stand on Ye Xuan's side! "
The old man said, "The Ancient God Abyss and the Dark Abyss are mortal enemies. It is not surprising that they would help Ye Xuan!"
Xuan Chu looked into the distance and did not speak.
The old man sighed softly.
This Ye Xuan was too good at pretending to be a pig to eat a tiger!
When the two of them went to see Ye Xuan, this guy kept showing weakness!
Too cunning!
On the other side, the Lord and the others were also there.
At this moment, the Lord and the others had extremely solemn expressions.
They had to admit that Ye Xuan's instant kill of a Dao Attainment Realm expert had shocked them!
That was the peak of the Dao Attainment Realm!
He had been instantly killed!
At this moment, the Lord suddenly said, "That is the Dao Seal, a treasure of the Daoting Realm. It used to Daoting our ancestors.
Not only can it increase the owner's strength, but it can also suppress the opponent's realm! "
When he spoke up to here, he paused for a moment and said, "But even then, it's still a bit too exaggerated!"
Yan Yaoyao looked at Ye Xuan in the distance. "It seems that we have not truly understood him!"
The Lord smiled and said, "He has indeed been giving us surprises!"
Luo Hou suddenly said, "Should we help him now?"
The Lord shook his head. "There is no point in helping him now."
Luo Hou was silent.
He naturally understood what the Lord meant. If they wanted to help, they should help first. If they helped now, they would not be sincere!
The Lord looked at Ye Xuan in the distance and smiled. "He does not need our help!"
As he said this, he seemed to have noticed something and frowned. "His sword …"
Everyone looked at Ye Xuan in the distance. At this moment, the sword in Ye Xuan's hand was constantly devouring the souls of the Dark Abyss experts!
At this moment, including the previous Lian Zun, the Soul Suppressing Sword had already absorbed the souls of four Dao Attainment Realm experts!
The rest of the Dao Attainment Realm experts were countless!
The Lord's expression was a little solemn. "This sword has probably broken through again!"
...
About an hour later, the battle ended!
The late master brought a few Dao Attainment experts and escaped, but the rest were all killed!
One should know that the Ancient God Abyss, including the Daoting, had a total of 13 Dao Attainment Realm experts!
Not far away, Ye Xuan put away his sword and walked in front of Su Ke. He smiled. "Senior, we meet again!"
Su Ke smiled. "A scholar has been separated for three days. My young friend is no longer the young friend from before!"
In fact, his heart was rather complicated. When he first met Ye Xuan, he still had the ability to kill Ye Xuan. But now, Ye Xuan already had the ability to kill him!
This speed of improvement was simply unimaginable!
Ye Xuan glanced at the people behind Su Ke and said, "Senior, you are from the Ancient God Abyss?"
Su Ke nodded. "Yes!"
Ye Xuan looked at Su Ke. "Senior, why did you help me?"
Su Ke hesitated and said, "We are mortal enemies with the Dark Abyss. The enemies of the Dark Abyss are the friends of the Ancient God Abyss!"
Ye Xuan said, "Is that all?"
Su Ke smiled. "My young friend, don't worry. The Ancient God Abyss has no ill intentions towards you."
Ye Xuan smiled. "Senior, you must be joking!
No matter what, thank you for your help just now. I, Ye Xuan, am eternally grateful! "
Su Ke said in a low voice, "My young friend, the Dark Abyss has failed this time. They will definitely not give up!
And this force is extremely powerful. You must be careful! "
He paused and said, "During this period of time, the ten of us will stay in the Fifth Dimension to prevent the Dark Abyss from launching a sneak attack!"
Ye Xuan hesitated for a moment and said, "You will stay in the Fifth Dimension to protect me?"
Su Ke asked, "Is there a problem?"
Ye Xuan looked at Su Ke. "Why?"
Su Ke thought for a moment and said, "We want to be friends with you!"
Ye Xuan's expression was slightly strange. Is my charm really that great?
At this time, Su Ke suddenly smiled bitterly. "My young friend, to tell you the truth, the reason we came to the Fifth Dimension is related to the senior behind you!"
The senior behind me?
Ye Xuan was struck dumb. Then he said, "Qing-er?"
Su Ke was surprised. "The senior in the plain dress?"
Ye Xuan nodded. "Yes!"
Su Ke looked at Ye Xuan. "I wonder what is the relationship between you two!"
Ye Xuan said, "I am her brother!"
Su Ke's expression was a bit strange. This younger sister is much stronger than her brother!
Although Ye Xuan is also strong, he is still not strong enough compared to the plain-dressed girl!
Ye Xuan sighed with emotion. Qing 'er!
In fact, he really wanted to see Qing 'er, but he didn't know where she was now!
At this time, a sword cry suddenly came from the side.
Ye Xuan turned his head and saw that the sword cry was from the Soul Suppressing Sword!
After absorbing so many souls, the Soul Suppressing Sword's aura was crazily rising!
Seeing this scene, Ye Xuan was happy. The Soul Suppressing Sword is about to break through!
As if thinking of something, Ye Xuan directly stored the Soul Suppressing Sword into the Prison Pagoda.
It's better to break through in the pagoda!
After that, Ye Xuan put away the equipment of the experts from the Dark Abyss. All of them were the best of the best. Even though they couldn't compare to the treasures of the Jia Long Clan, they were still top grade!
At this time, Su Ke suddenly said, "Little friend, I will leave first!
You must be careful during this period of time!
That Dark Abyss is not a good person. You must not underestimate it! "
Ye Xuan nodded. "Understood!
Thank you for your help, Senior! "
Su Ke smiled. "You are too polite!
From today onwards, my Ancient God Abyss and the Fifth Dimension are allies! "
As he said that, he specially looked at Xuan Chu and Su Ke.
Ye Xuan felt a little emotional. He naturally knew that the reason why the Ancient God Abyss was so friendly to him was because of Qing 'er!
Needless to say, Qing 'er must have been to the Ancient God Abyss!
He just didn't know if the Ancient God Abyss was beaten …
He knew that Qing 'er's temper was not very good.
Su Ke didn't say anything else. He turned around and left.
As for the 10 Dao Realm experts he brought with him, they stayed in the Fifth Dimension!
Ye Xuan looked at Venerable Mi. "Senior Mi, clean up the battlefield!"
Venerable Mi nodded. "Alright!"
Ye Xuan turned around and left.
Everyone looked at each other. They hadn't expected the matter to end just like that!
On the other side, Xuan Chu said softly, "Looks like the Ancient God Abyss didn't become friends with Ye Xuan because they are mortal enemies with the Dark Abyss!"
The old man fell silent.
At this moment, he realized that the matter was getting more and more troublesome!
Xuan Chu suddenly looked down. "The Dark Abyss will definitely not give up!
Let us wait and see! "
As she spoke, she paused for a moment and said, "Elder, send an order to my Master. Ask her to come here!"
The old man was stunned, and then he said, "This … why?"
Xuan Chu looked at the old man. "The two of us can't hold this place down!"
The old man. "…"
...
Below, Ye Xuan arrived on the street. As soon as he landed, Nian Nian threw herself into his arms. She hugged Ye Xuan tightly as if she was afraid that Ye Xuan would lose her …
Ye Xuan was about to speak when Nian Nian suddenly looked up at Ye Xuan. At some point, her face was covered in tears.
Ye Xuan felt an indescribable pain in his heart. He hurriedly said, "Don't cry!
Who bullied you! "
Nian Nian looked at Ye Xuan as her tears flowed uncontrollably. "Am I very useless?
I can't help you at all … "
Ye Xuan was about to speak when the space beside him suddenly split open. A moment later, a figure floated out!
Ye Xuan's expression changed drastically when he saw this. He suddenly drew his sword and slashed.
The sword slashed down!
Chi!
The sword slashed through the air!
Ye Xuan was alarmed. He activated his Dao Seal and was about to attack again when the figure had already retreated a hundred feet away. At the same time, Nian Nian was beside him.
Above the Dao Attainment Realm!
Ye Xuan's expression instantly turned ferocious. The figure suddenly grabbed Nian Nian's shoulder with his right hand. "If you want to save her, bring the six Dao Scriptures to the mortal world. Come alone!
If you don't come within two hours, her soul will be destroyed! "
With that, he and Mu Niannian disappeared.
At this moment, Nian Nian's weak voice came from afar. "Don't … Come …"
In the same place, Ye Xuan held the sword in his right hand tightly. His entire body emitted an extremely terrifying killing intent and hostility.
...
PS: Now that Qing Luan is in my hands, if you want to save her, give me the ticket. If not, I'll kill her!
Do as you see fit!







Chapter 1420
Venerated Mi and the others appeared the moment the figure and Nian Nian vanished.
Venerated Mi and the others' expressions darkened when they saw Nian Nian being taken away!
They hadn't expected An Yuan to send an expert above the Dao Realm!
Meanwhile, Su Ke suddenly appeared with an old man by his side. It was Su Zhe.
Su Zhe looked at Ye Xuan and hesitated for a moment before he said, "My friend, I'm sorry. The Old Man is late!"
Actually, Su Ke had gone back to invite Su Zhe over!
He knew that An Yuan would never let the matter rest, and if An Yuan wanted to make a move, he would definitely send an expert above the Dao Realm!
Because an expert at the Dao Realm was no longer a threat to Ye Xuan!
Therefore, he had decided to invite Su Zhe over. However, he hadn't expected An Yuan to act so quickly!
Ye Xuan took a deep breath and looked at Su Zhe, "Senior, where is the Milky Way?"
Su Zhe hesitated for a moment before he said, "It's a very dangerous place!
It's a forbidden place because anyone who steps into the Mortal World will have their cultivation sealed and become a mortal! "
Ye Xuan looked at Su Zhe, "How do I get there?"
Su Zhe said solemnly, "My friend, you'd better not go!
Because your cultivation will be sealed and you will become a mortal.
However, An Yuan won't do that!
Because the Mortal World was created by the owner of the Dark Scripture. Anyone who cultivates the Dark Scripture will not be suppressed by the Dark Dao Laws there.
The reason he wants you to go there is because he knows that he can't kill you in the outside world. However, if you go there, we … "
Ye Xuan closed his eyes slowly, "Senior, just tell me how to get there!"
Su Zhe wanted to persuade him but Ye Xuan suddenly opened his eyes. His eyes were bloodshot!
The power of his bloodline was surging!
Su Zhe was shocked. Ye Xuan's bloodline was actually so powerful!
After a while, Su Ke sighed softly and pointed with his finger. A ray of white light entered between Ye Xuan's brows.
Just as Ye Xuan was about to disappear, a voice came from the side, "Remember to come back!"
The one who spoke was Zhang Wenxiu.
Ye Xuan disappeared into the horizon.
Zhang Wenxiu looked at the sword ray in the horizon and a voice floated over, "I'll try my best!"
Try my best!
Zhang Wenxiu was stunned.
Su Ke looked at Su Zhe, "We …"
Su Zhe shook his head, "There's no other way!"
Su Zhe said, "There's no other way!
It was not because he, the Dark scripture master was because he was the disciple of the Dao Scripture's disciple.
One had to know that the owner of the Dark Scripture was the disciple of the Dao Scripture's owner. He created the Dark Scripture based on the Dao Scripture. How terrifying was his strength?
The Wan had the Yan had always had the Aby. The Yan had always had always had always but they always had the Dragon. Zhang had always had always. The Gu Ancient had the Had the Wan.
The Ancient God Abyss would enter the Mortal World as soon as the Dark Abyss was in danger. At that time, the Ancient God Abyss would not be able to do anything!
The Ancient God Abyss wanted Ye Xuan to go to the Mortal World for a simple reason. It was to deal with the Ancient God Abyss and the people behind Ye Xuan!
As long as Ye Xuan entered the Mortal World, the Ancient God Abyss would not dare to make a move. As for the people behind Ye Xuan, no matter how strong they were, would they dare to go to the Mortal World?
It was fair to say that for Ye Xuan, this was a deadly trap!
At this moment, an old man suddenly appeared in front of them.
It was the Master who had escaped earlier.
It was not his real body, but a shadow!
The Master looked at Su Zhe, "Su Zhe, the Honoured One said that he did not expect you to protect Ye Xuan personally!"
Su Zhe was expressionless, "I did not expect the Honoured One of the Three Masters of the Dark Abyss to come personally!"
The Master who had kidnapped Mu Niannian was the Honoured One of the Three Masters of the Dark Abyss!
The Master laughed, "This …
We have won this battle! "
Su Zhe smiled, "Is that so?"
The Master smiled, "We welcome the people behind Ye Xuan to the Mortal World!
They must come, otherwise, we will be disappointed! "
After saying that, he disappeared.
Su Zhe was silent for a moment, then he asked softly, "Will she go …"
The 'she' he was referring to was the woman in the plain dress!
At this moment, a voice suddenly rang out, "Where is he?"
Su Zhe turned his head, there was a woman standing in front of him.
Su Zhe looked at the woman in front of him, his eyes full of wariness.
He did not know when this person had appeared in front of him!
Who was this?
Su Zhe asked in a low voice, "Your Excellency … you are?"
The woman looked at Su Zhe, "Where is he?"
Su Zhe hesitated, "My friend Ye Xuan?"
The woman nodded.
Su Zhe said in a low voice, "The people from the Dark Abyss sent him to the Mortal World!"
The woman looked into the depths of the starry sky, "How?"
Su Zhe hesitated for a moment, then said, "Senior, the Mortal World was created by the owner of the Dark Scripture, it has the Law of Darkness, it can suppress one's cultivation …"
The woman suddenly asked, "How do we get there?"
Su Zhe looked at the woman, she blinked, "Don't I look like an expert?"
Su Zhe was speechless.
The woman said again, "Show me the way!"
Su Zhe hesitated for a moment, then bent his finger and a ray of white light entered the woman's forehead. After a while, the woman was about to leave, but at this moment, Zhang Wenxiu suddenly asked, "You are?"
The woman looked at Zhang Wenxiu and asked, "You are?"
Zhang Wenxiu looked at the woman, "I am his woman!"
Woman!
The woman blinked, "His woman?"
Zhang Wenxiu looked straight at the woman, "Yes!"
The woman looked at Zhang Wenxiu and smiled, "I like your character!"
As she said that, she opened her palm, "Let's go, I'll bring you to see your man!"
Zhang Wenxiu hesitated for a moment, then walked over to the woman and held her hand.
The woman was about to leave with Zhang Wenxiu when she seemed to have noticed something. She suddenly turned her head and looked at Xiao Qi.
When she saw Xiao Qi, the woman was slightly stunned, then she nodded slightly as a greeting.
Xiao Qi looked at the woman, not saying a word.
At this moment, Zhang Wenxiu suddenly asked, "Senior, you are?"
The woman smiled, "According to seniority, he should call me aunt!"
As she said that, she looked into the distance, "Let's not waste any more time!
This clone has gone through too many galaxies and wasted too much energy. It can't stay for too long, let's go! "
As soon as she finished speaking, she vanished on the spot with Zhang Wenxiu.
In the field, Su Zhe and the others felt like they had been struck by lightning!
Clone!
It was just a clone!
Su Zhe felt his head spinning!
At that moment, he had felt an incomparable sense of danger, but he had never thought that this woman was just a clone!
Just a clone was enough to make him feel an incomparable sense of danger. What did this mean?
If the real body was here, how terrifying would it be?
Thinking of this, Su Zhe could not help but break out in cold sweat.
At this moment, Su Ke suddenly said softly, "His father, his brother, his sister, his senior sister, his aunt … This is too much …"
Su Zhe was speechless.
...
Somewhere in the galaxy, the woman was holding Zhang Wenxiu's hand as they flew through the air.
Zhang Wenxiu looked at the woman, "Senior …"
The woman smiled, "Call me aunt!"
Zhang Wenxiu hesitated, then said, "Aunt … He's not an ordinary person, right?"
The woman nodded, "He's not an ordinary person!"
Zhang Wenxiu was silent.
The woman said softly, "His background is very complicated, I can't explain it clearly."
Zhang Wenxiu was silent for a moment, then said, "Are you guys very far away?"
The woman nodded, "Very far away. It's not easy to come here."
Zhang Wenxiu was silent.
The woman glanced at Zhang Wenxiu, smiled, "I should bring you to see someone!"
Zhang Wenxiu looked at the woman, "Who?"
The woman smiled, "His mother!"
Zhang Wenxiu said in a low voice, "Dugu Xuan?"
The woman shook her head, "His real mother!"
Zhang Wenxiu frowned, "Dugu Xuan is not his real mother?"
The woman hesitated, then said, "You can say that!
But … Sigh, this matter is very complicated!
It's all because of the Disaster Cause, I can't explain it clearly to you. "
Zhang Wenxiu suddenly asked, "How strong is the woman in the plain dress?"
She had always been curious about the woman in the plain dress.
The woman was silent.
Zhang Wenxiu looked at the woman, then asked, "Aunt, can you beat her?"
The woman blinked, "Can I not answer this question?"
Zhang Wenxiu was speechless.
...
Somewhere in the starry sky, Ye Xuan flew on his sword, he raised his speed to the limit, everywhere he passed, sword qi tore through the starry sky, it was incomparably terrifying!
In Ye Xuan's body, the blood was boiling, his whole body seemed to be on fire!
Soon, Ye Xuan arrived in front of a black hole, he turned into a sword light and entered the black hole.
Boom!
The entire black hole shook violently, sword qi tore through the black hole!
Soon, Ye Xuan showed up in a starry sky. As soon as he showed up in this starry sky, he felt all of his cultivation had disappeared!
But his bloodline power was still there!
The Great Dao law could suppress his cultivation, but it could not suppress his bloodline power!
At this moment, a middle-aged man suddenly appeared not far from Ye Xuan.
Human Venerable!
One of the three great venerables of the Dark Abyss!
On the right side of the Human Venerable was Nian Nian!
Ye Xuan's gaze fell on Nian Nian, Nian Nian kept crying, "I … I'm sorry …"
Ye Xuan shook his head, "You're not sorry!
I'm sorry!
Don't be afraid, even if I die, I'll be with you, okay? "
Nian Nian lowered her head slightly, her body trembling, she clenched her fists tightly, nails digging into her palms, blood flowing.
Human Venerable looked at Ye Xuan, "Just you?"
Ye Xuan nodded, "Yes!"
Human Venerable looked at Ye Xuan, "Where's the Dao scripture?"
Ye Xuan said, "Let her go!"
Human Venerable shook his head, "You're not qualified to negotiate with me!"
Ye Xuan looked at Human Venerable, "If you don't let her go, don't even think about getting the Dao scripture!
You can kill her, because before I came, I was already prepared to die!
But if you die like this, the six Dao scriptures will fall into the hands of Ancient God Abyss! "
Human Venerable chuckled, "Threatening me?
I won't kill her, I'll torture her until you hand over the Dao scripture!
Let's see who's more patient! "
With that said, he suddenly placed his right hand on Nian Nian's head, a powerful force enveloped her, following that, Nian Nian's entire face twisted, because her bones were being crushed bit by bit …
Nian Nian was in extreme pain!
But she did not cry!
She looked at Ye Xuan, forcing a smile that was uglier than crying, "I … don't … hurt …"
...







Chapter 1421
"It doesn't hurt?"
Venerable Human looked at Nian Nian and smiled, "How interesting!
It seems that not only does he care about you, you also care about him! "
Saying that, he was about to exert force, but at this time, Ye Xuan suddenly opened his palm. In his palm, there were six Dao Scriptures.
Venerable Human looked at Ye Xuan, the corners of his mouth slightly raised, his smile bright, "Have you lost your patience?"
Ye Xuan's expression was calm, "Can you let her go?"
Venerable Human released Mu Niannian, he slowly walked towards Ye Xuan, smiling, "Ye Xuan, do you know?
When you appeared in this place, I suddenly realized that I overestimated you.
You have guts, you have intelligence, and you have strength.
Unfortunately, you are not ruthless enough!
You may be ruthless enough to your enemies, but you are not ruthless enough to your own people.
What you don't know is that your so-called loyalty is meaningless, because these are your weaknesses, weaknesses that your enemies can exploit! "
Ye Xuan suddenly bent his finger, the six Dao Scriptures appeared in front of Venerable Human, and he himself appeared in front of Nian Nian.
Venerable Human put away the six Dao Scriptures, he glanced at Ye Xuan, but did not stop Ye Xuan.
In this place, he was invincible!
Ye Xuan gently hugged Nian Nian, but with this hug, Nian Nian suddenly sucked in a breath of cold air. She looked at Ye Xuan, tears streaming down her face, feeling wronged, "It hurts …"
Ye Xuan quickly let go, he gently grabbed Nian Nian's hand, looking at Nian Nian's broken bones, his heart felt like it was being twisted by a knife, "I'm sorry …"
Nian Nian looked at Ye Xuan, tears streaming down her face, "I'm sorry, I still can't remember the past … I … I'm too useless!"
"How ridiculous!"
At this time, the distant Venerable Human suddenly laughed, "It's really ridiculous!
Fifth Dimension Tendo, although I don't know your true strength, you were able to injure a Dao Completion Realm expert with less than 30% of your strength, so you must have some skill!
What's laughable is that, for the sake of this Ye Xuan and that so-called Five-Dimensional Universe, you didn't even use seventy percent of your strength until your death … For an expert like you to not sever the karma that binds you, I can only say that you're really stupid. "
Nian Nian looked at Ye Xuan. "Will we die?"
Ye Xuan gently caressed Nian Nian's cheek and smiled. "Are you afraid?"
Nian Nian shook her head. "With you around, I'm not afraid!"
Ye Xuan suddenly said, "Can I kiss you?"
Nian Nian blinked. "Kiss me?"
Ye Xuan nodded.
Nian Nian's face was slightly red, and her voice was as soft as a mosquito. "Just once!"
Ye Xuan said seriously, "You agreed!
You can't hit me in the future! "
Nian Nian slowly closed her eyes, feeling a little shy. "Kiss me!
I won't hit you in the future! "
Ye Xuan leaned over and gently touched Nian Nian's forehead.
They separated at the touch!
Nian Nian opened her eyes and glanced at Ye Xuan. "Is it over?"
Ye Xuan nodded. "It's over!
However, I'm a little regretful! "
Nian Nian blinked. "Why!"
Ye Xuan looked at Nian Nian and said seriously, "If we can survive today, I think I'll definitely be beaten by you in the future!
However, it doesn't matter!
Who knows if there's a tomorrow? "
With that, he leaned over and gently touched Nian Nian's forehead. "Even if I'm gone!
You have to live well, understand? "
With that, he suddenly stored Nian Nian into the Creation Gourd. He grabbed the Creation Gourd and threw it toward the exit of the mortal world. He roared, "Take her away!
To the Four-Dimensional Universe's Netherworld Palace! "
Not far away, the Human Venerable suddenly laughed. "Let her go?
Are you kidding me? "
With that, he was about to make a move. At this moment, Ye Xuan suddenly appeared in front of him. In the next moment, an extremely powerful bloodline power swept out from his body.
Boom!
In an instant, a killing intent swept across the heaven and earth!
This place had the laws of darkness which could suppress one's cultivation. However, it could not suppress Ye Xuan's bloodline!
Seeing that Ye Xuan could actually use the power of his bloodline, the Human Venerable frowned. "How is this possible!"
At this moment, Ye Xuan suddenly slashed forward!
It was not a dao sword because he could not use a dao sword at all!
He also could not use a dao seal!
This place could even suppress a dao seal!
To put it simply, other than the power of his bloodline and his dao body, he could not use any other power or external objects!
The sword slashed down. The sword stopped half an inch away from the Human Venerable's head!
The Human Venerable's two fingers caught Ye Xuan's sword!
The Human Venerable looked at Ye Xuan. "I underestimated your bloodline power!"
With that, he slightly tightened his fingers.
Boom!
In an instant, Ye Xuan was blasted hundreds of feet away!
After repelling Ye Xuan with one finger, the Human Venerable suddenly turned his head and looked in the direction where the Gourd of Fortune escaped. At present, compared to Ye Xuan, Mu Niannian was a greater threat!
The Human Venerable was about to make a move when a sword qi slashed at him from behind!
The Human Venerable frowned. He suddenly turned around and took a step forward. At the same time, he punched out.
Before Ye Xuan's sword fell, the Human Venerable's fist had already landed on his chest.
Bang!
Ye Xuan spat out a mouthful of blood and was instantly sent flying thousands of feet away. However, in the next moment, he once again rushed toward the Human Venerable with his sword.
The blood-red sword light tore through the space. The blood-red light was overwhelming!
In the distance, the Human Venerable slowly clenched his right hand. His eyes were filled with cold killing intent. "It's time to end this!"
With that said, he suddenly disappeared.
Chi!
In the field, the space suddenly cracked. In the next moment, a shadow directly hit Ye Xuan.
Boom!
The sword light around Ye Xuan was directly smashed. At the same time, Ye Xuan was sent flying. As soon as he stopped, the Human Venerable suddenly appeared in front of him!
The Human Venerable directly punched at Ye Xuan's throat!
Ye Xuan blocked with his sword.
Boom!
Once again, Ye Xuan and his sword were sent flying!
In the air, the Human Venerable punched again!
As the punch was thrown, the space cracked inch by inch. In the distance, a fist suddenly landed on Ye Xuan's chest.
Puff!
Ye Xuan suddenly spat out a mouthful of blood and was thrown backward.
The Human Venerable looked at Ye Xuan and sneered. "The legendary Taoist Body. If it was outside, it might be a little tricky. Unfortunately, it's here!
Today, let me shatter your Taoist Body! "
As his voice fell, he rushed forward and punched!
The punch was like a flash flood, unstoppable!
In the distance, Ye Xuan's pupils suddenly shrank. He did not choose to defend. Instead, he stabbed with his sword.
A life for a life!
However, the Human Venerable's speed was much faster than his!
The moment he attacked with his sword, the Human Venerable's fist had already landed on his chest.
Bang!
Ye Xuan's chest caved in. At the same time, the Human Venerable's powerful strength directly sent him flying.
Although the Taoist Body was strong, at this moment, his cultivation was suppressed. His strength was less than half of his peak. Especially, he could not use a killer move like the Taoist Sword.
It could be said that he was being suppressed by the Human Venerable in both speed and strength!
After sending Ye Xuan flying with a punch, the Human Venerable did not stop. Instead, he took a step forward and threw a punch with each step.
The punch was like a volcanic eruption, destroying heaven and earth!
In the distance, Ye Xuan's eyes flashed with anger. He held the Executing Heaven Sword with both hands and slashed forward.
At this moment, the Human Venerable's punch arrived.
Boom!
The surrounding space trembled. The Human Venerable's powerful punch directly sent the sword in Ye Xuan's hand flying. At the same time, a destructive force instantly landed on Ye Xuan's body.
Bang!
Ye Xuan was instantly sent flying thousands of feet away. As soon as he stopped, he spat out several mouthfuls of blood. At the same time, his body had already split open!
If this was outside, his body could continuously repair itself. But here, his cultivation was suppressed and he could not repair his body at all!
The Human Venerable slowly walked toward Ye Xuan. He slowly clenched his right hand and a powerful force gathered in his palm. Because the force was so strong, the space around him directly trembled!
In the distance, Ye Xuan wiped the blood from his mouth.
He looked at the exit in the distance and said softly, "She should be safe now!"
He knew that as long as Immortal Gourd brought Nian Nian to the Nether World Hall, even the Dark Abyss could not do anything to her!
Thinking of this, the corner of Ye Xuan's mouth curled up into a smile. But soon, the smile froze!
At the exit, he saw a person!
Nian Nian!
In Nian Nian's hand was a gourd!
Immortal Gourd!
Seeing Nian Nian, the Human Venerable was stunned for a moment. Then, he laughed. "How interesting!"
In the distance, Ye Xuan's eyes widened. "Immortal Gourd!
What the hell are you doing! "
At this moment, Immortal Gourd appeared in front of Ye Xuan with Nian Nian. At the same time, Immortal Gourd's voice sounded in Ye Xuan's mind. "Sigh, you can't blame me!
I want to take her away too!
But she won't go!
If I take her away by force, she will kill herself … I really can't help it … It's too f * cking difficult for me! "
Ye Xuan roared angrily. "Your current strength far surpasses hers. Can't you stop her from killing herself?"
Immortal Gourd was a little helpless. "I can beat her now, but she threatened me!
She said that if I take her away, when she regains her memory, she will tear me to pieces … You know how terrifying she was at her peak … I'm scared! "
He had been beaten by Mu Niannian in the past. He was really afraid of Mu Niannian!
Ye Xuan was speechless.
Nian Nian stared at Ye Xuan. "You said you wouldn't lie to me!"
Ye Xuan felt a little guilty. "I … I didn't lie to you!"
Nian Nian said angrily, "You left me alone!"
Ye Xuan shrugged. "You did the same thing in the past!"
Nian Nian burst into tears.
After crying for a while, she looked up at Ye Xuan. "Then we're even!
Now, no one can leave the other, okay? "
Ye Xuan was silent.
Nian Nian looked at Ye Xuan. "I don't want to live alone!"
Ye Xuan was silent for a moment. He took Nian Nian's hand and said softly, "Okay!
No one can leave the other! "
Nian Nian smiled through her tears. She gently hugged Ye Xuan and said in a trembling voice, "I'm afraid of death, but I'm even more afraid of living alone … Don't leave me …"
At this moment, the Human Venerable in the distance suddenly said, "Ye Xuan, where's the woman in the plain dress behind you?"
Ye Xuan looked at the Human Venerable. The Human Venerable smiled and said, "Isn't she your Path Protector?
Why hasn't she appeared at a time like this?
Don't tell me she's afraid! "
Ye Xuan was about to speak. At this moment, the space in the distance was suddenly torn apart. The next moment, two women walked out of the torn space!
Seeing the two women, Ye Xuan was stunned.
He knew one of them. It was Zhang Wenxiu!
But he didn't know the woman next to Zhang Wenxiu!
The Human Venerable's gaze fell on the woman next to Zhang Wenxiu, "You're not the woman in the plain dress!"
The woman smiled and said, "You seem a little disappointed!"
The Human Venerable smiled and said, "I am indeed a little disappointed.
Because we prepared a big gift for her. Unfortunately, she didn't come!
What a pity!
But it's okay, we can kill her in the future! "
"Kill her!"
The woman blinked, and in the next moment, she suddenly disappeared.
The Human Venerable's expression changed. He suddenly punched out. The power of the punch was like a mountain flood, shaking the heaven and earth!
However, as soon as he punched out, a jade-white hand grabbed his throat!
One hit kill!
The Human Venerable's expression changed. He looked at the woman and said in horror, "You're not suppressed!
How is that possible … "
The woman looked at the Human Venerable and smiled, "Kill my Great Mandate?
You idiot, I can't even take one of her sword. You want to kill her? I'll kill your mother!
I'll kill your mother! "
Then, she suddenly clenched her fist.
Boom!
The Human Venerable's head exploded and turned into nothingness!
Ye Xuan: "…"

Chapter 1422
Shocking!
Ye Xuan had to admit that even he was shocked!

This woman killed a Human Venerable in an instant!
What level was this Human Venerable?
She was a cultivator above the Dao Attainment realm!
Such a cultivator was killed by this woman in an instant!
This was too terrifying!

As if thinking of something, Zhang Wenxiu's pupils shrank.
This woman said that she couldn't even take one strike from the woman in the plain dress …
The woman in the plain dress!
How strong was she?
Zhang Wenxiu's heart was in turmoil!
Not far away, the woman clapped her hands and turned to look at Ye Xuan. "I've been traveling for a few days and I only killed this piece of trash … Don't you feel ashamed?"
Ye Xuan: "…"
Zhang Wenxiu hurriedly said, "Aunty, you've worked hard!"
Aunty?
Ye Xuan was stunned, then looked at Zhang Wenxiu. "Your aunty?"
Zhang Wenxiu said in a low voice, "What's mine is also yours!"
Ye Xuan: "…"
The woman walked to Ye Xuan and looked at Ye Xuan. "To be precise, I'm your aunty!"
Aunty!
Ye Xuan blinked. "Are there second aunties and third aunties?"
The woman nodded. "Yes!"
Ye Xuan: "…"
Zhang Wenxiu: "…"
Ye Xuan said in a low voice, "My mother and aunty, you …"
The woman smiled. "We call your mother sisters. As for your mother, I can't say much. You'll know in the future."
Ye Xuan was speechless.
In the future again!
The woman looked around and said, "This place is a little special …"
As she spoke, she looked at Ye Xuan. "This clone of mine is about to disappear.
You'll have to deal with the rest yourself! "
Ye Xuan asked in a deep voice, "Aunt, where is your main body?"
The woman smiled. "I'm busy!"
Ye Xuan asked again, "Is it far from here?"
The woman nodded. "It's very far. Most importantly, some of the rules are very troublesome, and we don't want to break them … In short, it's quite troublesome for us to come here."
Ye Xuan said in a deep voice, "The Nether Pavilion!"
The woman smiled and said, "You only guessed it now?"
Ye Xuan shook his head and smiled. "I guessed it!
But I'm not sure! "
The woman looked at Ye Xuan. "You said you were an orphan in the Nether World Hall and had no one to rely on … Kid, I'm here today to tell you two things. First, it's not that your father doesn't care about you. He has done a lot for you, but you don't know about it!
Second, you think your enemies are strong now, but you don't know that your enemies in the future are even stronger!
Just like me … Do you think I'm strong? "
Ye Xuan quickly nodded.
The woman smiled. "But the Nether Pavilion is in a dangerous moment!
The reason why my main body didn't come this time is because of this! "
Ye Xuan fell silent.
The woman patted Ye Xuan's shoulder lightly. "This is the last time we'll help you, because we're not sure if we can survive!
You're on your own! "
After saying that, her body gradually turned illusory.
Ye Xuan bowed slightly to the woman. "Aunt, thank you!"
The woman smiled. "We're family, no need to be so polite!"
As she spoke, she looked at Nian Nian, who was beside Ye Xuan. Nian Nian hesitated for a moment before saying softly, "Aunt …"
The woman laughed. "I don't deserve that!"
Ye Xuan quickly said, "Aunt, can you help Nian Nian recover her memory?"
The woman shook her head. "No!"
Ye Xuan was slightly puzzled. "Why not?"
The woman looked at Ye Xuan and smiled. "Can I not answer this question?"
Ye Xuan was speechless.
The woman thought for a moment and said, "Forget it!
I'll answer you!
The reason why I can't help her recover her memory is because she's too strong. I can't stop her! "
As she spoke, she glanced at Nian Nian. "She's an extraordinary woman!"
Ye Xuan frowned slightly. "Too strong?"
The woman smiled. "Her Sword Dao is the strongest besides those three. Hmm, that's not right. That girl Tingyun should be on par with her. However, your Sister Nian's strength isn't just in her Sword Dao … In short, she has her own Dao.
