Moreover, she's very strong. Ordinary people can't forcefully interfere with what she does.
So, let nature take its course!
In any case, she has no intention of harming you! "
Ye Xuan wanted to ask more, but the woman had already vanished.
She left in a carefree manner!
After a moment of silence, Ye Xuan left with Zhang Wenxiu and Nian Nian.
Of course, Ye Xuan did not forget the six Dao Scriptures. When the woman killed the Human Supremacy, he had already kept them.
Not long after Ye Xuan and the others left, a middle-aged man suddenly appeared in the Mortal World.
The middle-aged man looked around and said softly, "I'm late …"
This person was one of the Three Supremacies of the Dark Abyss, the Earth Supremacy.
Previously, when the Human Supremacy's Soul Tablet shattered, he rushed over here. Unfortunately, he was still too late.
The Earth Supremacy looked around with a solemn expression. "Good one, Ye Xuan!
Looks like we've underestimated you! "
After saying that, his figure trembled slightly and disappeared.
...
In the Fifth Dimension.
When Ye Xuan and the others returned to the Fifth Dimension, Su Zhe and Su Ke immediately appeared in front of Ye Xuan. Su Zhe looked at Ye Xuan and said, "Little friend, that Human Supremacy …"
Ye Xuan said, "He's dead!"
Dead!
Su Zhe looked at Ye Xuan and asked, "Then Senior killed him?"
Ye Xuan nodded.
Su Zhe was silent.
One of the Three Supremacies of the Dark Abyss, Human Supremacy, was dead!
Ye Xuan looked at Su Zhe and asked, "Senior, how can I reach the Dao Realm?"
Su Zhe shook his head. "You can't!"
Ye Xuan frowned slightly. "Why?"
Su Zhe sighed softly. "Little friend, you've just broken through not long ago. It's not wise to force your way into the Dao Realm now!
Moreover, you haven't fully stabilized your Dao Defense Realm. It's not suitable for you to break through to the Dao Realm! "
Ye Xuan was silent.
Su Zhe continued, "Of course, if you borrow the power of the God's Seal, it's not impossible. However, I don't recommend you to use the God's Seal. You're a genius, you can definitely create your own path!"
Ye Xuan said softly, "I don't have that much time!"
The Human Supremacy's sudden attack made him understand that the Dark Abyss was determined to kill him and Nian Nian!
He didn't think that the death of the Human Supremacy would make the Dark Abyss stop!
Not only would the Dark Abyss not stop, but it would also intensify!
Su Zhe hesitated for a moment and then said, "Little friend, why don't you come with us to the Ancient God Abyss?
Little friend, don't worry. If you go to the Ancient God Abyss, even if the Dark Abyss Master personally takes action, the Ancient God Abyss will protect you! "
Ye Xuan shook his head.
If he left this place, the entire Fifth Dimension would be completely destroyed!
The Fifth Dimension could not stop the Dark Abyss!
Su Zhe sighed softly when he saw that Ye Xuan didn't want to go to the Ancient God Abyss.
Ye Xuan wasn't willing to give up the Fifth Dimension, so he would always be in a passive position!
At this moment, Xuan Chu suddenly appeared in front of Ye Xuan. She looked at Ye Xuan and said, "Let me tell you some bad news. The Xuan Huan Sect from the Whirling World has sent people!"
Ye Xuan frowned slightly, "The Xuan Huan Sect?"
Xuan Chu nodded, "A super sect from the Whirling World!
They came this time for the Dao Scripture in your possession! "
Ye Xuan was silent. He hadn't expected the forces from the Whirling World to come so quickly!
Xuan Chu suddenly asked, "Who was that woman?"
Ye Xuan looked at Xuan Chu, "My aunt!"
Xuan Chu, "…"
Ye Xuan asked, "Miss Xuan Chu, how many people from the Xuan Huan Sect have come?"
Xuan Chu shook her head, "I don't know!
But we should know soon!
Because they should have already arrived! "
Ye Xuan nodded, "Thank you, Miss Xuan Chu, for telling me!"
After saying that, he turned around and left with Nian Nian.
Xuan Chu looked at Ye Xuan, not knowing what she was thinking.
Somewhere in the main hall.
Ye Xuan sat cross-legged on the ground and slowly closed his eyes!
If it wasn't for the help of the Nether World Hall, would he and Nian Nian have survived?
Of course not!
Moreover, he also discovered that powerhouses above the Enlightened Dao Realm could pose a threat to his Daoist Body!
Improve his Dao Body?
This thought flashed through Ye Xuan's mind, but he quickly rejected it.
Previously, he had relied on the gift from the Jia Long Dragon Clan to improve his Dao Body. Now, if he didn't have an opportunity, it would be impossible for him to improve his Dao Body!
Whether it was his realm or his body, he couldn't improve them for the time being.
After a while, Ye Xuan said softly, "It seems that I can only take it step by step!"
Ye Xuan no longer thought about improving his Dao Body. Instead, he began to stabilize his Dao Body.
(This chapter is not finished. Please continue.)
As Su Zhe had said, he hadn't even fully understood the Dao Controlling Realm. He really shouldn't think about the Dao Attainment Realm!
...
Somewhere in the starry sky, the Earthly Venerable Dark Abyss looked down at the Five-Dimensional Universe. Beside him was the Ancestral Master.
The Ancestral Master's expression was extremely solemn. He didn't expect the Human Venerable to die just like that!
And he died in the Mortal World!
What did this mean?
It meant that the other party wasn't suppressed by the Dark Dao Laws of the Mortal World!
The Earthly Venerable suddenly said, "Did you find out where that woman came from?"
The Ancestral Master shook his head. "I couldn't find out!"
The Earthly Venerable frowned slightly. "You couldn't find out?"
The Ancestral Master nodded. "She seemed to have appeared out of thin air!"
The Earthly Venerable was silent.
After a while, the Earthly Venerable looked down. "I have already informed the Celestial Venerable that he will rush here in three days!"
Hearing this, the Ancestral Master was shocked. "Is the Celestial Venerable going to make a move?"
The Earthly Venerable was expressionless. "The person behind Ye Xuan is more powerful than we thought!"
The Ancestral Master said in a low voice, "Besides that, there is also the Ancient God Abyss. They are determined to help Ye Xuan!"
The Earthly Venerable frowned. "What is their purpose in doing this?"
The Ancestral Master sighed softly. "The current situation is becoming more and more disadvantageous for us!"
The Earthly Venerable shook his head. "You are wrong!"
The Ancestral Master looked at the Earthly Venerable. The Earthly Venerable said softly, "As far as I know, many sects in the Whirling World have already sent people to the Five-Dimensional Universe!
And their goal is that Dao Scripture!
In other words, Ye Xuan's enemies will only increase!
We can wait and see for now. "
The Ancestral Master was about to speak when a shadow suddenly appeared in the distant sky above the Dao City. The next moment, a powerful aura suddenly enveloped the entire Dao City.
The Earthly Venerable chuckled. "Look, the experts of the Whirling World have arrived!
There's going to be a good show to watch! "
In the distant sky above the Dao City, Ye Xuan suddenly appeared in front of the shadow. The shadow gradually became solid. It was a middle-aged man.
The Dao Realm!
The middle-aged man looked at Ye Xuan. "You are Ye Xuan!"
Ye Xuan nodded. "Yes!"
The middle-aged man laughed. "Since ancient times, the treasures of heaven and earth belong to the strong. You are so weak, how can you have the nerve to occupy the six Dao Scriptures?"
Ye Xuan suddenly took out the six scrolls of the Dao Scripture. He placed them in front of himself and then looked at the middle-aged man. "Senior, you are right. How about this? Senior, lower your cultivation level and fight with me. If you win, I will give these six scrolls to you. What do you think?"
The middle-aged man laughed. "How interesting!
A Dao Manipulation Realm cultivator wants to challenge me? "
Ye Xuan looked at the middle-aged man. "I have fought with experts above the Dark Abyss Realm. They are very strong. I am no match for them!"
The middle-aged man shook his head. "No, no!
It is not that they are strong, but that you are too weak! "
Ye Xuan said in a low voice, "Senior, they are experts from the Dark Abyss!"
The middle-aged man chuckled. "Dark Abyss?
What kind of rubbish place is that?
How dare they compare to my Whirling World? "
On the other side, the Earthly Venerable was expressionless. No one knew what he was thinking.
The Ancestral Master's face was a little gloomy.
The middle-aged man suddenly said, "Fine, I will lower my realm and fight with you. You …"
At this moment, the Earthly Venerable's voice suddenly sounded in the sky. "Sir, although Ye Xuan is only at the Dao Manipulation Realm, his combat strength can kill those who have achieved the Dao!
Especially when he has a Divine Item Daoting … "
The middle-aged man looked at the Earthly Venerable in the sky and smiled. "You are from the Dark Abyss, right?"
The Earthly Venerable nodded. "Yes!
I am the Dark Abyss Human Venerable … "
The middle-aged man shook his head with a smile. "Do you know what it means to be a frog at the bottom of a well?"
The Earthly Venerable looked at the middle-aged man without saying a word.
The middle-aged man smiled. "Ye Xuan thinks that the experts from the Dark Abyss are strong because he is weak. He is a frog at the bottom of a well. He has not seen many Dao Attainment Realm cultivators, so he thinks that you are strong. You think that Ye Xuan is not weak because you are weak. An expert above the Dao Attainment Realm can't even kill a Dao Manipulation Realm youth … I can only say that you are useless!
Very, very useless! "
At this point, he shook his head with a smile. "To think that the Master of Dark Scripture was also a figure back then. Why are his descendants so useless?"
In the sky, the Earthly Venerable was silent.
Beside him, the Ancestral Master's face was frighteningly gloomy.
At this moment, the middle-aged man suddenly looked at the Earthly Venerable and said, "As far as I know, the Daoting has a Divine Item called the Seal of Dao. This item was the most precious treasure of the Daoting back then. You said that Ye Xuan has a Divine Item. Could it be this item?
If it is this item, I have to be careful! "
The Earthly Venerable looked at the middle-aged man calmly. "The Seal of Dao?
How could he have such a Divine Item?
The Divine Item I am talking about is the sword in his hand, not the Seal of Dao. Sir, you can rest assured. Go! "
Ye Xuan: "…"
...
(End of this chapter)







Chapter 1423
Sword!
The middle-aged man looked at the Executing Heaven Sword in Ye Xuan's hand when he heard the Earthly Venerable. He shook his head and smiled. "While this sword isn't bad, that's all there is to it!"
As he spoke, he opened his palm and pressed it down lightly. In an instant, his realm was suppressed from the Dao Attainment Realm to the Dao Attainment Realm!
As if he'd thought of something, the middle-aged man looked up at the Earthly Venerable. "I'll show all of you what a true expert is!"
As he spoke, he pressed his right hand down once more. In an instant, he went from the Dao Attainment Realm to the Dao Attainment Realm!
In the sky, the Earthly Venerable shook his head after a moment of silence. "The world is vast and anything can happen!"
The Ancestral Master was speechless.
Below, the middle-aged man looked at Ye Xuan. "This isn't bullying you, right?"
Ye Xuan hesitated for a moment before he said, "Senior, do you dare to suppress it to the Dao Attainment Realm?"
The crowd was speechless.
The middle-aged man looked at Ye Xuan. "The Dao Attainment Realm?"
Ye Xuan nodded. "I don't mean anything else. I just want to see how strong experts above the Dao Attainment Realm are!
If senior can defeat me at the Dao Attainment Realm, then I, Ye Xuan, will truly be convinced! "
The middle-aged man chuckled. "Ye Xuan, do you think I'm stupid?"
Ye Xuan was speechless.
The middle-aged man smiled. "While I'm confident, I know that it's better to be safe than sorry!
It's better to be careful when you're outside.
So, are you going to fight or not? "
Ye Xuan nodded. "Yes!"
He vanished on the spot as soon as he finished speaking.
A strand of sword light tore through the battlefield!
It was a swift strike!
Originally, the middle-aged man had a hint of vigilance in his eyes. Although he was confident, as he said, he was still very cautious. However, when he saw Ye Xuan's sword, that trace of vigilance suddenly disappeared!
This sword was very fast, but to him, it was too weak!
The middle-aged man shook his head and smiled. "That's it?"
As he spoke, he blasted a punch forward!
At this moment, Ye Xuan's sword momentum suddenly changed. The originally ordinary sword became a Dao sword!
At this moment, the middle-aged man's expression changed drastically. Because at this moment, he sensed danger. Originally, he was about to attack, but he suddenly switched to defense. He crossed his arms and fiercely pushed them forward.
At the same time, he stopped suppressing his cultivation level. However, Ye Xuan's sword had already descended.
Boom!
In front of everyone's eyes, the middle-aged man was sent flying by Ye Xuan's sword. In the process, the middle-aged man's fleshly body crumbled inch by inch. When he reappeared 10,000 feet away, only his soul remained!
After Ye Xuan pushed the middle-aged man back, he immediately pointed his finger and the Soul Suppressing Sword suddenly flew out.
Right at this moment, the middle aged man's soul suddenly vanished into the horizon. At the same time, a furious shout resounded from the horizon. "Despicable!
Shameless!
Despicable!
Shameless!
I, Ye Jun, have never seen such a despicable and shameless person … "
Ye Xuan was speechless.
On the other side, Xuan Chu shook her head.
Beside her, the old man shook his head. "This Ye Jun is really a weirdo …"
Xuan Chu said softly, "The Dao scripture and martial arts civilization began in the Whirling World. From the beginning, when we faced the Five-Dimensional Universe, we had the mentality of being superior to others. Let alone the Five-Dimensional Universe, even when facing the Dark Abyss and Ancient God Abyss, we have the same mentality.
However, whether it is the Five-Dimensional Universe or the Dark Abyss, they are actually not weak. "
The old man was silent.
In fact, when facing Ye Xuan at the beginning, he did not pay too much attention to Ye Xuan!
At that time, in his heart, Ye Xuan was just not bad!
But now, it seemed that this Ye Xuan was not only not bad.
Not to mention the Five-Dimensional Universe, even if Ye Xuan was placed in the Whirling World,
(This chapter is not finished, please continue.)
But, he was definitely the top existence of the younger generation.
As if thinking of something, the old man shook his head and sighed. "This Young Master Ye … is too good at pretending to be a pig to eat a tiger!"
He still could not forget how Ye Xuan had shown weakness when they had just arrived!
A person's strength was not scary, what was scary was when he hid his strength!
At this moment, Xuan Chu suddenly said, "When will Master arrive?"
The old man said in a low voice, "In two days!"
Xuan Chu nodded slightly. She looked at Ye Xuan in the distance, thinking about something.
In the distance, Ye Xuan looked up at the Terrestrial Venerable, and the Terrestrial Venerable was also looking at Ye Xuan.
He had to admit that Ye Xuan's strength surprised him!
Although Ye Jun had suppressed his cultivation by two realms, his foundation was still there!
However, he still could not take a blow from Ye Xuan!
One could imagine that if Ye Xuan reached Enlightenment … he would definitely be invincible among his peers.
All along, the focus of the Dark Abyss had been on the forces behind Ye Xuan and the Ancient God Abyss, thus neglecting Ye Xuan himself!
In fact, Ye Xuan himself was also very scary.
This kind of person must be killed as an enemy!
Ye Xuan looked at the Terrestrial Venerable and smiled. "Do you want to know how the Human Venerable died?"
The Terrestrial Venerable narrowed his eyes. "Are you threatening me?"
Ye Xuan smiled and turned to leave.
In the sky, the Terrestrial Venerable stared at Ye Xuan.
How did the Human Venerable die?
In fact, the death of the Human Venerable was not scary. What was scary was that the Human Venerable died in the Mortal World!
What did this mean?
It meant that the woman who killed the Human Venerable was not suppressed by the Dark Way Law of the Mortal World!
An Abyss had met someone who could ignore the Dark Way Law of the Mortal World!
Situ Tingyun!
That woman had caused An Abyss to suffer great losses!
At this moment, a voice suddenly sounded beside him. "Nether World Hall!"
The Terrestrial Venerable turned to see a woman standing beside him. The woman wore a simple black dress. The black dress was as black as ink and exuded a sense of oppression.
Celestial Venerable!
The Ancestral Master hurriedly bowed. "Greetings, Celestial Venerable!"
The Celestial Venerable nodded. Beside her, the Terrestrial Venerable said, "Big Sister, you came early!"
The Celestial Venerable said softly, "Third Brother is dead!
How could I not come early? "
The Terrestrial Venerable was silent.
The Celestial Venerable looked at the Terrestrial Venerable. "You don't look sad at all!"
The Terrestrial Venerable shook her head. "There is no point in being sad!"
The Celestial Venerable smiled. "Indeed!"
Then, she looked down. "I have found out that the person who helped him is from a force called Nether World Hall in the Fourth Dimension!"
The Terrestrial Venerable frowned. "Nether World Hall?
Why have I never heard of it? "
The Celestial Venerable said softly, "A very ancient force and very mysterious!
They appeared in the Fourth Dimension, but for some reason, they disappeared. "
The Terrestrial Venerable said in a low voice, "Disappeared?
Did they leave? "
The Celestial Venerable nodded. "They left!
As for where they went, I don't know!
But for now, they are a very scary group of people! "
The Terrestrial Venerable asked, "Why do you think so?"
The Celestial Venerable looked at the Terrestrial Venerable. "Do you know why that woman disappeared after killing the Human Venerable?"
Without waiting for the Terrestrial Venerable to answer, the Celestial Venerable said, "Because what she came was just a clone!"
Clone!
The Terrestrial Venerable's pupils suddenly shrank. "This …"
The Celestial Venerable smiled. "A clone in the Mortal World ignored the Great Dao nomological laws left by Dark Ancestor and killed the Human Venerable. Don't you find it very unbelievable?"
The Terrestrial Venerable said in a low voice, "This is too scary!"
(This chapter is not finished. Please turn the page.)
The Celestial Venerable said softly, "There is something even scarier!"
The Terrestrial Venerable looked at the Celestial Venerable. "What?"
The Celestial Venerable looked down. "He encountered the Naga race. As far as I know, the last patriarch of the Naga race was suppressed in the Dark World by that person … I have been to the Dark World. That old patriarch has fallen, which means that the Almighty has taken action.
However, Ye Xuan left the Dark World with the granddaughter of the Naga race's old patriarch.
There are two possibilities. The first is that the Almighty let Ye Xuan and Naga go, which is basically impossible!
The second is … "
At this point, she did not continue!
The Terrestrial Venerable said in a low voice, "The second is that the person behind Ye Xuan protected Ye Xuan and Naga!"
The Celestial Venerable nodded. "Yes!
If someone really protected him … then we have to re-evaluate the strength of the force behind him! "
The Terrestrial Venerable suddenly asked, "Big Sister, do you know that plain-dressed woman?"
The Celestial Venerable was silent.
The Terrestrial Venerable frowned slightly. "Why?"
The Celestial Venerable said softly, "Mysterious!
And powerful! "
The Terrestrial Venerable asked, "How powerful?"
The Celestial Venerable laughed lightly. "Do you know why the Ancient God Abyss is so determined to help Ye Xuan?"
The Terrestrial Venerable said in a low voice, "Because of the plain-dressed woman?"
The Celestial Venerable nodded. "According to my investigation, the plain-dressed woman has been to the Ancient God Abyss. However, I do not know what happened there!
But what is certain is that the Ancient God Abyss is so determined to protect Ye Xuan. Even Su Zhe has come personally. This must have something to do with the plain-dressed woman!
And for the Ancient God Abyss to help Ye Xuan at all costs, either the plain-dressed woman has made a deal with them, or they want to form a good relationship with the plain-dressed woman … If it is the latter, it means that the plain-dressed woman's strength is beyond our imagination! "
The Terrestrial Venerable was silent, his expression solemn.
The Celestial Venerable said again, "There is one more thing. Ye Xuan has swallowed the blood of the Naga Dragon Clan. His body has the power of the Naga Dragon Clan!
The blood of the Naga Dragon Clan is unyielding and domineering. Not to mention among humans, even among the demonic beasts, it is at the top of the pyramid. However, Ye Xuan can swallow their blood!
What does this mean?
It means that the power of Ye Xuan's bloodline is above that of the Naga Dragon Clan. No, it should be far beyond the Naga Dragon Clan!
However, we know nothing about the origin of the power of his bloodline! "
The Terrestrial Venerable shook his head. "This person is too mysterious!"
The Celestial Venerable looked down at the Dao City. "Daoting Ancestor Zhao Zhiqing made him the Dao Master after meeting him!
There are two reasons. First, he took a fancy to him. Of course, he is indeed a rare genius!
But I don't think Zhao Zhiqing made him the Dao Master and gave him the Dao Seal just because of this. "
The Terrestrial Venerable said in a low voice, "The force behind him!"
The Celestial Venerable nodded. "It must be!
Apart from that, this person is also related to Situ Tingyun … There must be an extremely mysterious and powerful force behind him!
And these people might not belong to our world … "
The Terrestrial Venerable frowned slightly. "Do we have a chance of winning?"
The Celestial Venerable shook his head. "Judging from the strength displayed by Situ Tingyun and the woman from the Nether World Hall, we have no chance of winning!"
The Terrestrial Venerable said in a low voice, "Are we going to give up?"
The Celestial Venerable smiled. "No!"
The Terrestrial Venerable frowned slightly. "Why?"
The Celestial Venerable said softly, "Because he might summon the Spirit of the Great Path. We are destined to be enemies with him."
With that, she smiled slightly. "It's not that we have no chance of winning!
We have to play this game of chess well!
After all, there are too many people who want the Dao Scripture in his hands now!
It's true that I, An Yuan, don't have a great chance of winning if I fight him alone. But why should we fight him alone?
We can choose to fight him together, can't we? "
.....

(End of this chapter)







Chapter 1424
Ye Xuan returned to his room. In front of him was the Soul Quelling Sword!
The Soul Quelling Sword had not broken through, but she had reached a critical point!
If she had absorbed Ye Jun's soul, she would have broken through. Unfortunately, Ye Jun had escaped!
Ye Jun's escape also made Ye Xuan understand that experts above the Dao Attainment Realm were not so easy to kill.
After a long silence, Ye Xuan suddenly kept the Soul Quelling Sword and left.
As for Nian Nian, she was still in the Prison Pagoda!
It was too dangerous for her to be out there!
One must know that the person An Yuan was truly afraid of was not Ye Xuan, but Nian Nian!
Ye Xuan arrived in the starry sky of the Fifth Dimension. Su Zhe was in this starry sky.
Su Zhe did not leave with his people. If he did, the experts from An Yuan would definitely come out in full force. That was not something the Fifth Dimension could fight against.
Seeing Ye Xuan, Su Zhe smiled faintly. "Young friend, you managed to injure Ye Jun with a single strike. With such strength, not to mention the Fifth Dimension, even in the Whirling World, among the younger generation, you are considered a top existence."
Ye Xuan shook his head, "Senior must be joking!
I was able to injure Ye Jun because he underestimated me and lowered his realm. If not for that, I'm afraid I would not be his opponent! "
Su Zhe's eyes flashed with surprise. Ye Xuan had destroyed Ye Jun's body with a single strike, but he did not feel complacent. This surprised him!
Ye Xuan cupped his fists, "Thank you for your help, I, Ye Xuan, am eternally grateful."
Su Zhe collected his thoughts and smiled, "An Yuan's enemy is my Ancient God Abyss's friend!"
Ye Xuan hesitated, then said, "Senior has seen Qing'Er?"
The woman in the plain dress!
The smile on Su Zhe's face gradually disappeared. He nodded slightly, "Greetings, Senior."
Ye Xuan quickly asked, "Did she say anything?"
Su Zhe smiled bitterly.
When they first met that senior, she wanted to destroy the Ancient God Abyss because their strength threatened Ye Xuan …
Su Zhe shook his head and smiled. "Little friend, she didn't say anything else. She just asked us not to hurt you!"
Ye Xuan was speechless.
Su Zhe hesitated for a moment before asking, "Young friend, may I ask what is Senior's background?"
In fact, she had investigated Ye Xuan and the plain-dressed woman. She knew a lot about Ye Xuan, but she knew practically nothing about the plain-dressed woman.
Too mysterious!
What is Qing'er's background?
Ye Xuan shook his head and smiled. Actually, he didn't know either!
He only knew that her name was Qing'er and that she was his relative. Other than that, he knew nothing about her background.
Seeing that Ye Xuan didn't answer, Su Zhe didn't ask any further. Instead, he changed the topic. "Young friend, with Senior's strength, it shouldn't be difficult for her to destroy the Ancient God Abyss. Why is she …"
Ye Xuan sighed softly. "Senior, don't you understand?
She doesn't even care about the Ancient God Abyss! "
Hearing this, Su Zhe's face gradually became solemn!
That's right!
With Senior's strength, does she need to care about the Ancient God Abyss?
Just like an elephant, does it need to care about an ant?
At this moment, Ye Xuan asked again, "Senior, you should know about the Cause of Misfortune, right?"
Su Zhe nodded. Just as he was about to speak, he seemed to have thought of something. His pupils shrank abruptly. "Young friend, do you mean to say that she is blocking the Cause of Misfortune for you?"
Ye Xuan nodded.
Su Zhe's expression became incomparably solemn. "No wonder … no wonder you were able to survive until now … I see …"
Ye Xuan suddenly asked, "Senior, what is the realm above Dao Attainment?"
Su Zhe said in a low voice, "Unity!"
Ye Xuan frowned slightly. "Unity?"
Su Zhe nodded. "Unity of All Laws, Unity of All Daos!
Experts who have reached this level can unite all Laws and Daos in the world into one.
Currently, whether it is the Ancient God Abyss or the Ancient God Abyss, experts of this level are few and far between!
As for the Dao Attainment Realm, although there are many Dao Attainment Realm experts in the Ancient God Abyss, those who can truly attain Dao can be counted on one hand. "
Ye Xuan was a little puzzled. "Truly attain Dao Attainment Realm?"
Su Zhe nodded his head slightly. "Every realm is divided into true and false. Some Dao Attained Realm cultivators are not as strong as they used to be. Just like Ye Jun, he was not as strong as he used to be. It could be said that his true strength was not even 60% of the Dao Attained Realm!
If the other party is not as powerful, even if you suppress your realm, you may not be able to defeat him!
Just like you, even if you suppress your realm to the Dao Validation Realm, within the Dao Validation Realm, there are not many who can be your opponent! "
Ye Xuan nodded. "I understand!"
Su Zhe continued, "The Ancient God Abyss has three Venerables, the Heavenly Venerable, the Earthly Venerable, and the Human Venerable!
All three are at the Consolidation Realm, but the Heavenly Venerable is the most terrifying, because she is the kind of Consolidation that is not as powerful as before!
Other than that, the Ancient God Abyss also has the Yin Yang Gods. These two have reached the peak of the Consolidation Realm tens of thousands of years ago. As for now, I'm afraid they are unfathomable. "
As he spoke, he looked at Ye Xuan. "Young friend, I still want to advise you. Why don't you come with me to the Ancient God Abyss!
There, the Ancient God Abyss can protect you. If you are in the Fifth Dimension, the Ancient God Abyss will not be able to help you … "
Ye Xuan said in a low voice, "I appreciate senior's kindness!
But you know, if I leave here, the Ancient God Abyss will definitely threaten me with the Fifth Dimension. I will not give up on the Fifth Dimension! "
Su Zhe sighed softly. "But forgive me for being blunt, young friend, with your current strength, there is no way you can fight against the Ancient God Abyss. Unless Miss Nian Nian regains her memory, or the person behind young friend appears!"
Ye Xuan was silent.
When would Nian Nian regain her memory?
He did not know!
As for the Nether World Temple … the current Nether World Temple would not have time to care about him!
It could be said that he could only face everything by himself!
Ye Xuan collected his thoughts and looked at Su Zhe. "Senior, if I may be so bold as to ask a favor!"
Su Zhe nodded. "Young friend, please speak!"
Ye Xuan said in a low voice, "Senior, I want you to stay in the Fifth Dimension for three months!
I need three months! "
Su Zhe was silent.
Ye Xuan suddenly said, "If I meet Qing 'er in the future, if you have any questions or want to know, I can ask Qing' er on your behalf!"
Hearing this, Su Zhe's expression changed. He cupped his fists and said, "If that's the case, then this old man will thank you in advance!"
If he could ask the woman in the plain dress for advice, it would definitely be beneficial.
A pointer from that kind of expert was equivalent to ten thousand years of hard work!
Su Zhe continued, "Little friend, I will transfer twenty-six Dao Completion experts to the Fifth Dimension. Apart from this, I will personally invite my master to the Fifth Dimension just in case. With him here, even if the Heavenly Sovereign personally takes action, he will not be able to do anything to you!"
Ye Xuan cupped his fists and said, "Many thanks!"
Su Zhe smiled. "Young friend, this old man also has a favor to ask!"
Ye Xuan smiled. "Senior, please speak!"
Su Zhe became serious.
"If you really manage to gather all the Dao scriptures in the future, I hope that you can borrow my Ancient God's Abyss to take a look. Is that possible?"
Ye Xuan smiled. "Of course!"
Su Zhe smiled. "Thank you!"
After chatting with Su Zhe for a while, Ye Xuan turned around and left. Su Zhe also left the Fifth Dimension.
From the current situation, he knew that even he could not control this place!
Because not only was there the Dark Abyss, there was also the Whirling World!
It was really difficult!
In the starry sky, Su Zhe suddenly stopped in his tracks. Not far in front of him, stood a woman.
The Heavenly Venerables!
Su Zhe narrowed his eyes. "I didn't expect the Heavenly Venerables to personally come forward!"
The Heavenly Venerables laughed. "Su Zhe, in my impression, you are a cunning person. But this time, it doesn't seem worth it for you to help Ye Xuan!
That doesn't seem like your style! "
Su Zhe was expressionless. "The enemy of the Ancient God's Abyss is the friend of the Ancient God's Abyss!"
The Heavenly Venerables shook his head and laughed. "No!
If I'm not wrong, you are helping him because of the woman behind him! "
Su Zhe looked at the Heavenly Venerables and did not speak.
The Heavenly Venerables' lips curled up. "Su Zhe, I am really curious. How strong is the woman in the plain dress? How could the Ancient God's Abyss spare no effort to help Ye Xuan!"
Su Zhe laughed. "It seems that you are also investigating the … woman in the plain dress!"
He wanted to call him Senior, but after thinking about it, he decided not to!
Why should he let the Ancient God's Abyss know how strong the woman in the plain dress was?
Wouldn't it be better to let them do what they want?
The Heavenly Venerables looked at Su Zhe. "As far as I know, the Whirling Sect, Xuan Huan Sect, and the number one aristocratic family, the Xiao Clan, have all sent people to the Fifth Dimension!
In addition, the Whirling World's Xuanji Sect has already built a transmission array. Once the transmission array is completed, it will be much easier for the Whirling World to come to the Fifth Dimension!
When that time comes, do you know what Ye Xuan will face?
Oh yes, there is also the Ancient God's Abyss! "
Su Zhe was silent.
The Heavenly Venerables laughed. "Su Zhe, the Ancient God's Abyss is helping Ye Xuan. This is equivalent to making everyone your enemy."
Su Zhe laughed. "So what?"
The Heavenly Venerables looked at Su Zhe. After a moment of silence, she laughed. "It seems that the woman in the plain dress is stronger than I thought!
But do you think that she can deal with everyone? "
Su Zhe looked at the Heavenly Venerables and laughed. "Heavenly Venerables, since you have been persuading me for so long, I will also give you a word of advice!
Whether it is the Ancient God's Abyss or the Ancient God's Abyss, it has not been easy for us to survive until now!
The world itself is already very difficult, why do we still have to work hard?
Is the Dao Scripture really that important?
Is it not good to be alive? "
The Heavenly Venerables looked at Su Zhe. "How strong is she!"
Su Zhe was silent.
The Heavenly Venerables laughed. "Let me rephrase my question. If I were to fight with her, what percentage would I have?"
Su Zhe looked at the Heavenly Venerables. "You?"
The Heavenly Venerables nodded. "I should have some chance of winning, right?"
Su Zhe was silent for a moment before replying. "Let's make it three to seven!
You three, she seven! "
The Heavenly Venerables blinked. "Really?"
Su Zhe replied calmly, "I have never lied to anyone before!"
The Heavenly Venerables laughed. "I know!
Thank you for telling me! "
After saying that, she turned and disappeared into the horizon.
Su Zhe said softly, "The feeling of lying is so f * cking satisfying … No wonder Little Friend Ye likes to lie …"
.....







Chapter 1425
The Five-Dimensional Universe.
Inside the Sword Hall, Ye Xuan sat cross-legged on the ground. In front of him was Jia Lou!
He was currently teaching Jia Lou the Dao Scripture Mantra!
Jia Lou also cultivated a Dao Body, but she did not cultivate the Dao Scripture Mantra. Now, he was teaching her the Dao Scripture Mantra without reservation!
Jia Lou's strength was the closest to the Dao Attainment Realm. If she cultivated the Dao Scripture Mantra, her strength would reach a terrifying level!
For now, even Ye Xuan could not compare to her. After all, she was a member of the Dragon Clan and had a unique advantage.
A moment later, Jia Lou stood up and looked at Ye Xuan. "Thank you!"
With that, she returned to the Prison Pagoda!
After a moment of silence, Ye Xuan stood up and left the hall. At this time, Ye Zhiming's voice sounded in his mind. "What plans do you have next?"
Ye Xuan chuckled. "What plans can I have?
I can only take one step at a time! "
Ye Zhiming said solemnly, "We must let Nian Nian recover her memory!"
Ye Xuan smiled bitterly. "I also want to, but you know Nian Nian's situation. She doesn't even know when she will recover her memory!"
After a moment of silence, Ye Zhiming said, "Do you still remember what your aunt said?"
Ye Xuan asked. "What did she say?"
Ye Zhiming said solemnly, "She said that she could not interfere with Nian Nian's matters. In other words, Nian Nian's memory loss … might have been intentional!"
Ye Xuan frowned slightly. "On purpose?"
Ye Zhiming said, "That's my guess!
But why did she lose her memory?
Is it because of the Five-Dimensional Universe?
But now that the Five-Dimensional Universe has recovered … "
Ye Xuan was silent.
In fact, he was also very puzzled. Why did Nian Nian lose her memory?
Did she not want to remember the past?
That shouldn't be the case!
At this time, a middle-aged man suddenly appeared in front of Ye Xuan!
The moment this middle-aged man appeared, Venerable Mi appeared behind Ye Xuan.
Ye Xuan looked at the middle-aged man. "From the Saha World?"
The middle-aged man smiled and said, "The Great Elder of the Profound Error Sect, Li Qiuheng!"
Ye Xuan said with a smile: "Sire must have come for the Dao Scripture!"
Li Qiuheng nodded. "Young Master Ye, before I came, An Yuan came looking for me. They wanted to cooperate with my Black Nebulous Sect, but I didn't agree immediately."
As he spoke, he looked at Ye Xuan and said with a smile, "Young master Ye, do you know why I didn't agree immediately?"
Ye Xuan shook his head, "I don't know!"
Li Qiuheng smiled and said, "Young master Ye, you are a smart person. You should understand that with your strength and the strength of the Fifth Dimension, it is impossible to protect those Dao Scriptures!
If that's the case, why don't you hand it over and keep it safe? "
Ye Xuan shook his head and smiled. "Sire, if I hand over the Dao Scripture, will you really let me go?"
Li Qiuheng looked at Ye Xuan. "If you are willing to hand it over, I can't guarantee anything else, but I can guarantee that my Black Nebulous Sect will not be your enemy!"
Ye Xuan was silent.
Li Qiuheng smiled and said, "I know that there is a powerful and mysterious force behind Young Master Ye!
However, Young Master Ye, do you really think that the people behind you can fight against the major sects of the Saha World and An Yuan at the same time? "
Ye Xuan didn't say anything.
Li Qiuheng shook his head and smiled. "Young Master Ye might not understand the Saha World. I can only tell you that any one of the top forces in the Saha World can easily destroy the entire Fifth Dimension!"
Ye Xuan thought about it and then said, "What Senior said makes sense!
This Dao Scripture is a disaster in the hands of me, Ye Xuan.
However, I am a bit unwilling to hand it over like this! "
Li Qiuheng smiled and said, "It is normal to be unwilling. However, although treasures are good, life is more important, isn't it?"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "Senior, if I hand over the six Dao Scriptures to you, will I get any benefits?"
Li Qiuheng looked at Ye Xuan and said, "You still want benefits?"
Ye Xuan chuckled and said, "If there are no benefits, who wouldn't I hand it over to?
I don't necessarily have to hand it over to Senior, what do you think? "
Li Qiuheng pointed at Ye Xuan and smiled. "Greedy!
No, you want to use the Dao Scripture to stall for time and buy time for yourself!
Young Master Ye, do you really think that you can deal with our major forces?
You're thinking too simply of us!
We won't give you this opportunity!
Five days, if you don't hand over the Dao Scripture in five days, we will make you and the entire Fifth Dimension disappear from this world.
Of course, Young Master Ye can also hurry up and call for reinforcements … If you are late, it will be too late! "
After saying that, he turned around and left!
After taking a few steps, he suddenly stopped and turned to look at Ye Xuan and said, "I heard that the woman behind you is very strong?"
Ye Xuan looked at Li Qiuheng and Li Qiuheng smiled and said, "If you are pinning your hopes on her, then let me tell you.
Let me tell you, in the future, you will find out what a stupid idea this is! "
After saying that, he turned around and disappeared into the horizon.
Just as Li Qiuheng disappeared, Xuan Chu appeared in front of Ye Xuan.
Xuan Chu looked at Ye Xuan and said, "Don't mind it, the Whirling World is the birthplace of the Dao Scripture and martial arts civilization. The people there look at the people outside the universe like city people look at country people."
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "I don't mind it at all!
I am even a little happy! "
Xuan Chu looked at Ye Xuan and understood!
The more the Whirling World looked down on Ye Xuan, the happier Ye Xuan was!
Xuan Chu said in a deep voice, "What are your plans next?
As far as I know, the experts of the Xuanhuan Sect are already on their way, and there are many of them. In addition, the Xuanji Sect is also building a teleportation array … "
Speaking of this, she looked at Ye Xuan and said, "Originally, it was impossible for the Xuanji Sect to build a teleportation array that can lead to the Five-Dimensional Universe, because it is extremely difficult to come here from the Whirling World. Even the experts of the Consolidation Realm can't easily come to this world. However, because of the Dao Scripture, the major forces of the Whirling World have united like never before. Their goal is not only the Dao Scripture, but also your universe!"
Ye Xuan said in a deep voice, "Resources!"
Xuan Chu nodded and said, "If you want to develop, you must have resources!
And your universe is a good target for the Whirling World.
In addition, because of the Dao Scripture, the major forces of the Whirling World have helped the Xuanji Sect build a teleportation array. What the Whirling World is after is not just the Dao Scripture! "
Ye Xuan looked calm and did not speak. No one knew what he was thinking.
Xuan Chu looked at Ye Xuan and said, "The current situation is that even if you hand over the Dao Scripture, the Whirling World and the Dark Abyss will not let you go!
Your Five-Dimensional Universe, the Dao World, the Six-Dimensional Universe, the Daoting World, and the Celestial Abyss, especially those top-grade mineral veins, are all coveted by them.
Of course, the most important thing is the Dao Scripture. You have six Dao Scriptures, and in addition to the two from the Dark Abyss, you have a total of eight Dao Scriptures … They will go crazy! "
Ye Xuan said with a smile, "Xuan Chu, what are you trying to say?"
Xuan Chu said in a deep voice, "I want your six Dao Scriptures!
If you give them to me, I can help you! "
Ye Xuan said with a smile, "How can I help?"
Xuan Chu said, "As long as you give me the Dao Scripture, whether it is the Dark Abyss or the Whirling World, my Whirling Sect will help you deal with them!"
Ye Xuan looked at Xuan Chu and said, "The Whirling Sect is that strong?"
Xuan Chu nodded, "Yes!"
Ye Xuan said with a smile, "Xuan Chu, I trust you, but I don't trust the Whirling Sect. Do you understand what I mean?"
Xuan Chu frowned slightly, "Do you think I don't have the ability to make decisions?"
Ye Xuan nodded.
Xuan Chu's expression was calm, "If there are no accidents, I will be the next Whirling Sect Master!"
Ye Xuan shook his head, "Xuan Chu, you said it yourself!
If there are no accidents … Also, Miss Xuan Chu, I, Ye Xuan, will not put my fate in the hands of others. If I give you the Dao Scripture and you suddenly ignore me, won't I be embarrassed? "
Xuan Chu was silent.
Ye Xuan said with a smile, "Miss Xuan Chu, I appreciate your kindness!"
After saying that, he turned and left.
Xuan Chu looked at Ye Xuan in the distance and sighed softly.
At this time, an old man appeared beside her and said in a deep voice, "Heavenly Venerable An Yuan contacted us!
He asked if we are interested in joining forces! "
Xuan Chu shook her head, "I'm not interested!"
The old man frowned slightly, "Why?"
Xuan Chu spoke softly, "Because I feel that something bad will happen if they target Ye Xuan like this!"
The old man spoke in a low voice, "You're talking about the people behind him?"
Xuan Chu closed her eyes slowly, "So many people are bullying him, so those people definitely won't sit idly by …."
The old man hesitated for a moment before he said, "I know that the Blackout Sect, the Profound Secrets School, the Xiao Clan, and the Dao Return Institute have joined forces with An Yuan this time. Their true objective isn't just Ye Xuan himself, it's the people behind him as well!
If we don't participate now, then once Ye Xuan is defeated in the future, our Whirling Sect won't have a share in the Dao Scripture!
Moreover, we might even be isolated by these powers. So, now …. "
Xuan Chu suddenly looked at the old man, "Is this what the Sect Master wants?"
The old man shook his head, "The Sect Master wants you and Exalt Yue to make the decision!"
Xuan Chu spoke in a low voice, "When will Master arrive?"
The old man replied, "I don't know!"
Xuan Chu looked at the old man, and the old man spoke in a low voice, "Exalt Yue has already stopped contacting me … She might have already arrived in the Fifth Dimension …"
Xuan Chu fell silent.
The old man continued, "There's one more thing, and that is that the transmission array has already been completed under the alliance of several great powers.
The Dao Scripture is almost complete!
Once it's completed, a large number of super experts will rush over to the Fifth Dimension … At that time, Ye Xuan will … "
He didn't continue!
Xuan Chu spoke softly, "Their true objective is the people behind Ye Xuan and Mu Niannian …"
The old man nodded, "An Yuan will also send a large number of experts to the Fifth Dimension. They only have one goal, and that is to force the power behind Ye Xuan to show themselves!
Then, they will be destroyed! "
Xuan Chu looked down at the Fifth Dimension and spoke softly, "Will they show themselves to help Ye Xuan?"
The old man spoke in a low voice, "If they don't show themselves, Ye Xuan will definitely die!
The Fifth Dimension will definitely be destroyed! "
At this moment, the old man turned around. Behind them was a woman!
Senior Sister Lu!
The old man glanced at Senior Sister Lu, but didn't speak.
In fact, they already knew that Senior Sister Lu was here.
Xuan Chu looked at Senior Sister Lu, "Can you persuade Ye Xuan?"
Senior Sister Lu was expressionless, "Why should I persuade him?
Does he really think that the Yang family is easy to bully? "
After saying this, she turned around and left.
Xuan Chu frowned slightly, "Yang family?
What family? "
The old man shook his head, "Never heard of it!"
Xuan Chu was silent.
...
Spirit Palace.
On this day, Senior Sister Lu came to the Spirit Palace and found Ling 'er. She looked at Ling' er, "You can contact that little white fellow, right?"
Ling 'er nodded.
Senior Sister Lu was expressionless, "Contact her!"
Ling 'er hesitated for a moment, then opened a box …
Somewhere in the distant starry sky, the little white thing next to the azure-robed man suddenly stopped. She hurried to open a box. A moment later, she suddenly lifted her head to look at Ye Xuan. Then she waved her little paw quickly!
The green-robed man was silent.
Beside him, the spear-wielding woman looked at the green-robed man, "If you don't care, I will go back!"
The green-robed man shook his head, "It's too late!
We are too far away from him!
Unless we shatter the starry sky!
Even if we shatter the starry sky, it will still take a month! "
The spear-wielding woman raised her eyebrows slightly, "So what?"
The green-robed man held the spear-wielding woman's hand and said softly, "I will inform a few people!"
As his voice fell, he opened his palm, and a ray of sword light suddenly shot up into the sky. The next moment, the ray of sword light split into several rays of sword aura and disappeared in the starry sky.
...
On the peak of an unknown mountain, a woman sat cross-legged on a boulder. Suddenly, she opened her eyes. In the sky in front of her, the space was torn apart by a ray of sword aura!
The woman opened her right hand, and the ray of sword aura fell into her hand. When she saw the sword aura, the woman looked excited, "You finally contacted me!"
As she said this, she frowned slightly, "The Five-Dimensional Universe?
The Dark Abyss?
I should have killed all these pieces of trash back then! "
As soon as she finished speaking, she suddenly drew her sword and slashed forward. With this slash, the space in front of her split open. In the next moment, she turned into a ray of sword light and entered the pitch-black space. Soon after, a ray of sword light tore through the pitch-black space tunnel …
...
On the other side, in an unknown galaxy, a woman slowly walked in a resplendent galaxy. The starry sky around her was dazzling, mysterious, and beautiful.
This woman wore a white robe, and there was a wine gourd hanging on her waist.
At this moment, the woman suddenly stopped. Not far in front of her, there was a black door floating in the air.
The woman said softly, "The Cause of Disaster … Brother, was it forced on you by others, or is it your own … I will investigate clearly …"
As she said this, she walked towards the black door floating in the air.
At this moment, a ray of sword aura suddenly appeared not far behind her. The woman turned around and opened her palm. The ray of sword aura fell into her palm. A moment later, the woman's expression suddenly became ferocious, "Bandit Yang, if anything happens to him, I will fuse with that woman and blow your dog head off!"
After saying that, she suddenly threw a punch in front of her.
Boom!
Under this punch, the starry sky was destroyed, and nothing existed.
The next moment, a ray of white light tore through the pitch-black space …
...
This was an unknown starry sky. In the starry sky, there was a stone staircase that was millions of feet long.
The stone staircase stood in the starry sky, and at the end of the stone staircase, there was a huge stone door.
On the stone staircase, a Swordsman wearing a cloud white robe walked slowly …
....
