Chapter 1426
Around them, the starry sky was deathly silent.
On the stone steps, Swordsman was walking slowly and calmly.
At the bottom of the stone steps, there was a sloppily dressed old man. The old man's hair was long and messy, and at his waist, there was a small black wine pot.
At this moment, this sloppy old man was staring at the Swordsman on the stone steps.
The stone steps were nine hundred and ninety thousand zhang in total, one zhang was a Dao Law, one zhang was a Heaven and Earth, one zhang was a whirling wind …
The stone steps were the road, and the stone door at the end was the legendary Dao Gate!
What was the Dao Gate?
According to legend, it was an inheritance left behind by the Dao Scripture's owner. Once you enter the Dao Gate, you can obtain the Dao.
After the Dao Scripture's owner, no one had ever reached the Dao Gate.
Even the four disciples of the Dao Scripture's owner did not. Not only that, they did not even reach half the distance.
At this moment, Swordsman was only ten thousand zhang away from the Dao Gate.
At this time, the Swordsman suddenly sped up!
He walked faster and faster!
The Dao Law on the Dao Path did not seem to have any effect on him!
Seeing the Swordsman suddenly speed up, the sloppy old man's pupils shrank, his eyes filled with disbelief.
Soon, the Swordsman arrived in front of the Dao Gate.
The stone door slowly opened, and a voice floated out from inside. "Enter this door, and you can obtain the Dao."
The Swordsman chuckled. "Dao?
Can you block my sword? "
With that, he turned around and floated away.
The stone door was empty and quiet.
When the Swordsman returned to the starting point, the sloppy old man suddenly said with a trembling voice: "Your excellency … why don't you go in and see?
You can obtain the true Dao by entering this door! "
The Swordsman did not look back. "I am already invincible, why would I need to enter the Dao?"
The sloppy old man was petrified.
At this time, the starry sky several hundred zhang in front of the Swordsman suddenly split open, and a strand of sword qi floated out.
The Swordsman opened his palm, and the strand of sword qi steadily fell in front of him.
A moment later, the Swordsman looked up into the distance and whispered: "The Five Dimensional Universe?"
At this point, he turned to look at the sloppy old man. "Can you do me a small favor?"
The sloppy old man hurriedly said, "Senior, please speak!"
Senior!
In fact, the sloppy old man felt rather complicated. How many years had it been?
When had he ever called anyone senior?
Swordsman smiled faintly. "The son of an old friend has encountered some trouble in the Fifth Dimension. The people there are too weak, so I have no interest in going there. However, the son of an old friend is in trouble, so I have no choice but to help, so …"
The slovenly old man hurriedly said, "This junior is willing to go and help!"
This was a great opportunity to form a good relationship!
Why would such an expert seek his help?
Such an opportunity was hard to come by even in ten thousand years!
Swordsman nodded. "Since you've done me a favor, I should also do you a favor. Tell me!"
The sloppy old man hurriedly bowed respectfully, "Senior, please give me some pointers!"
Swordsman shook his head. "I can't guide you!"
The sloppy old man was puzzled. "Why?"
Swordsman chuckled. "You are within the realm, but I am not!"
The sloppy old man was stunned. "Not within the realm?"
Swordsman nodded. "I don't have a realm!"
The sloppy old man: "…"
Swordsman suddenly walked into the distance. "The Dao is in the heart, and you are the Dao. There is no need to become someone else's Dao. Since you have reached the end of the road, why not try another one?"
As he spoke, he had already disappeared at the end of the starry sky. At the same time, a voice came from the end of the starry sky. "Actually, there is nothing wrong with being weak. At least, you can taste the taste of defeat …"
At the stone steps, the sloppy old man was silent. After a long time, he respectfully bowed towards the distance. "Thank you for your guidance!"
As he said this, he turned to look at the stone door with a complicated expression. "Master, I finally know why you are disappointed in us!
It turns out that you don't want us to follow your path … "
After saying this, he turned and left.
...
Qingcheng.
On this day, a woman arrived at Qingcheng. The woman wore a long white dress and was as beautiful as a fairy. As soon as she stepped into Qingcheng, she attracted the attention of countless people around her.
Although many people around her had lustful thoughts, no one dared to offend her.
The woman slowly arrived at the Ye Family.
At this time, the Ye Family had already declined. There were only a few people left in the entire Ye Family.
The woman walked towards the Ye Family. At this time, a Ye Family guard blocked in front of the woman. He glanced at the woman. "You are?"
The woman smiled faintly, and in the next moment, she had already disappeared. The guard was stunned.
When the woman reappeared, she was already in the Ye Residence. To be precise, she was in the small courtyard where Ye Xuan and Ye Ling used to live.
The woman looked around and smiled. "Ye Xuan …"
At this time, a weak voice sounded behind the woman. "You are?"
The woman turned around. In front of her stood an extremely weak old man.
The woman looked at the old man and did not speak.
The old man said with a trembling voice, "Do you know Ye Xuan?"
The woman nodded. "I do!"
The old man hurriedly asked, "Is he dead?"
The woman shook her head. "No!"
The old man was stunned. Then, he fell to the ground. "He's not dead yet …"
The woman looked at the old man. "You're going to die!"
The old man smiled miserably. "I know …"
The woman smiled. "You want him to die?
Why is that? "
The old man's expression suddenly became resentful. "He killed my grandson and caused me to become like this. Do you think I shouldn't want him to die?"
The woman shook her head and smiled. "So it's you. I heard that you forced him to leave the Ye Family …"
The old man stared at the woman. "He was never a member of the Ye Family!"
The woman smiled. "In your heart, you think that your grandson and the Ye Family Patriarch's position are the most important. But do you know that your so-called Patriarch's position is nothing in his eyes?
He was born in your Ye Family. In fact, it was a great opportunity for your Ye Family. If you had used this opportunity well, I believe that the fate of your Ye Family would have been changed!
Unfortunately, you forcibly turned this opportunity into an ill-fated relationship! "
The old man looked at the woman. "What level has he reached now?
Has he reached the Dharma Realm? "
The woman blinked. "Dharma Realm?"
The old man stared at the woman. "I heard that the strongest in the entire Azure Province is the Dharma Realm!
Has he reached the Dharma Realm? "
The woman smiled. "He's probably tens of thousands of times stronger than the Dharma Realm!
With his current strength, he should be able to destroy your Azure Province with a sneeze! "
Hearing this, the old man was stunned. Then, as if he had gone mad, he said, "Impossible … He can't be that strong …"
The woman ignored the old man. She turned around and looked around. Then, she said softly, "This small place can't cultivate someone like him …"
With that, she slowly closed her eyes. Soon, the surrounding space trembled.
Seeing this, the old man's expression changed. He quickly retreated. "You …"
At this moment, the woman suddenly opened her eyes. She narrowed her eyes. "I can't find out … What kind of force is behind you …"
A moment later, the woman turned around and left.
Behind her, the old man said in a trembling voice, "Who, who are you!"
The woman smiled. "I come from the Whirling World. Hmm, you probably haven't heard of it.
This time, I came to the Ye family to see his past and then to see the woman behind him. Unfortunately, she didn't leave any information.
However, it's not like I didn't gain anything! "
After saying that, she disappeared.
"Whirling World?"
In the field, the old man's eyes were filled with confusion. What was that place?
...
The Five-Dimensional Universe.
Somewhere in the starry sky, the Celestial Venerable stood quietly. Behind her were the Master and the Earth Venerable.
On the right of the Celestial Venerable stood a middle-aged man. He was Li Qiuheng of the Xuanhuan Sect.
Opposite Li Qiuheng was a middle-aged man. This person was Ye Jun, whose body had been destroyed by Ye Xuan.
At this moment, an old man suddenly appeared in front of everyone.
Li Qiuheng glanced at the old man and smiled. "So it's Elder Hu Bugui of the Dao Returning Academy."
The old man called Hu Bugui said indifferently, "I heard that you're preparing to join forces to deal with the force behind Ye Xuan?"
The Celestial Venerable smiled. "Yes!"
Hu Bugui looked at the Celestial Venerable. "Count the Dao Returning Academy in!"
The Celestial Venerable smiled. "Welcome!"
Li Qiuheng suddenly looked at the Celestial Venerable. "Celestial Venerable, is the force behind Ye Xuan really that strong?"
The Celestial Venerable said softly, "Everyone, there was a woman who appeared to help Ye Xuan before, and she killed my third brother in the Dark Abyss Forbidden Area. My third brother is also at the Consolidation Realm, and the other party is only a clone!"
Hearing this, everyone's expressions became solemn.
A clone!
A clone had killed a Consolidation Realm expert!
The Celestial Venerable continued, "Also, you should already know that Ye Xuan has the Calamity Cause, but he's still alive. If I'm not wrong, someone must be blocking the Calamity Cause for him!"
In the distance, Hu Bugui frowned. "What kind of force is it?"
The Celestial Venerable shook his head. "I don't know, but I'm sure that it's definitely a very strong force!"
"Very strong?"
Hu Bugui sneered. "Isn't that a little exaggerated?"
The Celestial Venerable looked at Hu Bugui and smiled. "Can you kill a Consolidation Realm expert with a clone?"
Hu Bugui fell silent.
He couldn't!
Hu Bugui looked at the Celestial Venerable. "But I don't think there are many experts of that level!"
The Celestial Venerable asked, "What if there are many?"
Hu Bugui frowned. "How is that possible? Even in the Whirling World, there aren't many experts of that level …"
The Celestial Venerable smiled. "What if there are many?"
At this moment, Li Qiuheng suddenly said, "The Celestial Venerable is right, what if there are many?
Even if there aren't many, what if there are two or three? "
Hu Bugui fell silent.
The Celestial Venerable smiled. "I, An Yuan, suffered a great loss because I underestimated him!"
As she said this, she looked down and said softly, "Everyone, if we want to destroy Ye Xuan and obtain the Dao Scripture, we must first take care of the people behind him.
So, this time, everyone, don't hide it anymore!
Call as many experts as you can! "
Hu Bugui frowned. "If we call too many experts, what if the people behind him are afraid and don't show up? Wouldn't it be a loss?"
The Celestial Venerable said softly, "That's true …"
....







Chapter 1427
In the starry sky, Li Qiuheng said, "We can do this, call more experts, but let the Consolidation Realm experts hide in the dark. Once the people behind Ye Xuan appear, we can annihilate them in one fell swoop!"
As he spoke, he glanced at the crowd. "What do you think?"
Li Qiuheng smiled and said, "That's fine!"
As he spoke, he looked at the Celestial Venerate. "Celestial Venerate, what do you think?"
After a moment of silence, the Empyrean said, "I feel that we shouldn't underestimate the people behind him. It's better to be safe than sorry."
Li Qiuheng smiled and said, "I know Sky Sovereign's concerns. Therefore, just in case, my Black Illusion Sect will send six peak Consolidation Realm experts and twenty Dao Attainment Realm experts to the Fifth Dimension!"
Hu Bugui added, "The Dao Returning Academy will also send six peak Unity realm experts and twenty Dao Attainment realm experts!"
As he spoke, he looked at Ye Jun.
After a moment of silence, Ye Jun said, "I'll withdraw!"
Quit?
Everyone looked at Ye Jun.
Ye Jun said indifferently, "Everyone, my Ye Family isn't as strong as you all, so we won't get involved!"
With that, he turned around and left.
Although the Ye Family was not considered weak in the Whirling World, it was not particularly strong either!
He had initially sought out Ye Xuan because he didn't know Ye Xuan's background. However, after hearing the Heavenly Venerate's words, he realized that Ye Xuan wasn't as simple as he seemed!
Even the Dark Abyss needed to join forces with the Whirling World. One could imagine how powerful the force behind Ye Xuan was!
At this time, if the Ye Clan still wanted to participate, it would be very stupid.
Moreover, even if he won in the end.
The Ye Family would not benefit at all, because the Ye Family was much weaker than the other forces!
Therefore, no matter if they won or lost, the Ye Family would not benefit from it!
Leaving was the best choice!
As for the grudge of having his body severed by Ye Xuan … He no longer cared!
It was good enough that he was alive!
The others didn't say anything when they saw Ye Jun leave, nor did they try to persuade him to leave.
The Ye Family's strength was indeed nothing to them.
Meanwhile, Li Qiuheng suddenly said, "What's the attitude of the Whirling Sect?"
The Whirling Sect!
Everyone looked at the Heavenly Exalt when they heard this.
The Whirling Sect's attitude was extremely important because the Whirling Sect was known as the number one sect in the Whirling World!
After all, the Whirling Sect possessed the last Dao Scripture. Yet, it was still standing. Just this alone was sufficient to prove how powerful the Whirling Sect was!
The Empyrean said softly, "Their attitude is unclear!
However, we can be sure that even if they don't help us, they will definitely not help Ye Xuan! "
Li Qiuheng nodded. "Although the Whirling Sect is strong, they will definitely not go against all of us just for Ye Xuan!
However, we have to be careful. If they really help Ye Xuan, then the matter will be slightly troublesome! "
The Empyrean nodded. "I'll go see them again and probe their attitude!"
After that, she looked at Li Qiuheng. "When will Profound Theory Sect's teleportation array be completed?"
Li Qiuheng said solemnly, "Five days at most!"
Five days!
The Heavenly Exalt nodded and said, "The Xiao Clan also participated in the construction of the teleportation formation, right?"
Li Qiuheng nodded. "Not only the Xiao Clan, but the Whirling Sect also participated!"
The Empyrean smiled. "It seems that you are very ambitious."
Li Qiuheng smiled. "Since we're here, we naturally can't just bring along the Dao Scripture.
What do you say, Empyrean? "
The Empyrean smiled. "Of course!
You guys chat. I'll go see the two from the Whirling Sect and see what their attitude is! "
After that, she left with the Earth Venerable and the Deceased Master.
Li Qiuheng looked at the Fifth Dimension below. "Let's get ready!"
After that, everyone left. The starry sky became quiet.
...
Dao City, inside the Sword Hall.
Ye Xuan and Guan Yin sat opposite each other.
Venerable Mi was also beside Ye Xuan.
Ye Xuan suddenly looked at Venerable Mi. "Are there many people coming recently?"
Venerable Mi nodded. "In the Fifth Dimension, more and more mysterious experts are appearing!
Most of them are from the Whirling World! "
After that, he paused. "We must think of a countermeasure!"
Ye Xuan nodded. "I know!"
After that, he looked at Guan Yin. "What's the overall situation in the Fifth Dimension?"
Guan Yin said in a low voice, "There are no problems internally!
But … if the Whirling World and the Dark Abyss really join forces, then we … "
Ye Xuan was silent.
Guan Yin said again, "No matter what, we cannot fight in the Fifth Dimension. Otherwise, it will cause a destructive blow to the Fifth Dimension!"
Venerable Mi sighed. "Their goal is the Fifth Dimension. Therefore, they will definitely not place the battlefield elsewhere. Moreover, we are very passive."
After that, he looked at Ye Xuan. "Sect Master, I feel that even if the Ancient God Abyss helps us, we have no chance of winning. Moreover, if they pay too high a price, they will most likely withdraw!"
Ye Xuan nodded. "This time, we can only rely on ourselves."
Venerable Mi wanted to say something but stopped.
Ye Xuan said softly, "Based on the current situation, we have no chance of winning!
Am I right? "
Venerable Mi said in a low voice, "Unless Miss Nian Nian regains her memory!"
Nian Nian!
Guan Yin and Ye Xuan looked at Ye Xuan. The only thing that could save the Fifth Dimension now was Nian Nian.
As long as Nian Nian regained her memory, all the problems would be solved.
But the problem was that Nian Nian showed no signs of recovering!
Ye Xuan suddenly stood up and left. Inside the hall, Venerable Mi and Guan Yin looked at each other.
Ye Xuan came to the starry sky and looked down at the Fifth Dimension.
This was the place that Ye Xuan wanted to protect!
But now, with the Whirling World and the Dark World joining forces, could he still protect this universe?
As if thinking of something, he opened his palm and six scrolls of Dao Scripture appeared in his hand.
Ye Zhiming suddenly said, "What's your plan?
Hand it over? "
Ye Xuan shook his head. "It's useless to hand it over. Because their goal is not only the Dao Scripture, but also this universe."
Ye Zhiming said in a low voice, "Compared to the Whirling World, the Fifth Dimension and the Daoting are too weak.
As for the Ancient God Abyss, as Venerable Mi said, if they pay too much, they will most likely retreat! "
Ye Xuan was silent.
Ye Zhiming said again, "Do you want to use this Dao Scripture to make them kill each other?"
Ye Xuan shook his head. "Impossible!
Those people are not stupid. If I do that, I will only give away the Dao Scripture for nothing! "
Ye Zhiming said, "Whirling School?"
Ye Xuan still shook his head. "The Whirling Sect is powerful, but they only want my Taoist scripture. They won't really help me. Even if they help me, they will only help me. They won't help the entire Five-Dimensional Universe!
They will even give up the Fifth Dimension to ease the relationship with other forces … In short, they will not rely on others. "
Ye Zhiming said in a low voice, "Can you contact the woman in the plain dress?"
Ye Xuan raised his head and looked into the depths of the starry sky. He could not sense the woman at all!
Ye Zhiming said in a low voice, "This time is not like before. If the difference in strength between us is too great, the Fifth Dimension might become chaotic."
Ye Xuan nodded. This was also the problem he was most worried about!
If the Whirling World and the Dark World joined hands, the Fifth Dimension would not be able to resist!
In this situation, many experts in the Fifth Dimension might collapse.
But this was normal, because the difference in strength between the two sides was too great.
Ye Zhiming said, "What are your plans?"
Ye Xuan was silent. After a while, he looked at the Dao Scripture in his hand. This Dao Scripture was a hot potato!
Actually, if it was only because of the Dao Scripture, it would be easy to deal with. But the problem was not only the Dao Scripture. The Whirling World built the teleportation array to invade this universe and take it for themselves!
As if he thought of something, Ye Xuan squinted his eyes. "Teleportation array!"
Ye Zhiming said solemnly, "If the teleportation array can't be built, then the Whirling World won't pose much of a threat to us. If there is only Dark Abyss, then Ancient God Abyss won't have to sacrifice too much and the situation will become advantageous to us.
Of course, the prerequisite is to stop them from building the teleportation array! "
Ye Xuan suddenly kept the Dao Scripture and came to Seven's room. Ye Xuan said solemnly, "Seven, I want you to help me find someone!"
Seven looked at Ye Xuan, "Who!"
Ye Xuan said a few words and moments later, Seven got up and left. "Hold on until I return!"
After saying that, she turned into a streak of sword light and disappeared.
At the entrance of the room, Ye Xuan raised his head and looked at the sky, "I will try my best!"
After saying that, he disappeared.
Soon, Ye Xuan found Xuan Chu because he had to ask Xuan Chu to know the coordinates of the teleportation array built by Xuanji Sect.
Xuan Chu looked at Ye Xuan, "You want to destroy the teleportation array!"
Ye Xuan nodded.
Xuan Chu shook his head, "Impossible!
That teleportation array was built by a few major forces … Moreover, my Whirling Sect also participated in it. It's definitely not something you can destroy! "
Ye Xuan smiled, "I still want to try!"
Xuan Chu fell silent.
Ye Xuan asked again, "Can I?"
After a moment of silence, Xuan Chu said, "It's in the starry sky 120 thousand li south of here. That's the coordinates chosen by Xuanji Sect. They didn't expect you to destroy the teleportation array, so you can try."
Ye Xuan cupped his fists, "Thank you!"
After saying that, he got up and was about to leave.
Xuan Chu suddenly said, "Even if you destroy the teleportation array, you'll only buy some time!
And they won't give up! "
Ye Xuan said softly, "All I need is some time!"
As soon as he finished speaking, he vanished.
Xuan Chu frowned slightly, "What did he mean?"
Ye Xuan didn't swagger off. Instead, he left Dao City stealthily and arrived at a starry sky according to Xuan Chu's directions.
This starry sky was the teleportation coordinates chosen by Xuanji Sect.
Ye Xuan slowly closed his eyes, and it didn't take long for the Spatial Dao Law to appear between his brows. A short while later, Ye Xuan suddenly opened his eyes and looked into the distance. The space there was 300m away was the coordinates chosen by Xuanji Sect because he'd sensed a mysterious force there!
Ye Xuan was about to attack when a voice resounded from behind him, "If you dare to attack, you'll die right now!"
.....







Chapter 1428
Ye Xuan turned around. In front of him stood a woman.
She was dressed in a spotless white dress.
The woman smiled, "I am Xuan Chu's master!"
Xuan Chu's master!
Ye Xuan looked at the woman, "Whirling Sect!"
The woman nodded, "Yes!
You can call me Yue Zun. They all call me that! "
Ye Xuan was silent.
The woman smiled, "Don't worry. I have no ill intentions towards you. Whirling Sect will not ally with An Yuan."
Ye Xuan looked at the woman, "Why?"
The woman smiled, "There are two reasons. First, I am good friends with the ancestor of Daoting, Zhao Zhiqing.
As for the second reason, I can't tell you for now! "
Ye Xuan smiled, "Don't you want the Dao Scripture?"
Yue Zun said, "We want it, but we won't snatch it from you!"
Ye Xuan looked at Yue Zun, "Why?"
Yue Zun smiled, "I won't answer this question!"
As she spoke, she looked at the space a hundred zhang in front of Ye Xuan, "Do you really think you can destroy this teleportation array?"
Ye Xuan said in a deep voice, "Sir, please give me some pointers!"
Yue Zun smiled, "In that space, there are at least five Consolidation Realm experts protecting the array. If you go in, do you think you can fight against five Consolidation Realm experts?"
Ye Xuan shook his head, "I can't!"
Yue Zun walked in front of Ye Xuan and looked at Ye Xuan, "Now, you have two choices. First, take the Fifth Dimension Tendo and run as far as you can. If you want to escape, with the help of Ancient God Abyss, they might not be able to catch you!
Second, hand over the Dao Scripture! "
Ye Xuan smiled, "Give it to Whirling Sect?"
Yue Zun nodded, "If you give it to my Whirling Sect, I can promise you that my Whirling Sect will protect your Fifth Dimension."
Ye Xuan shook his head, "I don't believe you!"
Venerable Yue smiled, "Why?"
Ye Xuan looked at Yue Zun, "Are you the Sect Leader of Whirling Sect?"
Yue Zun shook his head, "No, but the Whirling Sect's Sect Leader is my Senior Sister. Normally, she would not go back on her word!"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "Average?"
Venerable Yue smiled and said, "Then do you have a better choice?"
Ye Xuan looked at Yue Zun, "Miss Yue, I can choose to die together with you."
As soon as he finished speaking, he turned around and transformed into a streak of sword light that vanished into the horizon.
Indiscriminate destruction!
Yue Zun spoke softly, "Would you do that?"
Right at this moment, the space before her suddenly started trembling. Yue Zun frowned slightly when he witnessed this scene, "So quickly?
Looks like he can't wait any longer! "
...
Ye Xuan returned to the Fifth Dimension. He looked at the world below him in silence.
Passive!
The current situation in the Fifth Dimension was too passive!
Although the Ancient God Abyss had agreed to help, he knew that if the price was too high, the Ancient God Abyss would definitely retreat!
Because it was impossible for the Ancient God Abyss to become enemies with so many forces!
Currently, if the Ancient God Abyss retreated, the Fifth Dimension would not be able to fight back!
Why did the Whirling World and the Ancient God Abyss join hands?
It was because they wanted to deal with the forces behind him!
However, he was aggrieved because he did not know what forces were behind him!
What forces were behind him?
Ye Xuan was also a little confused.
He only knew of Qing 'er. As for the others, he wasn't familiar with them, including the aunt from the Nether World Hall who had come earlier!
Thinking of this, Ye Xuan sighed softly. Why did he feel like a scapegoat?
At this moment, a woman suddenly appeared in front of Ye Xuan. It was the Sky Sovereign.
The Sky Sovereign looked at Ye Xuan and said with a smile, "You are very calm!
If I'm not wrong, you must have contacted the people behind you.
Am I right? "
Ye Xuan was silent. He wanted to curse!
Contact?
I will contact your mother!
Qingcheng, Ye Clan, Ancestral Hall.
"Ancestors, Ye Xuan has no talent, no virtue … From now on, Ye Xuan's position as Crown Prince will be replaced by Ye Lang."
The one who spoke was an old man wearing a black robe.
Not far behind the old man stood a youth with a faint smile on his face.
This person was Ye Lang.
On both sides were the Ye Clan's Elders.
"Why!"
At this moment, a timid voice suddenly rang out in the ancestral hall.
Everyone turned to look and saw a little girl standing at the door. She was about 12 or 13 years old, and her hands were tightly gripping the hem of her skirt. Her face had a sickly pallor, and she looked a little weak. There was even a trace of fear in her eyes.
This little girl was called Ye Ling, Ye Xuan's sister. When she heard that the clan wanted to remove Ye Xuan, she rushed over despite her illness.
The black-robed old man frowned, "Ye Ling, what are you doing!"
The little girl called Ye Ling bowed to the people in the ancestral hall and said timidly, "Great Elder, my brother Ye Xuan is a Crown Prince. Why did you discard him for no reason?"
The Great Elder looked at Ye Ling coldly, "This is a matter of the clan. Why are you interrupting?
Leave! "
Ye Ling was afraid and didn't dare to look at the Great Elder, but she didn't leave. Instead, she plucked up her courage and walked into the ancestral hall. She bowed again to the Elders on both sides, "Elders, my brother is fighting with the Li Clan for the mining rights in Nanshan. He's fighting for the clan, and we don't know if he's dead or alive. But the clan is using a groundless excuse to discard his position. This is really unfair."
"Impudent!"
The Great Elder suddenly said angrily, "It's not up to a little girl like you to decide whether to discard him or not.
Men, drag her away. "
At this moment, the new Crown Prince Ye Lang suddenly smiled and said, "She should be flogged thirty times as a warning to others!"
The Great Elder said coldly, "Then flog her thirty times!"
Soon, two guards of the Ye Clan rushed in.
Ye Ling clenched her fists and said angrily, "This is unfair. My brother has risked his life for the clan for so many years. Even now, he's fighting for the clan. The clan is so unfair to him …"
One of the guards glanced at the new Crown Prince Ye Lang. He knew it was his chance to show off.
The guard sneered, "Young Master Ye Lang inherits the position of Crown Prince. Why are you shouting?" As he said this, he raised his hand and slapped Ye Ling's face.
Slap!
A crisp slap sounded. The right side of Ye Ling's face instantly turned red and swollen. But she didn't cry. She just held her cheek tightly.
Ye Lang looked at the guard and smiled, "What's your name?"
The guard hurriedly bowed, "I'm Zhang Mu. Greetings, Crown Prince."
Ye Lang nodded, "You're not bad. After I become the Crown Prince, I'll need ten guards. You can be my guard from now on."
Hearing this, Zhang Mu was overjoyed. He hurriedly bowed deeply, "I'm willing to go through fire and water for the Crown Prince!"
Ye Lang nodded slightly, "Drag him away. This person is disturbing the ancestral hall. Don't show any mercy. Do you understand?"
Zhang Mu glanced at Ye Lang. When he saw the murderous intent in Ye Lang's eyes, he understood.
He immediately grabbed Ye Ling's hair and dragged her out.
At this moment, Zhang Mu suddenly stopped when he saw something.
In the ancestral hall, everyone turned their heads to look outside.
Not far from the ancestral hall, a young man was walking toward the ancestral hall. The young man was wearing a tight-fitting robe. The robe was tattered and covered in blood.
This young man was Ye Xuan, who had rushed back from Nanshan!
Seeing Ye Xuan, Ye Lang's lips curled into a sinister smile.
Inside the ancestral hall, the Elders frowned.
The Great Elder narrowed his eyes, his face dark and gloomy. No one knew what he was thinking.
From afar, when Ye Xuan saw Zhang Mu dragging Ye Ling, his face turned savage. "Who gave you the guts to touch my sister?"
When Zhang Mu saw Ye Xuan, his face changed. He hurriedly looked at Ye Lang and was about to speak. At this time, Ye Xuan was like a ferocious tiger leaping in front of him. Before the latter could react, Ye Xuan's fist landed on his face.
Peng!
Zhang Mu felt a wave of dizziness, and he stumbled and fell.
However, Ye Ling did not stop there. He charged at Zhang Mu again. At this time, Ye Lang suddenly roared, "Ye Xuan, he's my man. How dare you …"
Ye Xuan suddenly stepped on Zhang Mu's chest.
Pu!
Zhang Mu spat out a mouthful of blood.
Seeing this, Ye Lang's face turned ugly. Ye Xuan looked up at him and said, "Your man?"
As he spoke, he stepped on Zhang Mu's face.
Zhang Mu's face turned into a bloody mess, as he screamed, "Prince, save, save me …"
Ye Xuan did not care about Zhang Mu, as he walked up to Ye Ling. Seeing Ye Ling's appearance, Ye Xuan felt as though his heart was being cut by a knife. He clenched his fists, and his entire body trembled.
When Ye Ling saw Ye Xuan, her tears flowed out, "Brother, it hurts, it hurts …"
Hearing this, Ye Xuan's expression turned savage. In the next instant, he charged in front of Zhang Mu and kicked Zhang Mu's head.
Peng!
Qingcheng, Ye Clan, Ancestral Hall.
"Ancestors, Ye Xuan has no talent, no virtue … From now on, Ye Xuan's position as Prince shall be replaced by Ye Lang."
The one who spoke was an old man in black robes.
Not far behind the old man, there was a youth with a faint smile on his face.
This person was Ye Lang.
On both sides were the Elders of the Ye Clan.
"Why!?"
At this time, a timid voice rang out in the Ancestral Hall.
Everyone turned to look and saw a little girl standing at the door. She was about 12 or 13 years old, and her hands were tightly gripping the hem of her skirt. Her face had a sickly pallor, and she looked a little weak. There was even a trace of fear in her eyes.
This little girl was called Ye Ling, and she was Ye Xuan's younger sister. When she heard that Ye Xuan was to be replaced, she disregarded her illness and rushed over.
The black-robed old man frowned, "Ye Ling, what are you doing!?"
The little girl called Ye Ling bowed to the people in the Ancestral Hall, and said timidly, "Great Elder, my brother Ye Xuan is a Prince, why did you discard him for no reason?"
The Great Elder looked at Ye Ling coldly, "This is a matter of the Clan, what are you interrupting?
Leave! "
Ye Ling was obviously afraid, and did not dare to look at the Great Elder, but she did not leave. Instead, she plucked up her courage and entered the Ancestral Hall. She bowed to the Elders on both sides, "Elders, my brother is fighting with the Li Clan over the mining rights at Nanshan. He is fighting for the Clan, and we don't know if he's dead or alive. Yet, the Clan is using a groundless excuse to discard his position. This is unfair."
"Impudent!"
The Great Elder suddenly raged, "Whether he discards his position or not, it's not up to a little girl like you to decide.
Men, drag her away. "
At this time, the new Prince, Ye Lang, suddenly laughed, "You should be flogged 30 times as a warning to others!"
The Great Elder replied coldly, "Then flog her 30 times!"
Soon, two guards of the Ye Clan rushed in.
Ye Ling clenched her fists, and said angrily, "This is unfair. My brother has risked his life for the Clan for so many years, and even now, he is fighting for the Clan. The Clan is so unfair to him …"
One of the guards glanced at the new Prince, Ye Lang. He knew that his chance to shine had come.
The guard sneered, "Young Master Ye Lang inherits the Prince's position, and it's everyone's wish. What are you yelling about?" As he spoke, he raised his hand and slapped Ye Ling's face.
Slap!
A crisp slap sounded, and the right side of Ye Ling's face instantly swelled up. However, she did not cry, and only held her cheek tightly.
Ye Lang looked at the guard, and smiled, "What's your name?"
The guard hurriedly bowed, "Subordinate Zhang Mu greets the Prince."
Ye Lang nodded, "You're not bad. After I become the Prince, I need 10 guards. You can be my guard from now on."
Hearing this, Zhang Mu was overjoyed, and hurriedly bowed deeply, "This subordinate is willing to go through fire and water for the Prince, even if it means death!"
Ye Lang nodded slightly, "Drag him out. This person is disturbing the ancestral hall, don't show mercy, understand?"
Zhang Mu glanced at Ye Lang, and when he saw the murderous intent in Ye Lang's eyes, he understood.
He immediately grabbed Ye Ling's hair and dragged her out.
At this moment, Zhang Mu seemed to have seen something, and suddenly stopped.
In the ancestral hall, everyone turned their heads to look outside.
Not far from the ancestral hall, a young man was walking towards the ancestral hall. The young man was wearing a tight-fitting robe, and the robe was tattered, and there was blood everywhere.
The young man was Ye Xuan, who had rushed back from Nanshan!
Seeing Ye Xuan, Ye Lang's lips curled into a sinister smile.
Inside the ancestral hall, the Elders frowned.
The Great Elder narrowed his eyes, and his face darkened. No one knew what he was thinking.
From afar, when Ye Xuan saw Zhang Mu dragging Ye Ling, his face turned savage, "Who gave you the guts to touch my sister?"
When Zhang Mu saw Ye Xuan, his face changed. He hurriedly looked at Ye Lang, and just as he was about to speak, Ye Xuan leaped in front of him like a ferocious tiger. Before the latter could react, Ye Xuan's fist landed on his face.
Peng!
Zhang Mu felt a wave of dizziness, and he stumbled and fell.
However, Ye Ling did not stop there. He charged towards Zhang Mu again. At this time, Ye Lang suddenly roared, "Ye Xuan, he's my man, how dare you …"
Ye Xuan suddenly stepped on Zhang Mu's chest.
Pu!
Zhang Mu spat out a mouthful of blood.
Seeing this, Ye Lang's face turned ugly. Ye Xuan looked up at him, and snarled, "Your man?"
As he spoke, he stepped on Zhang Mu's face.
Zhang Mu's face turned into a bloody mess, as he screamed, "Prince, save, save me …"
Ye Xuan did not care about Zhang Mu, as he walked to Ye Ling's side. Seeing Ye Ling's state, Ye Xuan felt as though his heart was being cut by a knife. He clenched his fists, and his entire body trembled.
When Ye Ling saw Ye Xuan, her tears flowed, "Brother, it hurts, it hurts …"
Hearing this, Ye Xuan's expression turned savage. In the next instant, he charged in front of Zhang Mu, and kicked Zhang Mu's head.
Peng!







Chapter 1429
The appearance of these experts caused the entire starry sky to tremble.
This expanse of the universe couldn't endure so many experts at all!
Meanwhile, Li Qiuheng gazed at the Heavenly Exalt and smiled, "Heavenly Exalt, my Black Illusion Sect has a total of 8 Consolidation Realm experts and 22 Dao Transformation Realm experts. The same goes for the Profound School, Dao Returnance Institute, and Xiao Clan!
What about you? "
Everyone gazed at the Heavenly Exalt.
The Heavenly Exalt grinned. She knew that the members of the Whirling Sect wanted to see An Yuan's strength.
At this moment, she had no choice but to reveal An Yuan's strength. Because if An Yuan didn't reveal his formidable strength, then he wouldn't have the right to speak!
The Heavenly Exalt smiled, "Come out!"
As soon as she finished speaking, 12 black robed experts suddenly appeared behind her!
The expressions of Li Qiuheng and the others changed slightly when they witnessed this scene!
All 12 of them were actually Consolidation Realm experts!
If the Heavenly Exalt and Earthly Exalt were included, then it was a total of 14 Consolidation Realm experts!
Besides that, there were 30 Dao Transformation Realm experts!
It could be said that An Yuan had the most experts amongst the great powers!
At this moment, the members of the Black Illusion Sect didn't dare underestimate An Yuan!
Meanwhile, a white robed old man walked forward. He glanced at them and smiled, "Everyone, I'm the Old Man, the Grand Elder of the Xiao Clan, Xiao Pingsheng. I think I should mention something in advance, and it's that there are only six scrolls of the Dao Scripture. If we kill Ye Xuan, then how will the six scrolls be divided?"
Everyone fell silent when they heard this.
How to divide the Dao Scripture was a very important question!
Xiao Pingsheng smiled, "We wouldn't have to kill each other then, right?"
Meanwhile, the Heavenly Exalt suddenly said, "Elder Xiao, I think it's not suitable for us to talk about this now!"
Xiao Pingsheng gazed at the Heavenly Exalt, "But this isn't a problem that can't be resolved without discussing it!"
The Heavenly Exalt gazed at Xiao Pingsheng, "Elder Xiao, the premise of this question is that we're able to kill Ye Xuan and annihilate the power that stands behind him. However, do you think we're 100% confident in our ability?"
Xiao Pingsheng chuckled and said, "It's not that I look down on Ye Xuan, but I really can't find any force in the entire universe that can fight against our joint forces!
Even with the help of the Ancient God Abyss and the Whirling Sect, it was impossible!
According to what I know, the Whirling Sect has already chosen not to interfere in this matter. As for the Ancient God Abyss, haven't they already left the Fifth Dimension? "
The Empyrean shook his head. "Elder Xiao, the influence behind Ye Xuan is unknown to us, and the unknown means that anything is possible!"
Xiao Pingsheng was about to speak when Li Qiuheng suddenly said, "What the Heavenly Venerate said makes sense. I think it's still too early for us to talk about the Dao Scriptures!
It wasn't appropriate either!
It wouldn't be too late to discuss the matter of the Dao Scripture after he destroyed Ye Xuan and the forces behind him.
And if we talk about it now, it's very likely to cause some unnecessary trouble and problems. "
Hu Buhui also nodded, "Let's get rid of Ye Xuan first!"
Seeing this, Xiao Pingsheng did not insist. He immediately nodded, "Then let's get rid of Ye Xuan first!"
At this moment, Li Qiuheng suddenly laughed, "Speaking of which, with so many of us, will the forces behind Ye Xuan be so scared that they won't dare to show themselves?
If that's the case, then this trip to the Fifth Dimension will be too boring! "
The Empyrean chuckled, "Let's go!
Let's go and meet Ye Xuan! "
Everyone nodded.
Soon, everyone disappeared. When they reappeared, they were already in the sky above the Dao City.
When so many experts appeared in the sky above the Dao City, everyone in the Dao City was petrified.
Then, everyone fell into despair!
Even Revered Mi felt despair at this moment!
So many experts!
How could the current Fifth Dimension fight against them?
Below, Ye Xuan walked out of the Sword Hall and looked up at the sky. When he saw so many experts in the sky, he fell silent.
They really wanted to gang up on Ye Xuan!
Ye Xuan slowly walked towards the sky. At this moment, a little girl appeared beside him.
It was Nian Nian!
Nian Nian grabbed Ye Xuan's hand and softly said, "I'll go with you!"
Ye Xuan smiled, "Okay!"
At this moment, Zhang Wenxiu, An Lanxiu, and Lian Wanli also appeared beside him.
There were also two people he was very familiar with. They were Xiao Dao and Qian Mo!
Ye Xuan looked at Xiao Dao and smiled, "You shouldn't have come at this time!"
Xiao Dao looked at Ye Xuan and said, "If I didn't come now, I might not have the chance to come in the future!"
Ye Xuan shook his head and smiled. He looked at Qian Mo, "Miss Qian Mo, what about you?"
Although he had slept with Qian Mo, that was Sister Nian's sin.
There were feelings between him and Qian Mo, but there didn't seem to be any. On the other hand, they had dual cultivated!
What was this?
Were they sleeping partners?
Qian Mo looked at Ye Xuan and didn't say anything.
Ye Xuan was about to speak when the Celestial Venerate in the sky suddenly smiled, "Ye Xuan, you seem to have a lot of female confidantes!"
Ye Xuan looked up at the Celestial Venerate and said with a smile, "Celestial Venerate, to be honest, aren't you overestimating me?
Let me count, tsk tsk, 46 Consolidation Realm, more than 100 Dao Attainment Realm … I'm only at Dao Defense Realm!
Aren't you guys going too far? "
The Celestial Venerate looked at Ye Xuan and said with a smile, "I've investigated you. You had many opponents in the past, but they're all dead!
Why?
There's a very important reason, and that's because they looked down on you!
They didn't go all out!
They always gave you a chance to grow!
So, you're alive, but they're dead!
We won't make their mistakes!
Look, we value you enough, right? "
Ye Xuan was silent.
The Celestial Venerate looked around and said with a smile, "Ye Xuan, where are your people?"
Ye Xuan looked around and cursed in his heart, I also want to know where my people are!
At this time, Li Qiuheng suddenly smiled, "If an expert appears, with our strength, even if they're millions of miles away, we'll still be able to sense them!
Unfortunately, I don't sense any powerful aura! "
As he said this, he looked at Ye Xuan, "Ye Xuan, don't tell me the people behind you are afraid?"
Below, Ye Xuan suddenly turned to Venerable Mi and the rest, "You guys go!"
Venerable Mi and the rest were stunned.
Ye Xuan smiled, "There's no point in staying here!"
Venerable Mi was silent.
Ye Xuan looked at Guan Yin below, "Go!"
Guan Yin was silent.
Go!
It was obvious that the Fifth Dimension had no chance of winning!
With all the experts of the Whirling World and the Dark Abyss joining hands, how could Ye Xuan resist?
It should be known that these factions had a foundation of hundreds of thousands of years or even hundreds of thousands of years!
And what about Ye Xuan?
His biggest support was Nian Nian, but now, Nian Nian had become a little girl. Not only could she not help Ye Xuan, but she also needed Ye Xuan to protect her …
It could be said that the Fifth Dimension was a dead end!
At this time, Ye Xuan looked at Dao City below, "Everyone, leave!"
He did not ask everyone to face the Whirling World and the Ancient God Abyss with him, because that was equivalent to sending others to their deaths!
In fact, he himself wanted to run away!
But he knew that he could not escape, and he did not want to escape!
He promised Sister Nian that he would protect this part of the universe, and he would do his best to do what he promised.
Hearing Ye Xuan's words, the people below had a complicated expression.
They knew that Ye Xuan wanted them to escape!
Ye Xuan looked at the people below and smiled, "I'm sorry, I don't have the ability to protect you!"
Below, countless people suddenly slowly bowed to Ye Xuan.
In fact, Ye Xuan not only changed the Fifth Dimension, but he also changed the fate of everyone!
In the past, the Fifth Dimension, the Sixth Dimension, and the Dao World did not have a single True Release Realm expert, but now, let alone True Release Realm experts, there were many Dao Validation Realm experts!
Moreover, Ye Xuan also shared the Dao Scripture … It could be said that Ye Xuan changed everyone's fate!
At this moment, when many people heard Ye Xuan asking them to leave, their hearts were incomparably complicated.
Unknowingly, they had already regarded the Fifth Dimension as their home.
Here, it was really harmonious!
In the sky, Ye Xuan smiled again and said, "Everyone, it is I, Ye Xuan, who does not have the ability to protect everyone and this part of the universe. It has nothing to do with you!"
Below, an old man suddenly said in a trembling voice, "Dao Master, why don't you escape? If you escape, with your talent, you might be able to contend against these people in the future!"
Escape?
Ye Xuan smiled lightly. "They won't let me escape. Of course, I won't escape either!"
As he said that, he turned to look at Nian Nian beside him and said with a smile, "I swore to you before. At that time, I said that I would live and die with the Five-Dimensional Universe in the future … Although I was just playing tricks at that time, I never thought that this oath would actually come true!"
Nian Nian nodded slightly. She tightly held onto Ye Xuan's hand. "I will go with you!"
Ye Xuan smiled. "Okay!"
As he spoke, he looked at Dao City below. "Everyone, stop wasting time!
Let's go! "
Below, many people hesitated for a moment before fleeing one after another.
This was a battle that they had no chance of winning!
But there were still some people who stayed. Of course, there were not many!
Ye Xuan suddenly looked at Venerable Mi. At this moment, an old man appeared beside Venerable Mi.
The person who came was Bai Dizi!
Bai Dizi said softly, "They can let those people below go, but they won't let us go!"
Ye Xuan looked at Bai Dizi and smiled. "Bai Dizi, as far as I know, your escaping skills are top-notch. Why don't you escape?"
Bai Dizi looked at Ye Xuan. "You are Daoting's only hope. If you die, then Daoting really doesn't exist anymore!
If Daoting is gone, there is not much meaning in me living!
So, let me accompany you to death! "
Ye Xuan was speechless.
Venerable Mi suddenly said, "Bai Dizi is right. You are the Daoting's last hope. If you perish today, then Daoting will have no more hope. If Daoting has no more hope, then what's the point of us living?"
As he spoke, he gazed at Ye Xuan and smiled. "Today, let us accompany you on your last journey!"
Ye Xuan smiled. Then he said, "I didn't expect that we would have to live and die together today. Life is so wonderful!"
As he spoke, he gazed at An Lanxiu and the others. His gaze swept past them with a complicated expression. "I really want to let all of you go, but I know that all of you definitely won't …."
When he spoke up to this point, he grinned. "All of you wanted to return the favor in the afterlife, but I feel like they won't allow me to have an afterlife. So, I'm sorry!
If there is a next life, please don't meet a man like me. Even I feel like I'm trash! "
Zhang Wenxiu gazed at Ye Xuan. "You've finally spoken the truth!"
Ye Xuan laughed. He glanced at the women again and said, "I don't want to see all of you die because that would be worse than death. So, let me die before all of you!"
As he spoke, he looked up at Venerable Tianji and the others and said softly, "I want to defy the heavens and change my fate. I want to protect all of you and the Fifth Dimension by myself. But I can't do it!
Reality is just so cruel! "
As he spoke, the blood within his body suddenly surged. In the next moment, a flame suddenly ignited within his body!
Bloodline ignition!
That wasn't all!
His soul actually started to ignite as well!
...
In a certain distant starry sky, a woman in a white robe suddenly stopped. She seemed to have sensed something, and she clenched her fists tightly while her eyes almost split apart from rage. "Brother!
Wait for me!
Wait for me! "
As she spoke, she suddenly vanished at the end of the starry sky, and everywhere she passed was annihilated inch by inch ….
....







Chapter 1430
In the sky above Dao City, Ye Xuan's ignition of his soul and bloodline shocked everyone!
Even the Celestial Venerables and the others were shocked.
They didn't expect Ye Xuan to directly ignite his bloodline and soul!
The Celestial Venerables stared at Ye Xuan, "Where is the person behind you!"
She had been waiting for the person behind Ye Xuan to appear.
But now, there was no one!
Could it be that Ye Xuan didn't have any force behind him?
Or could it be that the force behind Ye Xuan wasn't strong at all? After seeing the Whirling Sect and An Yuan joining forces, the force behind him was afraid!
They didn't dare to appear!
Below, Ye Xuan suddenly laughed, "Celestial Venerables, I want to see the power of a Consolidation Realm expert before I die. Can you satisfy me?"
The Celestial Venerables looked at Ye Xuan, "Where is the person behind you!"
"I'm afraid he won't dare to appear!"
Li Qiuheng suddenly laughed, "Just like the Ancient God Abyss, once the price is too high, no one will be willing to protect Ye Xuan!
So, Ye Xuan must have been abandoned. He has been abandoned! "
The Celestial Venerables scanned the surroundings, but still didn't sense any powerful aura.
No one appeared!
At this moment, Li Qiuheng suddenly laughed, "Ye Xuan, didn't you want to see the power of a Consolidation Realm expert?
I'll fulfill your wish! "
With that, he suddenly disappeared.
Down below, Ye Xuan laughed. "Bring it on!"
With that, he leaped up and slashed at the sky with his sword.
Dao Sword!
This slash was unprecedentedly powerful!
After igniting his bloodline and soul, Ye Xuan's strength skyrocketed like a volcanic eruption!
And the moment Ye Xuan slashed with his sword, he also used his Dao Seal!
With the enhancement of the Dao Seal, bloodline, and soul, although he wasn't at the Dao Attainment Realm, his aura was several times stronger than an average Dao Attainment Realm expert!
With this slash, a trace of shock flashed in the eyes of the Celestial Venerables!
Ye Xuan was only at the Dao Defense Realm!
He was actually able to display such a powerful sword!
The Empyrean looked down at Ye Xuan, "Truly a monster!"
At the moment when Ye Xuan slashed out with his sword, a fist print swept down from the sky and directly blasted on Ye Xuan's sword.
Boom!
Under everyone's gaze, Ye Xuan returned to his original position. Li Qiuheng also returned to his original position. On his right fist, there was a deep sword scar.
At this moment, Li Qiuheng's eyes turned solemn.
This Ye Xuan's strength had actually reached such a level!
Meanwhile, the distant Heavenly Exalt suddenly said, "He's still getting stronger!"
Everyone looked at Ye Xuan and saw that Ye Xuan's aura was still rising crazily, as if there was no limit.
Meanwhile, Ye Xuan's body was slowly turning illusory!
At this moment, Ye Xuan suddenly looked up at Li Qiuheng. "Again!"
As soon as he finished speaking, he suddenly disappeared on the spot.
Hiss!
A ray of sword light shot into the sky from below!
A strand of monstrous sword energy shook the heavens and the earth, and it was so powerful that all the experts in the surroundings were visibly moved!
Li Qiuheng's eyes narrowed slightly, and then he suddenly clenched his right fist. At the instant he clenched his fist, the space around his fist suddenly transformed into a spatial vortex. In the next moment, he suddenly smashed his fist forward!
Bang!
The spatial vortex suddenly swept down, and the entire sky actually warped at this moment!
Meanwhile, Ye Xuan's sword arrived before him.
Bang!
The spectators watched as Ye Xuan's sword slashed against the spatial vortex. The entire heavens and the earth trembled violently, and then the spatial vortex exploded apart and transformed into nothingness.
The sword continued forward and slashed straight at Li Qiuheng.
A wisp of viciousness flashed through Li Qiuheng's eyes. He flicked his sleeve, took a step forward, squatted down, clenched his right fist, and then smashed it down. "Obliterate!"
A strand of obliterating energy swept down, and everywhere it passed, space was obliterated!
Bang!
Ye Xuan and his sword were blasted back to where they stood earlier, and the space before him and Li Qiuheng had become pitch black!
At the same time, a wisp of blood slowly seeped out from the corner of Ye Xuan's mouth.
In the sky, Li Qiuheng looked down at Ye Xuan and said, "It's over!"
As soon as he finished speaking, he suddenly stomped his right foot on the ground, and then his figure plunged down. This charge seemed as if he intended to smash this expanse of the heavens and the earth into pieces. It was an extremely shocking sight!
Ye Xuan's eyes slowly closed while his right hand clenched tightly onto his sword. At this moment, he felt like he wasn't himself anymore!
Strength!
He felt like his body possessed boundless strength!
He'd never felt so strong in his life!
Of course, he knew that he'd obtained all of this at the cost of his life!
Ye Xuan didn't think too much about it and suddenly opened his eyes. In the next moment, he transformed into a fiery red ray of light that shot into the sky!
Bang!
Under the gazes of everyone, Ye Xuan slashed Li Qiuheng back with a single strike of his sword, and the latter directly retreated 3km away!
The eyes of the Heavenly Exalt in the sky instantly narrowed when he saw this scene. Ye Xuan's strength was unusually strong!
The other experts had extremely solemn expressions as well. Ye Xuan's current strength wasn't inferior to a Consolidation Realm expert in the slightest!
Even though Ye Xuan had paid the price with his life, it was still too terrifying!
In the sky, Li Qiuheng glanced at his chest. There was a sword mark there, and it was extremely deep to the point his bones could be seen!
Li Qiuheng's expression was extremely unsightly!
He'd never imagined that he'd actually been injured by Ye Xuan twice in succession!
An extraordinary humiliation!
Li Qiuheng looked down at Ye Xuan. Right at this moment, Ye Xuan suddenly vanished on the spot.
Om!
A sword howl shook the heavens and the earth as a ray of light shot into the sky from below and slashed straight at Li Qiuheng!
The expressions of everyone in the surroundings instantly changed when they saw this attack!
This attack was even stronger than the previous one!
Each attack was stronger than the previous one!
Li Qiuheng didn't dare act carelessly in the sky. He pressed his palms together, and then he flipped his palms outwards when the attack arrived in front of him before swiftly pressing them forward.
Bang!
A powerful force swept out like a volcanic eruption from his palms!
As soon as this force appeared, the entire sky instantly became illusory!
Bang!
Ye Xuan's attack had been forcefully blocked!
However, Li Qiuheng's countenance instantly turned ghastly pale!
Meanwhile, Ye Xuan suddenly stomped his right foot on the ground, and then he spun forward with his sword in hand.
Hiss!
The sound of something tearing resounded. Li Qiuheng's pupils constricted, and then he swiftly moved his arms forward to block Ye Xuan's attack!
Bang!
As soon as Ye Xuan's sword descended, Li Qiuheng was instantly pushed over 10km back. At the same time, one of his arms had been slashed into pieces by Ye Xuan!
The Heavenly Exalt stared fixedly at Ye Xuan from afar. At this moment, she suddenly realized that she'd overlooked Ye Xuan until now!
Even though she felt that Ye Xuan was an extraordinary genius, Ye Xuan hadn't been able to pose any threat to her at all.
But at this moment, she suddenly realized that her thoughts were wrong!
If Ye Xuan were to mature, then he would be extraordinarily terrifying!
The experts from Whirling World had extremely solemn expressions on their faces as well. Because Ye Xuan's combat strength had far exceeded their expectations. It could be said that not to mention the Fifth Dimension, even if Ye Xuan was in Whirling World, he would definitely be the number one expert in the younger generation!
Ye Xuan must die!
At this moment, both the Dark Abyss and Whirling World had unanimously come to a common understanding!
The best way to deal with a genius was to strangle him!
At this moment, Ye Xuan once again rushed towards Li Qiuheng from afar. Wherever the sword light passed, it tore through everything!
In the distance, Li Qiuheng's pupils suddenly shrank as he hurriedly said, "Attack!"
At this moment, he no longer dared to fight against Ye Xuan by himself!
As soon as his voice fell, two Consolidation Realm experts from the Xuanhuan Sect suddenly appeared in front of him!
But Ye Xuan didn't choose to retreat!
He slashed out with his sword!
The two experts suddenly disappeared from where they stood!
Rumble!
Rumble!
The sky trembled violently. Under the joint attack of the two Consolidation Realm powerhouses, Ye Xuan was forced to retreat repeatedly. However, he did not retreat for long before he suddenly stopped and slashed forward.
Chi!
A blood-red sword light pierced through the air!
Boom!
This sword strike directly forced the two Consolidation Realm experts to retreat!
Seeing this scene, the expressions of the Heavenly Exalt and the others not far away became even more unsightly!
Ye Xuan's strength was constantly growing!
Stronger and stronger!
At this moment, Ye Xuan suddenly disappeared from where he stood. When he reappeared, he was already in front of one of the Consolidation Realm experts. Just like before, he slashed down with his sword again!
The Consolidation Realm expert didn't dare to be careless and was about to attack with all his might when a sudden change occurred. A black and white Tai Chi circle suddenly appeared above his head, and in an instant, his realm was directly suppressed to the Dao Attainment Realm!
At the same time, Ye Xuan's four domains directly enveloped the old man!
This sudden turn of events caused the old man's expression to change drastically. He was just about to retreat, but it was too late.
Ye Xuan's sword fell.
Chi!
Under everyone's gaze, Ye Xuan's sword slashed straight down from the old man's head.
Chi!
The sword slashed to the end, and the old man's body was split into two.
His soul was directly destroyed!
The surroundings suddenly fell silent when they witnessed this scene!
Ye Xuan had killed a Consolidation Realm expert!
After all, Ye Xuan was only at the Dao Attainment Realm at this moment!
Killing an enemy two levels above him?
Not far away, the experts of the Whirling World looked at Ye Xuan as if they were looking at a monster!
At this moment, Hu Bugui, who was next to the Celestial Venerable, suddenly said, 'This person is too monstrous!
Kill him! '
The Celestial Venerable nodded. "Kill him!"
As soon as her voice fell, a dozen Consolidation Realm experts suddenly rushed out in unison, heading straight for Ye Xuan!
Seeing the dozen Consolidation Realm experts rushing over, Ye Xuan turned his head and glanced. He saw An Lanxiu, Nian Nian, Zhang Wenxiu, Lian Wanli, Xiao Dao, and Qian Mo …
The only regret was that he didn't see Ye Ling!
But it was good that Ye Ling wasn't here, so he could live on!
As long as he could live on, that was good!
Ye Xuan slowly closed his eyes. "Ling 'er … I can't go find you!
Don't blame me … You must live well … "
At this point, he suddenly opened his eyes, looked at the Consolidation Realm experts rushing towards him, and laughed. "Come on!"
As his voice fell, he began to completely release all his power!
Self-destruct!
Not far away, Li Qiuheng said somewhat crazily, "Kill him!
Kill him! "
As soon as he finished speaking, the experts behind him also rushed out one after another.
And at this moment, a beast-like roar came from nowhere. "Who dares to touch him!
Who dares!
Ahhhhh! "
The starry sky trembled!
.....
