Chapter 1431
Everyone was stunned when they heard this voice!
Who is it?
Ye Xuan listened to it as well, and he looked towards the depths of the starry sky. The voice was slightly familiar, but he couldn't recall who it was!
The Heavenly Venerable's eyes narrowed.
It's here!
The force behind Ye Xuan has finally appeared!
Hu Bugui raised his head and frowned. "I don't sense her aura!"
The nearby Xiao Clan's Xiao Pingsheng said in a low voice, "The person hasn't arrived, but his voice arrived first!"
Hu Bugui said softly, "Looks like it's not easy to deal with her!"
Xiao Pingsheng spoke indifferently, "It's good to increase the difficulty. Otherwise, it would be too boring!"
Hu Bugui smiled, "Indeed!"
They were curious about the force behind Ye Xuan, but they weren't afraid at all!
What a joke! A few dozen Consolidation Realm experts were gathered here!
Did they need to be afraid?
Suddenly, Li Qiuheng spoke fiercely, "No matter who she is, kill Ye Xuan first!"
As soon as he finished speaking, he charged towards Ye Xuan.
Ye Xuan was an arrow at the end of its flight, and it was the best time to kill him!
In next to no time, Li Qiuheng arrived in front of Ye Xuan, and then he smashed his fist towards Ye Xuan!
At this moment, Ye Xuan was powerless to resist because he'd overdrawn all his strength!
He could only watch as the fist smashed towards him!
Right at this moment, the Executing Heaven Sword in his hand suddenly trembled violently, and numerous sword howls shook the heavens and the earth. At the same time, the space in front of Ye Xuan was suddenly torn apart, and then a woman walked out from within it.
The woman wore a white robe and had a wine gourd hanging from her waist.
Along with the appearance of this woman, the gazes of everyone present descended onto her.
Who is she?
Ye Xuan grinned when he saw her. "Qing 'er!"
She was Qing 'er as well!
But she wasn't a woman in a plain dress!
Meanwhile, Li Qiuheng had arrived behind her.
Li Qiuheng stared at the woman who had just appeared and said fiercely: "You can go and die too!"
As soon as he finished speaking, his left hand suddenly blasted a punch towards the woman. However, in the next moment, he was stunned.
It wasn't just Li Qiuheng who was stunned, everyone else was stunned as well!
Because a hand that was pure white like jade had suddenly grabbed onto Li Qiuheng's throat.
This hand belonged to the white-robed woman!
No one saw how the white-robed woman attacked!
Even Li Qiuheng was dumbfounded at this moment. How did he get caught?
The white-robed woman looked at Li Qiuheng. She lifted Li Qiuheng up like a little chick, her eyes bloodshot. "What kind of trash are you?"
At this moment, everyone in the surroundings was stunned.
At this moment, the expressions of the powerhouses from the Whirling World turned solemn!
A Consolidation Realm expert was actually powerless in front of this woman?
The one who felt the most despair was still Li Qiuheng!
He wanted to resist, but at this moment, all his strength seemed to have disappeared. He couldn't resist at all!
At this moment, the white-robed woman exerted some force with her right hand.
Ka-cha!
A clear and melodious sound of bones breaking resounded in the field!
Immediately after, under everyone's gaze, she directly plucked off Li Qiuheng's head. In the next moment, she held Li Qiuheng's head and threw it to the right.
Boom!
In the distance, a Consolidation Realm powerhouse was directly smashed by the head before he could react!
Instant kill!
Instantly killing two Consolidation Realm powerhouses!
At this moment, the expressions of the Sky Sovereign and the others finally changed!
At this moment, they seemed to realize the seriousness of the matter!
Killing a Consolidation Realm powerhouse was like killing a chicken!
The white-robed woman didn't attack again. Instead, she turned to look at Ye Xuan. Ye Xuan grinned. "I'm going to die!"
At this moment, he felt extremely weak. Especially his soul, it was terrifyingly weak.
The power of his bloodline was fine because he realized that although he had burned the power of his bloodline, it was useless!
Even he couldn't extinguish his own blood!
He had to admit that this made him feel a little ridiculous!
If he couldn't do anything to his own blood, what the hell was this?
The white-robed woman looked at Ye Xuan, and tears suddenly flowed from her eyes. "With me here, how can you die?"
As she spoke, she gently placed her right hand on Ye Xuan's shoulder. In the next moment, a powerful force directly enveloped Ye Xuan. At the same time, with a wave of her right hand, the Soul Suppressing Sword appeared in her hand. She glanced at the Soul Suppressing Sword, then suddenly stabbed it into Ye Xuan's chest.
Boom!
Suppressing the soul with the sword!
Ye Xuan's soul, which was about to dissipate, was forcibly suppressed by her power and the Soul Suppressing Sword!
The white-robed woman looked at Ye Xuan. "You need to nourish yourself!"
After saying that, she turned to look at the Sky Sovereign and the others and said fiercely, "My brother's soul is weak. Why don't you all die?"
As soon as her voice fell, she suddenly punched out!
A hundred feet away, a Consolidation Realm powerhouse died on the spot!
Seeing this scene, everyone present was petrified!
At this moment, the seriousness in the eyes of the Sky Sovereign and the others had turned into fear!
With just one punch, the Consolidation Realm powerhouse died instantly!
That was a Consolidation Realm powerhouse!
The strongest powerhouse in the world!
Not only the Sky Sovereign and the others, but Su Zhe and the others who were hiding in the dark were also stunned.
Su Zhe gulped. He looked at Ye Xuan below and said with a trembling voice, "This Young Master Ye's sister … What kind of deities are they …"
On the other side, the Lord and the others were silent.
Especially Luo Hou and Ah Ku Wang. At this moment, both of them were sweating profusely.
Back then, they had wanted to kill Ye Xuan and obtain the Dao Scripture!
If they really killed Ye Xuan …
The two of them did not dare to think about the consequences!
Yan Yaoyao looked at the weak Ye Xuan in the distance and said softly, "We still underestimated him!"
It was not just her. Everyone had underestimated the people behind Ye Xuan!
In the distance, after the white-robed woman killed the Consolidation Realm powerhouse with a punch, she waved her right hand and the Consolidation Realm powerhouse's soul was directly caught in her hand. Then, she turned around and placed the soul in front of Ye Xuan. "Absorb!"
Ye Xuan, "…"
At this moment, the Sky Sovereign suddenly said in a deep voice, "Your Excellency, what happened between us and Young Master Ye was a misunderstanding!"
The white-robed woman suddenly turned around and in the next moment, she suddenly appeared in front of the Sky Sovereign. The Sky Sovereign's pupils suddenly shrank. Before he could react, the white-robed woman punched him in the face.
Boom!
The Sky Sovereign's head exploded like a watermelon!
The white-robed woman grabbed the Sky Sovereign's soul, her face expressionless. "This is also a misunderstanding!"
The Sky Sovereign's soul stared at the white-robed woman. "Who the hell are you!"
The white-robed woman did not answer the Sky Sovereign. She sent the Sky Sovereign's soul in front of Ye Xuan. "Absorb!"
Ye Xuan, "…"
The Sky Sovereign suddenly laughed self-deprecatingly. "Ridiculous!
I'm really ridiculous! "
All this time, her goal had been to deal with the people behind Ye Xuan, but at this moment, she realized how ridiculous her idea was!
The person in front of her was definitely far beyond the Consolidation Realm, and had even reached a realm that even she did not know!
The reason why the people behind Ye Xuan were not in this universe was because they were too strong, and this world was too weak!
They did not want to play in this world!
This was great!
She and the others had joined forces to force them back!
What was courting death?
She was courting death!
At this moment, a voice suddenly came from the horizon. "Your Excellency, do you really have to be so ruthless?"
Hearing this, the Sky Sovereign suddenly looked up.
There were two old men standing in the sky!
One wore a white robe, and the other wore a black robe!
The Dark Abyss Yin Yang God!
Seeing these two, the Sky Sovereign, who had originally given up resisting, suddenly opened her eyes. At this moment, she saw hope!
Yin Yang God!
These two had reached the peak of the Consolidation Realm tens of thousands of years ago!
As for now, their strength was unfathomable, and even she did not know how strong they were!
At this moment, the white-robed woman looked up at the Yin Yang God, and among them, the white-robed old man looked at the white-robed woman. "Don't go too far!"
The white-robed woman's lips curled into a mocking smile. "Go too far?
I'll show you what it means to go too far! "
As soon as she finished speaking, she suddenly disappeared on the spot.
In the sky, the Yin Yang God's expressions changed drastically, and the white-robed old man who led them directly smashed his fist down!
This fist smashed down, and the entire starry sky trembled as if it was about to collapse. It was extremely terrifying.
At this moment, the white-robed woman suddenly punched out.
Boom!
Under everyone's gaze, the white-robed old man's power suddenly disappeared, and at the same time, the white-robed old man was directly sent flying tens of thousands of feet away. As soon as he stopped, his physical body directly exploded, and only his soul remained!
At the same time, the white-robed woman punched out again, but this time, her target was the black-robed old man on the other side!
The black-robed old man didn't even have the chance to react before his body exploded into pieces!
It was an instant kill!
Everyone here was petrified when they witnessed this scene!
As for the Heavenly Exalt, he felt despair!
He truly felt despair!
The Yin Yang God actually didn't even have the ability to fight back before her!
How strong is she?
The white-robed woman directly brought the Yin Yang God's souls over to Ye Xuan, and then she gazed at Ye Xuan and spoke gently, "Quickly absorb them!
Replenish them! "
Ye Xuan was speechless.
When she saw Ye Xuan stunned, the white-robed woman spoke gently, "Don't just stand there!
Quickly absorb them! "
The expressions of everyone here became extremely strange when they witnessed this scene.
This woman was as bad-tempered as a volcano in front of others, but she was as gentle as water in front of Ye Xuan.
Ye Xuan hesitated for a moment, and then he gazed at the Heavenly Exalt's soul. The Heavenly Exalt stared fixedly at Ye Xuan with slight resentment, "Ye Xuan, why didn't you tell me earlier that the person behind you is so heaven defying!?"
Ye Xuan gazed at the Heavenly Exalt and said, "Would you believe me if I told you that I'm the son of the Ninth Dimension?"
The Heavenly Exalt turned to gaze at the white-robed woman, but she remained expressionless, "What's the point of being the son of the Ninth Dimension?
Big Brother, if you want, then I can destroy the Ninth Dimension and make you the master of it! "
Ye Xuan was speechless.
The Heavenly Exalt was speechless.
Suddenly, a formidable aura suddenly assaulted them from afar, and it was so strong that it caused the entire starry sky to tremble!
Everyone here raised their heads and looked towards the depths of the starry sky when they witnessed this scene.
The white-robed woman's eyes narrowed slightly, and there was a rare trace of seriousness in them.
Meanwhile, the Heavenly Exalt suddenly gazed towards the depths of the starry sky and spoke in a trembling voice, "It's definitely an expert of my Dark Abyss!
Could it be the Abyss Master? "
The Abyss Master?
Hope arose in the eyes of the Yin and Yang Gods when they heard the Heavenly Exalt!
The Abyss Master!
That was a true powerhouse above the Consolidation Realm!
Moreover, that was an expert that had surpassed the Consolidation Realm over 100,000 years ago!
On the other side, the experts of the Peaceful Whirling World were quite excited as well!
A top-rate expert of the Dark Abyss has arrived!
There's hope!
Didn't they notice that the invincible white-robed woman's expression had become slightly solemn?
The aura in the starry sky was growing stronger and stronger, and it was so strong that it wasn't inferior to the white-robed woman at all!
Right at this moment, the starry sky was suddenly torn apart, and then a woman walked out from within it.
She held a sword in her hand!
After she walked out, she glanced at the crowd below and said, "Who bullied the members of the Yang Clan?"
Everyone was speechless.
...







Chapter 1432
Who's bullying the members of the Yang Clan?
Everyone in the surroundings was stunned when they heard this.
Ye Xuan was stunned as well.
Who's here?
On the other hand, the Heavenly Exalt and the others were stunned as well. Because there were quite a few people here, and it was the Master of the Dark Abyss!
After all, the Master of the Dark Abyss was a man!
Suddenly, the Heavenly Exalt's pupils constricted, "You … you're Situ Tingyun!"
Situ Tingyun!
The expressions of the Yin and Yang Gods changed drastically when they heard the Heavenly Exalt!
Situ Tingyun!
This name was simply like a nightmare to An's Abyss!
It was exactly that woman who'd fought her way into An's Abyss all those years ago, and she'd practically destroyed it!
If she hadn't suddenly left, then An's Abyss would have been gone by now!
She's here!
The Heavenly Exalt felt utter despair!
She'd vanished for countless years, yet she'd returned to this universe for Ye Xuan's sake!
At this moment, she suddenly realized how naïve her intentions to annihilate the people standing behind Ye Xuan were!
Any random person standing behind Ye Xuan wasn't someone they could deal with!
On the other side, the experts from the Whirling World were dumbfounded.
That woman isn't from An's Abyss but from Ye Xuan's side?
We're finished!
At this moment, the experts from Whirling World felt despair as well!
Just the white robed woman was enough to make them feel despair!
Now, a Swordsman who wasn't inferior to the white robed woman had joined the fray ….
Situ Tingyun's gaze suddenly descended onto Ye Xuan, "It's you!"
Ye Xuan hesitated for a moment before he said, "Are you Senior Situ Tingyun?"
Situ Tingyun smiled, "You should call me Senior Sister!"
Senior Sister!
Ye Xuan was speechless.
Situ Tingyun walked over to Ye Xuan, sized up Ye Xuan, and then shook her head, "He's on the weak side!"
Ye Xuan broke out in a cold sweat!
Situ Tingyun suddenly gazed at the white robed woman. The white robed woman had a calm expression on her face.
Situ Tingyun smiled, "I've heard of you!"
The white-robed woman glanced at Situ Tingyun. "He's indeed the person with the greatest natural talent in the Sword Dao after him!
No, your talent in the Sword Dao is above his! "
Situ Tingyun!
Actually, the white-robed woman was not exaggerating!
After all, Situ Tingyun had relied on the green clothed man's three strands of Sword Intent to attain her current accomplishments. It could be said that besides the green clothed man, Situ Tingyun's accomplishments in the Sword Sect were the highest!
Situ Tingyun smiled and said, "Shall we get down to business first?"
White Robe nodded and looked at Ye Xuan. "Absorb it quickly!"
Ye Xuan did not hesitate. He absorbed the souls of the Celestial Venerate and the Yin-Yang Gods. After absorbing the souls of the three, his soul recovered at a ridiculous rate.
While Ye Xuan was digesting those formidable souls, the white robed woman suddenly turned around to gaze at the members of the Whirling World. Meanwhile, an old man walked forward!
The old man bowed slightly to the white-robed woman. "I am Xiao Pingsheng from the Xiao Clan. Greetings, Senior …"
The white-robed woman suddenly punched out!
Boom!
Xiao Pingsheng died instantly!
His soul was annihilated!
Everyone was speechless.
At this moment, the remaining experts of the Whirling World were shocked to the extreme!
It was an instant kill!
It wouldn't be so terrifying if it was just a victory!
But it was an instant kill!
A peak Consolidation Realm expert didn't even have the ability to fight back!
At this moment, Hu Bugui from the Dao Returning Courtyard suddenly said.
Bu Gui suddenly said, "Retreat!"
With that, he turned around and fled!
They could only flee!
They had no chance against the white-robed god of death!
The white-robed woman glanced at Hu Bugui. "Did I allow you to flee?"
As soon as she finished speaking, she suddenly punched out!
Boom!
In the distance, Hu Bugui's expression changed drastically. He suddenly turned around and punched out!
He knew he couldn't beat her, but he had to fight. If he didn't fight, he would definitely die. If he fought, he might have a chance to live!
Boom!
As soon as Hu Bugui punched out, a powerful force swept out from his fist like a tide. However, in the next moment, this powerful force vanished without a trace. At the same time, his entire body was forcefully wiped out by a powerful force!
It was directly wiped out!
The white-robed woman didn't stop. She suddenly pointed with her finger and the Executing Heaven Sword flew out. The next moment, a ray of sword light pierced through the air and traveled tens of thousands of miles.
Chi!
The sword traveled tens of thousands of miles. In the sky, bloody heads kept falling …
Seeing this scene, Su Zhe and the others who were hiding in the dark looked extremely fearful.
One should know that the Whirling Sect and the Dark Abyss had dozens of Consolidation Realm experts and more than a hundred Dao Attainment Realm experts!
However, these people were like vegetables being chopped up. They didn't even have the ability to fight back!
That sword directly killed dozens of Dao Attainment Realm and Consolidation Realm experts!
This strength …
Su Zhe wiped the cold sweat off his forehead. He once again looked at Ye Xuan who was still absorbing souls not far away. "This Young Master Ye's sister … I don't know how many sisters he has … It's too scary!"
On the other side, the Lord and the others were silent.
They had to admit that they had been dealt a heavy blow!
What was a strong expert?
This was a strong expert!
As for themselves, they were as weak as chickens in front of such a strong expert …
On the other side, Xuan Chu was also watching this scene.
In front of her stood a woman. It was Yue Zun, who had come into contact with Ye Xuan before!
At this moment, Yue Zun's expression was extremely grave!
Before she came, she had specially investigated Ye Xuan. Of course, she mainly wanted to investigate the white-robed woman.
However, she didn't expect that the white-robed woman would appear instead of the white-robed woman!
She also didn't expect that the white-robed woman would be so powerful. She definitely far surpassed Consolidation Realm experts!
This time, the Dark Abyss and the Whirling World had kicked an iron plate!
Behind Yue Zun, the Great Elder of the Whirling Sect suddenly wiped the cold sweat off his forehead. "Fortunately, we listened to Xuan Chu and didn't join forces with the Dark Abyss and the others …"
At this moment, he was indeed afraid!
If they had joined forces with the Dark Abyss and the other forces, it would have brought disaster to the Whirling Sect!
Although the Whirling Sect had a deep foundation, they couldn't withstand the revenge of such a strong expert!
Moreover, most importantly, there was more than one such expert!
Who knew how many more there were?
Xuan Chu looked at Ye Xuan in the distance and didn't say anything.
In the distance, after the white-robed woman had killed those strong ones, she collected all of their souls and then sent them to Ye Xuan. "Absorb!"
Ye Xuan's soul could be said to be extremely weak. The best way to nourish a soul was to use it to nourish it!
At this moment, the souls of these experts were simply great nourishment for the current Ye Xuan!
After Ye Xuan devoured the souls of the Sky Sovereign and the Yin Yang Gods, his soul aura suddenly skyrocketed …
The white-robed woman suddenly turned to look at Su Zhe who was not far away.
Seeing this, Su Zhe hurriedly said, "Greetings, Senior!
We are Young Master Ye's friends! "
The white-robed woman looked at Ye Xuan and Ye Xuan nodded. "Senior Su Zhe and the others have helped me a lot!"
The white-robed woman nodded slightly and looked at Su Zhe. "Thank you!"
Hearing this, Su Zhe trembled. He was slightly flattered by this senior's thanks.
But fortunately, this senior seemed to be reasonable!
As for the white-robed woman, she was really a little unreasonable!
The white-robed woman looked at Yue Zun and the others. Seeing this, the Great Elder hurriedly said, "Sir, we are also good friends with Young Master Ye!"
The white-robed woman retracted her gaze and looked at Ye Xuan. At this moment, Ye Xuan was madly absorbing the souls of those experts!
It was really great nourishment!
Especially since he had the Soul Suppressing Sword!
There wasn't much difference between him and the Soul Suppressing Sword!
The white-robed woman just looked at Ye Xuan, her eyes filled with gentleness.
Actually, she didn't care about anything back then because there was nothing left for her to care about.
During the battle between the white-robed woman and the green-robed man, she didn't choose to help the green-robed man not because she was afraid of the white-robed woman, but because she actually hoped that the white-robed woman could defy the heavens and change her fate.
Among the four of them, the one they owed the most was her brother.
No matter if it was her or the white-robed woman, they would never be able to forget that little boy that had starved to death in the cave.
Right at this moment, Ye Xuan suddenly opened his eyes. He didn't continue absorbing those souls because his soul had returned to normal, and it was better for the Soul Suppressing Sword to absorb the remaining souls!
Ye Xuan looked at the white-robed woman. "Qing 'er!"
The white-robed woman nodded. She walked over to Ye Xuan, and then she took Ye Xuan's hand and said softly, "I'm sorry I'm late!"
Ye Xuan laughed bitterly. "I thought I was dead for sure!"
The white-robed woman gazed at Ye Xuan. "You won't die with me here!"
Ye Xuan said softly, "Qing 'er, you and Qing' er …. Both of you are so strong!
Do you know where she is now? "
The white-robed woman raised her head and looked towards the depths of the starry sky. After a short moment, she shook her head. "She's very, very far away from us!"
Ye Xuan asked, "Is it because of my Misfortune Seed?"
The white-robed woman nodded. "Yes."
Ye Xuan furrowed his brows. "What is it?"
The white-robed woman fell silent for a moment. "It's a very complicated thing!
I don't know if this Misfortune Seed was forced upon you by others, or if it was your own doing. I've been investigating this matter, and I've just made some progress. Then, someone informed me that you're in danger … "
Ye Xuan hurriedly asked, "Who informed you?"
The white-robed woman fell silent.
Ye Xuan was about to ask more questions, but the white-robed woman shook her head. "One day, you'll understand everything."
Ye Xuan hesitated for a moment, then nodded. "Alright!
I won't ask anymore! "
The white-robed woman turned to look at Su Zhe. "Where is the Dark Abyss?"
Hearing this, Su Zhe was stunned for a moment, then he was overjoyed!
Su Zhe hurriedly said, "Senior, I'm willing to lead the way!"
The white-robed woman nodded. "Lead the way!"
As she said this, she looked at Ye Xuan. "Let's go settle the score!"
Ye Xuan was speechless.
Situ Tingyun suddenly asked, "Do you need my help?"
The white-robed woman pulled Ye Xuan's hand and walked away without looking back. "Do you think it's necessary?"

Chapter 1433
Along with the departure of Ye Xuan and the white-robed woman, the Fifth Dimension suddenly fell silent.
Venerable Yue said softly, "A calamity has descended upon Dark Abyss!"
Xuan Chu said softly, "I'm afraid it isn't just Dark Abyss!"
The corners of Venerable Yue's mouth curled up. "Yes!
However, it's great news for us. "
The Grand Elder suddenly said, "Venerable Yue, if Ye Xuan wants the last scripture of our Swaying Sect, then we …"
Venerable Yue glanced at the Grand Elder. "Wait for him?
Shouldn't we be the ones to give it to him? "
The Grand Elder was speechless.
...
On the other side, the Lord suddenly smiled, "What do you think?"
Behind him, Rahu and the others were silent.
What do they think?
That woman is already invincible!
How do they think?
Chi Yaoyao suddenly smiled, "Shouldn't we rejoice?"
The Lord smiled, "Indeed!"
As he spoke, he looked towards the distance and said softly, "I finally know why Ancestor Daoting chose him!
With such an expert behind him, wouldn't it be extremely easy for him to rebuild order? "
Rahu suddenly said, "Can Dark Abyss stop that senior?"
The Lord replied softly, "I don't think so!
However, Ancestor Dark Abyss isn't a simple figure. How could someone who could create the Dark Abyss be ordinary?
Moreover, the Dark Abyss has existed for so long, and its foundation is far beyond our imagination! "
Chi Yaoyao smiled, "That's not something we should worry about!"
The Lord grinned, "Indeed!"
As if he'd thought of something, he suddenly looked towards Situ Tingyun, "We almost forgot about this senior …"
...
A woman walked over to Situ Tingyun, it was Senior Sister Lu.
Senior Sister Lu smiled and said, "Tingyun!"
Situ Tingyun grinned, "Senior Sister Lu!"
Senior Sister Lu hesitated for a moment before she said, "Do you know anything about him?"
Situ Tingyun shook her head, "I don't."
Senior Sister Lu fell silent.
Situ Tingyun suddenly turned to look at Nian Nian. Nian Nian hurriedly lowered her head when she saw Situ Tingyun looking over.
Situ Tingyun walked over to Nian Nian and smiled, "What's your name?"
Nian Nian said softly, "Nian Nian!"
Situ Tingyun turned around to gaze at Senior Sister Lu. Senior Sister Lu hesitated for a moment before she said, "She's a Fifth Dimension Tendo!"
Tendo!
Situ Tingyun smiled. "Interesting. There's actually such an expert in this universe!"
Senior Sister Lu looked at Situ Tingyun, "Tingyun, can you help her recover her memories?"
Situ Tingyun shook her head.
Senior Sister Lu frowned slightly. "Not either?"
Situ Tingyun smiled and said, "She might have intentionally lost her memories. I believe that she will recover her memories when it's necessary."
Was it intentional?
Senior Sister Lu looked at Nian Nian in silence.
Soon, her expression became complicated.
What kind of person was the Fifth Dimension Tendo?
That was a person whose strength and intelligence were close to that of a demon!
How could such a person lose his memory?
Could she be plotting something again?
At that moment, Situ Tingyun suddenly turned her head. A powerful aura was rapidly approaching the Fifth Dimension's starry space from the Whirling World to the Fifth Dimension.
Another expert from the Whirling World had arrived!
Everyone was looking at the teleportation formation.
It didn't take long for an old man to walk out from within it. He glanced at the surroundings and spoke in a low voice, "Where are they?"
No one answered him!
The old man suddenly gazed at Yue Zun's group, "Yue Zun, where are they!?"
Yue Zun smiled, "So it's the Supreme Elder of the Blackout Sect!"
The old man gazed at Yue Zun, "What exactly happened here!?"
Yue Zun hesitated for a moment before he said, "I want to tell you what happened as well, but I think that you might not believe me!"
The old man stared fixedly at Yue Zun, "Something has happened to them!"
Yue Zun nodded, "Yes!"
The old man's face turned gloomy, "Impossible!"
He seemed to have thought of something, and he glanced coldly at the surroundings. In the end, his gaze descended onto Situ Tingyun, "Who is it!?"
Situ Tingyun smiled, "I can be considered to be Ye Xuan's Senior Sister!"
Ye Xuan!
The old man's eyes narrowed slightly while he slowly clenched his right fist, but he didn't dare attack.
Because the woman before him gave him an extremely dangerous feeling!
In his opinion, this was extremely absurd because he'd already attained the peak of the Consolidation Realm, and there weren't many in this world that could pose a threat to him!
But at this moment, he really did sense danger!
The old man thought for a moment before he relaxed his right hand. He felt that it was better to be cautious and keep a low profile!
He looked at Situ Tingyun, "Where are the members of my Blackout Sect!?"
Situ Tingyun smiled, "They're dead!"
The old man's expression instantly turned cold, "They're dead?
My Blackout Sect has 8 Consolidation Realm experts and a few dozen at the Dao Attainment Realm!
You're saying that they're dead? "
Situ Tingyun nodded, "They're indeed dead!"
The old man laughed from extreme rage, "Dead?
Don't tell me that they were killed! "
Situ Tingyun shook her head, "That's not it!"
The old man pointed angrily at Situ Tingyun, "What a huge joke! Eight Consolidation Realm experts and a few dozen Consolidation Realm experts in total, yet you're saying that they were killed …"
Situ Tingyun suddenly interrupted the old man, "Is the Consolidation Realm very strong?"
The old man was stunned.
Situ Tingyun hesitated for a moment before she said, "I don't mean to offend you, but I feel that it's enough to kill a Consolidation Realm expert with hands, right?"
Everyone, "…"
On the other side, Yue Zun's expression was very unnatural.
The High Lord shook his head and smiled bitterly, "That's too much of a blow!"
In front of Situ Tingyun, the old man suddenly pointed at himself and smiled, "I'm a Consolidation Realm expert. You have hands, and two hands at that. Why don't you try killing me?"
Situ Tingyun blinked, "That's what I said!"
The old man smiled, "That's what I said! …"
At this point, the old man's pupils suddenly constricted because he saw a sword, a very, very ordinary sword. The sword was slightly blurry at first, but it quickly became clear. However, when he saw the sword clearly, it had already pierced his throat.
A sword pierced through his throat!
The old man looked at Situ Tingyun in disbelief, "This …"
Situ Tingyun shrugged. "I was the one who killed him!"
The old man was at a loss, "Why … Why can't I even take a single sword strike …"
Situ Tingyun blinked, "You might be a little weak!"
The old man suddenly roared, "I'm at the peak of the Consolidation Realm!
I'm at the peak of the Consolidation Realm! "
Situ Tingyun hesitated for a moment before she said, "I was wrong!
It's not that you're weak, but that you're very weak at the Consolidation Realm. "
The old man, "…"
On the other side, Lord Yue shook his head, "This woman's words are so infuriating!
I can't take it anymore! "
With that, she turned around and left.
Xuan Chu, "…"
The High Lord shook his head and smiled bitterly, "This senior is speaking … Farewell, farewell!"
With that, he turned around and left.
Luo Hou and the others, "…"
In the distance, the old man in front of Situ Tingyun was at a loss.
At the instant Situ Tingyun attacked, he knew that he'd encountered a true expert!
She was too strong, and he was too weak!
In some places, Consolidation Realm experts were at the top of the pyramid, but in other places, they were like cabbages.
Different environments had different values!
At this moment, Situ Tingyun suddenly looked at Senior Sister Lu, "Senior Sister Lu, let's catch up!"
Senior Sister Lu nodded, "Alright!"
The two women left.
The starry sky returned to peace once more.
...
Somewhere in the starry sky, Ye Xuan was flying on his sword, and the white-robed woman was by his side.
Su Zhe wasn't too far away from them.
At this moment, Su Zhe was extremely excited!
How many years had the Ancient God Abyss and the Dark Abyss been fighting for?
Countless years!
However, both sides hadn't come to a conclusion!
But now, the situation was about to change!
Ye Xuan suddenly looked at the white-robed woman, "Qing 'er, do you know the origin of my bloodline?"
The white-robed woman nodded, "I do!"
Ye Xuan hurriedly asked, "Who am I?"
The white-robed woman hesitated for a moment, and then she said, "I know who your father is, but I don't know your mother. However, I do know that your mother isn't ordinary!"
Dugu Xuan!
Ye Xuan spoke in a low voice, "My mother is Dugu Xuan, but she said she was going to look for someone, and we haven't heard from her since."
The white-robed woman said, "She's very complicated, and I don't know the specifics. However, I do know that she isn't an ordinary person."
Ye Xuan fell silent.
The white-robed woman continued, "Don't think too much about it. What you have to do is live well!"
Ye Xuan spoke softly, "I want to become as strong as you!"
The white-robed woman said, "Time!"
As she spoke, she gazed at Ye Xuan, "That Qing 'er I know has lived for over 200,000 years. If she lived for that long, she would be as strong as you!"
Over 200,000 years!
Ye Xuan was slightly curious, "Qing 'er, are you originally from the three-dimensional universe?"
The white-robed woman nodded, "Yes!"
Ye Xuan was slightly puzzled, "Why are all the people from the three-dimensional universe so terrifying?"
The white-robed woman fell silent for a moment, then said, "In the entire three-dimensional universe, there are only a few special ones!"
Ye Xuan asked again, "Qing 'er, you've been to very far places, do you know how big this universe is?"
The white-robed woman shook her head, "There's no end."
Ye Xuan asked, "Infinite?"
The white-robed woman nodded, "Something like that!"
As she said this, she seemed to have thought of something and said, "There's a place that we have to be careful of."
Ye Xuan asked, "What place?"
The white-robed woman was about to speak when Su Zhe suddenly said, "Senior, we've arrived!"
We've arrived!
Ye Xuan looked up and saw a huge abyss not far away. That abyss was like a pitch-black black hole in the starry sky, deep and mysterious.
The Dark Abyss!
Su Zhe said solemnly, "Senior, this is the Dark Abyss. There's a powerful enchantment around it …"
At this moment, the white-robed woman threw a punch.
Boom!
The huge abyss trembled violently. Immediately after, the boundary around the abyss vanished into thin air.
The white-robed woman looked at the abyss, her face expressionless, "Are you going to commit suicide, or should I kill you?"
Su Zhe was speechless.
....







Chapter 1434
Domineering!
Too domineering!
Su Zhe looked at the white-robed woman. Why was Ye Xuan's sister so domineering?
Right at this moment, the enormous abyss suddenly trembled. In the next moment, an old man walked out from within it.
Su Zhe quickly said, "Senior, this is an elder of An Yuan. His strength is at the peak of the Consolidation Realm!"
The white-robed woman nodded, "You don't need to introduce me to someone who is about to die!"
Su Zhe was speechless.
In the distance, the old man bowed slightly to the white robed woman, "Senior, I, An Yuan, was in the wrong this time. I, An Yuan, am willing to return the two scriptures and apologize to Young Master Ye!"
He admitted defeat!
Obviously, An Yuan already knew about what happened in the Fifth Dimension!
The white-robed woman's mouth curled into a disdainful smile, "Apologize?"
As she said that, she punched out.
Boom!
Before the old man could react, he was directly smashed into pieces by the white-robed woman's punch!
The white-robed woman said, "Brother, apologize to him!"
Ye Xuan was speechless.
Su Zhe had a strange expression on his face.
At this time, another old man came out from the abyss. This old man held a black cane in his hand and looked at the white-robed woman, "Your Excellency, do you really want to be so ruthless?"
The white-robed woman was expressionless, "When you went against my brother, did you think of holding back?"
The old man said in a low voice, "Your Excellency, we already know our mistakes!"
The white-robed woman's expression became ferocious, "Mistakes?
Since you know your mistakes, why don't you die? "
Su Zhe blinked and sweated.
This senior is too scary!
In the distance, the old man stared at the white-robed woman, "Your Excellency, I, An Yuan, am not easy to bully!"
The white-robed woman laughed, "I will bully you right now!"
As she said that, she punched out!
Boom!
The huge abyss in the distance began to shatter!
Seeing this scene, the old man's expression changed. The white-robed woman wanted to destroy the entire Dark Abyss!
The old man quickly said, "Sacrificial array!"
As soon as he finished speaking, the Dark Abyss suddenly trembled violently, and then numerous black blades flew out from within it. Moreover, figures could be seen within these blades!
Ye Xuan's expression turned solemn when he saw this. These giant blades contained extremely powerful energy that could easily tear space apart!
At this time, the white-robed woman punched out.
Boom!
Those huge blades were instantly transformed into nothingness. At the same time, the entire Dark Abyss started to shatter!
In next to no time, numerous shrill cries resounded from within the dark abyss, and then countless people fled from within it!
The old man's countenance instantly turned pale when he witnessed this scene. At this moment, he was truly on the verge of despair!
What kind of person was he?
Why was he so ridiculously powerful!
The white-robed woman was about to attack again, but at this moment, a middle-aged man, who was wearing a white robe, suddenly appeared.
The man suddenly appeared in front of the white-robed woman.
Su Zhe's expression instantly became solemn when he saw this person, and he hurriedly said, "Senior, this person is the current master of the Dark Abyss, and his name is Mo Yuan!"
Mo Yuan looked at the white-robed woman. "Are you from Xuan City?"
The white-robed woman's face was expressionless. Without answering, she directly punched out.
In the distance, Mo Yuan's pupils suddenly shrank. In the next moment, he suddenly rushed forward and also punched out!
The moment he punched out, the space around him directly distorted into a strange shape. At the same time, the surrounding starry sky even cracked inch by inch.
Compared to the white-robed woman's simple punch, the momentum of Mo Yuan's punch could be said to be earth-shattering.
But soon, the power of Mo Yuan's punch began to dissipate inch by inch, like snow meeting boiling oil!
Seeing this scene, Mo Yuan's pupils suddenly shrank. "How … How is this possible …"
As soon as he finished speaking, his entire body disappeared without a trace.
Killed with a single punch!
In the distance, Su Zhe's expression became extremely solemn!
At this moment, his heart was in turmoil, and he was extremely shocked!
He knew that he had seriously underestimated the strength of this senior!
That was Mo Yuan!
The current master of the Dark Abyss had been killed by a punch from the white-robed woman!
Ye Xuan was also a little shocked. Just how strong was this Qing 'er?
The white-robed woman didn't stop. She looked at the shattered Dark Abyss and blasted out another punch!
A fist seal swept out!
If this punch entered the Dark Abyss, the entire Dark Abyss would be turned into nothingness in an instant!
One punch to destroy a world!
However, just as the punch was about to enter the Dark Abyss, a finger seal suddenly flashed out from the Dark Abyss.
Boom!
The white-robed woman's fist seal was directly blocked, but in the next moment, the finger seal directly shattered. The fist seal went straight into the Dark Abyss, but there was no movement!
Not far away, Su Zhe's expression became solemn!
He knew that the true expert of the Dark Abyss had appeared!
Could it be the Second Elder of the Dark Abyss?
The white-robed woman looked at the Dark Abyss with a calm expression.
At this moment, an old man walked out of the Dark Abyss. The old man's back was a little heavy, and his hair was white. He looked particularly weak.
Su Zhe frowned because he didn't know the old man at all.
The hunchbacked old man gazed at the white-robed woman, and a trace of a complicated expression flashed through his eyes, "I never expected that the Dark Abyss would suffer such a calamity today!"
The white-robed woman clenched her right fist slowly.
Meanwhile, the hunchbacked old man suddenly said, "Senior, I, An Yuan, am willing to submit to Young Master Ye. I wonder if Senior can spare my life?"
The white-robed woman turned to look at Ye Xuan.
Meanwhile, the hunchbacked old man hurriedly added, "Young Master Ye, if you're willing to show mercy, I, An Yuan, will follow Young Master Ye forever …."
Ye Xuan smiled, "I don't need it!"
The hunchbacked old man was stunned.
Su Zhe was stunned as well. He'd thought that Ye Xuan would agree. After all, the entire Dark Abyss submitting to him was extremely tempting!
After all, Ye Xuan had subdued the Daoting as well.
And the Dark Abyss was even more powerful than the Daoting!
The hunchbacked old man looked at Ye Xuan, "Young Master Ye, this old man doesn't understand!
As far as I know, didn't you give the Daoting a chance?
Why can't you give it to me … "
Ye Xuan shook his head, "When the Daoting Ancestor made me the Daoting Master, the Daoting was stronger than me, Ye Xuan. The Daoting Ancestor's strength was enough to crush me. But now, you chose to submit not because you want to submit, but because you want to live.
The difference is huge! "
The hunchbacked old man was stunned, and just as he was about to speak, the white-robed woman suddenly said angrily, "My brother said there's no need!
You don't understand, do you? "
As soon as she finished speaking, she punched out!
Boom!
Before the hunchbacked old man could finish his words, his entire body turned into a wisp of green smoke and disappeared without a trace.
He was directly erased!
It was obvious that the white-robed woman had used a bit of strength in that punch!
After killing the hunchbacked old man with a single punch, the white-robed woman looked at the shattered Dark Abyss, and in the next moment, she punched out!
A fist swept through the battlefield, and the space in its path was annihilated inch by inch. It was an extremely shocking sight.
If this fist entered the Dark Abyss, the entire Dark Abyss would be instantly turned into nothingness!
Just as the fist was about to enter the Dark Abyss, a shadow suddenly appeared at the entrance of the Dark Abyss, and the shadow flicked his sleeve.
Boom!
The white-robed woman's fist was instantly blocked by a mysterious force!
Su Zhe's voice trembled as he spoke from afar, "Dao Brother!"
The shadow before them was the Ancestor of the Dark Abyss, Dao Brother. However, it wasn't his true body, it was just a shadow!
Dao Brother!
He was one of the disciples of the previous owner of the Dao Scripture!
Moreover, he had created the Dark Abyss!
Dao Brother looked at the white-robed woman in the distance, and he just looked at her without saying a word. After that, his body started to dissipate bit by bit.
Su Zhe frowned slightly when he saw this. What does this mean?
Just like that, the Dao Brother slowly disappeared in front of the three of them.
Ye Xuan was silent.
What did she mean by this?
At this moment, the white-robed woman waved her right hand, and two rays of white light suddenly flew out from the Dark Abyss and landed steadily in her hands.
Dao Scripture!
Two Dao Scriptures!
Ye Xuan was about to speak, but the white-robed woman suddenly punched out!
Boom!
In the distance, the entire Dark Abyss was directly turned into nothingness!
Completely wiped out!
Seeing this scene, Su Zhe's heart was filled with mixed feelings.
The Dark Abyss and the Ancient God Abyss had been fighting for so many years, but now, this force had completely disappeared.
At this moment, the white-robed woman suddenly said, "Let's go!"
Su Zhe hurriedly asked, "Back to the Fifth Dimension?"
The white-robed woman nodded.
Su Zhe was about to speak, but the white-robed woman said again, "Then go to the Whirling World!"
Go to the Whirling World!
Su Zhe was stunned.
This senior still didn't want to give up?
At this moment, the white-robed woman suddenly said, "Let's go!"
As she said this, she pulled Ye Xuan and turned to leave.
Su Zhe hesitated for a moment, then followed.
...
Whirling World.
Somewhere in the clouds, the clouds suddenly trembled. Soon, four experts appeared above the clouds.
These four people were the Xuanhuan Sect's Sect Master Li Shanshui, the Xuanji Sect's Sect Master Gu Wuchao, the Dao Returning Academy's Sect Master Yun Min, and the Xiao clan's Patriarch Xiao Jing!
Xuanhuan Sect's Sect Master Li Shanshui suddenly said, "I think everyone should know that something has happened to the Fifth Dimension!"
Gu Wuchao said in a deep voice, "I can no longer contact the people of my Xuanji Sect!"
Dao Returning Academy's Sect Master Yun Min said softly, "Me too!"
Xiao Jing also said, "My Xiao clan too!"
Xuanhuan Sect's Sect Master Li Shanshui suddenly said, "They might all be dead!"
Hearing this, the expressions of everyone present changed.
Li Shanshui said softly, "Everyone, this time, we might have kicked an iron plate!"
Xiao Jing looked at Li Shanshui. "No one should be able to destroy them over there!"
Li Shanshui said in a deep voice, "We might have underestimated the force behind that Ye Xuan!"
Everyone fell silent!
The force behind Ye Xuan!
Why had they sent so many experts to the Fifth Dimension this time?
They wanted to destroy the force behind Ye Xuan, seize the Dao Scripture, and divide the Fifth Dimension.
But now, all the people they had sent were gone!
Li Shanshui suddenly said, "Everyone, the people behind Ye Xuan will definitely not let this go."
Xiao Jing said in a deep voice, "In Brother Li's opinion, what should we do next?"
A cold light flashed in Li Shanshui's eyes. "We can't sit still and wait for death. We must strike first to gain the upper hand."
As he said this, he looked at everyone. "Everyone, this time, we must work together and unite as one!
I have already asked all the experts of my Xuan Fei Sect to rush back. Not only that, I have also invited some of the elders who are in seclusion … All the experts of my Xuan Fei Sect have rushed to the transmission array here … Everyone, I hope that you can do the same. Don't think that you will get lucky. The other party was able to destroy so many of us, so they must have a lot of people. None of our four clans can contend against them. Only when the four clans unite as one will we have a chance! "
After the other three were silent for a moment, Xiao Jing suddenly said, "I will immediately ask all the experts of my Xiao clan to rush here!"
Dao Returning Academy Master Yun Min also said, "The people of my Dao Returning Academy will arrive here in an hour at most!"
Xuanji Sect Master Gu Wuchao said, "Within an hour, all the experts of my Xuanji Sect who are at or above the Dao Attainment Realm will appear here!"
Soon, countless experts of the entire Whirling World rushed towards the transmission array that led to the Fifth Dimension.
More and more people came because there were many vassal forces under the four super forces …
....

Chapter 1435
Under the call of the four major forces, more and more forces from the Saha World began to join them.
However, the Whirling Sect, which had the greatest influence in the Whirling World, did not make any moves.
Whirling Sect.
In a certain pavilion, two women sat facing each other.
One of the women was Yue Zun, who had rushed back from the Fifth Dimension.
The other woman was the current Sect Master of the Whirling Sect, Yue Xi!
The two of them were playing chess.
Yue Xi raised a piece and placed it down, "Is what you said true?"
Venerable Yue laughed, "Senior Sister, do you think I would lie to you?"
Yue Xi shook her head, her eyes flashed a trace of complexity, "I just can't believe that there is such a strong person in this world!"
Venerable Yue said in a low voice, "I didn't believe it in the beginning either!"
Yue Xi shook his head and smiled, "It seems that our vision is too narrow!
In other words, the Whirling World has limited us! "
Yue Zun raised a chess piece and placed it down. Then, he said, "Senior sister, have you considered it?"
Yue Xi chuckled and said, "What's there to consider?
Exchanging a Daoist scripture for a good karma, no matter how you look at it, it's our gain! "
Venerable Yue smiled and said, "Indeed!"
Yue Xi turned his head and took a look, "Now more and more experts from the Whirling World are rushing to that teleportation array. It seems that Xuan Huan Sect wants to fight to the death!"
Venerable Yue shook his head, "A mantis trying to stop a chariot!"
In her opinion, numbers meant nothing to a powerhouse at the level of the white-robed woman!
Most importantly, there was also a female Swordsman!
That female Swordsman was also terrifying!
If the two of them joined forces, they could even shatter the Whirling World, let alone destroy the Mystic Nebulous Sect and other forces!
At that moment, an old man suddenly appeared behind the two women. The old man bowed slightly and said, "Sect Master, Sect Master Li Shanshui of the Profound Nether Sect has come to visit. Do you want to see him?"
Hearing this, Yue Xi looked at Yue Zun and said with a smile, "Why do you think he came here?"
Venerable Yue spoke indifferently, "He wants us to join forces with him!"
Yue Xi smiled and said, "Yes!"
The old man bowed slightly and then quietly retreated.
A moment later, Li Shanshui appeared in front of the two women.
Yue Xi stood up and said with a smile, "Brother Li, why are you free to come to my Whirling Sect today?"
Li Shanshui smiled and said, "Sect Master Yue, to tell you the truth, I came this time because I have something to ask of you!"
Yue Xi rolled his eyes at Li Shanshui, "Brother Li, what do you mean by begging? You're treating me like an outsider!
What's the matter, Brother Li, just say it. "
Li Shanshui looked at Yue Xi, "Sect Leader Yue, I think you should already know what happened in the Fifth Dimension!"
Yue Xi blinked, "What is it?"
Li Shanshui's expression was calm. Damn, this woman is playing dumb!
Li Shanshui smiled slightly, "Sect Leader Yue, I will be straightforward!
We underestimated the power behind Ye Xuan in the Fifth Dimension. This time, we want the Whirling Sect to join us. If Sect Leader Yue agrees, after we kill Ye Xuan, all the Dao Scriptures on him will belong to the Whirling Sect! "
Yue Zun glanced at Li Shanshui. Needless to say, Li Shanshui's conditions were very tempting.
After all, if the Whirling Sect obtained the Taoist scriptures from Ye Xuan, they would have a total of seven Taoist scriptures!
Of course, not to mention seven Daoist scriptures, the Whirling Sect wouldn't even be tempted by nine Daoist scriptures!
They didn't dare to be tempted!
Yue Xi smiled, "Sect Leader Li, this condition is very tempting … However, Sect Leader Li, I will tell you the truth. This time, we won't interfere in the matter between you and the Fifth Dimension!"
Li Shanshui frowned, "Why?"
Yue Xi smiled slightly, "Sect Leader Li, forgive me for speaking bluntly, but why should we interfere?"
Li Shanshui was silent.
Yue Xi continued, "Sect Leader Li, if you obtain the Taoist scriptures from Ye Xuan, my Whirling Sect won't be jealous."
Li Shanshui glanced at Yue Xi and said, "Farewell!"
With that, he turned and left.
After Li Shanshui left, Yue Zun suddenly said, "Actually, if they go to the Fifth Dimension now, they can still be saved!"
Yue Xi looked at Yue Zun, "How?"
Yue Zun smiled, "Admit your mistake and beg for mercy."
Yue Xi smiled, "They won't!"
Yue Zun nodded. As if thinking of something, she suddenly looked at Yue Xi, "Senior Sister, why didn't you tell him about the true strength of the person behind Ye Xuan?"
Yue Xi blinked, "He didn't ask!"
Yue Zun gave a thumbs up, "No wonder Master passed the position of Sect Leader to you!
Amazing! "
Yue Xi smiled, "If you want, I can give it to you right now!"
Yue Zun stood up and walked over to Yue Xi, "Senior Sister, if I had the intention to fight for the position of Sect Leader, would you have let me go?"
Yue Xi grabbed Yue Zun's hand and smiled lightly, "Am I that bad in your heart?"
Yue Zun smiled, "Even now, I still can't see through you!"
Yue Xi looked at Yue Zun, "After I took over the Whirling Sect, have I harmed anyone?"
Yue Zun was silent for a moment, then smiled, "I was thinking too much!"
With that, she turned and left.
On the spot, Yue Xi said softly, "Silly girl …"
...
Somewhere in the clouds, more and more experts were gathering here. They were experts from all over the world.
And they were all summoned by Xuanhuan Sect and other forces!
The experts of the Xuanhuan Sect and other forces had also arrived. At this moment, there were sixty-nine Consolidation Realm experts gathered here. In addition, there were more than three hundred Dao Attainment Realm experts and thousands of Dao Defense Realm experts!
It seemed like a lot, but it was actually normal, because most of the top experts in the Whirling World were here!
In the Five-Dimensional Universe.
After Ye Xuan and the white-robed woman returned to the Five-Dimensional Universe, they did not stop. Instead, they directly went to the teleportation formation to the Whirling World.
The white-robed woman glanced at Su Zhe in the distance, "You can stay here!"
Su Zhe hesitated for a moment, then nodded, "Okay!"
The white-robed woman nodded slightly, then led Ye Xuan towards the teleportation formation. At this moment, a voice suddenly came from behind them, "Count me in!"
Ye Xuan turned around and saw that the person who spoke was Situ Tingyun.
The white-robed woman said, "I alone am enough!"
Situ Tingyun smiled, "I want to join in the fun!"
The white-robed woman was about to speak when Ye Xuan suddenly said, "Then let's go together!"
Situ Tingyun smiled, "Then let's go!"
After saying that, she turned into a sword light and entered the teleportation formation.
The white-robed woman and Ye Xuan disappeared on the spot.
...
In the teleportation formation passage, Ye Xuan looked at Situ Tingyun, "Senior Sister, I would like to ask you for advice on Sword Dao!"
"Sword Dao!"
Situ Tingyun blinked, then smiled, "The person beside you is also a Swordsman!
And a powerful Swordsman! "
Ye Xuan looked at the white-robed woman, "Qing 'er … Are you a sword and fist cultivator?"
The white-robed woman nodded, "Sort of."
Ye Xuan hurriedly said, "Then can you provide me with some guidance in Sword Dao?"
The white-robed woman glanced at Ye Xuan, and then she said, "Your current Sword Dao already has a flavor of its own. However, it's still very, very lacking in terms of intent!"
Ye Xuan nodded, "Yes!
Is there any way to improve it? "
The white-robed woman thought for a moment, and then she said, "I can point you in a direction. As for whether you're able to improve it, that's up to you!"
Ye Xuan nodded, "Alright!"
The white-robed woman said, "Your current comprehension of the Sword Dao has attained the level of the unrestrained Sword Heart. What is the unrestrained Sword Heart?
It's when the sword isn't restrained by yourself or anything else. However, your sword hasn't attained true freedom. What is freedom?
It's freedom that comes naturally from not attaining it. You're far from attaining that level right now!
The reason you're unable to attain that level is because you have too many trivial matters and too many burdens. There's an invisible shackle in your heart, and it's preventing you from attaining true freedom. "
Ye Xuan fell silent.
He understood what the white-robed woman meant. Because of the matter regarding the Fifth Dimension, he was utterly unable to attain true freedom in the Sword Heart!
Ye Xuan asked another question. "Qing 'er, then what about the level above the unrestrained Sword Heart?"
The white-robed woman gazed at Ye Xuan and said, "I can't tell you that!"
Ye Xuan was slightly puzzled, "Why?"
The white-robed woman spoke softly, "You've already created your own path in the Sword Dao!
You can only explore this path on your own. Do you understand what I mean? "
Ye Xuan fell silent.
The white-robed woman continued, "If you continue on this path, then your Sword Dao will truly create a path that truly belongs to you. At that time, you'll become someone that isn't within your realm of cultivation!
As for our path in the Sword Dao, even though you can walk it as well, there's no need for you to! "
Ye Xuan nodded slightly, "I understand!"
The white-robed woman glanced at Situ Tingyun in the distance and said, "Her Sword Dao was also created by her own!"
Situ Tingyun nodded. "Regardless of whether it's the Sword Dao or any other path, it's best to walk one's own path. Even though it's much simpler to walk someone else's path, there are too many limitations."
As she spoke, she smiled faintly. "In our eyes, there are only two types of people in this world. One is within the realm of cultivation, and the other is outside the realm of cultivation!
Those within the realm of cultivation are equivalent to what the Milky Way Realm calls the novice village. Those outside the realm of cultivation are the true experts. "
Ye Xuan blinked. "What's the meaning of novice village?"
Situ Tingyun smiled and said, "It means that they're very, very weak!"
Ye Xuan was speechless.
Situ Tingyun continued, "Of course, the owner of this scripture is considered an expert. However, those who walk his path are not. Unless one surpasses him, one can only be considered to be unconventional!"
Unconventional!
Ye Xuan said in a low voice, "Is the owner of this scripture very formidable?"
Situ Tingyun smiled and said, "I've never seen him. However, he was able to create a complete martial arts system, so he's definitely a genius amongst geniuses. Such a person is rare in this world."
The white-robed woman nodded. "This scripture's martial arts system is not bad indeed. As for the owner of this scripture, I've never seen him before, so I won't comment on him."
Ye Xuan suddenly asked, "What about the woman in the plain dress?
How strong is she? "
Situ Tingyun fell silent.
The white-robed woman fell silent as well.
Ye Xuan glanced at the two of them and said softly, "Both of you should know, right?"
Situ Tingyun gazed at the white-robed woman. "Ask her!"
Ye Xuan gazed at the white-robed woman. The latter fell silent for a moment before she said, "Let's change the topic!"
Ye Xuan was speechless.
...







Chapter 1436
Ye Xuan glanced at the white robed woman. Obviously, she didn't want to talk about the Qing 'er.
What exactly happened during her generation?
Why did only two out of the four Qing 'er remain in the end?
Ye Xuan was quite curious.
However, he didn't ask any further.
Suddenly, the three of them stopped moving because an old man had suddenly appeared not too far away from them.
The white robed woman gazed at the old man with a calm expression and indifference in her eyes.
The old man's gaze descended onto Ye Xuan, "You're Ye Xuan!"
Ye Xuan nodded.
The old man glanced at the white robed woman and Situ Tingyun, and then he smiled, "What? You've only brought two people with you?"
Ye Xuan nodded.
The old man laughed with ridicule, "Ye Xuan, who are you looking down on?"
Ye Xuan was speechless.
The old man sized up the white robed woman and Situ Tingyun again, and then he smiled, "Ye Xuan, don't you think you've brought too few people with you?"
Ye Xuan thought for a while. Then he said, "Yes, it is a little too little!"
The old man was about to speak when Situ Tingyun suddenly said, "All of you seem to have been waiting for us?"
The old man gazed at Situ Tingyun, "We've been waiting for a long time!"
Situ Tingyun blinked, "Err … then lead the way!"
The old man glanced at Ye Xuan's group of three, "Come on then!
We've prepared a huge gift for all of you. I hope you like it! "
He turned around and left once he finished speaking.
Situ Tingyun hesitated for a moment, "I'm a little panicked!"
Ye Xuan was speechless.
The white robed woman glanced at Situ Tingyun, "You've learned quite a bit from him!"
As soon as she finished speaking, she led Ye Xuan off into the distance.
Situ Tingyun chuckled, and then she followed after them.
...
Whirling World. At this moment, a few thousand people had gathered at the teleportation formation!
There were a total of 98 Consolidation Realm experts amongst them!
Moreover, there were over 500 Dao Attainment Realm experts!
Among them, there were thousands of Dao Defense Realm experts!
The Xuanhuan Sect and the other three super forces had used all the resources they could!
This time, they were serious.
And they didn't dare to underestimate him!
The fall of dozens of Consolidation Realm experts made them realize that they were definitely not facing an ordinary force!
At that moment, an old man walked out from the teleportation formation.
Not far away, Li Shanshui, the sect master of the Mystic Fraudulent Sect, opened his eyes and looked at the elder. The elder said solemnly, "They're here!"
Li Shanshui narrowed his eyes. "How many?"
The old man said, "Including Ye Xuan, that makes three!"
Three people!
Everyone was stunned when they heard this.
Li Shanshui frowned. "Are you sure there are only three of them?"
The old man nodded. "Just three!
However, the aura of those two women is very calm. I'm afraid they're not ordinary people! "
Three people!
Li Shanshui looked at the entrance of the teleportation array with a hint of doubt in his eyes.
Ye Xuan only brought two women to the Saha World?
Was he confident, or did he have a backup plan?
The Xiao Clan's Patriarch, Xiao Jing, spoke abruptly, "It isn't that simple!"
The Dao Convergence Dean, Yun Min, nodded. "Yes, we can't be careless!"
Li Shanshui gazed at the teleportation formation, "Then let's see how extraordinary they are!"
As he spoke, he closed his eyes slowly.
Actually, there was a trace of uneasiness in his heart.
It was absolutely impossible for Ye Xuan to have no backup plan. Or perhaps, it could be said that those two women were absolutely not ordinary people!
But at this moment, they had no way out!
They couldn't beg for mercy from Ye Xuan, right?
He couldn't do something like that!
Two women gazed silently at Li Shanshui's group from high up in the clouds.
They were Yue Zun and Yue Xi!
Yue Xi smiled, "Junior Sister, looks like Li Shanshui and the others are prepared to fight to the death!"
Yue Zun spoke softly, "Let's just watch in silence!"
Yue Xi gazed at Yue Zun, "Do you know that if Ye Xuan loses, then all of these powers will turn against my Saha Sect!?"
Yue Zun fell silent.
If Ye Xuan lost, then Li Shanshui would definitely utilize this opportunity to annihilate the Saha Sect!
Yue Xi was just about to speak when the teleportation formation in the distance suddenly started trembling.
Both of them gazed at the teleportation formation.
The gazes of everyone here descended onto the teleportation formation, and it didn't take long for three people to walk out from it!
Two women and a man.
It was Ye Xuan's group of three!
When Ye Xuan walked out from the teleportation formation, he was instantly stunned. Isn't there a little too many people here?
Moreover, there are actually so many experts here!
The Xiao Clan's Patriarch suddenly walked over to Ye Xuan's group of three, and he gazed at Ye Xuan, "You're Ye Xuan!"
Ye Xuan nodded.
Xiao Jing smiled, "Young Master Ye, we underestimated you!
I never expected that such an enormous power would actually stand behind you! "
As he spoke, he glanced at the white robed woman and Situ Tingyun, "However, aren't you looking down on the experts of my Saha World a little too much by only bringing two people with you?"
Meanwhile, the white robed woman suddenly shook her head, "You talk too much!"
As soon as she finished speaking, she suddenly vanished on the spot.
Xiao Jing's pupils constricted, and then he suddenly smashed his fist forward.
Bang!
The spectators hadn't even been able to see it clearly when a figure was blasted flying. It was Li Shanshui!
Li Shanshui frantically retreated. In the process of retreating, his physical body cracked inch by inch and his soul gradually dissipated. When he finally stopped, his physical body had already disappeared and his soul was almost transparent!
Everyone in the surroundings was petrified when they witnessed this scene.
The Patriarch of the Xiao Clan is gone just like that?
At this moment, Li Shanshui's countenance was pale while his eyes were filled with disbelief!
He hadn't imagined that the Patriarch of the Xiao Clan would be instantly annihilated with a single punch!
At this moment, all the experts of the Saha Sect were terrified!
This wasn't victory, it was instant annihilation!
He'd instantly annihilated a peak Unity Realm expert with a single punch!
On the other side, Yue Xi's expression instantly became solemn as well!
At this moment, she finally understood why her Junior Sister was so afraid of the Fifth Dimension!
This woman was too strong!
The white robed woman gazed at Li Shanshui from afar. Li Shanshui's expression changed, and he said ferociously, "Everyone, attack together!"
As soon as he finished speaking, the experts of the Black Illusion Sect charged forward.
The experts of the other sects were about to attack as well. Right at this moment, the white robed woman smashed her fist forward.
Bang!
All the experts of the Black Illusion Sect that were charging towards her were instantly annihilated by a single punch!
Over 100 Dao Attainment Realm experts and over a dozen Unity Realm experts had been instantly annihilated with a single punch!
At this moment, the surroundings were so silent that a falling needle could be heard!
So many experts had been instantly annihilated just like that!
Everyone looked at the white robed woman as if they were looking at a monster.
On the other side, Yue Xi's expression was extremely solemn as well. She stared fixedly at the white robed woman, and the shock in her heart couldn't be any greater!
What sort of godly strength is this?
In the distance, the white robed woman gazed at Li Shanshui. Li Shanshui gulped and spoke with a trembling voice, "Senior … this is a misunderstanding!"
Everyone was speechless.
The white robed woman was expressionless. "What misunderstanding?"
Li Shanshui's lips moved, but he didn't know what to say.
At this moment, the Dao Returning Academy's Dean, Yun Min, suddenly walked in front of the white robed woman and bowed respectfully. "Senior, we are here today to welcome Young Master Ye and you."
Everyone was speechless.
Yun Min bowed again and said, "Senior, if we have offended you before, please …"
The white robed woman suddenly opened her palm, and the Dao Scripture on Ye Xuan's body flew into her hand. She looked at Li Shanshui and the others. "This is the Dao Scripture that my brother obtained. Don't you want his Dao Scripture?
It's here now. Come and get it! "
Yun Min said with a trembling voice, "No … I wouldn't dare!"
The white robed woman's mouth curled into a disdainful smile. "Wouldn't dare?
You forced my brother to almost self-destruct!
Still wouldn't dare? "
As soon as she finished speaking, she blasted out a punch!
Bang!
Yun Min's entire body was annihilated by this punch!
He didn't even have a chance to fight back!
The expressions of everyone here changed drastically when they witnessed this scene, and they immediately fled. Meanwhile, the white robed woman suddenly spoke fiercely, "Did I say that all of you could leave?"
As she spoke, she smashed her fist forward, and an expert that was over 1km away was instantly obliterated by this punch!
Everyone had stopped what they were doing!
They didn't dare to move!
The white robed woman glanced coldly at them. "Do you want to live?"
Everyone was stunned, and then they hurriedly nodded.
The white robed woman gazed at Li Shanshui. "What about you?"
Li Shanshui spoke with a trembling voice. "I do …"
Don't beg for mercy?
No!
It isn't shameful to beg for mercy when facing such an expert!
The white robed woman's face was expressionless. She glanced at Ye Xuan and said, "This is my brother!"
Everyone looked at Ye Xuan.
The white robed woman continued, "He's from the Ninth Dimension!
He's the master of the Ninth Dimension, and he's reincarnated here to play! "
Ye Xuan was speechless.
Everyone glanced at each other.
The Ninth Dimension?
Does the Ninth Dimension really exist?
The white robed woman continued, "If you want to live, it's very simple. Follow my brother!
In the future, he'll take you to the Ninth Dimension to play! "
Ye Xuan was speechless.
Everyone was speechless.
Li Shanshui's expression was somewhat strange. Why does it seem like this senior is tricking us?
The white robed woman frowned slightly. "What, you don't believe me?"
Hearing this, Li Shanshui hurriedly said, "I believe, of course I believe!"
Everyone else nodded hurriedly.
The white robed woman's face was expressionless. "Is it a grievance to follow my brother?"
Li Shanshui hurriedly shook his head. "No!
It's not grievance!
It's our honor to follow Young Master Ye. "
The white robed woman was silent, and no one knew what she was thinking.
Afraid that the white robed woman would go back on her words, Li Shanshui hurriedly came before Ye Xuan and bowed respectfully to Ye Xuan. "Young Master Ye, from now on, we are your people!"
Ye Xuan ignored Li Shanshui. He walked to the white robed woman's side and said softly, "Qing 'er …"
The white robed woman slowly closed her eyes. "Brother, I'm leaving!"
Ye Xuan frowned slightly. "Leaving?"
The white robed woman nodded. She opened her palm, and a blood-red thread suddenly appeared on her hand.
Ye Xuan was stunned. "This is?"
The white robed woman looked at Ye Xuan. "The cause of calamity!"
Ye Xuan said solemnly, "What do you mean?"
The white robed woman raised her head and looked into the depths of the starry sky. There was a trace of confusion in her eyes. "I underestimated this cause of calamity!"
Ye Xuan was silent.
At this moment, he thought of Nian Nian!
Was Nian Nian's death really related to the Dao Ancestor?
With Nian Nian's strength, even if it was less than 20%, it should be enough to kill the Dao Ancestor!
Moreover, Nian Nian lost her memory!
This was very unusual!
At this moment, a powerful aura suddenly appeared in the distant sky.
Everyone in the surroundings looked up into the sky!
Li Shanshui gazed at Gu Wuchao with slight astonishment, "What're you doing?"
Gu Wuchao laughed fiercely, "She wants us to follow Ye Xuan?
She's probably overthinking things! "
As he spoke, he bowed deeply towards the sky. "Greetings, Ancestor!"
As soon as he finished speaking, a figure gradually condensed in the sky, and it wasn't long before a white haired old man appeared within their fields of vision.
The Profound Sect's Ancestor!
The white haired old man glanced at the surroundings, and then he gazed at Gu Wuchao in the end. "Has my Profound Sect encountered a threat of life and death?"
Gu Wuchao nodded and spoke respectfully, "Yes!"
As he spoke, he pointed at the white robed woman in the distance. "Ancestor, it's her who intends to destroy my Profound Sect!"
The white haired old man gazed at the white robed woman. The white robed woman's expression was calm.
The white robed old man seemed to have noticed something, and his pupils constricted. He turned around to look at Gu Wuchao and roared furiously, "You idiot! How could you screw over your ancestors like this?
I'll fuck your ancestors! "
Everyone in the surroundings was speechless.
....
