Chapter 1437
Gu Wuchao was quite stunned.
What's going on?
The white haired old man cupped his fists to the white robed woman and said respectfully, "May I know your name, Senior?"
Senior?
Everyone here was petrified when they heard the white haired old man!
The ancestor of the Dark Secrets Sect actually addressed the white robed woman as Senior?
At this moment, Li Shanshui was covered in cold sweat!
Because he'd actually wanted to summon his ancestor as well!
That was the final trump card of the Dark Secrets Sect!
However, he'd hesitated because he wasn't sure if his ancestor could resist the white robed woman!
But he hadn't expected that Gu Wuchao would summon his ancestor!
Fortunately, Gu Wuchao had summoned his ancestor!
Otherwise, he would be finished!
The white robed woman gazed at the white haired old man, "Are you not going to lend a hand?"
The white haired old man hurriedly shook his head, "Of course not! Of course not!"
The white robed woman's face was emotionless as she gazed at Gu Wuchao. The latter's expression changed, and he hurriedly bowed respectfully, "We're willing to follow Young Master Ye to the death!"
The white robed woman paid no attention to Gu Wuchao, and she gazed at Ye Xuan, "Come with me!"
Ye Xuan nodded, "Alright!"
The white robed woman turned around and left.
Ye Xuan followed her.
Situ Tingyun glanced at the others here, and they were looking at her as well.
Situ Tingyun blinked, "Does anyone want to spar with me?"
All of them were speechless.
...
At the other side.
Ye Xuan and the white robed woman were strolling through the clouds.
The white robed woman said, "I have to go!"
Ye Xuan spoke in a low voice, "Qing 'er, do you know much about the Cause of Calamity?"
The white robed woman shook her head, "Not much!"
She paused for a moment and continued, "I've been constantly investigating the Cause of Calamity throughout the years, and I've made some progress. I'll get to the bottom of it once I leave!"
Ye Xuan spoke in a low voice, "Why can't I sense the Cause of Calamity within me?"
The white robed woman gazed at Ye Xuan, "Because you're not strong enough!"
Ye Xuan was speechless.
The white-robed woman said softly, "The cause of the calamity is mainly this cause. Everything in the world has a cause and an effect. We don't know how this cause was formed."
As she spoke, she looked up at the starry sky and said softly, "People living in this world are like chess pieces on a chessboard!
Of course, the chess player might also be a chess piece … Fate is like an invisible hand that controls everything in the world! "
Ye Xuan smiled bitterly. "Am I that chess piece?"
The white-robed woman looked at Ye Xuan. She grabbed Ye Xuan's hand and said softly, "This universe is boundless, and there are too many unknowns.
Look at this starry sky. There are countless galaxies and planets. These galaxies and planets are all moving confidently according to some kind of law … How could all of this be a coincidence?
If it wasn't a coincidence, then who created all of this?
Both you and I could be pawns.
Even the three of them didn't dare to say that they were invincible in the universe.
”
Ye Xuan fell silent.
The white-robed woman continued, "I'm going to leave this place and investigate the cause of your calamity. You have to take care of yourself from now on, understand?"
Ye Xuan looked at the white-robed woman. "Will there be any danger?"
The white-robed woman shook her head. "I don't know!"
Ye Xuan was just about to say something when the white-robed woman said with a smile, "I can protect myself!"
She gently hugged Ye Xuan as she spoke.
Ye Xuan's body stiffened.
Ye Xuan didn't notice that two streams of clear liquid had appeared on the white-robed woman's cheeks.
After a long while, the white-robed woman released Ye Xuan. She pulled out a storage ring and placed it in Ye Xuan's hand with a faint smile. "There's still time!"
She pointed a finger toward the sky as she spoke.
Chi!
The space in the sky suddenly cracked open. Immediately afterward, she transformed into a streak of white light and disappeared into the cracked space.
Gone!
Down below, Ye Xuan's gaze was slightly blank.
The white-robed woman stopped somewhere in the starry sky. She looked at her palm, and there were already two bloody marks on it.
The white-robed woman's expression was cold, and no one knew what she was thinking.
Moments later, she suddenly turned and looked down. After a long moment of silence, she transformed into a streak of white light and disappeared into the starry sky.
...
The Whirling World.
Ye Xuan returned to the teleportation portal. Situ Tingyun looked at Ye Xuan. "She left?"
Ye Xuan nodded.
Situ Tingyun smiled. "Then I'm leaving as well!"
Ye Xuan looked at Situ Tingyun. "Senior Sister, where are you going?"
Situ Tingyun laughed. "I'm going to find a place that makes me feel threatened!"
Ye Xuan: "…"
Situ Tingyun walked over to Ye Xuan and patted Ye Xuan on the shoulder. "Little Junior Brother, we'll meet again!"
As soon as she finished speaking, she was about to leave. However, she seemed to have thought of something, and she suddenly gazed at the ancestor of the School of Secrets in the sky. The latter's expression changed. "Sir?"
Situ Tingyun smiled, "Don't be nervous. I don't kill people indiscriminately!"
The old man was speechless.
Situ Tingyun continued, "I want to show my ability before I leave, and you're the strongest here. So, make your move!"
The white haired old man hesitated for a moment before he said, "I can't defeat you!"
Situ Tingyun rolled her eyes. "I didn't say that you can defeat me. I just asked you to make your move, and then I'll show my ability."
The white haired old man was speechless.
Situ Tingyun continued, "Make your move quickly!
I'm busy!
Right, remember to use your full strength! "
The white haired old man glanced at Situ Tingyun. "Then I'll have to offend you!"
As soon as he finished speaking, he suddenly opened his palm. In the next moment, he suddenly slapped it towards Situ Tingyun.
Bang!
A palm swept down from the sky. As soon as it appeared, the expressions of countless experts in the surroundings changed drastically, and they retreated explosively. Because the energy contained within that palm was truly too terrifying!
At this moment, Ye Xuan's expression had become solemn as well!
That palm had definitely surpassed the Perfect Union Realm.
The white haired old man stared fixedly at Situ Tingyun.
Actually, he wanted to witness her strength as well.
At this moment, everyone in the surroundings was looking at Situ Tingyun as well.
The corners of Situ Tingyun's mouth curled up slightly. Her left thumb twitched slightly, and then a sword suddenly flew out from within its sheath. In the next moment, a ray of light flashed from below, and then a sword was pressed against the white haired old man's throat.
On the other hand, the white haired old man's attack had vanished without a trace!
Everyone in the surroundings was stunned when they witnessed this scene.
Gu Wuchao's legs even felt slightly weak.
At this moment, he finally understood why his ancestor had been so terrified!
It was too fucking terrifying!
The white haired old man gazed at Situ Tingyun with a complicated expression, "Senior's Sword Dao is unparalleled throughout the ages!"
Situ Tingyun roared with laughter, and then she gazed at Ye Xuan and smiled, "That attack from before is called Instant Death. Every strike of my sword kills an enemy within a 3km radius. I've once utilized this sword technique to kill a person who's two realms of cultivation above him. Now, I'll pass it down to you!"
When she spoke up to this point, she seemed to have thought of something, and she roared with laughter, "All those years ago, he passed down Sword Intent to me and allowed me to step into the Sword Dao. Today, I'll pass down my sword technique to you …. Interesting!
Hahaha! "
As she spoke, she tapped with her finger, and a ray of light shot into the center of Ye Xuan's forehead.
Ye Xuan's figure trembled, and it didn't take long for countless pieces of information to surge into his mind.
Situ Tingyun gazed at Ye Xuan and smiled, "Little Junior Brother, we'll meet again in the future. I hope we'll be able to discuss the Dao with the sword when we do!"
As soon as she finished speaking, she transformed into a ray of light that vanished into the horizon.
She's gone!
The experts from the Whirling World instantly heaved sighs of relief when they saw Situ Tingyun leave as well.
Meanwhile, two women suddenly arrived in front of Ye Xuan, and it was Yue Xi and Yue Zun.
Yue Xi grinned, "Young Master Ye!"
Ye Xuan gazed at Yue Xi, "You're the Sect Master of the Whirling Sect?"
Yue Xi smiled, "I am!"
As she spoke, she opened her palm, and a scripture appeared there. She passed it to Ye Xuan, "Young Master Ye, this is the last scripture. Fate brought us together today, so I'll give it to Young Master Ye!"
Fate!
Li Shanshui and the others had extremely strange expressions on their faces!
Dammit!
She really knows how to talk!
Needless to say, the Whirling Sect had really become the biggest winner!
Because the Whirling Sect hadn't suffered any losses this time.
Actually, they'd come to an understanding now. The reason the Whirling Sect hadn't joined forces with them was definitely because they knew how formidable the person standing behind Ye Xuan was, so they refused to cooperate with them!
But this woman just refused to tell them!
She'd caused them to be practically annihilated!
She was too treacherous!
Ye Xuan glanced at Yue Xi. He didn't refuse, and he took the scripture and said, "Sect Master Yue, I've gathered all nine scriptures, and I'm willing to share them with the Whirling Sect!"
Yue Xi blinked, "Really?"
Ye Xuan nodded, "Of course!"
Yue Xi grinned, "Thank you, Young Master Ye!"
Actually, she was really happy. Because even if Ye Xuan didn't share them with the Whirling Sect, she wouldn't dare say anything!
She didn't know if Ye Xuan was really the master of the Ninth Dimension, but she knew that he was absolutely not an ordinary person!
After Ye Xuan put the scripture away, he glanced at everyone here, "Everyone, return to your respective residences!"
As soon as he finished speaking, he turned around and left.
Meanwhile, Li Shanshui hurriedly said, "Young Master Ye, we're all following you now. You …."
Ye Xuan thought for a moment, and then he said, "I'll look for all of you if I need anything!"
Li Shanshui hesitated for a moment, and then he said, "Young Master Ye, I'll follow by your side!"
All the experts of the Blackhat Sect had been killed!
So it was utterly meaningless for him to stay in the Whirling World.
Ye Xuan was about to speak when Li Shanshui added, "Young Master Ye, my Blackhat Sect has been around for over 100,000 years, and we still have some finances. If Young Master Ye doesn't mind, then I'll give them to Young Master Ye!"
Ye Xuan glanced at Li Shanshui, and the latter hurriedly said, "I don't have any ill intentions. I just want to follow Young Master Ye."
Now, Ye Xuan was his only way out!
Ye Xuan thought for a moment, and then he nodded. "Alright!"
Li Shanshui hurriedly said, "Young Master Ye, please wait a moment. I'll go back and pack up!"
As soon as he finished speaking, he turned around and left.
Ye Xuan glanced at the experts of the Dao Returning Institute and the Xiao Clan in the distance. They didn't make a stand.
He didn't force them!
Obviously, they wanted to stay in the Whirling World, and they didn't really want to follow Ye Xuan. After all, no one liked to be the subordinate of another. Moreover, the white robed woman and the Swordsman had left!
Right at this moment, the ancestor of the Profound Secrets Sect suddenly looked at Gu Wuchao and said angrily, "What are you still looking at?
Hurry up and pay your respects to Young Master Ye!
Are you trying to make me crawl out of my coffin from anger? "
Gu Wuchao was speechless.

Chapter 1438
When he heard the white haired old man, Gu Wuchao hurriedly walked over to Ye Xuan and bowed respectfully to Ye Xuan, "From today onward, my Profound Secrets Sect swears to follow Young Master Ye to the death!"
Ye Xuan gazed at the white haired old man. The white haired old man grinned, "Young Brother, it's their honor to follow you."
He hesitated for a moment as he spoke, and then he said, "I hope you'll treat them well as well!"
Actually, even though everyone here was aware that the white robed woman and the Swordsman were terrifying, they didn't know exactly how terrifying they were.
However, the white haired old man knew!
Because he was an expert above the Oneness Realm!
However, not to mention that he was only a strand of his soul, even his main body wouldn't be a match for a single attack from that woman.
In other words, the strength of those two women had exceeded the scope of his understanding.
If the Profound Secrets Sect followed Ye Xuan, then it would definitely be able to attain glory once more.
In the Profound Secrets Sect's opinion, it wasn't submission, it was an opportunity!
An enormous opportunity!
On many occasions, the accomplishments a person could attain in the future depended on who that person followed.
The Profound Secrets Sect had arrived at a certain height, and it was very difficult for it to improve further.
Unless an extraordinarily monstrous genius appeared within the sect. However, that was even more difficult!
Because it had been many years since an expert above the Oneness Realm had appeared in the Whirling World!
Now, an opportunity had been placed before the Profound Secrets Sect, and it was to follow Ye Xuan and rely on Ye Xuan to bring the Profound Secrets Sect to a new height!
Ye Xuan hesitated for a moment when he heard the white haired old man, and then he nodded, "Alright!"
He didn't refuse them!
The reason Qing 'er hadn't killed them was because she wanted to leave and leave some help for him!
But now, he really did need help!
He wanted to reorganize the Fifth Dimension and the Daoting!
He wanted to truly rebuild order!
And he needed people to accomplish all of that!
After they heard the Profound Secrets Sect's Ancestor speak, the other powers expressed their submission as well.
They suddenly understood something, and it was that Ye Xuan was a backer!
This thigh was right here, so why not cling to it?
Now that the Profound Secrets Sect had Ye Xuan as their backer, if they didn't submit, what would they do if the Profound Secrets Sect came looking for trouble with them in the future?
Most importantly, there was still the Whirling Sect in the Whirling World. This time, the Whirling Sect didn't suffer any losses!
It could be said that the Whirling Sect was currently the strongest sect. If they didn't cozy up to Ye Xuan, it was very likely that they would be devoured by the Whirling Sect!
So, after weighing the pros and cons, basically all the powers present expressed their willingness to submit to Ye Xuan.
And Ye Xuan did not refuse.
Meanwhile, Li Shanshui appeared here, and he walked over to Ye Xuan and smiled, "Young Master Ye, let's go!"
Ye Xuan nodded. "Alright!"
As he spoke, he glanced at the others. "All of you stay here and wait for my orders!"
Everyone hurriedly nodded.
Ye Xuan turned around and left with Li Shanshui.
After the two of them left, the others glanced at each other, and their eyes were filled with bitterness.
This time, all of them were almost finished.
On the other side, the Whirling Sect's Master, Yue Xi, remained silent, and no one knew what he was thinking.
Exalt Yue smiled, "Senior Sister, are you slightly disappointed?"
Yue Xi smiled, "What are you disappointed about?"
Exalt Yue gazed at the experts in the distance, "Senior Sister, you're disappointed that those two didn't kill all of them!
If those two seniors killed all of them, then the Whirling World would belong to my Whirling Sect!
But now, all of them have sided with Ye Xuan, so we can't attack or curse them. We seem to be quite passive instead, right? "
Exalt Yue smiled, "Indeed!"
Yue Xi spoke softly, "Senior Sister.
Regardless of whether we admit it or not, that Young Master Ye isn't someone we can afford to offend now!
Even if he wants our Whirling Sect to submit, we have no other choice! "
Yue Xi fell silent.
Exalt Yue continued, "Fortunately, that Young Master Ye doesn't seem to be very interested in the Whirling World!"
Yue Xi suddenly raised his head and looked towards the horizon, and he spoke softly, "I'm curious now. I'm curious about exactly what level of cultivation those two women have attained, and where they've gone …."
A short while later, everyone here left.
Once all of them left, a slovenly old man appeared here.
This slovenly old man was called over by the white cloud Swordsman, and everything had come to an end when he arrived here!
The slovenly old man fell silent for a long time before he spoke softly, "That Young Master Ye isn't simple at all …."
Meanwhile, a figure suddenly appeared by the slovenly old man's side.
It was the Ancestor of the Dark Abyss, Dao Brother's 2nd Brother!
Dao Brother's 2nd Brother gazed towards the direction Ye Xuan had left towards, "Senior Brother, long time no see!"
The slovenly old man's face remained emotionless, "Your Dark Abyss is gone!"
Dao Brother's 2nd Brother smiled, "If it's gone, then it's gone!
What's the big deal? "
The slovenly old man gazed at Dao Brother's 2nd Brother, "You won't give up, right?"
Dao Brother's 2nd Brother roared with laughter, "Do you think I should give up?"
The slovenly old man shook his head, "Junior Brother, why?
You, An Yuan, were in the wrong in this matter! "
Dao Brother's 2nd Brother roared with laughter, "I don't care if I'm in the wrong or not. All I know is that kindness must be repaid, and enmity must be repaid!"
The slovenly old man spoke softly, "If you choose to take revenge, then you'll be doomed eternally!"
Dao Brother's 2nd Brother gazed at the slovenly old man, "Senior Brother, do you know his true identity?"
The slovenly old man shook his head, "I don't!"
Dao Brother's 2nd Brother gazed at the slovenly old man and smiled, "Senior Brother, you didn't come back for this person, right?"
The slovenly old man glanced at Dao Brother's 2nd Brother, "Junior Brother, out of respect for Master, I'll say one more thing. Give up on taking revenge. If you insist on taking revenge, then you'll really be doomed eternally."
He turned around and left once he finished speaking.
Dao Brother's 2nd Brother smiled, "Senior Brother, aren't you underestimating me?"
The slovenly old man sighed, "We're used to being invincible in Master's era!
However, we don't know that there's always someone better out there! "
Dao Brother's 2nd Brother chuckled, "How interesting. Two women scared you, Senior Brother!
Senior Brother, you're becoming less and less courageous as you live! "
The slovenly old man turned around and glanced at Dao Brother's 2nd Brother, "Master once said, 'Don't argue with a retard, because it will lower your IQ'. I think Master's words are very reasonable!"
Dao Brother's 2nd Brother looked at the slovenly old man, "Senior Brother, don't forget that the Dao Scripture belongs to our Dao Sect. Now, it's in the hands of outsiders. Why, don't you have any thoughts about it?"
The slovenly old man was silent.
Dao Brother's 2nd Brother smiled, "You don't have any thoughts, but I do. I believe that Third Junior Sister and Junior Brother will not allow the Dao Scripture to fall into the hands of outsiders!"
He turned around and left after he finished speaking.
The slovenly old man sighed softly …
...
Ye Xuan brought Li Shanshui back to the Fifth Dimension.
Inside the main hall.
Guan Yin and the others were there, as were the experts of the Daoting!
It was worth mentioning that Bai Dizi was also there!
And now, the affairs of the entire Fifth Dimension were not only handled by Guan Yin alone, but also by Bai Dizi!
Bai Dizi's management skills were really terrifying, not something that Guan Yin could compare to!
It should be known that Ye Xuan's side was not only in the Fifth Dimension, but also in the Sixth Dimension, the Dao World, the Daoting, the Underworld … There were so many places and so many forces. It could be said that Guan Yin's ability was already somewhat insufficient!
But after Bai Dizi's arrival, she suddenly felt a lot more relaxed!
As for fighting for power, whether it was her or Bai Dizi, they did not have that level of power. Ordinary power was simply meaningless to them.
Now, Guan Yin was slowly delegating power because she also began to pay attention to personal cultivation!
Over the years, because she had to deal with complicated matters, her cultivation had fallen behind.
Ye Xuan looked at everyone. "Now, our crisis has been temporarily resolved, but we still have a lot of things to do!"
At this time, Bai Dizi walked out. He bowed slightly to Ye Xuan and said, "I have something to report!"
Ye Xuan looked at Bai Dizi. "Speak!"
Bai Dizi nodded. "We have three things to do now. The first is to formulate a set of laws that everyone will abide by. This set of laws will be the standard by which we will manage this world in the future. Those who violate the laws, no matter who they are, will be severely punished. I have already drafted this set of laws, and I will show it to you later!"
Ye Xuan shook his head. "Not only for me to see, but also for everyone in the hall!
Moreover, it has to be shown to the world! "
Bai Dizi looked at Ye Xuan. Ye Xuan said, "This set of laws will be the foundation by which we will manage this world in the future. So, this set of laws can't be formulated by a single person or a few people. Everyone should participate in it."
When they heard this, everyone hurriedly nodded to express their agreement!
Bai Dizi glanced at Ye Xuan and nodded. "That's for the best!
As for the second matter, even though the external crisis has been resolved, there might be an internal crisis soon!
Alliance Leader Ye, all the powers are envious of the mineral veins that you obtained earlier. Besides that, there are also some places in our universe with abundant spirit energy that everyone is envious of. Now, the thoughts of many people have started to drift away. So, we have to be extremely careful in how we distribute the benefits. "
Ye Xuan glanced at Bai Dizi. This Bai Dizi has really thought things through. Actually, many powers have started to fall into chaos from within before collapsing.
The current Fifth Dimension must also pay attention to this point!
Bai Dizi continued, "As for the third matter, that is development!
Vigorously develop!
For now, we have resolved the crisis. However, because of Alliance Leader Ye, this crisis might not exist for the time being!
In the future, there might be an even bigger crisis! "
Ye Xuan's face was filled with black lines.
The White Emperor's son continued, "In short, we need to be strong enough to protect ourselves!
In addition, we must train as many outstanding people as possible. "
After a moment of silence, Ye Xuan said, "Everyone retreat. Bai Dizi, you stay behind!"
Everyone looked at each other and retreated.
Inside the hall, only Ye Xuan and Bai Dizi were left.
Ye Xuan looked at Bai Dizi. "Do you think that now is the right time to rebuild order?"
Bai Dizi shook his head. "Not suitable?"
Ye Xuan was somewhat puzzled. "Why?"
Bai Dizi softly said, "Because we have more problems to deal with. For example, the internal balance of power, how to divide the benefits … If these problems are not dealt with properly, it will be a hidden bomb. If you are not here one day, this bomb will explode and the entire Fifth Dimension will instantly collapse."
As he said this, he looked at Ye Xuan. "Right now, we can only take one step at a time!
You must not be too hasty.
Moreover, I feel that the problem you should be thinking about right now is not the Fifth Dimension and order, but the problem of your strength and the reason for your disaster!
Moreover, the Dark Abyss has been destroyed, but is the ancestor Dark Abyss still alive? Will he take revenge?
Moreover, you now have the complete version of the Dao Scripture. This temptation is too great. Will some hidden forces come to snatch it?
They might not dare to openly, but what about in the dark?
Moreover, those two seniors have already left. If you are in danger, can you immediately let them come to the Fifth Dimension?
The most important thing is that they are very strong, but this does not mean that you are strong. Do you understand? "
Ye Xuan was silent.
.....
