Also, I'm planning to buy a car with four wheels. Do you guys think a Maserati or a Lamborghini is better?
Or should I buy one of both?
But I also feel that it's a little wasteful … and a little worried.







Chapter 1451
Somewhere in the starry sky, an old man was leading a group of experts as they traveled madly through the starry sky.
This old man was the Daoist Faction's Qing He.
At this moment, Qing He and the people behind him had raised their speed to their limits!
Because they wouldn't be able to catch up if they were too late!
Once the woman in a plain dress stepped into the Beastman Dimension, then they could only watch helplessly!
Because the Beastman Dimension wasn't a place they could step foot into.
So they had to be fast!
Because they were too fast, the starry sky was torn apart inch by inch wherever Qing He and the others passed. It was an extremely shocking scene!
Around an hour later, Qing He suddenly spoke with excitement, "We caught up!"
The people behind him looked up and saw a woman in a plain dress at the end of the starry sky.
At this moment, the woman in a plain dress suddenly stopped. There was an enormous stone stele not too far away from her, and there were four large words on the stone stele: Human Stop.
The border between the Beastman Dimension and the Human Dimension.
The woman in a plain dress continued forward.
Right at this moment, a thunderous voice resounded from behind her, "Stop!"
The woman in a plain dress turned around. The starry sky in the distance was suddenly torn apart, and in the next moment, five people appeared a few hundred meters away from her.
It was Qing He.
The woman in a plain dress looked at Qing He with a calm expression, and there wasn't the slightest fluctuation in her eyes.
Qing He looked at her with a solemn expression. He didn't dare underestimate her in the slightest because he noticed that he couldn't sense her aura at all!
There were two possibilities!
The first was that she had a special technique to conceal her aura. The second was that she was too strong!
Qing He restrained his thoughts and looked at her, "You're Ye Xuan's Dao Protector!"
Ye Xuan!
The woman's eyes flickered slightly when she heard this name, and she nodded slightly.
Qing He stared fixedly at her, "Have you heard of my Daoist Faction?"
The woman shook her head.
Qing He frowned slightly, "You haven't heard of the Daoist Faction!"
The woman glanced at Qing He, "How is he now?"
Qing He said, "You're talking about Ye Xuan?"
The woman nodded.
Qing He was expressionless, "He isn't doing very well!"
The woman's beautiful brows knit together slightly.
Qing He looked at the woman and said solemnly, "Have you really not heard of my Dao Sect?"
The woman in the plain dress looked at Qing He. "Is it your Dao Sect that is making things difficult for him?"
Qing He looked straight at the plain-dressed woman. "Yes!"
As he spoke, he slowly clenched his right hand, and a powerful force condensed in his right hand.
He didn't dare be careless in the slightest when facing this woman in a simple dress, and it wasn't just that, he was prepared to flee at any moment!
His objective for coming here this time was naturally to kill the woman in a plain dress. But if he couldn't kill her, then he would choose to flee decisively!
After all, the people behind Ye Xuan were not simple.
He had already thought of a way out!
The woman in the plain dress was silent. No one knew what she was thinking.
Qing He stared at the plain-dressed woman. "I heard that the Fifth Dimension Tendo and you are evenly matched?"
The plainly dressed woman thought for a moment and nodded. "Yes."
Qing He narrowed his eyes. "What realm are you at?"
The woman thought for a moment and said, "I'm a little taller than you!"
Qing He furrowed his brows. "Above Unity?"
The woman in the plain dress nodded.
Qing He suddenly disappeared on the spot, and in the next moment, a fist imprint suddenly appeared in front of the plain-dressed woman.
The woman raised her sword to block it.
Bang!
As an explosion sounded out, the woman in the plain dress retreated over a hundred feet. However, Qing He exploded violently.
However, Qing He had retreated over 1km!
After Qing He stopped moving, his eyes were filled with excitement. "You really aren't that strong!"
The woman's expression was calm as she glanced at Qing He and the others. "All of you can't kill me!"
Qing He fell silent.
The collision from before had allowed him to gain a rough understanding of her strength. Just as she'd said, she was at most above Unity.
However, they would definitely be unable to do anything to her!
It was too little!
Meanwhile, the woman in a plain dress spoke abruptly. "Why don't you go get more people?"
Qing He raised his head to look at her. "You're not running?"
She shook her head. "I'm not running!"
Qing He frowned slightly. "Why?"
She thought for a moment and said, "I'm tired from walking!
So, let's rest! "
Qing He gazed at her. "Are you sure you won't run?"
She nodded.
Qing He said, "Then just you wait!"
As soon as he finished speaking, he turned around and left.
Meanwhile, the woman in a plain dress spoke abruptly. "Get someone stronger."
Qing He turned around and glanced at her. "As you wish!"
As soon as he finished speaking, he turned around and vanished into the horizon.
However, the four of them who'd come with him hadn't left.
All of them were staring at the woman in a plain dress. Obviously, they were afraid that she would flee.
The woman in a plain dress turned around and gazed into the distance. No one knew what she was thinking.
She didn't want to go back!
Because she was afraid that she wouldn't want to leave once she returned!
However, she had no choice but to leave!
There were numerous Karmic Lines around her that ordinary people couldn't see!
Calamity Lines!
The dense expanse of Karmic Lines coiled around her like a dumpling!
All of them belonged to Ye Xuan!
She couldn't slash them all!
Boundless Karmic Lines!
She just didn't slash them!
In any case, these Calamity Lines couldn't do anything to her!
Actually, she could stay by Ye Xuan's side forever. So long as she stayed by Ye Xuan's side, then no matter how terrifying the Calamity Lines were, they wouldn't be able to do anything to Ye Xuan.
However, she still wanted to find the source!
Who exactly is controlling all of this?
The woman in a plain dress slowly closed her eyes, "Don't let me find you!"
...
Somewhere in the starry sky, Qing He who was rushing towards the Dao Sect suddenly stopped!
Because he'd encountered the Sacred Leader and the others!
Qing He looked at the Sacred Leader, "All of you came to kill that woman as well?"
The Sacred Leader stared at Qing He, "All of you found her?"
Qing He nodded.
The Sacred Leader frowned slightly, "You didn't die?"
Qing He sneered, "All of you overestimate her!
She's just that. "
The Sacred Leader's frown deepened, "Just that?"
Qing He smiled, "Why? All of you think she's very strong?"
The Sacred Leader fell silent.
He was slightly puzzled.
That shouldn't be the case!
There was no reason for Master to lie to him!
At this moment, Qing He suddenly said, "Sacred Leader, are you here to kill this person as well?"
The Sacred Leader hesitated for a moment before shaking his head, "No!"
Qing He was slightly puzzled, "Then why did you come here?"
The Sacred Leader fell silent. Could it be that I'm here to stop you from sending yourself to death?
The Sacred Leader shook his head and said, "Qing He, you've fought her before?"
Qing He nodded.
The Sacred Leader was slightly puzzled, "Is she really not that strong?"
Qing He frowned slightly, "Sacred Leader, why do you think she's very strong?"
The Sacred Leader: "…"
Qing He
Suddenly, he said, "Sacred Leader, you came at the right time. If we join forces, we can definitely kill this person!"
The Sacred Leader hurriedly shook his head, "I'm just passing by!"
As he said this, he looked at Qing He, "Are you going back?"
Qing He nodded, "Although this woman isn't as strong as the white-robed woman, we can't underestimate her. It's still a little difficult for us to kill her, so …"
The Sacred Leader suddenly said, "So you're going back to call for help?"
Qing He nodded.
The Sacred Leader said in a deep voice, "Have you ever thought that this matter is a little strange?"
Qing He frowned slightly, "Strange?"
The Sacred Leader said in a deep voice, "I think she might have deliberately asked you to go back and call for help!"
Qing He said in a deep voice, "You're saying that she deliberately showed weakness?"
The Sacred Leader nodded.
Qing He shook his head, "Absolutely impossible!"
The Sacred Leader was slightly puzzled, "Why is it impossible?"
Qing He said, "Why would she show weakness?"
The Sacred Leader fell silent. He didn't know why she would show weakness!
Qing He continued, "If she's really extremely strong, then why didn't she appear when Ye Xuan was targeted by the Whirling World?
Moreover, if she's really strong, then why didn't she just go to my Taoist Faction and destroy it?
Why did she show weakness?
What's the point of that? "
The Sacred Leader fell silent.
Indeed, he didn't understand. If she was really as strong as his Master said, then why didn't she just destroy the Taoist Faction?
Or did she not take the Taoist Faction seriously at all?
Or did she disdain to go to the Taoist Faction?
Meanwhile, Qing He suddenly said, "According to what we know, she's always called herself Ye Xuan's younger sister, so she definitely has an extremely good relationship with Ye Xuan. If we can capture her, then we can use her to threaten Ye Xuan and make Ye Xuan hesitate in taking action. Moreover, it might even make the white-robed woman behind Ye Xuan hesitate in taking action."
The Sacred Leader looked at Qing He and was about to speak. Meanwhile, Qing He suddenly said, "Let's not waste any more time!
Sacred Leader, let's talk another day! "
After saying that, he turned and disappeared into the horizon.
In the starry sky, the Sacred Leader fell silent.
He still felt that something was wrong. Because his Master had no reason to lie to him!
In other words, there was only one explanation. That was, the woman deliberately showed weakness and deliberately made Qing He go back to call for help.
Thinking of this, the Sacred Leader said softly, "This Taoist Faction is going to be tricked!"
Saying that, he shook his head, "With such a teammate … I'm a little panicked!"
...
Taoist Faction.
Qing He rushed back to Daoting as fast as he could.
In a pavilion, the Second Brother looked at Qing He, "She told you to come back and call for help?"
Qing He nodded, "Yes!"
The Second Brother fell silent, "This matter is a little strange!"
Qing He hurriedly shook his head, "No, I think she underestimated the enemy!"
The Second Brother was a little puzzled, "Underestimated the enemy?"
Qing He nodded, "Although this woman is not good with words, I can feel that she is very arrogant. When she looks at me, it feels like she is looking at an ant!
Moreover, she is a Swordsman and has never heard of our Taoist Faction. Therefore, I feel that she has no idea how strong our Taoist Faction is. In her eyes, our Taoist Faction might be some third-rate force. "
The Second Brother fell silent.
Qing He continued, "I have fought with this woman. Although she did not use her sword, I have a rough idea of her strength.
She is an expert, but compared to the white-robed woman and Situ Tingyun, there is still a big gap. This woman is our breakthrough point. Once we capture this woman, not only can we threaten Ye Xuan and make Ye Xuan hesitate, we can also use this woman to understand the force behind Ye Xuan. It can be said to be killing two birds with one stone. "
The Second Brother was still silent. Obviously, he was a little hesitant because he felt that things might not be so simple.
Qing He was a little anxious, "Second Master, this is a rare opportunity. Let's do it!"

Chapter 1452
A once-in-a-lifetime opportunity!
Second Brother Dao narrowed his eyes, "I'll go myself!"

Qing He smiled, "Enough!"
Second Brother Dao thought for a moment and shook his head, "We still can't be careless!

Qing He nodded, "In this way, it's basically foolproof!"
Second Brother Dao frowned, "Don't be careless!"
Qing He smiled, "Understood!"

Second Brother Dao slowly closed his eyes, and he felt quite uneasy in his heart.

Who had the Dao Sect been afraid of?
Who had they been afraid of?
...
Somewhere in the starry sky, the Sacred Lord didn't leave with everyone. Instead, he came to the starry sky where the woman in the plain dress was.
He wanted to see exactly who this woman in the plain dress was!
When he saw the woman in the plain dress, the Sacred Lord's expression instantly became solemn!
His strength and knowledge were far beyond Qing He's. The moment he saw the woman in the plain dress, he knew that she was deliberately showing weakness!
This woman was very strong!
But he didn't know exactly how strong she was.
At this moment, the woman in the plain dress turned to look at the Sacred Lord. The Sacred Lord's expression changed, and he didn't hesitate to turn around and leave.
He knew that if he didn't leave now, he might not be able to leave later!
The woman in the plain dress didn't make a move and allowed the Sacred Lord and the others to leave.
The woman in the plain dress stood in the starry sky. She looked into the depths of the starry sky, and she held a small wooden figure in her hand.
This small wooden figure looked exactly like Ye Xuan!
After a long time, the woman in the plain dress withdrew her gaze and looked at the small wooden figure. When she saw it, a rare trace of gentleness flashed in her eyes.
At this moment, the space behind her suddenly trembled. In the next moment, a dozen powerful auras suddenly appeared behind her. Not long after, Qing He and the others appeared behind the woman in the plain dress.
Qing He instantly heaved a sigh of relief when he saw that the woman in a plain dress hadn't left.
All along the way, he was rather worried that the woman in a plain dress would flee. If the woman in a plain dress fled, then it would be equivalent to missing a rare opportunity!
Fortunately, the woman did not run away!
Wen Tianyu, the head of the academy, said abruptly, "Retreat!"
Retreat?
Qing He was stunned when he heard Wen Tianyu, and then he said, "What do you mean by that?"
Wen Tianyu looked at Qing He. "Retreat!"
With that, he turned around and left.
At this moment, Wen Tianyu's expression was extremely solemn. To be exact, he was a little nervous.
The instant he saw her, he knew that she wasn't an ordinary person.
This was a conspiracy!
Therefore, he decisively chose to leave!
However, it was a little too late.
A wisp of sword light had pierced through his glabella!
It was completely silent!
Wen Tianyu stood rooted to the ground, his eyes glazed over.
When did she use her sword?
He didn't know!
He only knew that he was dead!
On the other hand, Qing He and the others were stunned. Wen Tianyu is dead?
As if he'd thought of something, Qing He turned around to look at the woman in a plain dress, and his voice trembled as he said, "It's you …."
The woman glanced at Qing He. "How boring!"
As soon as she finished speaking, she turned around and left.
Qing He was about to speak when the heads of over a dozen experts flew into the air.
The heads of more than a dozen experts flew out one after another. Fresh blood gushed out like a fountain. It was extremely bloody.
Qing He was slightly stunned. In next to no time, he covered his neck with both hands because his throat had suddenly split open and blood sprayed out!
Qing He was horrified, and his soul was about to flee. At his level, even if his body was destroyed, so long as his soul remained, then he could be reborn.
However, when his soul was about to flee, he noticed to his astonishment that his soul was gradually vanishing.
Qing He stood on the spot.
He knew that he was dead!
His soul had been obliterated!
Qing He raised his head to look at the woman in a plain dress. "Is it fun to act weak …?"
In the distance, the woman didn't even turn around. She felt that she was wasting time.
Such a weak person shouldn't be a threat to her brother. Let him play by himself!
In the battlefield, Qing He wanted to inform his second brother before he died, but he was powerless to do so.
Right now, he only had a sliver of consciousness. His soul and body had been erased.
This sliver of consciousness had no roots or roots, so it had no meaning. Moreover, this sliver of consciousness was also vanishing.
That sword had directly erased everything he had!
Tens of thousands of years of cultivation, gone in an instant!
....
In the distance, the woman in a plain dress had already stepped into the Beastman World. The moment she stepped into the Beastman World, a voice suddenly sounded from the distant starry sky. "Human, this is the Beastman World."
The woman didn't stop and continued to walk into the distance.
At this moment, a shadow suddenly appeared not far away from the woman in a plain dress. The shadow gradually solidified, and soon, an expert with the face of a beast appeared in front of the woman in a plain dress.
This Beastman expert looked at the woman in a plain dress. "This is the Beastman World!"
The woman in a plain dress looked at the Beastman expert. "Excuse me!"
The Beastman expert looked straight at the woman in a plain dress. "No!"
The woman in a plain dress suddenly pulled out her sword.
Hiss!
A strand of sword light tore through the sky. The Beastman expert's pupils constricted. He wanted to resist, but as soon as the thought arose in his mind, his head flew into the air!
However, the strand of sword light didn't disappear. It tore through the sky and traveled a distance of 500,000km!
The starry sky within 500,000km was destroyed inch by inch!
This sword had directly destroyed the border between the Beastman World and the Human World.
At this moment, the entire Beastman World was shocked.
A human expert had invaded?
At this moment, a middle-aged man appeared in front of the woman in a plain dress. The middle-aged man didn't seem much different from a human, and the only difference was his eyes. His eyes were dark purple.
The middle-aged man looked at the woman in a plain dress with an extremely solemn expression.
Danger!
That was what he felt at this moment!
How many years has it been since he felt danger?
The woman didn't stop and continued forward.
The middle-aged man said in a low voice, "Human, my Beastman Race once signed an agreement with your Dao Sect's ancestor to not invade our race. Why have you come to invade my Beastman Race!?"
The woman in a plain dress looked at the middle-aged man. "I'm just passing by!"
The middle-aged man was stunned, and then he said, "You're just passing by … Then why did you kill people and destroy this world!?"
The woman in a plain dress looked at the middle-aged man. "You're not satisfied?"
The middle-aged man: "…"
The woman in a plain dress continued forward.
The middle-aged man fell silent.
When the woman passed by the middle-aged man, she turned around and glanced at him, "Compared to those people from before, you don't seem so weak."
The middle-aged man: "…"
The woman in a plain dress opened her palm, and the little wooden figure appeared in her hand. She looked at the middle-aged man. "This is my brother!"
The middle-aged man glanced at the little wooden figure and hesitated for a moment. "What do you mean!?"
Su?
The woman in a plain dress said, "Perhaps he will come here one day. If he does, give me some face and don't bully him, alright?"
The middle-aged man looked at the woman in a plain dress. "What if I don't agree?"
The woman opened her palm.
A sword suddenly flew out. The sword shot into the depths of the starry sky and arrived at the Beastman World. In an instant, the entire starry sky turned illusory!
The middle-aged man's expression changed drastically when he saw this scene!
This woman wants to destroy the entire Beastman World!
As the sword descended, the entire Beastman World started to collapse inch by inch!
True collapse!
Under this sword, even the origin of the entire Beastman World was dissipating.
The middle-aged man hurriedly said, "Senior … please have mercy!
I, I agree! "
At this moment, he suddenly understood that this woman was not just a little stronger than him, but many, many, many, many, many points!
He could not block that sword!
The Beastman World could not block it either!
The woman in a plain dress looked at the middle-aged man expressionlessly. "Too late!"
As she spoke, her right hand pressed down lightly. The sword sank down and the sky above the Beastman World darkened.
The middle-aged man said with a trembling voice, "Senior … please have mercy!"
He had never been so humble in his life!
When had the Beastman Race ever suffered such humiliation?
He also wanted to fight, he also wanted to be unyielding!
But his strength did not allow him to!
The moment this woman in a plain dress attacked, he felt despair!
This woman was so powerful that he felt despair!
At this moment, the woman in a plain dress stopped. After a moment of silence, she said, "For my brother's sake, I will ask you again."
As she spoke, she took out the little wooden figure. "This is my brother!
If he comes here, don't bully him, alright? "
The middle-aged man hurriedly said, "Alright, alright, alright!"
The woman in a plain dress nodded. "Wouldn't everything be fine if you answered like that just now?"
The middle-aged man laughed bitterly. I didn't know you were so abnormal!
The woman in a plain dress did not speak further. She walked towards the distance, but she stopped in next to no time. The middle-aged man's expression instantly changed when he saw this.
The woman in a plain dress turned to glance at the middle-aged man. "There is a familiar aura here … Do you know a little girl with a horn on her head?"
A little girl with a horn on her head?
The middle-aged man was stunned, and then he said with a trembling voice, "Senior, you know Miss Erya?"
The woman in a plain dress nodded. "Has she been here?"
The middle-aged man nodded and said respectfully, "Yes, she has passed by here … Senior, what is your relationship with Miss Erya?"
The woman in a plain dress thought for a moment and said, "Enemy!"
Enemy!
The middle-aged man's expression was slightly strange. "Enemy?
Senior … that Miss Erya is very, very strong. She said that besides her brother, no one is a match for her … "
The woman in a plain dress had a calm expression. "Did she say that?"
The middle-aged man nodded. "Yes!"
The woman in a plain dress did not speak. She turned around and continued forward.
The middle-aged man hesitated for a moment and said, "Senior, do you need us to take care of your brother?"
The woman in a plain dress did not even turn her head. "Up to you!"
The middle-aged man nodded and felt relieved. He did not really want to get involved in these things. Especially to take care of a human, he was still slightly disgusted and resistant.
At this moment, the woman in a plain dress said, "You can take care of him or not. But if anything happens to him, all of you will be buried with him!"
The middle-aged man was petrified on the spot.

Chapter 1453
Taoism.

All fallen!
Second Elder Dao was surprisingly calm.
The old man glanced at Second Elder Dao and said, "Second Elder …"
Second Elder Dao slowly closed his eyes, "I understand!"
The old man bowed slightly and left.

Second Elder Dao walked towards the back of the mountain, and before long, he arrived before a mountain wall. He looked at the mountain wall in front of him and said softly, "The Taoism is in danger!"
After a moment of silence, the mountain wall suddenly trembled, and then it split open, and an old man in a gray robe walked out.
The old man looked at Second Elder Dao, "The Taoism is in danger?"
Second Elder Dao nodded, "Ask everyone who is in closed door cultivation to come out!"

Second Elder Dao said softly, "The nine Dao scriptures have been gathered, and the spirit of the Grand Dao is about to appear!"
The old man was stunned, "Isn't that a good thing?"

The old man in gray was speechless.

Mu Xing said in a low voice, "Is it that serious?"

Boundless Sacred Ground.

"Danger?"
The woman smiled and said, "You underestimated her too much!
She's not dangerous, she's terrifying. She's the most dangerous person in the world, and also the most terrifying person. "
The Holy Lord hesitated for a moment and then asked, "Master, why do you know that woman in a plain dress so well?"
The woman smiled and did not answer the question. Instead, she stood up and left the bamboo house. Outside the bamboo house, the Sacred Leader hurriedly bowed.
The woman looked at the end of the horizon and said softly, "The Second Daoist probably won't give up, right?"
The Sacred Master nodded. "I've already received news that he has begun to recall all the Dao Sect's disciples who are outside."

Holy Master shook his head. "From what I know, he might be trying to destroy the forces behind Ye Xuan!"
The woman was stunned, and then she said, "Why isn't he looking for Ye Xuan directly? Why is he looking for the forces behind Ye Xuan?"
The Sacred Leader hesitated for a moment and said, "Perhaps he feels that the forces behind Ye Xuan are a huge threat …. So, he wants to deal with the forces behind Ye Xuan first!"
The woman suddenly asked, "Is the Second Daoist an idiot?"
The Sacred Leader was speechless.

I can't figure it out! "
The Sacred Leader hesitated for a moment and said, "Actually, the Second Daoist is very strong!
However, they're used to being superior!
After all, the Dao Sect was practically invincible all those years ago, and the Four Saints of the Dao Sect were extremely famous …. The Dao Sect has never suffered such humiliation, and this is probably the first time. "
The woman smiled and said, "Actually, it's fine. I don't want Ye Xuan to be so free and unfettered. It's not a bad thing for us to have the Dao Sect cause trouble for him!"
The Sacred Leader said in a low voice, "Master, Ye Xuan is auctioning the contents of the eighth scripture in Xuan City …."
The woman glanced at the Sacred Leader. "You want it?"
The Sacred Leader nodded.
The woman smiled and said, "Then go and bid for it!"
The Sacred Leader wanted to say something but hesitated.
The woman said softly, "You want to ask if the people behind Ye Xuan are so terrifying, why do we still want to be enemies with them, right?"
The Sacred Leader nodded.
The woman smiled and said, "This is a grudge between me and them."
The Sacred Leader bowed slightly and didn't ask any further questions.
A moment later, the Sacred Leader left.
The woman looked up into the sky, and her smile gradually turned cold as she thought of something.
...
Xuan City.
A grand auction was about to be held under the arrangements of Lan Ruo, the City Lord of Xuan City.
There was only one thing to be auctioned in this auction!
The Dao Scripture!
The contents of the eighth scripture!
Countless forces and experts rushed to Xuan City when they heard the news.
At this moment, Xuan City was unprecedentedly bustling.
City Lord Manor, inside the hall.
Lan Ruo looked at Ye Xuan. "How many fortune divine crystals are you going to auction?"
Ye Xuan asked, "Are the fortune divine crystals the common currency now?"
Lan Ruo nodded. "Yes!
Of course, some precious elixirs are also counted. However, these elixirs are too rare and hard to come by. "
Ye Xuan thought for a moment and said, "Then let's go with the fortune divine crystals!
In Miss Lan Ruo's opinion, how many fortune divine crystals can the contents of the eighth scripture be sold for? "
Lan Ruo looked at Ye Xuan. "A priceless treasure that can't be estimated!"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "There shouldn't be anyone coming to snatch it, right?"
Lan Ruo smiled and said, "You can rest assured in Xuan City unless all the experts from the Dao sects rush here."
Ye Xuan cupped his fists and said, "Then I'll have to trouble Miss Lan Ruo this time!"
Lan Ruo smiled and said, "You're welcome!"
At this moment, an old man walked in and bowed slightly. "City Lord, everything is ready!"
Lan Ruo looked at Ye Xuan and smiled. "Young Master Ye, let's go!"
Ye Xuan nodded and said, "Alright!"
Under Lan Ruo's lead, Ye Xuan arrived at the auction site. Ye Xuan scanned the area and realized that there were very few people around. There were only a few dozen of them!
Lan Ruo smiled and said, "We've done a screening. After all, there are only a few powerful forces."
Ye Xuan nodded and said, "Alright!"
Lan Ruo pointed to the round stage in the distance and said, "Young Master Ye, are you going to do it yourself, or do you want one of us to do it?"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "I'll do it!"
With that, he appeared on the round stage.
At this moment, everyone's eyes fell on Ye Xuan.
Ye Xuan glanced at the surroundings and noticed that the weakest amongst them was at the Consolidation Realm. Besides that, there were a few extremely powerful auras!
He even saw three familiar faces!
Nan Yue Xiu, Nan Yueqi, and Nan Yueqing!
The Nan Yue Clan!
When he saw Ye Xuan look over, Nan Yue Xiu smiled as a greeting!
Ye Xuan cupped his fists and looked around. "Everyone, I won't waste my breath!
Let's get straight to the point! "
As he spoke, he opened his palm and an ancient scroll appeared in his hand. "The contents of the eighth Daoist scripture. The starting price …"
He hesitated for a moment and looked at Lan Ruo. Lan Ruo smiled and raised a finger.
Ye Xuan immediately said, "The starting price is 10,000,000 Fortune Crystals!"
Lan Ruo was stunned when he heard this, and everyone else was stunned as well.
10,000,000 Fortune Crystals?
The silence was terrifying!
The atmosphere was very strange!
Ye Xuan gazed at Lan Ruo. Lan Ruo hesitated for a moment, and then he said via voice transmission, "I mean, 1,000,000,000!"
1,000,000,000!
Ye Xuan's face froze.
He realized that he seemed to have underestimated this scripture!
Lan Ruo continued, "This scripture is a precious treasure of the Daoist Path, and it's even the eighth volume. Its value can't be measured with money!
Actually, a bid of 1,000,000,000 is too little! "
Ye Xuan was a little embarrassed. He was a little embarrassed!
Lan Ruo rolled his eyes at Ye Xuan, and then he shouted, "100,000,000!"
100,000,000!
The atmosphere instantly returned to normal when Lan Ruo from Xuancheng made a bid!
At this moment …
An old man said in a hoarse voice, "200,000,000!"
"300,000,000!"
"500,000,000 …"
The price rose higher and higher.
Ye Xuan was quite excited. Just as Lan Ruo had said, he had underestimated this scripture!
The price rose higher and higher, and it didn't take long for it to reach 1,100,000,000!
1,100,000,000 Fortune Crystals!
Ye Xuan fell silent.
1.1 billion Fortune Divine Crystals ah!
How many experts would he be able to nurture if he brought them to the Fifth Dimension!
I'm still too poor!
He'd already made up his mind. He would auction off the ninth volume once he finished studying it!
Right at this moment, a voice suddenly resounded. "3,000,000,000!"
3,000,000,000!
As soon as this was said, the surroundings fell silent once more.
Ye Xuan looked at the person who'd spoken. It was an old man in a black robe, and his face couldn't be seen.
Lan Ruo glanced at the old man as well, and then she sent a voice transmission to Ye Xuan. "The Ancient Race!
He's extremely strong! "
Ye Xuan nodded, and then he glanced at the surroundings and said, "Is there anyone else who has a higher bid than this senior?"
The surroundings fell silent.
Ye Xuan was about to speak when a voice suddenly resounded. "Young Master Ye, my Southyue Race doesn't have that many Fortune Crystals, but we can use medicinal pills to exchange for them."
As he spoke, he waved his right hand, and a few hundred bottles of medicinal pills appeared in front of Ye Xuan.
Ye Xuan glanced at the medicinal pills, and then he turned to look at Lan Ruo. Lan Ruo glanced at the medicinal pills and said, "They're worth over 3,000,000,000 Fortune Crystals!
These medicinal pills are sufficient to allow a huge batch of Dao Formation Realm experts to appear in the Fifth Dimension! "
A huge batch of Dao Formation Realm experts!
Ye Xuan was slightly tempted.
Meanwhile, the old man from the Ancient Race suddenly said, "It's medicinal pills!
My Ancient Race has them as well! "
As soon as he finished speaking, he opened his palm, and a few hundred bottles of medicinal pills appeared in front of Ye Xuan.
The old man looked at Ye Xuan. "Young Master Ye, what do you think about 3,000,000,000 and these medicinal pills?"
Ye Xuan turned to look at Nanyue Xiu, but the latter remained silent.
The value of the Dao Scriptures far exceeded these medicinal pills, but if the Southyue Race continued to buy them, then it would truly be a huge blow!
When Nanyue Xiu remained silent, Ye Xuan looked at the old man and smiled. "Deal!"
As soon as he finished speaking, he flicked his finger, and the scroll landed in front of the old man.
The old man was very straightforward, and he flicked his finger, and a spatial ring landed in front of Ye Xuan.
Ye Xuan glanced at it, and there were exactly 3,000,000,000 medicinal pills within it!
The old man was about to leave when Ye Xuan suddenly said, "I wonder if there are any from the Daoist Faction!"
The Daoist Faction!
Everyone looked at Ye Xuan.
Ye Xuan smiled. "There aren't any?"
Meanwhile, an old man suddenly appeared not too far away from Ye Xuan, and he gazed at Ye Xuan. "What?"
It was obvious that he was from the Daoist Faction.
Ye Xuan glanced at everyone here, and then he pointed at the old man. "I'll give the eighth scripture to anyone who kills him for free!"
The surroundings fell silent.
The old man sneered. "Who dares?"
Right at this moment, a cold light flashed through the surroundings.
The old man's expression changed drastically, and he turned around abruptly. In the next moment, the cold light had already pierced through his forehead!
His soul was annihilated!
At the same time, a shadow appeared not too far away from Ye Xuan.
The shadow was hazy and couldn't be seen clearly.
In the field, everyone looked at the shadow.
What guts!
The shadow extended his right hand to Ye Xuan.
Ye Xuan flicked his finger, and an ancient scroll appeared in front of the shadow.
The shadow glanced at the scroll, then turned around and left.
At this moment, Ye Xuan suddenly said, "Do you have any thoughts on the ninth scripture?"
The shadow stopped. A moment later, he said, "Who should I kill?"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "Ten Dao Sect Consolidation Realm powerhouses!"
The shadow fell silent.
Ye Xuan looked around and smiled. "I'll give the eighth scripture to anyone who kills a Dao Consolidation Realm cultivator. I'll give the ninth scripture to anyone who kills ten!

Chapter 1454
The Ninth Dimension!
Rumor had it that the Ninth Dimension was the Son of the Dimension!
However, no one really believed it. However, the power behind Ye Xuan was too mysterious!
Did this guy really come from the Ninth Dimension?
But where was the Ninth Dimension?
Everyone was puzzled.
At this moment, the figure in front of Ye Xuan said, "Kill ten and you'll give me the ninth Dao Scripture. Really?"
Ye Xuan pointed at himself. "When have I ever lied to anyone?"
The figure said, "Wait!"
After saying that, he disappeared.
The people in the hall were silent.
Killing a Consolidation Realm expert could exchange for the eighth Dao Scripture!
That was really worth it!
But that was the Dao Sect!
Although they were tempted, they did not dare to act!
At this moment, Ye Xuan suddenly smiled. "Everyone, I know you don't want to be enemies with the Dao Sect!
However, if you can't do it in the open, you can do it in the dark!
In any case, as long as you hide well, who will know it was you who killed them? "
Everyone took a look at Ye Xuan. Damn it. This guy is so bad!
Ye Xuan smiled. "Why is the Dao Sect so powerful?
That's because they have the Dao Scripture. If you get the eighth and ninth Dao Scripture, you can also be as powerful!
The opportunity is right in front of you, it would be a pity if you don't cherish it! "
At this moment, a voice suddenly sounded from the dark. "We can also choose to kill you!"
Everyone looked at Ye Xuan.
Ye Xuan was silent for a moment. The next moment, a powerful bloodline power suddenly swept out from his body.
Boom!
The surrounding space directly trembled!
After seeing the power of Ye Xuan's bloodline, everyone's expression changed!
Lan Ruo's expression gradually became solemn.
Ye Xuan smiled. "I think everyone must be very curious about my background …"
As he said that, he looked at everyone and smiled. "To tell you the truth, I am the son of the Ninth Dimension. This bloodline is the first bloodline of the Ninth Dimension, the Crazy Demon Bloodline."
The son of the Ninth Dimension!
The hall became silent!
Naturally, they did not believe it!
But Ye Xuan's bloodline was really too strange!
Too powerful!
And they had never heard of this bloodline!
This was very abnormal!
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "Everyone should have investigated me, Ye Xuan. Everyone should be very clear about what kind of person I, Ye Xuan, am.
First, I only want to protect my Five-Dimensional Universe. I have no interest in your territories!
Secondly, in my heart, the Daoist scriptures are like dung. Why?
Because in our Nine Dimensions, this kind of thing is really just so-so. "
After saying this, he looked at everyone. "Everyone should know what I, Ye Xuan, have done in the Fifth Dimension. I, Ye Xuan, like to make friends. If everyone is willing to be friends with me, Ye Xuan, I will give you Dao Scriptures for free!
Let's cultivate together and become stronger together!
I, Ye Xuan, never eat alone.
If you don't want to be friends with me, that's fine too. My way of thinking is that even if we can't be friends, we shouldn't be enemies!
As long as everyone doesn't become enemies with me, Ye Xuan, I, Ye Xuan, will never offend any of you. "
Everyone in the hall was silent.
Lan Ruo glanced at Ye Xuan and remained silent. No one knew what he was thinking.
At this moment, Ye Xuan said, "It's fine if you don't want to get involved in this. As long as you kill the people from the Daoist Faction, I will give you the contents of the Dao Scriptures."
No one in the hall said anything.
At this moment, many people already had some ideas. However, they were not stupid enough to express them here!
Killing an expert from the Daoist Faction would give them the contents of the eighth volume!
This was too worth it!
The temptation was huge!
Many people were tempted!
It was worth the risk!
Soon, some people in the hall left.
Everyone left.
After everyone left, Lan Ruo walked in front of Ye Xuan and smiled. "They will make a move!"
Ye Xuan smiled. "Will they?"
Lan Ruo looked at Ye Xuan. "If I didn't get the eighth volume of the Dao Scriptures, I would definitely do that!
Killing one person for a volume of the Dao Scriptures. This is too worth it!
However, if you do that, it's equivalent to declaring war on the Daoist Faction! "
Ye Xuan chuckled. "If I don't do that, will they let me go?"
Lan Ruo shook her head. "No!"
Ye Xuan suddenly asked, "What about the Boundless Sacred Ground?
Have they made any moves? "
Lan Ruo shook her head. "The Boundless Sacred Ground is very quiet. They haven't made any moves!"
Ye Xuan was silent.
Lan Ruo said in a low voice, "The Daoist Faction has made a big move. From what I know, they have already gathered all the Daoist Faction disciples outside. Not only that, some hidden experts from the Daoist Faction have also come out of seclusion. They might be up to something big soon. You must be mentally prepared!"
Something big!
Ye Xuan said softly, "Miss Lan Ruo, what level is Second Brother Dao's expert at?"
Lan Ruo said in a low voice, "He should be half a step into the Divine State."
Ye Xuan frowned. "Divine State?"
Lan Ruo nodded. "The so-called Divine State refers to the ability to reverse the deathly aura in one's body and gradually convert it into life aura. To a certain extent, it's very difficult for experts of this level to die normally. This is because they can slowly reverse the deathly aura and convert it into life aura.
Although it's not considered eternal life, it's more than enough to live for hundreds of thousands of years. "
As she spoke, she looked at Ye Xuan. "In the end, the goal of everyone's cultivation is actually to live longer."
Ye Xuan nodded. "I understand now!"
Lan Ruo continued, "The white-robed lady and Situ Tingyun who attacked just now are naturally extremely powerful. However, the Daoist Faction might not be particularly afraid of them. This is because the Daoist Faction has a very deep foundation. You must understand that the cultivation realms of the various worlds are all created by the Daoist Faction's patriarch.
Although the Daoist Faction's patriarch is no longer around, you still cannot underestimate the Daoist Faction. "
Ye Xuan shook his head. "Actually, I still don't understand why the Daoist Faction wants me dead."
Lan Ruo looked at Ye Xuan. "Because you've gathered all nine scrolls of the Dao Scripture!
If you summon the Spirit of the Great Dao, you'll be the leader of the Daoist Faction.
Although you have no intention of being the leader of the Daoist Faction, the people of the Daoist Faction will not allow you to summon the Spirit of the Great Dao. "
As she spoke, she paused before continuing, "Actually, most of the time, when people want you dead, it's not because you want to be their enemy, but because you have the ability to threaten them. To them, that's enough."
Ye Xuan chuckled. "I understand now!
Miss Lan Ruo, I want to go somewhere. Are you interested in coming with me? "
Lan Ruo was a little curious. "Where?"
Ye Xuan shook his head. "I don't know either!
Before Qing 'er left, she gave me a map. It's obvious that she wants me to go to that place. "
Lan Ruo asked, "The white-robed woman?"
Ye Xuan nodded.
After a moment of silence, Lan Ruo said, "Young Master Ye, this might be a fortuitous encounter. Are you sure you want me to go with you?"
Ye Xuan smiled. "I'm sure. It all depends on whether Miss Lan Ruo is willing!"
Lan Ruo looked at Ye Xuan. After a moment, she smiled. "Of course!"
Ye Xuan smiled. "Then let's go!"
Lan Ruo nodded. "Let's go!"
Soon, Ye Xuan and Lan Ruo left Xuan City.
...
Daoist Faction.
On this day, an old man suddenly came to the bamboo house where Second Brother Dao was. The old man said in a deep voice, "Second Brother, that Ye Xuan has spread the word in Xuan City that anyone who kills a Consolidation Realm expert of our Daoist Faction will immediately obtain the contents of the eighth scroll. If he kills more than ten people, he will obtain the contents of the ninth scroll!"
Second Brother Dao was expressionless. "Does anyone dare?"
The old man said in a deep voice, "We've already lost contact with two Consolidation Realm experts.
.....”
Second Brother Dao narrowed his eyes with murderous intent. "Who is it!"
The old man shook his head. "I don't know!"
Second Brother Dao was about to speak when footsteps suddenly sounded from outside the door. The next moment, a man walked in!
The second Dao Brother was stunned when he saw the woman. The old man was also stunned, but he quickly came back to his senses and bowed respectfully. "Fourth Master!"
The woman in front of him was one of the Four Sages of Daoist Faction, Fourth Brother Dao!
Second Brother Dao said softly, "Fourth Brother, you've come out of seclusion?"
Fourth Brother Dao nodded. He smiled. "This Ye Xuan is using the Dao Scripture to tempt those forces into becoming enemies with us!"
Second Brother Dao said, "What do you think, Fourth Brother?"
Fourth Brother Dao shook his head. "We can't find trouble with those forces who killed our experts. If we do that, we'll be playing into Ye Xuan's hands!"
Second Brother Dao frowned. "Just let it go?"
Fourth Brother Dao nodded. "Not only that, we have to be on good terms with those forces.
Ye Xuan has the Dao Scripture in his hands, and we also have the contents of the Dao Scripture, don't we? "
Second Brother Dao said softly, "You mean, we can also learn from Ye Xuan?"
Fourth Brother Dao smiled. "Those people dared to kill our people for the contents of the Dao Scripture. Say, if we also use the Dao Scripture as bait, will they kill the people in the Fifth Dimension?"
Second Brother Dao was silent.
Fourth Brother Dao smiled. "Are they more afraid of Ye Xuan or our Dao Sect?"
As he said this, he looked at the old man beside him. "Go and investigate and see if Ye Xuan has any relatives and friends in the Fifth Dimension. Then spread the order. Anyone who kills any of Ye Xuan's relatives and friends will be given the contents of the eighth volume of the Dao Scripture for free. Not only that, but we'll also add one billion Divine Crystals!"
One billion Divine Crystals!
The old man's expression changed.
Fourth Brother Dao smiled. "If Ye Xuan wants to compete with us in terms of wealth and foundation, he's still too young!"
Second Brother Dao smiled. "That's a good plan!"
Fourth Brother Dao said softly, "The forces behind Ye Xuan are too mysterious. We can't fight them head-on for now. We can take it slow and compete with them in terms of foundation and wealth!"
Second Brother Dao said in a deep voice, "This is a good plan, but the forces behind Ye Xuan …"
Fourth Brother Dao said softly, "It's fine, take it slow.
Right now, we want to kill people with a borrowed knife. We want the forces in the Fifth Dimension to target Ye Xuan.
With a great reward, there will be brave people. We want Ye Xuan to become the enemy of the forces in the Fifth Dimension!
As for the white-robed woman and Situ Tingyun behind him, why do we need to find them?
We can wait for them to come to us!
Our top priority now is to get Third Senior Sister back, as well as some of the Elders who are training outside. Get them to come back immediately … Then we'll set up a trap to kill the white-robed woman and Situ Tingyun … and that plain-dressed woman … "
Second Brother Dao said, "I'll go find Third Brother!"
After saying that, he disappeared.
....
Somewhere in the starry sky, Lan Ruo suddenly stopped. After a moment of silence, she looked at Ye Xuan. "The Daoist Faction has issued a notice. Anyone who kills a friend or relative of Ye Xuan will not only be rewarded with the contents of the eighth volume of the Daoist Scripture, but also one billion Divine Crystals!"
Ye Xuan fell silent.

Lan Ruo said after a moment of silence, "Speak!"

No, twenty billion!
Also, all the Daoist Faction's Daoist Scriptures, martial arts, and mental cultivation techniques will be offered … "
Lan Ruo: "…"

Chapter 1455

Ye Ling was wanted!

In the starry sky.

Lan Ruo shook her head. "No one would do that to their sister!"
Ye Xuan was speechless.

At this point, she suddenly stopped.
The Fifth Dimension!
At this moment, she suddenly thought of something. Was the Fifth Dimension weak?
If it was just the Fifth Dimension, then it was definitely weak.

Lan Ruo said softly, "This is a dead Star Sector!"

Lan Ruo shook his head. "I've never been here, nor have I heard of it!"
Ye Xuan was a little surprised. "You don't even know?"
Lan Ruo smiled. "The universe is vast and boundless. It's not something a human can see!"
As she spoke, she looked into the depths of the distant starry sky and said softly, "Actually, this universe is full of dangers, but it's also full of opportunities!"
Ye Xuan nodded. "Indeed!"
As he spoke, he looked into the depths of the starry sky. There was a trace of curiosity and anticipation in his eyes.
What kind of place was this place that Qing 'er wanted him to go to?
...
In the Fifth Dimension.
Currently, the starry sky of the Fifth Dimension was filled with Consolidation Realm experts from the Whirling World!
To guard the Fifth Dimension!
The Whirling Dance School had also sent all their super experts to the Fifth Dimension!
It was obvious that the Whirling Sect was going to stick together with Ye Xuan!
This was normal. After all, the Whirling Sect and the Fifth Dimension were studying the ninth Dao Scripture together. If the Whirling Sect did not put in some effort, how could they?
Although the Whirling Sutra Sect once possessed the ninth volume of the Dao Scripture, they did not completely comprehend it. With their strength, it was practically impossible for them to completely comprehend the ninth volume of the Dao Scripture. However, things were different now!
Because Nian Nian was here!
To be safe, the Whirling Sect had directly sent all their Consolidation Realm experts. There were a total of thirty-six of them!
In addition to the Consolidation Realm experts from other forces in the Whirling World, there were a total of ninety-six Consolidation Realm experts in the Fifth Dimension!
This lineup was actually very terrifying!
And these ninety-six Consolidation Realm experts were guarding the starry sky of the Fifth Dimension. In addition, the Xuanji Sect had set up dozens of super arrays in the sky of the Fifth Dimension!
Right now, the Fifth Dimension was like an iron bucket!
...
Inside the Sword Hall.

...

At this moment, a man walked in!
White Robe!
At this moment, White Robe had reached the Dao Attainment Realm!

White Robe said, "Three hundred and sixty!"
Three hundred and sixty!

Other than that, there are some pills that can increase cultivation level for the White Robe Army. "
White Robe glanced at Bai Dizi. "He gave them to you?"
Bai Dizi nodded.
White Robe was silent.

White Robe nodded.

White Robe was silent.
Bai Dizi looked outside the hall with a complicated expression. "White Robe, what was our dream back then?
It was to rebuild order!
And he is really doing this!
Although he is very young and a bit willful, he really wants to make this world a better place! "
White Robe picked up the pills and left.
When he reached the door, he suddenly stopped. "I fight for my beliefs. If he needs me, I can risk my life at any time!"
After saying this, he walked out of the hall.
Inside the hall, Bai Dizi was silent.
At this moment, a middle-aged man appeared in front of Bai Dizi.
This person was Zhenwu!
In fact, he had been back for some time!
Bai Dizi said, "How is the investigation going?"
Zhenwu said in a deep voice, "The Dao Sect is targeting us. They have issued a wanted order. Anyone who kills a friend or relative of the Dao Master can obtain the contents of the eighth volume of the Dao Scripture.
And now, some mysterious experts have appeared in the Five-Dimensional Universe. The weakest of them is at the Consolidation Realm! "
Bai Dizi narrowed his eyes. "The Dao Sect!"
Zhenwu nodded. "I also know that they have begun to gather all the experts outside. They might be making a big move!"
Bai Dizi was silent.
Zhenwu looked at Bai Dizi. "What do you think?"
Bai Dizi said softly, "The Dao Master said he has something to do and needs to leave the Five-Dimensional Universe for a period of time … I think he definitely needs time right now. So, we have to fight for some time for him!"
Zhenwu asked, "How?"
After a moment of silence, Bai Dizi said, "The Dao Sect doesn't dare to make a move because they are afraid of the forces behind the Dao Master. In other words, Miss Tingyun and the white-robed woman have released the news.
They will say that the Dao Master has gone to find Miss Tingyun and the white-robed woman … This way, the forces in the dark will be afraid. As for the Dao Sect, if they want to make a move, they must consider Miss Tingyun and the white-robed woman. As long as they consider Miss Tingyun and the white-robed woman, they won't dare to make a move easily! "
Zhenwu nodded. "Okay!"
Bai Dizi said again, "One more thing. Contact Xuan City, the Gu Race, and the Nanyue Race. Tell them that we have invited them to the Five-Dimensional Universe as guests and that we will study the first to eighth volume of the Dao Scriptures together!"
Zhenwu hesitated for a moment and said, "Will they come?"
Bai Dizi said, "If I were them, I wouldn't refuse!
They need to kill one of us to obtain the contents of the eighth volume. But now, we don't need anything and will give it to them for free!
In any case, the contents of the first to eighth volume have already been leaked. Since that's the case, why don't we be more straightforward? "
Zhenwu spoke in a low voice, "I'll get it done right now!"
As soon as he finished speaking, he turned around and left.
Within the hall. Bai Dizi closed his eyes slowly ….
He was very worried at this moment.
The Dao Sect dared to target Ye Xuan even though they knew how formidable the white-robed woman and Situ Tingyun were. Obviously, the Dao Sect was confident!

Sky Oblivion Planet Zone.

He died with everlasting regret!

The black-robed man said in a trembling voice, "Senior …"

Chapter 1456
To Dao Sect!

Boom!
The person who spoke immediately exploded!
His soul was destroyed!
The remaining two were petrified in place!

Beside Ye Ling, the black-clothed man's body began to tremble.
What kind of monster was this?
Dao Sect!

It was like killing a chicken!

Was this senior in front of him too strong, or was he too weak?

Ye Xuan!

Angry!
Extremely angry!

Dao scriptures!
All the cultivation methods in the universe, including all the divine abilities and innate martial arts, originated from the Daoist scriptures!

On this day, a woman and a man in black arrived at the Dao Domain.
The woman was none other than Ye Ling!

The black-clothed man turned and ran!

All the Dao Domain experts were alarmed!
Who was it?

The man was Dao Brother Four!
Dao Brother Four looked at Ye Ling. "It's Ye Xuan's sister, Ye Ling!"
Ye Ling was expressionless. In the next moment, she slapped him.
In the distance, Dao Brother Four's pupils suddenly shrank, and he punched out!
Dao Fist!
With this punch, the starry sky in front of him immediately became illusory. At the same time, a gust of
At the same time, a powerful force that could destroy heaven and earth swept towards Ye Ling. However, before the force of this punch could get close to Ye Ling, it disappeared without a trace!

Seeing this scene, the expressions of the surrounding Daoist Gate experts changed!
In this confrontation, Dao Brother Four was at a disadvantage?
Ye Ling walked towards Dao Brother Four. "Aren't you looking for his sister?
I'm here now! "
Dao Brother Four looked at Ye Ling with an extremely solemn expression.
Ye Ling suddenly punched out!
Dao Brother Four's pupils suddenly shrank, and he blocked with his arm.
Boom!
The space where Dao Brother Four was directly shattered, and Dao Brother Four himself retreated tens of thousands of feet away!
However, he did not die. He was only injured because he had also cultivated a Daoist Body!
Moreover, he had cultivated a Daoist Body to the Consolidation Realm!
Dao Brother Four looked at Ye Ling, and he slowly clenched his right hand. In the next moment, he suddenly leaped up, and then he clenched his right hand tightly, and a flame gushed out from the palm of his hand!
Fen Tian Jue!
Dao Brother Four suddenly slapped his palm down towards Ye Ling!
Boom!
A giant flaming palm swept down from the starry sky, and wherever the palm passed, the space was annihilated inch by inch. It was extremely terrifying!
In the distance, Ye Ling was expressionless. She opened her palm, and a dim light shot up into the sky.
Under everyone's gaze, the dim light directly shattered Dao Brother Four's palm. In the next moment, the dim light shot straight towards Dao Brother Four!
In the sky, Dao Brother Four's pupils suddenly shrank, and he suddenly blocked with his arms.
Boom!
Dao Brother Four instantly retreated tens of thousands of feet, and when he stopped, his physical body directly cracked!
Ye Ling's attack directly cracked his physical body!
In the distance, Ye Ling glanced at her right hand. Her right hand had already cracked!
Ye Ling shook her head. "Ling 'er, this physical body is too weak!
It can't even withstand 10% of my strength!
However, it's enough! "
As she spoke, she looked at Dao Brother Four in the distance, and in the next moment, she directly slapped him!
Slap!
With a crisp slap, Dao Brother Four was directly sent flying, and this time, he flew for tens of thousands of feet!
After slapping Dao Brother Four, Ye Ling did not stop. She directly disappeared on the spot, and when she reappeared, she was already in front of Dao Brother Four. Dao Brother Four's expression changed greatly. He was about to attack again, but Ye Ling suddenly slapped him again.
Slap!
A dim light directly slapped Dao Brother Four's face.
Boom!
Dao Brother Four was blasted flying again. Moreover, his Dao Body directly cracked open, and blood sprayed out.
Ye Ling gazed at Dao Brother Four who was blasted flying, and she was about to attack again. Meanwhile, over a dozen formidable auras swept over from behind her!
Ye Ling suddenly turned around and suddenly smashed her fist forward!
Bang!
At this moment, the starry sky in an area of over 100km in front of Ye Ling collapsed, and those extraordinary experts from the Daoist Sect were directly wiped out!
Ye Ling turned around to look at Dao Brother Four. She was just about to attack, but she frowned when she clenched her right hand. She looked at her right hand, and her right hand was covered in cracks!
Ye Ling remained silent.
This physical body was quite weak, and it was utterly unable to withstand too much of her strength!
Meanwhile, Dao Brother Four suddenly spoke ferociously, "Who the hell is it!?"
Ye Ling looked at Dao Brother Four, and in the next moment, she directly vanished on the spot. In the distance, Dao Brother Four's pupils constricted, and he was just about to attack when a hand had clamped down on his throat.
It was Ye Ling's hand!
At the same time, a ray of dim light enveloped Dao Brother Four!
The dim light forcefully suppressed all of Dao Brother Four's strength!
Ye Ling gazed at Dao Brother Four with an icy cold expression, "Does the enmity between Ye Xuan and the Daoist Sect have anything to do with his younger sister?
Does it? "
As she spoke, she suddenly clenched her fist.
Bang!
Dao Brother Four's body collapsed, but his soul transformed into a wisp of green smoke that drifted 30km away!
Dao Brother Four stared fixedly at Ye Ling, "Sacrifice the formation!"
As soon as he spoke, a ray of black light suddenly shot into the sky from the depths of the Dao Domain. As soon as the ray of white light appeared, strange and mysterious talismans suddenly appeared around Ye Ling, and the ray of white light directly locked onto Ye Ling!
Ye Ling smashed her fist forward!
A ray of dim light instantly swept through the starry sky!
Bang!
The mysterious talismans were obliterated inch by inch!
At this moment, streams of light suddenly erupted from the ray of white light, and these streams of light were like shooting stars that drowned Ye Ling.
Below, Ye Ling was about to attack when she suddenly frowned. Because at this moment, her face had turned slightly pale!
Her physical body was unable to support her any further attacks!
Ye Ling fell silent for a moment, and then she smashed her right fist forward!
Bang!
Those streams of light collapsed inch by inch, and the white light array was also shattered by her punch in an instant!
Ye Ling didn't attack again. She looked at Dao Brother Four, "If you dare to cause trouble for his younger sister again, I'll destroy the Daoist Sect."
As soon as she finished speaking, she turned around and left.
Actually, she could destroy the Daoist Sect now, but the price she would pay would be huge!
Because Ye Ling's physical body couldn't bear it!
Dao Brother Four's expression was extremely gloomy when he saw Ye Ling turn around and leave.
Humiliation!
This woman came to the Daoist Sect to kill someone, shattered his Daoist body, and then left swiftly!
The Daoist Sect had never suffered such humiliation!
However, there was nothing he could do!
With his own strength, he couldn't do anything to this woman at all!
And the Consolidation Realm experts of the Daoist Sect were probably not enough in front of this woman!
He could only watch as the woman left!
Of course, at this moment, he was still thinking about a question. How strong was this woman?
He could clearly feel that this woman hadn't displayed her full strength!
At this moment, Ye Ling suddenly stopped in the distance. Seeing this scene, Dao Brother Four's expression changed!
What was this woman trying to do?
After Ye Ling stopped, she turned to look at Dao Brother Four, "He still has a younger sister. If you really want to take revenge on him, you can go find his other sister!
That sister likes to wear a plain dress, and the world calls her Tianming. You can go find her!
Really! "
Dao Brother Four looked at Ye Ling, "What do you mean?"
Ye Ling said, "Don't you like to find his younger sister?
I'll introduce you to his younger sister!
That sister is weaker, you can go find her! "
Dao Brother Four narrowed his eyes, "Are you saying that the woman in the plain dress is weaker?"
Ye Ling nodded, "Among all the people behind him, Tianming is the weakest!"
Dao Brother Four looked at Ye Ling, "Why are you telling us this!"
Ye Ling was expressionless, "Because I don't like that woman!"
After saying that, she turned and left.
Dao Brother Four suddenly asked, "Is that Tianming really the weakest?"
Ye Ling turned to look at Dao Brother Four, "Do you think I'm above lying?"
After saying that, she turned into a dim light and disappeared at the end of the sky.
Dao Brother Four was silent.
Tianming!
The weakest among all the people behind Ye Xuan!
At this time, an old man appeared beside Dao Brother Four, the old man said in a deep voice, "This woman's words …"
Dao Brother Four looked at the dim light in the distant sky and said softly, "Such a strong person must not be above lying because she has her pride, so I believe what she said!
Perhaps, that woman in the plain dress is our breakthrough … "
.....
