Chapter 1470
Who is it?
At this moment, all the experts in the surroundings were looking up at the starry sky. That aura was so formidable that it shocked them.
Under everyone's gazes, the space in the sky suddenly split open. In the next moment, a middle aged man walked out from within the space that had split open.
The middle aged man wore a grey robe with wide sleeves, and his hands were hidden within them. He seemed like a scholar, quiet, and refined.
Ye Xuan frowned slightly because he didn't recognize the middle aged man!
Suddenly, a voice resounded in Ye Xuan's mind. "Wu Li, the Martial Emperor!"
It was Lan Ruo's voice!
The Martial Emperor!
Ye Xuan's eyes narrowed slightly when he heard this. He knew who it was!
It was that big shot who imprisoned Jia Long and the others!
Ye Xuan was quite puzzled. Why has he made an appearance at this moment?
Wu Li looked down at Ye Xuan and said, "Where's that woman?"
Jia Lou!
Ye Xuan was about to speak when Jia Lou appeared by Ye Xuan's side. At this moment, Jia Lou had attained the peak of the Dao Attainment Realm under the full support of the Fifth Dimension. It could be said that she was only a little bit away from attaining the Union Realm!
Jia Lou stared Wu Li in the eyes without a trace of fear. Conversely, her eyes were filled with killing intent. It could be said that it was like the eyes of an enemy that had met.
Meanwhile, Wu Li suddenly slapped his palm down.
The space in the sky above Jia Lou collapsed!
At practically the exact same moment, Jia Lou smashed her fist forward!
She was going head-on against it!
She had no choice but to go head-on against it because Wu Li's punch had sealed off the space around her!
Rumble!
Along with a deafening explosion, the space where Jia Lou stood collapsed, and she was instantly pushed back thousands of meters. As soon as she stopped moving, the dragon scales on her body cracked inch by inch. Not only that, but even her Dao Body shattered at this moment.
Everyone in the surroundings was shocked when they witnessed this scene!
Right at this moment, Wu Li smashed his fist forward again!
Hiss!
The space in front of Jia Lou collapsed, and a fist mark flashed out, heading straight for Jia Lou. The powerful fist force was like a tsunami, directly crushing the space in front of Jia Lou and deforming it.
Jialou's pupils constricted. She couldn't block this punch!
Jialou did not close her eyes. Even at this moment, there was no fear in her eyes!
Right at this moment, a ray of sword light suddenly slashed down.
Boom!
The fist mark was forced to a stop by the sword light, but the next moment, the sword light shattered, and the fist mark broke through the air.
Meanwhile, Ye Xuan appeared in front of Jia Lou, and a trace of ferocity flashed through his eyes as he slashed with his sword!
He directly used the power of his bloodline and the power of the Unparalleled Sword.
Boom!
As soon as the sword descended, the fist collapsed, and Ye Xuan and Jia Lou were instantly blasted back over 3km!
After stopping, Ye Xuan's entire right hand trembled slightly.
In the sky, Wu Li looked at Ye Xuan. "Do you think that I don't dare to kill you?"
Ye Xuan looked Wu Li in the eyes, "I promised a senior from the Jia Dragon Clan that I would take care of Miss Jia Lou. I, Ye Xuan, keep my word!"
Wu Li nodded, "I know that you have many powerful backers, but …."
Ye Xuan suddenly said, "I'll fight you one on one!"
One on one!
Wu Li's eyes narrowed slightly, "Fight me one on one?"
Ye Xuan looked Wu Li in the eyes, "I don't know what enmity you have with the Jia Dragons, and I don't want to know!
I'll fight you one on one, and I, Ye Xuan, will take over the enmity between you and the Jia Dragons. "
A trace of gratification flashed through the eyes of the mysterious woman in the clouds, and she smiled, "At least he's responsible. He didn't bring shame to his parents!"
Nian Nian gazed into the distance in silence.
In the distance, behind Ye Xuan, Jia Lou tugged on Ye Xuan's sleeve and shook her head.
Ye Xuan smiled, "I promised your grandfather that I would protect you!
I keep my word! "
Then
Jia Lou looked at Ye Xuan, "This enmity is between me, Jia Lou, and him!"
Ye Xuan said, "The Jia Dragons have been kind to me."
Jia Lou said in a low voice, "He's very strong!"
Ye Xuan smiled, "One can't be ungrateful!"
As he spoke, he raised his head to look at Wu Li, "What do you think?"
Wu Li looked at Ye Xuan, "It's not fair for you to fight me one on one!"
Ye Xuan said, "Then lower your realm and fight me!"
The crowd, "…."
In the clouds, the mysterious woman suddenly laughed, "This little fellow is really interesting!
This Wu Li is really unlucky to have encountered such a thick-skinned fellow! "
In the distance, Wu Li looked at Ye Xuan, "What if I don't lower my realm?"
Ye Xuan smiled, "Then I'll challenge someone of a higher realm. It's not shameful if I lose, and it's a huge profit if I win!"
Everyone had a strange expression on their faces. Needless to say, this was indeed the case.
Wu Li slowly walked towards Ye Xuan. With every step he took, his aura became weaker. When he was several dozen feet away from Ye Xuan, his realm had already been suppressed to the Consolidation Realm!
Wu Li looked at Ye Xuan, "Suppressing to the Consolidation Realm is my limit!"
Ye Xuan smiled, "That's enough!"
As his voice fell, he suddenly raised his sword and rushed forward. In front of Wu Li, the space was suddenly torn apart, and a ray of sword light appeared!
Wu Li slightly leaned to the side, and a sword passed right between his eyebrows. At this time, his right hand suddenly swept out.
Bang!
A ray of sword light shattered, and Ye Xuan instantly retreated thousands of feet!
The moment he stopped, the flesh in front of his chest split open, and blood flowed out!
Seeing this scene, the expressions of many experts in the Fifth Dimension sank.
Ye Xuan looked at his chest, and his expression gradually became solemn!
This Martial Emperor's moves were very simple, speed and power!
In terms of speed and power, he was suppressed!
At this time, Wu Li took a step forward, and with this step, a fist imprint suddenly appeared in front of Ye Xuan!
Ye Xuan was already prepared, and he raised his sword and slashed.
Bang!
The space where Ye Xuan was directly collapsed, and his entire body was sent several thousand feet back!
Before he could stop, Wu Li took another step forward, and with each step, he threw a punch!
It was a very simple punch!
At this time, in the distance, Ye Xuan suddenly stomped his right foot. In the next instant, he gripped his sword with both hands and fiercely slashed forward. The moment his sword fell, four kinds of domains directly enveloped Wu Li.
Bang!
Within the domains, the fist imprint directly shattered, and Wu Li retreated several dozen feet.
Seeing this scene, the experts of the Fifth Dimension immediately breathed a sigh of relief. It was good that there was still a fight!
In the distance, Wu Li looked at Ye Xuan. "Four kinds of domains!"
Ye Xuan nodded.
Wu Li said in a light voice, "I'm slightly surprised!"
As he spoke, he took another step forward.
Bang!
The space in front of Ye Xuan suddenly collapsed, and in the next moment, an afterimage flashed by. The strength of this afterimage was so strong that even four kinds of domains found it difficult to suppress it!
Right at this moment, Ye Xuan slowly closed his eyes, and in the next moment, he suddenly slashed down with his sword.
As this sword descended, Wu Li's pupils suddenly constricted, and he changed from offense to defense. He raised his right arm horizontally to block.
Bang!
Under the gazes of everyone, Wu Li retreated explosively by several hundred feet!
Everyone in the surroundings was stunned when they witnessed this scene!
What kind of power is this?
In the distance, Bai Dizi was slightly excited. He knew what kind of power this was!
The Power of Faith!
This was the Power of Faith of all the living beings in the Fifth Dimension!
And now, Ye Xuan was using this Power of Faith!
The purest Power of Faith!
At this moment, Ye Xuan wasn't alone!
He represented everyone who believed in him!
"The Power of Faith!"
Above the clouds, the mysterious woman.
She said in a light voice, "Very pure Power of Faith."
Behind her, the Divine Lord's expression was extremely gloomy.
Nian Nian looked into the distance and still didn't speak, but there was a trace of gratification in her eyes!
She knew that the reason Ye Xuan was able to possess such pure Power of Faith was because the living beings in the Fifth Dimension trusted him. In other words, Ye Xuan was sufficiently good to all the living beings in the Fifth Dimension!
In the distance, Wu Li looked at Ye Xuan. "The Power of Faith!"
Ye Xuan grinned. "Take another strike from me!"
As soon as he finished speaking, he took a step forward, twisted his wrist, and slashed down with his sword.
Hiss!
A ray of sword light tore through the sky!
In the distance, Wu Li suddenly clenched his right hand, and then he smashed his fist forward!
Bang!
The space where his fist descended directly transformed into a vortex, and a powerful force poured out like a torrent.
At this moment, the heavens and earth shook and split!
Rumble!
As soon as the two powerful forces came into contact, it was like a volcanic eruption. The powerful force swept across the entire world, and the expressions of the surrounding Consolidation Realm experts changed drastically, and they all retreated!
Below, a huge light screen suddenly rose from the Dao City.
A protective shield!
This was a protective shield built by the Xuanji Sect with all their might. It was to prevent the powerful forces from entering the Fifth Dimension and causing a devastating blow to the Fifth Dimension!
The remaining power was completely blocked by the protective barrier. However, the entire protective barrier was also shattered.
In the sky, Wu Li retreated more than three hundred feet, but Ye Xuan didn't even take a step back!
At this time, Ye Xuan not only had the blessing of four kinds of domains, but also the Power of Faith of the Fifth Dimension. His current strength had exceeded the scope of the Consolidation Realm!
Wu Li looked at Ye Xuan. He knew that if he didn't restore his realm, with his current strength, he wouldn't be able to do anything to Ye Xuan.
He had underestimated this young man in front of him!
Ye Xuan suddenly said, "Your Excellency Martial Emperor, today, I, Ye Xuan, took advantage of you, and this is quite unfair to you. How about this, in a year, let's fight again. At that time, you don't have to suppress your realm!"
Fight more!
Wu Li looked at Ye Xuan, "You want to delay for a year!"
Ye Xuan nodded, "Yes!"
Wu Li's expression was calm, "Do you really have to interfere in the affairs of the Naga Dragon Clan?"
Ye Xuan said, "I have to repay the kindness of others!"
Wu Li stared at Ye Xuan and didn't speak.
Ye Xuan said again, "Just one year!
A year later, I, Ye Xuan, will fight you fairly. I can swear to the heavens that if there are people behind me, I won't let them interfere!
Do you think it's feasible? "
Wu Li slowly loosened his right hand, "A year later, life and death!"
A life and death!
Ye Xuan said, "Sure!"
Wu Li glanced at Jia Lou, "Your grandfather found a good person for you!"
With that, he turned and left.
After walking a few steps, he suddenly turned his head and looked at a certain place in the clouds, "Your Excellency, as you wish!"
With that, he quickly disappeared not far away.
Above the clouds, Nian Nian suddenly said, "Congratulations!"
The mysterious woman blinked, "What are you congratulating me for?"
Nian Nian looked at the mysterious woman, "If Wu Li wants to kill Jia Lou, he will need your help, because he will soon discover that his opponent will grow very quickly, so quickly that it will exceed his expectations.
At that time, even if he is unwilling, he can only ask for help from you!
And if he asks for help from you, then isn't the entire Ultimate Martial Realm in your pocket?
And with your intelligence, you should not be plotting just this. If I'm not wrong, the Ultimate Martial Realm is not simple!
What do you think? "
The mysterious woman looked at Nian Nian, and after a moment, she suddenly smiled and said, "If it wasn't for that kid below, I would be very willing to be friends with you, because you are too smart!
Unfortunately, we can only be enemies. "
Nian Nian took out a stick of tanghulu, "You made a move, now, it's my turn!"
The mysterious woman slightly raised the corner of her mouth, "Looking forward to it!"
.....







Chapter 1471
With Wu Li's departure, the entire Fifth Dimension completely calmed down!
There were no cheers.
Because the Fifth Dimension had also suffered heavy casualties!
In the sky, Ye Xuan looked up at the clouds in the sky. The next moment, he appeared directly above the clouds.
However, there was nothing here!
After a moment of silence, Ye Xuan turned around and left.
After returning to Dao City's Dao Hall, Nian Nian was sitting on the stone steps in front of the hall. She was holding a tanghulu in her hand.
Ye Xuan walked in front of Nian Nian. Nian Nian looked up at Ye Xuan. "Is it over?"
Ye Xuan smiled. "It's over for now!"
Nian Nian grinned. She took out a lively fish. "Grilled fish!"
Ye Xuan laughed. "Alright!"
As he spoke, he pulled Nian Nian into the hall.
Grilled fish!
The two sat next to each other. Nian Nian hugged Ye Xuan's arm and leaned her head against Ye Xuan's shoulder. There was a sweet smile on her face.
At this moment, Bai Dizi walked into the hall.
Looking at the White Emperor, Ye Xuan said with a smile, "Have a seat!"
Bai Dizi shook her head. "I'll just stand!"
Ye Xuan did not insist. "Let's talk!"
Bai Dizi hesitated for a moment. "Do you still have money?"
Hearing this, Ye Xuan was dumbfounded. He said in shock, "You ran out of money?"
Bai Dizi nodded. "I've basically spent all the money you gave me!"
Ye Xuan blinked. "All spent?
Three billion! "
Bai Dizi nodded slightly.
Ye Xuan was a little curious. "How did you spend it?"
He knew that Bai Dizi was usually not extravagant.
Bai Dizi said in a deep voice, "Those pills were basically given to the most outstanding people. As for these Fortune Divine Crystals, they have many uses!
Among them, I used one billion Fortune Divine Crystals to support the world below! "
Ye Xuan looked at Bai Dizi. "The world below?"
Bai Dizi said in a deep voice, "It's just some low-level worlds!
These worlds are very, very backward. Then, I used your name to establish a few martial arts academies in these backward worlds. The name of the academy is called Fifth Dimensional Academy, and you are the dean.
Those who meet certain requirements can enter the Martial Arts Academy for free … Based on preliminary estimates, we have already established more than a million Fifth Dimensional Academies. Moreover, we are still expanding … This expenditure is extremely large, but it is extremely meaningful! "
Ye Xuan said, "Tell me!"
Bai Dizi nodded. "There are two main reasons why the Five-Dimensional Universe is lagging behind other worlds. The first is the upper limit. What is the upper limit?
This is the martial arts civilization of our Five-Dimensional Universe!
Before there was the Dao Scripture, other than the Five-Dimensional Tendo, the ceiling of the Five-Dimensional Universe's Martial Dao was Release One, and it was a fake Release One.
But now, it is different. We have the Dao Scripture, and with the addition of the Whirling World, our current upper limit is no different from the Dao Sect!
But what about the lower limit?
Some of the worlds below the Five-Dimensional Universe are too backward!
Some of them are even in the Savage Era … My idea is very simple. We will establish Fifth Dimensional Academies in various places to give those backward worlds a chance to learn martial arts, and also give them a chance to change their destiny!
When there are more and more outstanding people, it will be much easier for us to change the entire Five-Dimensional Universe! "
After saying this, he paused, then continued, "Of course, there is also some selfishness!
I established the Fifth Dimensional Academy in your name. It can be said that as long as someone comes out of our academy, they will be your student. And these people will worship you like a god. The more students there are, the more power of belief you will have!
This is a win-win situation!
The most important thing is that we can also unearth more talents. Some people, it is not that they do not have the ability, it is not that they do not work hard, it is just that they do not have the opportunity, they do not have the platform. If we give them the opportunity and platform, they will not be worse than anyone else. "
Ye Xuan
Pondering.
Bai Dizi hesitated for a while, then said, "This matter is my own initiative, I …"
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "You think too much!
You have done very well!
I have to say, in terms of the overall situation, we are inferior to you!
As for the matter of money, I will think of a way! "
Bai Dizi nodded, "If you say so, then I can rest assured!
There is one more thing, and that is, I have collected the martial arts books of the Daoting and Saha World. These martial arts books and divine techniques, I have already ordered people to compile them. When the time comes, they will be stored in the various academies. As long as you meet the requirements, you will be able to cultivate.
However, for the time being, Dao scriptures, martial arts, and Dao scripture cultivation methods will be placed in our Dao City's Fifth Dimensional Academy. The Dao City's Fifth Dimensional Academy is the main academy. This place will be the holy land in the hearts of all the students of the Fifth Dimensional Academy. Everyone will strive to cultivate in order to come here!
Because only by coming here can you learn the legendary Dao scripture martial arts and Dao scripture mental cultivation methods!
The most important thing is, only by coming here can you see the mysterious Dean! "
Ye Xuan: "…"
Bai Dizi smiled faintly, "If you want to come here, it will be very, very difficult!
It can be said that among millions of people, only one person can come here, because we only recruit 30 people every year!
At that time, when the headquarters starts to recruit, you must personally come to take a look, you will definitely be shocked!
Because those who can come to the headquarters must be super evildoers!
Those kind of true super evildoers! "
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "I am looking forward to it!"
As he said this, he hesitated for a while, then said, "Everything you have done is very good, but, in terms of culture …"
Bai Dizi smiled and said, "Don't worry, all the academies cultivate both literature and martial arts!
Cultivating literature, which is also cultivating the mind, is equally important as cultivating martial arts! "
Ye Xuan nodded, "You have thought it through very thoroughly!"
As he said this, he looked at Nian Nian, who was beside him, "Nian Nian's contribution to the Five-Dimensional Universe being able to have what it is today is indispensable. Her contribution to the Five-Dimensional Universe should be known by everyone in the Five-Dimensional Universe."
Bai Dizi glanced at Nian Nian and nodded, "I know, in cultural classes, there is an article about a person's biography. Only people who have made great contributions to the Five-Dimensional Universe can be included in this article. Currently, there are only two people, one is Miss Nian Nian, and the other is you. Miss Nian Nian is ranked first, and you are ranked second!
In addition, we have also built Miss Nian Nian's memorial courtyards all over the world, which have detailed records of Miss Nian Nian's contributions to the Five-Dimensional Universe. "
Ye Xuan looked at Bai Dizi and said with a smile, "You are really thoughtful!"
Bai Dizi said softly, "Whether it is Miss Nian Nian or you, even if what you have done for the Five-Dimensional Universe is not praised by the world, it should not be forgotten by the world!"
In fact, the Five-Dimensional Universe was a burden to both Ye Xuan and Nian Nian!
As long as Mu Niannian gave up on the Five-Dimensional Universe, other than the three swords, she was almost invincible. To Nian Nian, without the Five-Dimensional Universe, she would be even stronger!
As if he had thought of something, Bai Dizi said, "One more thing, we have already formulated a law. As long as you nod your head, it can be implemented in the entire Five-Dimensional Universe."
As he said that, he took out a thick book and handed it to Ye Xuan.
Ye Xuan took it and glanced at it. A moment later, he looked at Bai Dizi, "Is this law only for the people at the bottom, or for everyone?"
Bai Dizi looked at Ye Xuan, "For everyone!
Including you!
Even you don't have the privilege! "
Ye Xuan nodded, "Then that's enough!"
After saying that, he handed the book to Bai Dizi.
Bai Dizi took the book and said, "Then I'll start implementing it!"
Ye Xuan nodded.
Bai Dizi retreated.
Ye Xuan handed the roasted fish to Nian Nian and said with a smile, "Eat!"
Nian Nian took the roasted fish and said with a smile, "I'm going out to play!"
After saying that, she picked up the roasted fish and left the hall.
Only Ye Xuan was left in the hall.
Ye Xuan sat cross-legged on the ground and spread his hands. Suddenly, a mysterious power appeared around him!
The power of faith!
He could feel that his power of faith was continuously becoming stronger.
This power of faith was very strong!
If not for this power of faith, he would not have been able to do anything to Wu Li.
However, he also understood that this power did not completely belong to him, Ye Xuan.
This was given to him by all living beings!
If one day, he went against the flow and the Five-Dimensional Universe collapsed, then this power of faith would disappear!
He could not rely too much on this power of faith!
As if thinking of something, Ye Xuan took out a scroll. This was the content and notes of the ninth volume of the Dao Scripture. It also contained the ninth volume of the Dao Scripture's mental cultivation method and Dao Scripture martial arts!
Life Fist!
The ninth volume of the Dao Scripture martial arts was Life Fist. When he saw the content of this Life Fist, Ye Xuan's expression suddenly changed!
What was Life Fist?
By burning one's lifespan as the price, one could obtain endless lifespan power!
Lifespan power!
This was the first time Ye Xuan heard of this power!
By burning one year of lifespan, one could obtain ten years of cultivation. By burning one hundred years, one could obtain a thousand years of cultivation. By burning one thousand years, one could obtain ten thousand years of cultivation … Not only that, when burning one's lifespan, one could also trigger one's own destiny power …
Ye Xuan closed the ancient book and could not calm down for a long time!
This thing could not be easily cultivated!
This Life Fist was extremely profound and mysterious. It also involved the power of destiny and some karma power. In any case, he did not understand it.
Most importantly, this thing needed to burn one's lifespan!
And he, Ye Xuan, did not have much lifespan left!
His current lifespan was less than a thousand years!
If he burned his lifespan, he was afraid that he would directly die!
Moreover, this Life Fist was not something he could cultivate just because he wanted to. It was extremely difficult. Not to mention, one of the difficulties was the physical body. His physical body must be at the Consolidation Realm before he could reluctantly cultivate it!
Reluctantly!
If his physical body was not strong enough, he would not be able to withstand the power obtained by burning his lifespan!
In addition, his Divine Soul must be strong enough …
It could be said that this Life Fist had very strict requirements for the cultivator.
Ye Xuan hesitated.
There was no doubt about the power of this Life Fist. Once it was cultivated, its power would not be any weaker than his Instant Kill Sword, or even stronger. Most importantly, he could combine both of them!
After burning his lifespan to obtain the power of life, he could use the Instant Kill Sword again …
In that case, it could be said that his strength and speed would reach a very terrifying level!
However, burning one's lifespan was really not a joke. Moreover, it could be addictive.
Because the more lifespan burned, the stronger the power!
There was no upper limit!
The moment of death was also the moment when he was at his strongest …
After a long time, Ye Xuan finally chose to cultivate it. However, in order to cultivate this Life Fist, he had to first improve his physical body to the Consolidation Realm …
And now, if he wanted to advance to the Consolidation Realm, he needed the Ancestral Dragon's blood, and the Ancestral Dragon's blood could only be obtained by Taoism!
Would Taoism give it to him?
Of course not!
As if thinking of something, Ye Xuan said softly, "This time, Taoism besieged my Five-Dimensional Universe … No matter what, they should compensate me for my mental damage …"
After saying that, he suddenly got up and left.
...
PS: New month, ask for a few guaranteed monthly tickets to save face!!
Otherwise, it would be too ugly!
fpzw







Chapter 1472
Dao Sect!
Somewhere in the hall, Third Lady was sitting cross-legged on the ground. In front of her was a long ruler.
Dao Gate Ruler!
Inside the hall, there were some Dao Sect experts!
At this moment, everyone's expression was somewhat ugly.
In this trip to the Fifth Dimension, Dao Sect could be said to have suffered a great defeat. This time, Dao Sect's losses were too heavy.
At this moment, Third Lady suddenly opened her eyes. The next moment, she disappeared.
In the sky outside the hall, Third Lady appeared in front of a man.
This man was Ye Xuan!
Seeing Third Lady, Ye Xuan was secretly on guard. This woman was not simple, he must be careful.
Third Lady looked at Ye Xuan, "What's the matter?"
Ye Xuan nodded.
Third Lady asked, "What's the matter?"
Ye Xuan thought for a moment, then said, "Your Dao Sect besieged me, causing indelible damage to my young mind. Shouldn't you compensate me for my mental damage?"
Third Lady looked at Ye Xuan, "Are you serious?"
Ye Xuan nodded.
Third Lady said, "You want the Ancestral Dragon's blood!"
Ye Xuan blinked, he was a little surprised, "How do you know?"
Third Lady said again, "You want to cultivate Life Fist!"
Ye Xuan, "…"
Third Lady asked again, "Are you sure you want to cultivate Life Fist?"
Ye Xuan nodded.
Third Young Lady said, "I have to remind you that even in our Taoism, only two people have practiced this Taoist scripture martial art."
Ye Xuan frowned, "Two people?"
Third Lady nodded, "Master and me!"
Ye Xuan blinked, "Third Lady has cultivated Life Fist?"
Third Lady looked at Ye Xuan, "Is there a problem?"
Ye Xuan hesitated, then said, "Is it powerful?"
Third Lady looked at Ye Xuan, "Do you want to try?"
Ye Xuan quickly shook his head. "No need!"
What a joke! He couldn't even defeat this woman without using her Life Punch. If she used her Life Punch, his Taoist body would probably be blasted into smithereens.
Third Young Lady said, "It's impossible for you to learn this Life Fist by yourself. In other words, you have to take a lot of detours!
Do you want me to teach you? "
Ye Xuan was stunned, and then he said, "You'll teach me?"
The Third Young Lady nodded. "If you want, I can teach you!"
Ye Xuan was puzzled. "Why?"
The Third Young Lady turned her head and looked into the distance. "Do you want to go for a walk?"
Ye Xuan thought about it and nodded. "Sure!"
Third Young Lady nodded and walked to the right. Ye Xuan followed her.
Not long after, the two of them arrived at the back of a mountain. There was a Xiao Dao at the back of the mountain, and at the end of the Xiao Dao was a cliff.
The two of them walked along the Xiao Dao.
Third Young Lady suddenly said, "Young Master Ye, the reason why my Second Senior Brother targeted you like a madman is because you have the Dao Scriptures. He's afraid that you'll collect all nine Dao Scriptures and threaten his position.
Of course, there's another reason. All these years, the Taoists have been used to being high and mighty!
He thinks that the Taoists are number one in the world, and no one can offend them.
Moreover, he's being used by someone! "
Ye Xuan frowned slightly. "Used by someone?"
Third Young Lady turned her head and looked at Young Master Ye. "Young Master Ye, you have a very powerful enemy. How powerful is he?
I think that if the other party wants to kill you, you won't be able to survive. However, I don't understand why the other party didn't kill you. Perhaps it's because he's afraid of the person behind you. "
Ye Xuan said in a deep voice, "Who is that person?"
Third Young Lady shook her head. "I don't know him, and I don't want to know him.
This is a matter between Young Master Ye and the other party. My Taoists doesn't want to interfere. "
Ye Xuan didn't say anything. He had some doubts in his heart. Who is this enemy?
Third Young Lady said again, "Young Master Ye, if you want to learn Life Fist, I can help you. I can even help you improve your physical body to the Consolidation Realm."
Ye Xuan looked at Third Young Lady. "What's the condition?"
Third Young Lady smiled slightly. "The grudge between the Fifth Dimension and the Taoists will be written off."
Ye Xuan was silent.
Third Young Lady continued, "Young Master Ye, your enemy isn't my Taoists, and my Taoists' enemy isn't you.
However, someone wants my Taoists to fight to the death with you, and then let you and my Taoists … Or rather, let you and Master form a bad relationship.
However, I feel that there's no need for us to become enemies. First, we don't have any conflict of interest. Second, we don't have any deep hatred. The reason for this situation, other than being used by others, is because my Second Senior Brother's IQ is limited.
And now, I'm in charge of the Taoists! "
Ye Xuan asked, "What about Second Brother?"
Third Young Lady said, "He has been imprisoned by me. He won't appear for at least a hundred years. And after a hundred years … If Young Master Ye hasn't fallen, I think Second Senior Brother shouldn't pose any threat to Young Master Ye. What do you think?"
Ye Xuan asked with a smile, "Can't you tell me who that mysterious person is?"
Third Young Lady said with a smile, "My Taoists can't afford to offend him!
Please forgive me, Young Master Ye! "
Ye Xuan was about to speak, but he found that he had already walked to the edge of the cliff. Under the cliff, clouds and mist lingered, making it unfathomable.
Third Young Lady gently pointed with her finger. The clouds and mist below suddenly separated. The next moment, Ye Xuan saw a behemoth!
Dragon!
To be precise, it was a dragon's head!
This dragon's head was at the bottom of the abyss. Its body followed the abyss for an unknown length.
The moment this dragon's head appeared, Ye Xuan suddenly felt an oppressive pressure!
Dragon's Might!
He had never felt such a strong Dragon's Might. Compared to this pressure, the Winged Dragon in Xuan City was simply child's play!
Ye Xuan said in a deep voice, "Ancestral Dragon!"
Third Young Lady nodded, "Only the Ancestral Dragon's blood can improve your current Dao Body!"
Ye Xuan looked at Third Young Lady, "This dragon has fallen?"
Third Young Lady nodded.
Ye Xuan was a little curious, "How did it fall?"
Third Young Lady said with a smile, "I don't know either!"
Ye Xuan was speechless.
Third Young Lady looked at the Ancestral Dragon below, "At that time, I was still young. I only know that after Master brought it back, it fell not long after.
As for the reason, Master never said!
After this dragon fell, Master guarded it for three months. Three months later, he left, and after that, there was no news of him. "
Saying that, she shook her head, "Young Master Ye, my Dao Faction has no intention of becoming enemies with you. My Dao Faction can't afford to offend you. Now that I am in charge of the Dao Faction, I want to settle the grudge between us with Young Master Ye!"
Ye Xuan said softly, "Third Young Lady, aren't you afraid that I will summon the Great Dao Spirit and threaten your position?"
Third Young Lady chuckled, "If that's the case, I can't wait to be happy!"
Ye Xuan was a little curious, "Why?"
Third Young Lady looked at Ye Xuan, "If you really get the recognition of the Great Dao Spirit, it means that you are the person appointed by Master, and you will also be a part of my Dao Faction. With a genius like you joining, I naturally should be happy.
As for the Dao Faction's Master … To put it bluntly, what's the use of that position?
Second Senior Brother spent a lot of effort to fight for the position. As long as I want to, I can take it back at any time! "
Saying that, she shook her head, "Second Senior Brother doesn't understand the principle that strength is the king. Whatever position, it's all empty."
Ye Xuan looked at Third Young Lady, "If I really get the recognition of the Great Dao Spirit, are you really willing to let me be the Dao Faction's Master?"
Third Young Lady nodded, "Yes."
Ye Xuan said, "Without the recognition of the Great Dao Spirit?"
Third Young Lady smiled, "No!"
Ye Xuan was a little puzzled, "Why?"
Third Young Lady smiled slightly, "If you have the recognition of the Great Dao Spirit, it means that you have obtained Master's recognition. Since you have obtained Master's recognition, Dao Faction should naturally share honor and disgrace with you, live and die together!
However, if you don't get the recognition of the Great Dao Spirit, it means that you have not obtained Master's recognition … In this case, I naturally can't use the entire Dao Faction's future to help you.
Moreover, you can't take the initiative to join Dao Faction, right? "
Ye Xuan said with a smile, "I see!
The Dao Faction's ancestor's opinion is the most important! "
Third Young Lady nodded, "Just like Second Senior Brother, although I also want to kill him, he is Master's disciple after all. Even if I don't give face to a monk, I still have to give face to Buddha, so I can't be too ruthless.
However, Young Master Ye can rest assured that from now on, he will not appear in front of Young Master Ye again.
This, I can guarantee. "
Ye Xuan looked at the Ancestor Dragon below and was silent.
In fact, he was very clear that the reason why Third Young Lady was so humble was not because of Ye Xuan, but because she was afraid of the person behind him. Moreover, she did not want to be used by others!
Third Young Lady looked down and was also silent.
She wanted to resolve the grievances between the Five-Dimensional Universe and Dao Faction because Dao Faction really had no reason to fight with Ye Xuan. Moreover, Ye Xuan being able to gather all nine Dao Scriptures was very abnormal. In her opinion, it was very likely that Ye Xuan was the person chosen by her Master!
However, she was not sure because the Great Dao Spirit had run away!
At this moment, Ye Xuan suddenly smiled and said, "Third Young Lady, let's talk about Life Fist!"
Third Young Lady glanced at Ye Xuan and said with a smile, "Let's talk about Dao Body first!
Young Master Ye's Dao Body cultivation is indeed very good, but his realm is a bit low. For Young Master Ye, the Dao Body of Achieved Dao Realm should be somewhat insufficient! "
As she said this, she looked down and said, "Young Master Ye's bloodline is overbearing. It is enough to absorb the Ancestor Dragon's blood, so it should not be a big problem for him to improve!
Also, this Ancestor Dragon's Scale Armor is extremely hard. I can give Young Master Ye a few pieces and let Young Master Ye forge them into treasured armor. This way, except for some mysterious experts, it should be impossible for ordinary people to kill Young Master Ye! "
Ye Xuan looked at Third Young Lady, "Mysterious experts?"
Third Young Lady nodded, "For example … the white-robed woman behind Young Master Ye!"
Ye Xuan said with a smile, "Why don't you use a different analogy?"
Third Young Lady smiled slightly, "It can't be helped. I'm weak and can't afford to offend others. Please forgive me, Young Master Ye!"
Ye Xuan smiled, then looked down and narrowed his eyes. Who was it that made Third Young Lady so afraid?
Who was it that wanted to mess with him?
At this moment, Third Young Lady suddenly said, "Young Master Ye, let's go down!"
Ye Xuan collected his thoughts and nodded, "Okay!"
Soon, the two of them walked towards the bottom of the abyss.
...
Somewhere in the starry sky, a little girl walked slowly. The little girl held a skewer of tanghulu in her left hand and a grilled fish in her right.
This little girl was Nian Nian!
After walking for an unknown period of time, the starry sky in front of Nian Nian suddenly shook violently and a voice came from it, "The three-dimensional universe does not welcome outsiders. Leave immediately!"
Nian Nian looked at the space in front of her, "Ye Xuan!"
After a moment of silence, that expanse of space suddenly split open, and then a woman walked out from within.
The woman was dressed in a white dress and held a halberd in her hand. Her expression was indifferent.
.....







Chapter 1473
Seeing this woman, Nian Nian's eyes flashed with surprise.
This woman is so strong!
This was her first impression!
The woman looked at Nian Nian, "Ye Xuan?"
Nian Nian nodded.
The woman asked, "Who are you!"
Nian Nian smiled, "Let me tell you slowly!"
...
On the other side, Ultimate Martial Realm.
On a certain mountain peak, Wu Li suddenly opened his eyes. Not far in front of him, stood a woman.
It was the mysterious woman from the Sacred Land!
Wu Li looked at the mysterious woman, "You want me to kill Ye Xuan!"
The mysterious woman shook her head and smiled, "No!
You can't kill him! "
Wu Li frowned, "The person behind him?"
The mysterious woman nodded and smiled, "Do you see the woman who stood with me that day?"
Wu Li was silent.
The mysterious woman said, "That's the Fifth Dimension Tendo!"
Wu Li said, "I know!"
The mysterious woman smiled, "The reason why you agreed to Ye Xuan's one year appointment is mainly because of her. Because you know, with her around, you can't kill Ye Xuan, right?"
Wu Li looked at the mysterious woman, "What are you trying to do!"
The mysterious woman smiled, "How confident do you think you are after one year?"
Wu Li was silent.
How confident?
In fact, he really wasn't confident!
His current realm was crushing Ye Xuan, but Ye Xuan's combat power wasn't weak at all. Moreover, Ye Xuan's growth speed was too fast!
One year later, was he really confident?
At this moment, the mysterious woman suddenly smiled, "Do you want to know what realm is above the God Realm?"
Wu Li's pupils suddenly shrank, he looked at the mysterious woman, "Who are you!"
The mysterious woman smiled, "I can't answer this question!"
Wu Li said in a deep voice, "Sir, with your strength, if you want to kill Ye Xuan, it should be a piece of cake!
Why do you want me to do it? "
The mysterious woman shook her head, "Not yet!"
Wu Li frowned. "Why?"
The mysterious woman smiled and said, "Because that woman is still quite close to here. I need her to speed up, or rather, I need his Disaster Cause to speed up … Because there are too many people helping him now, his Disaster Cause's progress is a bit slow."
Wu Li stared at the mysterious woman. "You don't dare to kill him openly!"
The mysterious woman smiled and said, "That's not something you should worry about!
This time, I came to ask you a question. Are you willing to let go of Jia Lou of the Jia Long tribe?
If you are willing to let go of this hatred, I will never come looking for you again!
If you're not willing, we can work together. "
Wu Li was silent.
The mysterious woman smiled, "It seems that you are unwilling to let go of your hatred!"
As she spoke, she tapped with her finger, and an ancient scroll appeared before Wu Li. "This scroll can allow you to advance a step further!"
With that, she turned around and left.
Wu Li remained silent on the spot. A moment later, he opened the ancient book, and his expression gradually turned solemn. In the end, the solemn look in his eyes gradually turned into excitement …
...
In the horizon, the mysterious woman walked towards the distance, and behind her was the Sacred Master.
The Sacred Master hesitated for a moment, and then said, "Master, you want to nurture this Wu Li and let him fight against Ye Xuan?"
The mysterious woman shook her head and smiled. "I'm not interested in him, but the Ultimate Martial Realm!"
Ultimate Martial Realm!
The Sacred Master was silent!
To the entire Ultimate Martial Realm, even the Sacred Master didn't know much!
Even the Sacred Master didn't know much about it!
He only knew that the Ultimate Martial Realm had produced six Martial Emperors!
After the Dao Sect's ancestor disappeared, the Ultimate Martial Realm instantly became the number one power, but the Sacred Master didn't know anything about the situation inside the Ultimate Martial Realm!
The Ultimate Martial Realm wasn't open to the outside world, and outsiders couldn't enter at all. This place was actually very mysterious!
The mysterious woman turned around and glanced in the direction of the Ultimate Martial Realm, and said with a smile, "This place isn't simple!"
With that, she withdrew her gaze. "Let's go meet some old fellows!"
As she spoke, she walked towards the distance.
Before long, the two of them disappeared into the distant horizon.
...
Dao Sect.
Ye Xuan and the Third Young Lady arrived at the bottom of the abyss. Needless to say, Ye Xuan was shocked by the abyss!
To be more precise, he was shocked by the Ancestral Dragon!
The abyss was truly bottomless, and they still hadn't reached the bottom after descending for almost 150km. Ye Xuan still didn't know exactly how big the Ancestral Dragon was, because when he looked down from his position, the abyss was at least tens of thousands of km long.
Right at this moment, the Third Young Lady suddenly stopped, and then she looked at the Ancestral Dragon and bowed slightly. "Sorry for the offense!"
As she spoke, she pressed her fingers together and lightly swiped, and then a part of the Ancestral Dragon that didn't have scales split open and blood sprayed out.
The Third Young Lady gestured with her right hand, and all the blood fell into a white gourd in her hand.
The Ancestral Dragon's blood!
Ye Xuan was slightly excited as he looked at the white gourd.
He could sense how formidable the Ancestral Dragon's blood was, and it could be said that the Dark City's Winged Dragon couldn't compare to this enormous dragon at all.
Meanwhile, the Third Young Lady suddenly put away the gourd, and then she passed it to Ye Xuan. "Let's begin!"
Ye Xuan hesitated for a moment, and then he asked. "Is this enough?"
The Third Young Lady smiled. "If it's not enough, then we can take more!
In any case, it's convenient! "
Ye Xuan nodded, and then he took the gourd. He opened it, and a wave of heat assaulted his face!
The Ancestral Dragon's blood was red like lava!
Ye Xuan looked at the Third Young Lady. "Are we going to swallow it just like that?"
The Third Young Lady nodded. "Yes!"
Ye Xuan hesitated for a moment, and then he asked. "Will it be dangerous?"
The Third Young Lady sized up Ye Xuan and said, "Your body should be able to endure it!"
Ye Xuan thought for a moment, and then he nodded. "Alright!"
As he spoke, he directly drank the Ancestral Dragon's blood!
Bang!
As soon as the blood entered his body, Ye Xuan's clothes were instantly transformed into ash. At the same time, his entire body actually started burning!
The Third Young Lady sized up Ye Xuan's body, and then she said, "Use the energy of your bloodline to suppress it!"
Ye Xuan hurriedly activated the energy of his bloodline. As soon as he did, the energy of the Ancestral Dragon's blood was instantly suppressed!
Ye Xuan instantly heaved a sigh of relief when he witnessed this scene.
If the energy of his bloodline wasn't able to suppress the Ancestral Dragon's blood, then he might be finished!
Because he felt like his body was on the verge of being incinerated when the Ancestral Dragon's blood entered his body!
The Ancestral Dragon's blood was too domineering!
Even his Dao Physique was unable to endure it!
Fortunately, the energy of his bloodline was able to suppress the Ancestral Dragon's blood. Otherwise, his current Dao Physique would really not dare to absorb the Ancestral Dragon's blood!
Suddenly, the Third Young Lady said, "Start absorbing the Ancestral Dragon's blood!"
Ye Xuan nodded. He sat cross-legged on the ground and started to absorb the Ancestral Dragon's blood.
The Third Young Lady ceaselessly sized Ye Xuan up, and it didn't take long for her gaze to descend onto a certain spot on Ye Xuan's body.
She shook her head. "Isn't that part of yours too ugly!
What's the use of it? "
Ye Xuan was speechless.
It didn't take long for Ye Xuan to feel that the Ancestral Dragon's blood within his body had been completely absorbed. However, his body still hadn't changed at all!
Ye Xuan opened his eyes and gazed at the Third Young Lady. The latter fell silent for a moment before she went to get another gourd of Ancestral Dragon's blood and passed it to Ye Xuan.
Ye Xuan didn't hold back, and he picked up the gourd and gulped it down.
As soon as the gourd of Ancestral Dragon's blood entered his body, the formidable energy of Dragon Blood started to spread throughout Ye Xuan's body. Ye Xuan hurriedly utilized the energy of his bloodline to suppress it ….
About an hour later, Ye Xuan opened his eyes again and gazed at the Third Young Lady.
The Ancestral Dragon's blood had been completely absorbed by him again!
However, his body still hadn't changed much!
The Third Young Lady frowned. "How can you eat so much?"
Ye Xuan smiled bitterly. "I don't know either!"
As he spoke, he glanced at the huge Ancestral Dragon not far away. "Then, Third Young Lady, can you let me absorb more?
Look at this dragon, it's huge! "
The Third Young Lady glared at Ye Xuan. "This Dragon's blood is very precious!"
Ye Xuan smiled bitterly. "I know, but I don't think it's of much use for you to let me absorb so little!
Look at me, my body hasn't changed at all! "
The Third Young Lady thought for a moment and said, "Just you wait!"
As she spoke, she turned and left!
After the Third Young Lady left, Ye Xuan's gaze fell on the Ancestral Dragon, and his eyes lit up.
This Ancestral Dragon's entire body was a treasure!
Moreover, it was a priceless treasure!
At this moment, the Third Young Lady took out a large wooden bucket filled with Dragon's blood.
The Third Young Lady looked at Ye Xuan. "Drink it!"
Ye Xuan blinked his eyes. "So much!"
The Third Young Lady said plainly, "I want to see how much you can absorb!"
Ye Xuan smiled. He directly picked up the wooden bucket and drank it. As the Dragon's blood entered Ye Xuan's body, Ye Xuan's body gradually started to become red hot like iron …
There was finally a change!
The Third Young Lady heaved a sigh of relief. After all, the Ancestral Dragon's blood was very precious. One must know that there was only one Ancestral Dragon. Its blood would decrease every time it was used, and it couldn't be regenerated!
Under such circumstances, its blood was even more precious!
Not to mention Ye Xuan, even the internal members of Taoism would find it difficult to obtain the Ancestral Dragon's blood.
At this moment, a powerful aura suddenly emanated from Ye Xuan's body. At the same time, his body directly burned!
Ye Xuan was shocked. He hurriedly activated the power of the bloodline in his body to suppress it!
The Third Young Lady suddenly said, "Don't just suppress it. Remember to absorb it!
Also, circulate the Dao Scripture's mental cultivation method. Let that mental cultivation method assist your bloodline power. "
Ye Xuan nodded and hurriedly circulated the Dao Scripture's mental cultivation method … Just like that, the Ancestral Dragon's blood in his body gradually calmed down and was absorbed by his body bit by bit. His body was also slowly changing …
The Third Young Lady just looked at Ye Xuan. No one knew what she was thinking.
...
Three-dimensional universe.
The woman in the white dress and Nian Nian walked slowly. After a long time, Nian Nian turned to look at the woman in the white dress. "This is it!"
The woman in the white dress was silent for a moment. She slowly closed her eyes. "I know who that woman is!"
Nian Nian was a little curious. "Who?"
The woman in the white dress opened her eyes and whispered, "If it's really her, then he's in danger!"
.....
