Chapter 1486
Aunty!
The Beast King stared at the mysterious woman. "We are going to help your nephew!"
The mysterious woman smiled. "No need."
The Beast King said after a moment of silence: "You want him dead!"
A trace of surprise flashed in the mysterious woman's eyes. "How did you know?"
The Beast King looked at the mysterious woman. "Northern Wilderness is your doing!"
The mysterious woman laughed. "As expected of the Beast King. Very smart. Everything you say is right."
The Beast King said in a deep voice: "Your Excellency, do you know that he has a sister?"
The mysterious woman nodded. "I do!
The invincible Tian Ming! "
The Beast King looked at the mysterious woman with a serious expression. "Since you know, why do you still want to kill him?"
The mysterious woman smiled. "That's my business!
As for you Beastmen … Just stay in your Beastman Realm and don't come out.
I have no enmity with you and I don't want to destroy you. Do you understand? "
The Beast King was silent.
The mysterious woman looked at the Beast King and smiled. "I'm not joking with you. And I won't give you a second chance!"
Then she turned and left.
The Beast King was silent.
Not far away, the Beastman said: "King …"
The Beast King slowly closed his eyes. "I can't afford to offend my sister, and I can't afford to offend this Aunty either … Let them play by themselves!
I can't beat anyone!
I'm scared!
I'm scared! "
Then he turned and left.
...
After the mysterious woman left, she did not return to the Sacred Region. Instead, she went to the Divine City.
When she entered the tavern, the waiter and the shopkeeper's face suddenly became serious.
The shopkeeper walked in front of the mysterious woman and bowed. "Your Excellency is?"
The mysterious woman smiled. "A pot of Spring Sword."
The shopkeeper looked at the mysterious woman. "Please wait!"
Soon, the shopkeeper brought out a pot of Spring Sword.
The mysterious woman opened the bottle and gently sniffed. "Not bad."
Suddenly, a voice came from the Inner Courtyard. "What's the matter?"
The mysterious woman picked up a peanut and put it in her mouth. "I don't want to kill you. After all, we are old acquaintances."
The Inner Courtyard was silent.
The mysterious woman said again: "This is our family's private matter. Outsiders should stay out of it!
Okay? "
The Inner Courtyard was still silent.
The mysterious woman smiled and said, "I want you to give me an answer. Otherwise, I won't be polite!"
In the Inner Courtyard, a sigh sounded. "Why did you have to do this?"
The mysterious woman chuckled, "You know the reason!"
In the inner courtyard, the voice said, "After all, he is your nephew."
The mysterious woman narrowed her eyes.
Boom!
The entire tavern turned into nothingness in an instant!
The shopkeeper and the waiter's expressions changed drastically. Their eyes were filled with terror. At this moment, both of them could smell the scent of death.
The mysterious woman poured herself a cup of wine and drank it in one gulp. "Why is he still alive?"
As she spoke, she turned around to look at a small house. Even though she was smiling, it was slightly bone piercingly gloomy, and it caused others to shiver. "On what basis?"
Inside the hut, the man was silent.
The mysterious woman smiled and stood up. "For the sake of an old friend, I don't want to kill you. After all, this matter has nothing to do with you. However, I don't want you seniors to help him.
If you dare to interfere, don't blame me for being ruthless. "
Then, she stood up and left.
At this moment, the man in the hut suddenly said, "Have you ever considered his feelings?"
The mysterious woman stopped. After a moment of silence, she said, "I don't hate him. He tried his best back then. However, I still want to seek justice."
The man in the hut sighed again. "Have you ever thought about that woman?
He will be considerate and won't hurt you. However, that woman …
(To continue this chapter, please continue to the next page.)
If you do this, you will anger that woman. Once she returns, many people will die. Do you understand? "
The mysterious woman smiled and said, "So what?
Anyway, I've already prepared myself to die.
I'm not even afraid of death, so why would I be afraid of her? "
The man in the hut sighed again. "Is there really no way to resolve this matter?"
The mysterious woman smiled and walked into the distance. "Either he dies, or I die."
Soon, the mysterious woman disappeared into the distance.
At this moment, the shopkeeper came before the hut and bowed respectfully. "Master … This man …"
The man in the hut sighed softly and said no more.
....
Taoism.
After the mysterious woman left, she went directly to Taoism.
Inside the hall, the third lady sat cross-legged in front of the statue of the Taoism's ancestor.
The mysterious woman looked at the statue of the Taoism's ancestor and said with a smile, "Your master is a very amazing person!"
The third lady opened her eyes and said with a smile, "Thank you!"
The mysterious woman looked at the third lady. "You are also a smart person!"
The third lady said, "Boss, I won't interfere in the matters of the Fifth Dimension!
I don't have the ability to interfere! "
The mysterious woman smiled and said, "I'm not here to cause trouble for you!
I'm here to ask you something. "
The third lady nodded. "Boss, please speak."
The mysterious woman said, "Do you know where the Spirit of the Great Dao is?"
The Spirit of the Great Dao!
After a moment of silence, the third lady said, "To tell you the truth, I'm also looking for the Spirit of the Great Dao!"
The mysterious woman smiled and said, "You don't know either?"
The third lady nodded. "When Young Master Ye combined the nine scriptures into one, the Spirit of the Great Dao did appear!
However, for some reason, she escaped!
Logically speaking, this shouldn't be the case! "
The mysterious woman looked at the third lady. "Why do you think she escaped?"
The third lady shook her head. "I really don't know."
The mysterious woman smiled and said, "Make a guess!"
After a moment of silence, the third lady said softly, "She should have sensed the calamity on Young Master Ye, or perhaps she sensed your existence!"
The mysterious woman blinked. "Am I that scary?"
The Third Young Miss hesitated for a moment, and then she said, "Sir, you don't seem like an extremely evil person. Moreover, with your strength, you don't need the Daoist Scriptures at all, so why do you still target Ye Xuan?
Is it a personal grudge? "
The mysterious woman smiled and said, "It is indeed a personal grudge!"
The third lady nodded. "I understand."
The mysterious woman glanced at the statue of the Taoism's ancestor and said with a smile, "I'm leaving!"
With that, she turned around and left.
The third lady said, "Boss, take care!"
The mysterious woman smiled and said, "I'm not the boss. The woman in the plain dress is the real boss."
The third lady said softly, "I can't defeat them. They are all bosses!"
The mysterious woman laughed and said, "Miss, your future is limitless!"
After saying that, she disappeared.
In the hall, the third lady looked at the statue of the Taoism's ancestor and said softly, "Master … Disciple finally understands what you said. There is always someone better than you!"
....
In the Five-Dimensional Universe.
In the hall, Nian Nian was leaning on Ye Xuan's thigh and was sleeping soundly.
In front of the two of them, there were fish bones on the ground.
Ye Xuan looked at the sky outside the hall and pondered.
During this time, he had been thinking about a question. Was the mysterious expert in the Holy Land the woman who claimed to be his aunt?
If it was, it didn't make sense!
The reason why his bloodline could be awakened was because of the other party's help!
Since the other party wanted him dead, why did she help him improve his bloodline?
Ye Xuan was a little puzzled.
(This chapter is not over, please turn the page)
At this moment, Ye Xuan suddenly raised his head. The next moment, he gently placed Nian Nian on the ground and disappeared from the hall.
The moment Ye Xuan disappeared, Nian Nian suddenly opened her eyes …
...
In the Five-Dimensional Universe, Ye Xuan looked at the group of people in front of him, "Who are you!"
In front of him stood more than 30 people. These people's auras were extremely powerful and had already surpassed the God Realm!
The middle-aged man in the lead was Ge Yao!
Ge Yao stared at Ye Xuan, "Where is that woman?"
Ye Xuan frowned slightly, "Woman?
What woman? "
Ge Yao stared at Ye Xuan and slowly clenched his fists, "Your name is Ye Xuan, right?"
Ye Xuan nodded, "Yes!
Speaking of which, is there some misunderstanding? "
"Misunderstanding!"
Ge Yao's face became a little sinister, "Misunderstanding?
You're telling me it's a misunderstanding? "
As his voice fell, he suddenly blasted out a punch.
In the distance, Ye Xuan frowned slightly and raised his sword.
Boom!
The space in front of the two of them exploded. Then, Ye Xuan retreated hundreds of feet!
As for Ge Yao, he also retreated hundreds of feet!
Ge Yao stared at Ye Xuan, "I'll ask you one last time, where is that woman?"
Ye Xuan stood with his sword in hand, "Sir, I think there must be some misunderstanding between us. I think you don't want to be used by others, right?"
Ge Yao sneered, "Misunderstanding?
Ye Xuan, you actually have the nerve to say it's a misunderstanding!
You absorbed the souls of my clansmen, and then you tell me it's a misunderstanding? "
Souls!
Ye Xuan was stunned. In the next moment, his face turned ugly!
At this moment, he was sure that the mysterious enemy was his so-called aunt!
That woman was digging a hole for him!
Damn it!
This hole was too deep!
At this moment, Ge Yao sneered, "Tell me, is this a misunderstanding?"
Ye Xuan thought for a moment, then said, "I want to say that these souls were forcefully absorbed by a woman. Do you believe me?"
"Ye Xuan!"
Ge Yao suddenly said fiercely, "Do you think I'm a three year old child?
Forcefully absorbed by you?
What is she to you?
Is she your mother? "
Ye Xuan was slightly helpless, "I really didn't lie to you this time. She really did force me to absorb them!"
Ge Yao stared fixedly at Ye Xuan as if he wanted to kill Ye Xuan.
Ye Xuan was slightly speechless. Why doesn't anyone believe me when I tell the truth?
Dammit!
That woman!
At this moment, Ye Xuan felt that he was in a terrible state!
But he didn't understand why that woman would do that!
Meanwhile, Ge Yao suddenly said, "Let that woman come out!"
Ye Xuan gazed at Ge Yao, "I don't know where she is!
Really! "
Ge Yao's face was expressionless, "It's fine. I don't believe that she won't come out once I catch you!"
As he spoke, he charged directly at Ye Xuan.
Behind him, the super experts also rushed over!
At this moment, Ye Xuan suddenly held his sword horizontally to his neck. Seeing this, Ge Yao suddenly stopped and looked at Ye Xuan, "What are you doing?"
Ye Xuan looked at Ge Yao and sneered, "You want to use me to threaten my aunt? No way!
If you dare take another step forward, I'll kill myself. Let me tell you, once I die, my aunt will go crazy and take revenge on you. She will hide in the dark and take revenge on you. Let me ask you, are you afraid? "
Ge Yao narrowed his eyes, "I don't believe that you really dare to kill yourself!"
At this moment, Ye Xuan suddenly held his sword and stabbed it into his abdomen.
Pfft!
Ye Xuan immediately spat out a mouthful of blood.
Seeing this, Ge Yao was dumbfounded. Dammit, are all modern people so crazy?
Suicide just because you say so?
....
(End of this chapter)







Chapter 1487
Needless to say, Ge Yao was quite stunned right now!
He really hadn't intended to kill Ye Xuan, and he'd mainly intended to capture Ye Xuan so that the mysterious woman wouldn't act against him. However, he'd never imagined that Ye Xuan would be so staunch and take his own life just like that!
That's too ruthless!
Meanwhile, Ye Xuan suddenly spoke in a hoarse voice, "So long as I die, then my Aunt will definitely stop at nothing to take revenge on all of you!"
Ge Yao gazed at Ye Xuan and spoke fiercely, "She killed countless members of our clan and even took countless treasures from us!"
Ye Xuan's eyelids twitched when he heard this. Dammit! That woman is really ruthless!
Ge Yao stared fixedly at Ye Xuan, "All of you will repay this enmity with your blood!"
Ye Xuan fell silent for a moment before he said, "I'll take all of you to her. Do all of you dare?"
Ge Yao was slightly hesitant.
Even though he'd awakened most of the experts in his clan, he still didn't have the information to deal with that mysterious woman!
That woman was too strong!
Ye Xuan hesitated for a moment before he said, "I'll tell you the truth. Don't get angry!
That is, the number of people you have is really not enough for my aunt to fight!
Do you know how strong she is? "
Ge Yao gazed at Ye Xuan, "How strong?"
Ye Xuan spoke seriously, "I don't know the specifics. All I know is that she kills Godrank Realm experts like ants, and experts above the Godrank Realm can't even withstand a single blow from her!"
Ge Yao glanced at Ye Xuan and didn't say anything.
Ye Xuan continued, "I think that the few of you aren't enough. Why don't you call more people over, and then I'll take all of you to her?"
Ge Yao gazed at Ye Xuan, "You don't seem to be worried about her!"
Ye Xuan laughed embarrassedly, "My Aunt is really good at fighting!"
Ge Yao gazed at Ye Xuan and laughed coldly, "Just you wait!
And that Aunt of yours. I'll make all of you pay the price! "
With that, he turned around and left.
Seeing that Ge Yao and the rest had left, Ye Xuan pulled out the sword from his abdomen, his face gradually darkening!
Damn it, that woman was setting him up!
He finally understood why the other party forced him to absorb those souls and even gave him treasures!
They wanted to make him a scapegoat!
Although he had obtained some benefits, it was obvious that he had formed a bad relationship with this mysterious force.
What was he trying to do?
Ye Xuan sheathed his sword and turned to leave.
At this moment, Bai Dizi appeared in front of Ye Xuan. He glanced at the end of the starry sky in the distance. "Are you alright?"
Ye Xuan shook his head. "I'll handle it!"
As soon as he finished speaking, he transformed into a ray of sword light and vanished into the distance.
In the starry sky, Bai Dizi's eyes flashed with a trace of worry.
...
Saint-level.
In front of the bamboo house, the Holy Master was bowing, and no one knew what he was saying.
After a while, the woman in the bamboo house shook her head and smiled. "This little fellow is really interesting. He sent those fellows from the Wilderness North away with just a few words!
He's just like his father. His eloquence is extraordinary! "
The Holy Master hesitated for a moment and said, "Master, what kind of force is the Wilderness North?"
The woman said softly, "It's a very, very ancient force!
They belong to the prehistoric civilization! "
The Holy Master frowned slightly. "Prehistoric civilization?"
The woman nodded. "It's a civilization that existed before the Daoist Scripture Civilization. However, there are no records of that civilization in the entire universe because the Daoist Scripture Civilization was a million years away from that civilization. During that million years, there was a blank period. In other words, it was the primitive era. During that era, there were pitifully few humans, and they didn't even have a written language. Therefore, there are no records of the prehistoric era.
As for why they sealed themselves, no one knows. "
At this point, she paused for a moment and continued. "However, this prehistoric civilization is a little strange.
Qingcheng, Ye Clan, Ancestral Hall.
"Ancestors above, Ye Xuan has no talent, no virtue … From this moment onwards, Ye Xuan's position as Crown Prince will be replaced by Ye Lang."
The one who spoke was an old man in a black robe.
Not far behind the old man stood a youth with a faint smile on his face.
This person was Ye Lang.
On both sides were the Ye Clan's Elders.
"Why?!"
At this moment, a timid voice suddenly sounded in the ancestral hall.
Everyone turned to look and saw a little girl standing at the door. She was about 12 or 13 years old, and her hands were tightly gripping the hem of her skirt. Her face had a sickly pallor, and she looked a little weak. There was even a trace of fear in her eyes.
This little girl was called Ye Ling, and she was Ye Xuan's younger sister. When she heard that the Clan wanted to dismiss Ye Xuan, she disregarded her illness and rushed over.
The black-robed old man frowned. "Ye Ling, what are you doing!"
The little girl called Ye Ling bowed to the people in the ancestral hall, and said timidly, "Great Elder, my brother Ye Xuan is a Crown Prince, why did you discard him for no reason?"
The Great Elder looked coldly at Ye Ling, "This is a Clan matter, what are you interrupting for?
Leave! "
Ye Ling was obviously afraid, and did not dare to look at the Great Elder. However, she did not leave. Instead, she plucked up her courage and entered the ancestral hall. She bowed again to the Elders on both sides, "Dear Elders, my brother is fighting with the Li Clan over the mining rights at Nanshan. He is fighting for the Clan, and we don't know if he's dead or alive. Yet, the Clan is using a groundless excuse to discard his Crown Prince position. This is unfair."
"Impudent!"
The Great Elder suddenly raged, "Discard him or not, it's not up to a little girl like you to decide.
Men, drag her away! "
At this moment, the new Crown Prince Ye Lang suddenly laughed, "You should be flogged thirty times as a warning to others!"
The Great Elder said coldly, "Then flog him thirty times!"
Soon, two guards of the Ye Clan rushed in.
Ye Ling clenched her fists, and said angrily, "This is unfair. My brother has risked his life for the Clan for so many years, and even now, he is fighting for the Clan. The Clan is so unfair to him …"
One of the guards glanced at the new Crown Prince Ye Lang, and he knew that his chance to show off had come.
The guard sneered, "Young Master Ye Lang inherits the Crown Prince position, and it is everyone's wish. What are you shouting for?" As he spoke, he raised his hand and slapped Ye Ling's face.
Slap!
A crisp slap sounded, and the right side of Ye Ling's face instantly turned red and swollen, but she did not cry. She just held her cheek tightly.
Ye Lang looked at the guard, and smiled, "What's your name?"
The guard hurriedly bowed, "I'm Zhang Mu, greeting the Crown Prince."
Ye Lang nodded, "You're not bad. After I become the Crown Prince, I will need ten guards. You can be my guard from now on."
Hearing this, Zhang Mu was overjoyed, and he hurriedly bowed deeply, "I will go through fire and water for the Crown Prince, and I will do anything for you!"
Ye Lang nodded slightly, "Drag him out. This person is disturbing the ancestral hall, so don't show any mercy. Do you understand?"
Zhang Mu glanced at Ye Lang, and when he saw the murderous intent in Ye Lang's eyes, he understood.
He immediately grabbed Ye Ling's hair and dragged her out.
At this moment, Zhang Mu seemed to have seen something, and he suddenly stopped.
In the ancestral hall, everyone turned their heads to look outside.
Not far from the ancestral hall, a young man was walking towards the ancestral hall. The young man was wearing a tight-fitting robe that was torn, and there was blood everywhere.
This person was Ye Xuan, who had rushed back from the South Mountain!
Seeing Ye Xuan, Ye Lang's mouth curled into a cold smile.
Inside the ancestral hall, the Elders frowned.
The Great Elder narrowed his eyes, and his expression was frighteningly dark. No one knew what he was thinking.
From afar, when Ye Xuan saw Zhang Mu dragging Ye Ling, his face turned savage, "Who gave you the guts to touch my sister?"
When Zhang Mu saw Ye Xuan, his face changed. He hurriedly looked at Ye Lang, and was about to speak, when Ye Xuan suddenly leaped in front of him like a ferocious tiger. Before the latter could react, Ye Xuan's fist landed on his face.
Peng!
Zhang Mu felt a wave of dizziness, and he stumbled and fell.
However, Ye Ling did not stop there. He charged towards Zhang Mu again. At this time, Ye Lang suddenly roared, "Ye Xuan, he's my man, how dare you …"
Ye Xuan suddenly stepped on Zhang Mu's chest.
Pu!
Zhang Mu spat out a mouthful of blood.
Seeing this, Ye Lang's face turned ugly. Ye Xuan looked up at him and snarled, "Your man?"
As he spoke, he stepped on Zhang Mu's face.
Zhang Mu's face turned into a bloody mess, as he screamed, "Prince, save, save me …"
Ye Xuan did not care about Zhang Mu, as he walked to Ye Ling's side. Seeing Ye Ling's appearance, Ye Xuan felt as though his heart was being sliced by a knife. He clenched his fists, and his entire body trembled.
When Ye Ling saw Ye Xuan, her tears flowed out, "Brother, it hurts, it hurts …"
Hearing this, Ye Xuan's expression turned savage. In the next instant, he charged in front of Zhang Mu, and kicked Zhang Mu's head.
Peng!
Qingcheng, Ye Clan, Ancestral Hall.
"Ancestors, Ye Xuan has no talent, no virtue … From now on, Ye Xuan's position as Prince shall be replaced by Ye Lang."
The one who spoke was an old man in black robes.
Not far behind the old man, there was a youth with a faint smile on his face.
This person was Ye Lang.
On both sides, there were the Ye Clan Elders.
"Why!?"
At this time, a timid voice rang out in the ancestral hall.
Everyone turned to look and saw a little girl standing at the door. She was about 12 or 13 years old, and her hands were tightly gripping the hem of her skirt. Her face had a sickly pallor, and she looked a little weak. There was even a trace of fear in her eyes.
This girl was called Ye Ling, and she was Ye Xuan's younger sister. When she heard that the clan wanted to remove Ye Xuan, she disregarded her illness and rushed over.
The black-robed old man frowned, "Ye Ling, what are you doing!?"
The little girl called Ye Ling bowed to the people in the ancestral hall, and said timidly, "Great Elder, my brother Ye Xuan is a Prince, why did you discard him for no reason?"
The Great Elder looked at Ye Ling coldly, "This is a matter of the clan, why are you interrupting?
Leave! "
Ye Ling was obviously afraid, not daring to look at the Great Elder, but she did not leave. Instead, she plucked up her courage and walked into the ancestral hall. She bowed to the Elders on both sides, "Elders, my brother is fighting with the Li Clan over the mining rights at Nanshan. He is fighting for the clan, and we don't know if he's dead or alive. Yet, the clan is using a groundless excuse to discard his position. This is unfair."
"Impudent!"
The Great Elder suddenly raged, "Whether he discards his position or not, it's not up to a little girl like you to decide.
Men, drag her away. "
At this time, the new Prince, Ye Lang, suddenly laughed, "You should be flogged 30 times as a warning to others!"
The Great Elder replied coldly, "Then flog her 30 times!"
Soon, two guards of the Ye Clan rushed in.
Ye Ling clenched her fists and said angrily, "This is unfair. My brother has risked his life for the clan for so many years. Even now, he is risking his life for the clan. The clan is so unfair to him …"
One of the guards glanced at the new Prince, Ye Lang. He knew that this was his chance to shine.
The guard sneered, "Young Master Ye Lang inherits the position of Prince. What are you yelling about?" As he spoke, he raised his hand and slapped Ye Ling's face.
Slap!
A crisp slap sounded, and the right side of Ye Ling's face instantly swelled up. However, she did not cry. She only covered her cheek tightly.
Ye Lang looked at the guard and smiled, "What's your name?"
The guard hurriedly bowed. "Subordinate Zhang Mu greets the Crown Prince."
Ye Lang nodded, "You're not bad. After I become the Prince, I will need 10 guards. You can be my guard from now on."
Hearing this, Zhang Mu was overjoyed. He quickly bowed deeply, "This subordinate is willing to go through fire and water for the Prince!"
Ye Lang nodded, "Drag him away. This person is disturbing the ancestral hall. Don't hold back. Do you understand?"
Zhang Mu glanced at Ye Lang. When he saw the murderous intent in Ye Lang's eyes, he understood.
He immediately grabbed Ye Ling's hair and dragged her out.
At this moment, Zhang Mu suddenly stopped as if he had seen something.
Inside the ancestral hall, everyone turned their heads to look outside the hall.
Not far from the ancestral hall, a young man was walking towards the ancestral hall. The young man was wearing a tight-fitting robe. The robe was tattered and covered in blood.
The young man was Ye Xuan, who had rushed back from Nanshan!
Seeing Ye Xuan, Ye Lang's lips curled into a sinister smile.
Inside the ancestral hall, the Elders frowned.
The Great Elder narrowed his eyes, his face dark and gloomy. No one knew what he was thinking.
From afar, when Ye Xuan saw Zhang Mu dragging Ye Ling, his face turned savage. "Who gave you the guts to touch my sister?"
When Zhang Mu saw Ye Xuan, his face changed. He quickly looked at Ye Lang and was about to speak. At this time, Ye Xuan leaped in front of him like a ferocious tiger. Before the latter could react, Ye Xuan's fist landed on his face.
Peng!
Zhang Mu felt a wave of dizziness, and he stumbled and fell.
However, Ye Ling did not stop there. He charged at Zhang Mu again. At this time, Ye Lang suddenly roared, "Ye Xuan, he's my man! How dare you …"
Ye Xuan suddenly stepped on Zhang Mu's chest.
Pu!
Zhang Mu spat out a mouthful of blood.
Seeing this, Ye Lang's face turned ugly. Ye Xuan looked up at him and said, "Your man?"
As he spoke, he stepped on Zhang Mu's face.
Zhang Mu's face turned into a bloody mess, as he screamed, "Prince, save, save me …"
Ye Xuan did not care about Zhang Mu, as he walked up to Ye Ling. Seeing Ye Ling's state, Ye Xuan felt as though his heart was being sliced apart. He clenched his fists, and his entire body trembled.
When Ye Ling saw Ye Xuan, her tears flowed, "Brother, it hurts, it hurts …"
Hearing this, Ye Xuan's expression turned savage. In the next instant, he charged in front of Zhang Mu and kicked Zhang Mu's head.
Peng!







Chapter 1488
Needless to say, Ye Xuan was a little shocked at this moment!
His own father killed his own grandfather?
Can it be played like this?
At this moment, the voice sighed softly. "It's not your father's fault. It's your grandfather who wanted to devour your father's bloodline. Moreover, your grandfather is really not a good person. These are all old matters. You will naturally know about these grudges in the future."
Ye Xuan said in a low voice, "I don't really want to know about these grudges now. I just want to know if anyone has come to take that woman!"
The voice said, "Originally, your bloodline could suppress her, but now, your bloodline has been suppressed and sealed. How can you play with her?"
Ye Xuan was speechless. "I also didn't know that my aunt was such a scammer!"
The voice said, "After all, she is your aunt. Why don't you go and talk to her? Maybe you can resolve some of the grudges from the past!
After all, you are quite good at bluffing! "
Ye Xuan was speechless.
The voice said again, "Aunt still has things to do. Take care of yourself!"
In the hall, Ye Xuan sighed softly.
Grudges!
What grudges!
What does the matters of the older generation have to do with me!
Why are they all beating me up?
After a long time, Ye Xuan sighed again and turned to leave.
I can only go and talk to that woman!
Just as Eldest Aunt said, they were a family, so why should they fight?
It would be good to talk!
Of course, I can't beat her …
...
After leaving the Four-Dimensional Universe, Ye Xuan came to the Holy Region.
Let's talk!
As soon as Ye Xuan arrived at the Holy Region, the Holy Master appeared in front of him. At this time, the Holy Master's arm had already recovered.
The Holy Master looked at Ye Xuan. "What do you want?"
Ye Xuan said with a smile, "Kill people. Oh, no, chat!
I'm here to chat! "
The Holy Master stared at Ye Xuan. "Chat!
What do we have to chat about? "
Ye Xuan pointed below. "I'm here to talk to my aunt!"
Holy Lord frowned, "Ye Xuan, what nonsense are you spouting!"
Ye Xuan blinked, "Holy Lord, don't you know that the woman below is my aunt?
My dear aunt! "
The Sacred Leader glared at Ye Xuan. "Are you here to acknowledge your kin?"
Ye Xuan nodded. "Yes!"
Saint Master was expressionless. "There's no one down there. You can leave!"
Ye Xuan chuckled. He took out the Supreme Sword and gently tapped it on his palm. He didn't say anything and just smiled.
The Sacred Lord's expression was somewhat unsightly.
Damn it, this guy is threatening me!
However, he really couldn't do anything to Ye Xuan!
God Realm experts couldn't do anything to Ye Xuan because Ye Xuan's physical body was too monstrous.
Deity Realm powerhouses were already unable to pose any substantial threat to Ye Xuan's fleshy body!
Suddenly, a voice resounded from below, "Ask him to come down!"
The Sacred Lord bowed respectfully to the people below. Then he looked at Ye Xuan and said, "You can leave now!"
Ye Xuan walked down, and it didn't take long for him to arrive before a bamboo forest. He passed through the bamboo forest and saw a bamboo house.
At this moment, a voice resounded from within the house, "Come in!"
Ye Xuan didn't hesitate and walked in. The furnishings within the house were very simple. There was only a bed, a bamboo table, and two bamboo chairs!
The woman sat before the table and was reading a book.
The woman smiled when she saw Ye Xuan, "Sit!"
Ye Xuan nodded. He sat before the woman. There was a chessboard on the table, and the white piece was in a hopeless situation!
Ye Xuan smiled, "Is this white piece me?"
The woman shook her head and smiled, "It's not you.
It's me! "
Ye Xuan frowned slightly, "You?"
The woman smiled, "Yes!
No matter where I go, I'll die in the end. "
Ye Xuan looked at the woman, "I heard from others that you're really my aunt?"
The woman nodded, "It's true, and we're related!"
Ye Xuan was puzzled, "Why did you do this to me?"
The woman smiled, "Some grudges."
Ye Xuan asked, "The older generation?"
The woman nodded.
Ye Xuan looked at the woman, "Is it appropriate for you to bully the younger generation for the grudges of the older generation?"
The woman smiled, "I can't beat the older generation!"
Hearing this, Ye Xuan's mouth twitched, and he almost went berserk!
F * ck, you can't beat the older generation, so you come to beat me?
F * ck me …
The woman smiled, "Did you come to me today to talk about this?"
Ye Xuan said, "I want to understand something!"
The woman put down the book in her hand and smiled, "Ask away!"
Ye Xuan looked at the woman, "You can kill me, right?"
The woman nodded, "I can indeed kill you, but that's under the premise that no one else interferes.
But if I touch you, someone will definitely stop me!
Just like now, although it's only the two of us, I can't kill you if I want to! "
Ye Xuan frowned, "Why?"
The woman smiled, "That's not the point!"
Ye Xuan was silent for a moment, then said, "I want to know about the grudges of the older generation!"
The woman shook her head, "I can't tell you. No, I don't want to tell you!"
Ye Xuan looked at the woman, "So you're saying that you're determined to kill me!"
The woman smiled, "Yes!"
Ye Xuan nodded, "I understand!"
With that, he stood up and left. When he walked to the door, he turned to look at the woman, "You've done so much, so it shouldn't be just to use others to kill me, right?"
The woman smiled, "Yes!"
Ye Xuan said, "The cause of disaster?"
The woman nodded.
Ye Xuan nodded slightly, "I understand."
As soon as he finished speaking, he vanished on the spot.
Within the bamboo house, the woman's smile gradually vanished. After a long time, she placed her right hand lightly on the chessboard, and in the next moment, the entire chessboard transformed into nothingness.
Everything was destroyed!
There was no winner!
...
Ye Xuan returned to the Fifth Dimension, and he looked for Bai Dizi.
Within the hall, Ye Xuan said in a low voice, "Investigate those mysterious powers that came looking for me earlier and find out their origins!"
Bai Dizi said in a low voice, "I've already sent people to investigate before you left!
However, there's no news! "
Ye Xuan said softly, "Then they should be quite far away from us."
Bai Dizi nodded, "I've already asked Black City for help, and they've agreed."
Ye Xuan hesitated for a moment before he said, "You must do it secretly. Otherwise, you might implicate them!"
Bai Dizi nodded slightly, "I understand!"
As he spoke, he hesitated for a moment before he said, "Do you know who's behind this?"
Ye Xuan nodded. "I do!"
Bai Dizi fell silent for a moment before he said, "No matter what, be careful."
Ye Xuan nodded. "I understand."
Bai Dizi was about to speak when a figure suddenly appeared within the hall. Ye Xuan looked at the figure, and the figure bowed slightly to Ye Xuan before leaving behind a scroll and vanishing.
Ye Xuan opened his palm, and the scroll appeared in his hand. He opened it, and there were only four words on it — Divine City, Northern Wilderness!
Divine City?
Northern Wilderness?
Ye Xuan exerted some force with his right hand, and the scroll vanished.
The mysterious power from before was from the Northern Wilderness!
That woman was obviously using the Northern Wilderness!
Ye Xuan fell silent for a moment before he said, "I'm going out for a while."
As soon as he finished speaking, he vanished on the spot.
...
Northern Wilderness.
Ge Yao knelt devoutly in front of the stone tablet, and behind him were dozens of super overlords.
These people had all surpassed the Immortal State.
At this moment, all of them were kneeling in front of the stone tablet.
After an unknown period of time, the stone tablet trembled slightly, and in the next moment, a woman walked out of it.
The woman only wore a black tube top, and most of her skin was exposed to the air. She only wore a very short leather skirt, and her legs were as white as jade.
After the woman appeared, she slowly closed her eyes, and Ge Yao and the others in front of her hurriedly bowed respectfully. "Greetings, Divine Envoy!"
The woman gently hooked her finger, and a black gauze suddenly appeared on her body, which made her look even sexier.
After a while, the woman suddenly opened her eyes, and her gaze pierced through the starry sky, directly to the Sacred Region.
Inside the bamboo house, the mysterious woman who was reading a book suddenly opened her eyes. She turned her head to take a look and said with a smile, "Interesting!
It seems that I've underestimated this prehistoric civilization. "
...
Northern Wilderness.
The Divine Envoy opened her palm, and a machete suddenly appeared in her hand. In the next moment, she lightly slashed in front of her.
Whoosh!
The space in front of her cracked, and almost at the same time, in the bamboo house in the Sacred Region, the space in front of the mysterious woman suddenly cracked, and a black blade flashed out.
The mysterious woman's expression was calm, and she lightly pointed with her fingers.
Boom!
The blade shook violently, and then slowly turned into nothingness.
The Divine Envoy swung the blade again.
Whoosh!
A blade suddenly appeared between the mysterious woman's eyebrows, but the blade stopped half an inch away from the mysterious woman's eyebrows!
This was because the mysterious woman's jade-like fingers had caught the blade!
The mysterious woman gently pinched the blade with her fingers, and the blade turned into nothingness. Then, she lightly pointed forward —
In the Sacred Region, the space in front of the Divine Envoy suddenly cracked, and a finger shot out.
The Divine Envoy's expression was calm. She opened her palm, and countless blade auras flew out of it.
Whoosh, whoosh, whoosh, whoosh, whoosh!
In an instant, the finger was directly cut into powder.
In the Sacred Region, inside the bamboo house, the woman smiled and did not attack again.
In the Northern Wilderness, the Divine Envoy also did not attack again. Several blade auras flew around her.
Ge Yao hesitated, and then asked, "Divine Envoy?"
The Divine Envoy said softly, "Very strong!"
Very strong.
Hearing this, Ge Yao's expression became serious.
The Divine Envoy slowly closed her eyes. "This woman forced her way into the Northern Wilderness, took those souls, and bullied the Northern Wilderness … Just for that young man Ye Xuan?"
Ge Yao nodded. "Yes!
That young man has already absorbed those souls! "
Then, she paused, and then said, "That young man is not simple, especially his body, which is extremely powerful, and his bloodline has extremely strong healing abilities."
The Divine Envoy was expressionless. "I'll go and see this person. You guys wait here for the Underworld Envoy."
Underworld Envoy!
Hearing this, Ge Yao's heart jumped, and he quickly nodded. "Yes!"
The Divine Envoy did not speak again. She took a step forward, and with that, she disappeared from the Northern Wilderness …
..







Chapter 1489
In the starry sky, Ye Xuan rode on his flying sword. After a long time, he arrived at the God City.
Just as he was about to step into the God City, a powerful divine sense suddenly enveloped him.
Ye Xuan frowned slightly. At this moment, that divine sense suddenly disappeared without a trace.
Ye Xuan was slightly startled. A moment later, he continued forward. There was only a small tavern in the city. The small tavern was very new, as if it had just been built.
Ye Xuan walked into the tavern. Inside the tavern, there were only two people. One was the tavern manager, and the other was a waiter.
At this moment, both of them were looking at Ye Xuan.
Ye Xuan was a little baffled by their gazes. He asked, "Do the two of you know me?"
The waiter looked at the manager. The manager waved his hand and the waiter retreated.
The manager looked at Ye Xuan and said with a smile, "Do you want to drink?
The best wine here is Spring Sword! "
Ye Xuan thought for a moment and said with a smile, "I'll have a pot."
The manager smiled and said, "Please sit."
Ye Xuan walked to the side and sat down. The manager immediately brought over a pot of wine and two side dishes.
Just as the manager was about to leave, Ye Xuan suddenly smiled and said, "Let's have a chat?"
The manager hesitated for a moment before nodding, "Sure!"
He sat in front of Ye Xuan.
Ye Xuan smiled and said, "Senior knows me!"
The manager smiled, "Why do you say so?"
Ye Xuan said, "When I first came in, the way you looked at me."
The manager was silent.
Ye Xuan suddenly asked, "I'll be more direct. Are you in cahoots with that woman?"
The manager seemed to know who Ye Xuan was talking about. He immediately shook his head, "No!"
No!
Ye Xuan asked again, "Do you know me?"
The manager nodded, "My master knows you!"
Ye Xuan was a little curious, "Your master?
Can I meet him? "
The manager shook his head. "It's not convenient for the time being!"
Ye Xuan smiled and asked, "Why?"
The manager hesitated for a moment before he said, "Young Master Ye, your true objective for coming here this time is for that woman, right?"
Ye Xuan nodded.
The innkeeper sighed in a low voice. "Young Master Ye, to be honest, that woman also came to the tavern … and we couldn't do anything to her."
After a moment of silence, Ye Xuan smiled and said, "Then I'll ask about the Northern Wilderness!"
Northern Wilderness!
The shopkeeper said, "We know a little about Dao Yi. The Northern Wilderness is a prehistoric civilization, a civilization before the Dao Scripture. Their cultivation system is completely different from ours. Their cultivation system is also different!
Moreover, they also cultivate Faith Energy, but it's different from ours. Moreover, some of their cultivation methods are very special. For example, they cultivate Psychokinesis, which we know nothing about. Apart from that, they also cultivate Underworld Energy, a special kind of power … "
As he said this, his expression became serious.
Ye Xuan smiled bitterly. "To tell you the truth, that woman must have gone to the Desolate North. Then she brought out the souls of some of the Desolate North's powerhouses and let me absorb them …"
The innkeeper looked at Ye Xuan and asked, "You absorbed them?"
Ye Xuan shrugged. "She forced me to absorb them!"
The innkeeper said in a deep voice, "She wants to make the Northern Wilderness your enemy!"
Ye Xuan nodded.
After a moment of silence, the innkeeper said, "What are you going to do?"
Ye Xuan said, "I want to go to the Northern Wilderness and clear up this misunderstanding. But I'm afraid I won't be able to return. They are not only strong, but they also have a lot of people."
The innkeeper hesitated and said, "You absorbed all the souls?"
Ye Xuan nodded.
The innkeeper sighed again. "That's not a simple problem."
Ye Xuan said in a deep voice, "I'm not particularly worried about the Northern Wilderness. I'm worried about that woman. My intuition tells me that she's plotting something!"
The innkeeper nodded. "Master also said that she's plotting something. It's not just to cause trouble for you. It might have something to do with the Cause of Misfortune on you!"
Ye Xuan nodded. "My guess is also the Cause of Misfortune. But I don't know the specifics."
The innkeeper glanced at Ye Xuan. "Young Master Ye, you can't fight her alone. Master suggests that you find someone from the older generation!"
Ye Xuan shrugged. "I can't find anyone!
By the way, can you help me contact Qing 'er? "
The innkeeper asked. "The woman in the plain dress?"
Ye Xuan nodded.
The innkeeper shook his head. "No!"
Ye Xuan was puzzled. "Why?"
The innkeeper said in a deep voice, "Young Master Ye, Master also doesn't suggest that you let that senior come back!
Because if she comes back, things will become more complicated. Also, your aunt's target might be the woman in the plain dress … "
Ye Xuan frowned. "Kill Qing 'er?"
The innkeeper shook his head. "She doesn't have that ability!
She might be plotting against you and the woman in the plain dress. The only thing that can restrain the woman in the plain dress is the Cause of Misfortune. So … "
When he spoke up to here, he sighed softly. "Actually, Master isn't too sure about her true objective. The only thing I know is that it's related to the Disaster Cause. Because if she wants to kill you, she can only rely on the Disaster Cause!"
Ye Xuan suddenly asked. "Can I see your Master?"
The innkeeper shook his head. "Master can't see you. Please understand."
Ye Xuan nodded. "I understand. Let's talk about the Northern Wilderness!
The Northern Wilderness now sees me as their mortal enemy. Although I tricked them into leaving, I believe that they will definitely come back soon … "
The innkeeper suddenly said. "Go find Miss Ding!"
"Miss Ding?"
Ye Xuan blinked. "Who is it?"
The innkeeper took out a scroll and placed it in front of Ye Xuan. "Young Master Ye, take care!"
Then, he got up and left.
Ye Xuan was silent for a long time. He picked up the scroll and left.
Not long after, he suddenly turned around. Not far away, the tavern suddenly burst into flames. Soon, the entire tavern turned into nothingness.
Ye Xuan said softly. "I'm sorry. I didn't know I would implicate you … Thank you!"
Then, he turned around and left.
In the starry sky, Ye Xuan opened the scroll. It was actually a map.
Miss Ding?
Ye Xuan was curious. Who was this Miss Ding that the tavern senior mentioned?
Would he implicate her if he went to find her?
After a moment of silence, Ye Xuan finally chose to find this Miss Ding. Otherwise, who knew what would happen if he allowed that woman to continue?
He really couldn't beat her!
Even now, he still didn't know how strong that woman was!
Since it was a grudge between the older generation, it was better to let the older generation solve it themselves!
I won't take the blame!
...
In the Fifth Dimension. On this day, a woman suddenly arrived in the starry sky of the Fifth Dimension.
It was the Divine Envoy!
The Divine Envoy stood in the starry sky and looked down at the Fifth Dimension. After a long time, a trace of surprise flashed in her eyes. "This universe … is a bit interesting …"
Then, she suddenly turned around. Not far away, there stood a little girl!
Mu Niannian!
The Divine Envoy looked at Mu Niannian. After a while, she looked at the candied fruit in Mu Niannian's hand and said softly.
"You are very strong!"
Mu Niannian said: "The Northern Wilderness?"
The Divine Envoy nodded.
Mu Niannian said with a smile: "Want to talk?"
The Divine Envoy looked at Mu Niannian's candied fruit and asked: "Is there a need to talk?"
Mu Niannian smiled slightly. "That woman is using you!"
The Divine Envoy looked calm. "That woman wants to use us to target that young man?"
Mu Niannian said with a smile: "It seems that I can save my breath!
However, I am a bit curious. How did you know?
Or is it just a guess? "
The Divine Envoy slowly clenched her right hand that was hidden behind her back. "I have fought with her. She is very strong. It is meaningless for such a strong person to snatch those souls. Those treasures are also meaningless to her.
Then, there are only two possibilities left. First, she is really doing it for that young man. Second, she is framing that young man and wants the Northern Wilderness to become enemies with that young man. "
Then, she looked down. "This time, I came to see that young man and this universe!
This universe is not simple. You are very strong.
However, you are a bit strange. You are in a very strange state now! "
Mu Niannian said with a smile: "Strange state?"
The Divine Envoy nodded. "There seems to be something bothering you!"
Mu Niannian smiled. "The Cause of Misfortune!"
The Divine Envoy frowned. "The Cause of Misfortune?"
Mu Niannian asked: "There is no Cause of Misfortune in your era?"
The Divine Envoy said softly: "You are talking about the Body of Misfortune."
Mu Niannian was a bit curious. "The Body of Misfortune?"
The Divine Emissary nodded. "The Cause of Disaster you mentioned should be what we call the Body of Disaster, the source of all evil karma … However, this kind of person has never appeared even in our era. In our era, there was a Good Body … As for this Body of Disaster, not only did it not appear in our era, it did not even appear in the most ancient era."
Mu Niannian licked the candied fruit and said: "Do you have a way to solve this Body of Misfortune?"
The Divine Envoy looked at Mu Niannian's candied fruit again. "Yes!"
Mu Niannian blinked. "There is?"
The Divine Envoy said: "The Body of Misfortune cannot be directly erased or changed, but it can be reversed, forcibly reversed!"
Mu Niannian asked: "How do you reverse it?"
The Divine Envoy looked at Mu Niannian. "Become stronger!
So strong that no karma can touch you. "
Mu Niannian was silent.
Wasn't she talking about the woman in the plain dress?
That woman was the one who no karma dared to touch!
But it was still very difficult for Ye Xuan to reach the level of the woman in the plain dress, at least not in a short time.
At this moment, the Divine Envoy suddenly said: "That young man can live until now with the Body of Misfortune is because someone is blocking the source of the Body of Misfortune for him, right?"
Mu Niannian nodded. "Yes!"
The Divine Envoy frowned slightly. "Someone can do that?"
Mu Niannian smiled. "Yes!"
The Divine Envoy shook his head. "Impossible … This Cause of Misfortune is simply … No, you have no reason to lie to me. Moreover, that young man is indeed still alive."
Mu Niannian licked the candied fruit and smiled. It was good to talk to smart people because you didn't have to explain too much nonsense.
At this moment, the Divine Envoy suddenly asked: "What are you licking?"
Mu Niannian smiled. "Candied fruit!"
The Divine Envoy hesitated. "It looks delicious. Can I lick it?"
Mu Niannian blinked and said: "This … This is a divine item. It blooms every ten thousand years and bears fruit every ten thousand years. Look at this string of mine, there are six of them. They have been bearing fruit for sixty thousand years!"
The Divine Envoy: "…"
...







Chapter 1490
Sixty thousand years old!
The Saint blinked. "Really?"
Mu Niannian said seriously, "Of course!
However, I can give you a skewer. "
With that, she took out a skewer of candied haws and handed it to the Saint.
The Saint hesitated for a moment before taking the candied haws. She licked it gently. It was a little sweet and sour, but there was no spiritual energy or energy. She looked at Mu Niannian and asked, "Why doesn't this thing have any energy or spiritual energy?"
Nian Nian blinked, feeling a little awkward. How was she going to fool him?
Fortunately, the Saint did not continue to ask this question. She licked it again and said, "This thing is sour and sweet. There's an indescribable feeling when you lick it."
Mu Niannian smiled and said, "Delicious, right?"
The Saint nodded. "Indeed!"
With that, she glanced at Mu Niannian and said, "I can't take it from you for free!"
When she spoke up to here, she opened her palm to reveal a pure white spirit fruit. As soon as it appeared, a wave of pure spiritual energy instantly spread out from her palm.
Nian Nian blinked. "This is?"
The Saint said, "My clan's sacred fruit. It blooms every ten thousand years and bears fruit every ten thousand years. After eating, it can cleanse the marrow and nourish the limbs and bones … Most importantly, it tastes good and delicious!"
Nian Nian looked at the Saint. "Is it for me?"
The Saint nodded. "Yes."
Nian Nian smiled and said, "Actually, this candied haw isn't that precious!"
The Saint nodded. "I know!
This thing should be some snacks of this era, right? "
Nian Nian nodded. "Yes."
The Saint smiled slightly. "No matter what, I ate your candied haw and I don't like to owe others, so you can keep it!"
Nian Nian shook her head. "You have your principles and I have mine. Just give me a skewer of candied haw in the future."
The Saint thought for a moment and said, "That's fine too!"
Nian Nian smiled and said, "Let's talk about that woman. Are you interested?"
The Saint nodded. "Yes."
Nian Nian smiled and said, "You already know the truth. What are you going to do now?"
The Saint shook his head. "I don't know how strong she is, and I don't know what she will do next."
As she said that, she looked at Mu Niannian. "Because you're affected by the Disaster Constitution, you can't attack openly, right?"
Nian Nian nodded. "Yes."
The Divine Envoy said softly, "Then things will be a bit tricky."
Nian Nian said, "If I'm not wrong, she should have a backup plan, but we don't know what this backup plan is for now.
Most importantly, you've already seen through her scheme. I'm worried that she has already anticipated this and has a backup plan. "
The Saint nodded slightly. "That's what I'm worried about."
As she spoke, she shook her head. "I wanted to talk to her, but she didn't want to."
Nian Nian blinked. "Why don't we join forces?"
The Saint was silent.
Nian Nian asked, "Are you worried about the Body of Disaster?"
The Sage nodded. "Yes!"
Nian Nian smiled and said, "She killed many of your people."
The Saint looked at Nian Nian. "But if we continue to be enemies with her without knowing her true strength, we might lose more people. Moreover, her real intention is to target you. My clan doesn't want to get involved in this mess for now."
Nian Nian nodded. "I understand!
However, you guys still have to be careful. She probably won't let this go! "
The Saint nodded. "Thank you for the reminder."
As she said that, she licked the candied fruit and said, "I still have something to do. We'll talk another day."
With that, she turned and left.
Nian Nian looked at the Saint in the distance and remained silent.
'What will that woman do next?'
...
Somewhere in the starry sky, Ye Xuan was flying on his sword. He didn't know where he was going because he was following the map.
Miss Ding!
He was also curious about this Miss Ding. The tavern owner had asked him to look for her. She should be able to restrain that woman, right?
At this moment, the space not far away from him suddenly trembled. Ye Xuan frowned slightly and clenched his right hand tightly.
He clenched the sword in his hand because he felt a murderous intent!
A murderous intent that came out of nowhere!
At this moment, the murderous intent suddenly disappeared. The next moment, the space split open and a woman walked out!
It was the mysterious woman from the Sacred Land.
Ye Xuan looked at the woman in silence.
The woman said with a smile, "Are you going to look for help?"
Ye Xuan hurriedly shook his head. "No!
I'm just strolling around! "
The woman laughed and said, "I like to see you lie with your eyes wide open. It's really interesting!"
Ye Xuan was speechless.
The woman said with a smile, "Go back!"
Ye Xuan looked at the woman. "Are you afraid that I'll look for that person?"
The woman shook her head. "I'm not afraid because she can't do anything to me. However, with her around, it'll be a little troublesome to carry out many of my plans because she knows me better than Miss Nian and knows more than Miss Nian!"
Ye Xuan was silent.
The woman looked at Ye Xuan and said with a smile, "Are you going back yourself, or do you want me to beat you up?"
Ye Xuan looked at the woman. "How about a spar?"
The woman said with a smile, "Are you serious?"
Ye Xuan nodded. "I'm serious!
Hmm … it's a spar, the kind where we stop when it's appropriate! "
The woman laughed. "Stop when it's appropriate!
Since you want to know my strength, then come! "
Ye Xuan suddenly disappeared from the spot.
Chi!
The space in front of the woman suddenly tore open and a sword beam appeared an inch away from the woman's eyebrows.
Instant Kill Sword!
Extreme Instant Kill Sword!
However, such a fast sword was caught by two fingers!
The woman held onto Ye Xuan's sword and smiled. "A very fast sword. However, even Tingyun can't do anything to me with this sword, let alone you!"
As she said that, her fingers trembled slightly.
Boom!
Ye Xuan and his sword were sent flying hundreds of feet away!
The woman looked at Ye Xuan. "Again!"
Ye Xuan looked at the woman. The next moment, he suddenly appeared in front of the woman. Immediately after, four types of Domains enveloped the woman. At the same time, he held the sword with both hands and slashed forward.
He used all his strength in this sword!
Of course, it lacked the Crazy Demon Bloodline Power!
Even so, the power of this sword was enough to destroy heaven and earth. However, even with the support of four types of Domains, this sword was still caught by the woman's two fingers!
The woman's two fingers trembled slightly.
Boom!
Ye Xuan's four types of Domains were directly shattered. At the same time, he was sent flying hundreds of feet away.
Ye Xuan looked at the sword in his hand in silence.
He was crushed!
This woman's strength was far above his. Even if he used the Power of Faith, he might not be able to do anything to this woman.
The woman sized up Ye Xuan. "Four types of Domains. It's quite rare. However, it's a pity that your four types of Domains are of a low level. You haven't grasped the true essence of Domains!"
Ye Xuan frowned slightly. "Low level?"
The woman nodded and smiled. "You can't really think that Domains are so trashy, right?"
Ye Xuan hesitated for a moment. "Are Domains very strong?"
The woman smiled. "Of course. Although you have four types of Domains, you haven't grasped the essence of Domains. Therefore, your power is mediocre."
Ye Xuan said in a low voice. "How can I display the true power of this Domain?"
The woman blinked. "Are you asking me?"
Ye Xuan: "…"
The woman smiled. "I won't tell you!
Otherwise, if you're too strong, you'll only make things difficult for me. "
Ye Xuan said in a low voice. "Are you afraid that I'll become stronger?"
The woman smiled. "If you want to be a threat to me, you'll need at least 30 years, or even longer. Therefore, within 30 years, it doesn't matter how you jump around. However, I can't take the initiative to help you improve!
Isn't that looking for trouble for myself? "
Ye Xuan was silent.
The woman smiled. "Don't worry. I won't target the people around you. I won't use your relatives to threaten you.
You can rest assured. "
Ye Xuan glanced at the woman. "In that case, I should be thanking you!"
The woman smiled. "I can understand you. After all, it's a grudge of the older generation. You have to take the blame!
But there's no other way. This matter has something to do with you. Moreover, I really can't beat the older generation. I can only beat you. "
Ye Xuan looked calm. "You're really straightforward.
Speaking of which, I'm curious. Do you have some kind of blood feud with my mother? "
The woman smiled. "Sort of!"
Ye Xuan frowned. "You're sisters!
Is there such a big grudge? "
The woman shook her head. "I can't tell you about this."
Ye Xuan was silent for a moment. He asked again. "I heard from a senior that my grandfather was killed?"
The woman nodded. "Yes."
Ye Xuan continued to ask. "My father did it?"
The woman nodded. "Your grandfather's death … I can only say that he deserved it.
Although it's a bit unfilial to say this, he has done too many evil things!
Moreover, when you were born, he wanted to kill you! "
Ye Xuan was stunned. "My grandfather wanted to kill me?"
The woman nodded. "Yes!"
Ye Xuan wiped the cold sweat off his forehead. Damn it. It's not easy for me to live until now!
The woman suddenly smiled. "Let's go back!"
Ye Xuan looked at the woman. "Can we make an agreement?"
The woman smiled. "Let's hear it!"
Ye Xuan said in a deep voice. "No matter what happens in the future, don't make a move on the Fifth Dimension. Don't make a move on the people around me. Of course, I won't make the Fifth Dimension and the people around you your enemy!
This is a grudge between the two of us. What do you think? "
The woman smiled. "Sure!
However, I won't make a move on the Fifth Dimension. I won't show mercy to some people from the older generation who helped you. "
Ye Xuan was silent for a moment. "Okay!"
After saying that, he turned around and left.
Not long after Ye Xuan left, a shadow quietly appeared behind the woman. The shadow gradually solidified. It was a woman wearing an emerald green dress. There were some leaf-like things on the woman's head. It looked quite strange.
The woman who had just appeared stared at Ye Xuan at the end of the starry sky in the distance. Her eyes were filled with killing intent.
The mysterious woman suddenly smiled. "You can't just kill him like that. Do you understand?
Moreover, what's the point of killing him?
After all, the person you want to kill is Tian Ming. "
The woman in the emerald green dress was expressionless. "If I kill him, that woman will definitely be in pain, right?"
The mysterious woman smiled. "And then?
Then she will end you with a sword?
Also, we can't kill him now. Don't underestimate that Miss Nian Nian. "
The woman in the emerald green dress was silent.
The mysterious woman suddenly said, "How's the contact going?"
The woman in the emerald green dress said solemnly, "I've already contacted some people. However, most of them don't dare to participate in this matter because they fear Tian Ming."
As she said that, she looked at the mysterious woman. "How do you plan to deal with that man and that woman?"
The mysterious woman raised her head to look at the end of the starry sky and said softly, "Our appearance is the best chance for this Disaster Cause. I don't believe it won't seize this opportunity … This Disaster Cause will definitely help us … If I'm not wrong, this Disaster Cause is about to make a move."
....
In a certain part of the starry sky, a woman was walking slowly.
It was the woman in the white dress!
At that moment, the woman in the white dress suddenly stopped. The blood-red threads around her suddenly trembled violently. They surrounded the woman in the white dress like a huge ball, wrapping around her. However, it was very difficult for them to approach her. At the same time, the space in front of the woman suddenly turned blood-red. Within that blood-red space, there was a blood-red door.
The woman in the white dress slowly closed her eyes. After a long while, she turned her head to take a look and sneered. "You're playing with me?
If it weren't for the fact that you're his mother, I would've ended you with my sword long ago!
You don't even recognize your own son. What the hell! "
After saying that, she walked towards the blood-red door.
...
PS: Updated one minute late, one more chapter!







Chapter 1491
As the plain-dressed woman walked towards the blood-red door, the starry sky around her had already turned blood-red. The entire starry sky was like a sea of blood. It was extremely strange!
The plain-dressed woman walked slowly. Her expression was calm as the number of blood-red threads around her increased. When she reached the blood-red door, those blood-red threads had already covered the entire starry sky!
If someone was here, they would definitely be scared to death!
This was too terrifying!
Karmic Threads!
Endless Karmic Threads of Disaster!
These Karmic Threads of Disaster should be on Ye Xuan's body. However, they had been shouldered by the plain-dressed woman. Of course, these Karmic Threads of Disaster couldn't do anything to her. However, she couldn't sever them all because new threads would appear even if she severed them. Therefore, she didn't sever them all.
The plain-dressed woman walked towards the blood-red door. Behind the door was a long blood-red path that seemed to have no end.
When she entered the blood-red door, she suddenly turned her head to look at the Karmic Threads of Disaster. She could see countless things from these Karmic Threads of Disaster.
Many of the Karmic Threads of Disaster were related to her and the green-robed man. However, there were also some that didn't belong to her and the green-robed man!
They belonged to Ye Xuan himself!
The degree of terror of these Karmic Threads of Disaster wasn't any less than the ones she and the green-robed man had.
Everyone had a past life, present life, and a future life. However, when a person's strength reached a certain level, they could sever their past life and future life.
The green-robed man had done it!
She had also done it!
She wouldn't be tainted by any karma. She would be herself.
However, Ye Xuan couldn't do it.
What was she really worried about?
She was worried that Ye Xuan's past life would determine his present life.
Some powerful people could be reborn after reaching a certain level. Moreover, they could control their own rebirth.
After such people were reborn, they would gradually regain their past life's memories. If they were strong enough in their present life, they might be able to maintain their current state. However, if they weren't strong enough, they might become their past life's self.
Was there a difference?
There was definitely a difference. Because once the past life's memories were restored, the person at that time would no longer be him!
The reason why Ye Xuan was still himself now was because she had blocked everything from his previous life. All the karmic threads from his previous life had basically landed on her.
Of course, this was only her guess. She was not sure if it was Ye Xuan's doing in his previous life, or if someone else was doing it, or if he was doing it himself, or if someone was helping him …
Regardless of the reason, she was certain that Ye Xuan's identity was not simple. In fact, it was becoming more and more complicated.
Before this, what gave her a headache was that the Disaster Cause had been lurking in the dark, leaving her powerless.
But now, the Cause of Disaster could no longer hold back!
When she thought up to here, the woman in a plain dress put away the wooden doll, and then she turned around to glance below. At this glance, she directly saw the mysterious woman from the Hallowed Grounds, and she had an expressionless face. "A bunch of ants. If it wasn't for the fact that you're his mother, I would have killed you a long time ago!
Are you even worthy of showing off your intelligence? "
After saying that, she entered the blood-red door.
In fact, the mysterious woman from the Hallowed Grounds did not know that the woman in a plain dress wanted to make a move against the Disaster Cause even more than she did …
If the Disaster Cause did not make a move and kept hiding, she really could not do anything to it. But if the Disaster Cause made a move and let her know where the Disaster Cause was, then it would be different.
After the woman in a plain dress disappeared, the blood-red door in the starry sky slowly became illusory. After a while, it disappeared, and the surrounding starry sky also returned to normal.
....
In the Hallowed Grounds, the mysterious woman in the bamboo house suddenly raised her head.
After being silent for a long time, she softly said, "No, they might not have gone far. We have to wait a little longer. We can't rush …"
After saying that, she lowered her head and continued to read the ancient book.
At this moment, the Sacred Master's voice came from outside the door. "Master, the people from the Desolate North have already gone to the Fifth Dimension!"
The woman nodded. "I know."
The Sacred Master hesitated for a moment, then said, "Will the Desolate North ally with the Fifth Dimension?"
The woman shook her head. "They wouldn't dare."
The Sacred Master was somewhat puzzled. "Why?"
The woman smiled and said, "They won't want to get involved in this mess!"
The Sacred Master said in a deep voice. "But if they know that this is a conspiracy of yours, Master …"
The woman shook her head and smiled. "As long as Ye Xuan absorbs those souls, it will be fine. Those souls are evil causes.
Although I forced him to absorb them, he still benefited from it.
As for the Desolate North, the Sacred Envoy doesn't represent the entire Desolate North. Moreover, as long as there are enough benefits, the Desolate North will kill Ye Xuan. "
Although the Sacred Master still had some doubts in his heart, he didn't ask anymore. Instead, he quietly retreated.
Outside the bamboo forest, the Sacred Master sighed.
He knew that his master must have some big plan. Recently, some extremely powerful auras appeared in the Hallowed Grounds. However, he didn't know who these people were, and he didn't dare to ask.
...
Ye Xuan returned to the Fifth Dimension. Somewhere in the cultivation room, Ye Xuan opened his right hand and slowly clenched it. In an instant, a powerful force condensed in his right hand!
Life Fist!
He had to admit that the power of this Life Fist was very powerful. However, he knew that even if he burned one thousand years of his life, the Life Fist would not be able to do anything to that woman.
Ye Xuan slowly loosened his right hand.
This was the first time he felt so powerless!
Although he had many enemies in the past, and they were all powerful, they were completely incomparable to this mysterious woman. Now, he felt that the woman was in control of everything.
The biggest disadvantage was that the woman knew everything about him, while he didn't know much about her!
As if he had thought of something, Ye Xuan suddenly opened his hands, and a mysterious force suddenly overflowed from his body.
The power of faith!
At this moment, his power of faith was unprecedentedly powerful!
This was because it could be said that he had gathered the power of faith of the entire Fifth Dimension. Moreover, this power of faith was very pure.
It could be said that this power of faith would increase his strength to an extremely terrifying level.
However, his use of the power of faith was very simple and crude. That was to use it to forcibly increase his own strength!
Domain!
Ye Xuan suddenly displayed his sword domain. His sword domain directly enveloped the entire cultivation room. After the sword domain appeared, he crazily released his power of faith. Endless power of faith entered his sword domain.
Excitement gradually appeared in Ye Xuan's eyes.
Because he noticed that the sword domain was actually undergoing a transformation when the power of faith entered it!
As if he'd thought of something, Ye Xuan suddenly said, "Condense!"
As soon as he finished speaking, a sword suddenly appeared in his hand. It was an illusory sword!
It was a sword condensed from the power of faith he'd condensed!
Ye Xuan held the sword in his hand and slowly closed his eyes. At this moment, his sword domain had undergone a tremendous transformation.
The sword domain that was supported by the power of faith and the sword Dao Yi was countless times stronger than his original sword domain. Moreover, he was able to increase the effects of the power of faith to its limits within this sword domain. Moreover, he could even utilize this sword domain to improve the might of his Sword Dao!
The power of faith could strengthen the sword domain, and the sword domain could strengthen his Sword Dao!
Ye Xuan clenched his fists tightly.
He looked into the distance with the sword of faith in his hand. At this moment, he really wanted to slash out. The power of this sword would definitely destroy the world.
However, this was the Fifth Dimension. Naturally, he couldn't use his sword. If he did, it would severely damage the origin of the Fifth Dimension!
Ye Xuan put away his sword and continued to ponder the power of faith and sword domain.
He originally wanted to rush to the Consolidation Realm. However, he felt that he should stabilize his current realm. After all, he'd just reached the Dao Attainment Realm not long ago.
As for his physical body, it hadn't been long since he'd reached the Consolidation Realm. It would be very difficult to improve it again.
Since he couldn't improve his realm and physical body, he would improve his Sword Dao and sword domain!
Especially the sword domain. He didn't know when it started, but he rarely used it. Against ordinary enemies, he didn't even need to use the sword domain. He could instantly kill them with one strike!
However, against some enemies, the sword domain was completely useless. For example, against that mysterious woman, the sword domain was completely useless!
And that woman's words made him understand that it wasn't that the sword domain was weak, but that he hadn't developed it yet!
In the following time, Ye Xuan began to study the sword domain and the power of faith. Not only that, but he also studied the sword of instant death. With the blessing of the sword domain and the power of faith, the power of the sword of instant death could also be greatly enhanced. Especially in the space covered by the sword domain, the speed of the sword of instant death was already indescribable … It could be said that the speed was so fast that even he couldn't resist it.
The power of faith and sword domain allowed Ye Xuan to discover a new continent.
In the blink of an eye, one month passed.
During this month, Ye Xuan hid in the cultivation room every day. As for the matters of the Fifth Dimension, he was relieved that Bai Dizi and the others were handling it. Moreover, Bai Dizi and the others didn't disturb him.
Apart from cultivating, Ye Xuan had been reading books for the past month!
He read the ancient books that Nian Nian had collected!
Not only that, he also asked Bai Dizi to collect all the books related to the sword path in the Fifth Dimension, especially those from the Sword Sect.
Just as the white-robed Qing 'er said, his current sword path had reached its end. He could only walk the next path by himself. However, if he wanted to walk his own path, learning was indispensable.
He wanted to improve his attainments in the Sword Dao to the next level!
During this time, there was no movement from the Sacred Domain.
On this day, the Sacred Master came to the bamboo house. The Sacred Master glanced inside the bamboo house and saw that there were two women inside.
The Sacred Master bowed slightly. "Master, that Ye Xuan seems to be cultivating crazily!"
The mysterious woman said with a smile, "Let him be!"
The Sacred Master hesitated for a moment and then said, "Master, aren't you worried?"
The mysterious woman said, "You can leave!"
The Sacred Master didn't dare to say anything else and immediately left.
...
Inside the bamboo house, the mysterious woman looked at the woman in front of her. The woman was wearing an emerald green dress and there were a few broken leaves in her hair.
The mysterious woman said with a smile, "Tree Boundless, you are too anxious!"
Tree Boundless' expression was cold. "She has already left!
Are you still not going to act? "
The mysterious woman shook her head. "Not enough, because I can still feel a trace of her aura …"
Tree Boundless suddenly asked, "What if she comes back?"
The mysterious woman was silent.
Tree Boundless looked at the woman. "You have thought about this problem, right?"
The mysterious woman said softly, "She will not come back."
Tree Boundless frowned slightly. "Why?"
The mysterious woman said with a smile, "In her eyes, you and I are both ants."
.....







Chapter 1492
Ants!
Tree Boundless was silent.
How strong was that woman?
She had personally experienced it!
So strong that it made people feel despair!
In this world, who could suppress the plain-dressed woman?
No one!
Even the green-robed man could only fight against the plain-dressed woman, but if the plain-dressed woman went crazy, the green-robed man could not stop her.
In the eyes of that woman, apart from a few people, who was not an ant?
In front of Tree Boundless, the mysterious woman suddenly smiled and said, "Of course, if she comes back, it is also a good thing."
Tree Boundless looked at the mysterious woman and asked, "What do you mean?"
The mysterious woman smiled and said, "The reason why Ye Xuan can live so comfortably now is because she is at the front. If she returns to Ye Xuan's side, who will be at the front?
Of course, she can always stay by Ye Xuan's side, but if she stays by Ye Xuan's side, Ye Xuan will never be able to grow.
The path of the Great Dao is walked by oneself. This is also the reason why she left Ye Xuan, because she wants Ye Xuan to grow on his own. "
Saying that, she shook her head and smiled, "In her heart, the enemies of this universe, including us, are all Ye Xuan's whetstones."
Tree Boundless' expression was somewhat cold, "She is so confident!"
The mysterious woman said softly, "She is indeed very confident, but she has the strength."
Saying that, she turned to look at the horizon, "I hope that the Cause of Disaster is not so weak, otherwise … how can others play with it?"
Tree Boundless asked, "In your opinion, does the Cause of Disaster have a chance of winning?"
The mysterious woman nodded, "Yes!"
Tree Boundless asked, "Why do you think so?"

Most importantly, if the source of this Cause of Disaster is Ye Xuan himself, then this matter will be too interesting.

Tree Boundless asked solemnly, "What do you plan to do next?"
The mysterious woman raised the teacup and took a light sip, and then she said softly, "Wait!"
Tree Boundless frowned. "How much longer do we have to wait?"
The mysterious woman smiled and said, "We've waited for so many years. There's no need to rush, right?"
Tree Boundless was silent.
The mysterious woman suddenly asked, "How's the contact?"
Tree Boundless said calmly, "Your seduction worked!
More and more people join us!
However, you have to remember one thing. If that woman or that man comes back, everything we've done will be meaningless. "
The mysterious woman nodded, "Even if that man wanted to come back, he wouldn't be able to do so immediately.
What we really need to be careful of is slaughtering them … "
Tree Boundless nodded. "As long as that woman doesn't come back."
At this point, she suddenly looked at the mysterious woman. "By the way, what level have you reached?
Why can't I sense your realm? "
The mysterious woman smiled slightly, "We're not enemies, you don't need to worry."
Tree Boundless said calmly, "I'm just curious!"
The mysterious woman smiled and said, "A little higher than you think!"
Tree Boundless frowned slightly, but she didn't ask any more questions.
At this time, the mysterious woman suddenly said, "We have to be careful of someone!"
Tree Boundless asked, "Who?"
The mysterious woman dipped her finger into the tea, and then wrote a name on the table.
Tree Boundless frowned slightly, "He's here?"
The mysterious woman nodded, "He should be here."
Tree Boundless said, "I'll deal with him!"
The mysterious woman smiled and said, "No, you have to deal with something else."
Tree Boundless looked at the mysterious woman, "Tell me your plan!"
The mysterious woman said softly, "When that woman is a little further away, when I can't sense her, we'll make the Disaster Cause on Ye Xuan materialize … At that time, besides the Three Swords, whoever helps him will suffer the wrath of Heaven!"
Tree Boundless said, "Alright!"
Saying so, she stood up and left.
The mysterious woman looked at the teacup in front of her, and after a long time, she said softly, "Even if I'm an ant trying to shake a tree, I still want to try …"
Saying so, she took out a white silk handkerchief, and on the handkerchief, there was a small footprint.
Looking at the handkerchief in her hand, a trace of pain flashed in her eyes, "Why should you die … Why?
Because he has an invincible little sister?
Don't worry, I'll make him pay the price. "
Those were her son's footprints. However, she had never even seen her son's face. That was because the calamity had descended upon her, and her soul had almost been destroyed. When she had woken up, only one of her two children was left!
No, at that time, there was another person, and that was Tian Ming!
After recalling the past, the killing intent in the mysterious woman's eyes became more and more ferocious …
