I might not be able to update five to six times a day like before!
Sorry!!
!!







Chapter 1500
Beihuang.
In the Thunderbolt Pool, Ye Xuan was still crazily absorbing the Heavenly Tribulation Lightning. As the energy of the Heavenly Tribulation Lightning entered his body, a faint layer of lightning appeared all over his body.
His body felt warm and comfortable.
Ye Xuan closed his eyes. With his current strength, he could instantly kill some Immortal State experts. However, he knew that he still had no chance of winning against that mysterious woman!
Not to mention the mysterious woman, he had no chance of winning against an expert of the Third Young Lady's level. Because his sword could not break through the Third Young Lady's body!
Unless he combined his Life Sword and the Instant Kill Sword, together with the power of faith and four types of domains.
Under such circumstances, he might be able to pose a fatal threat to the Third Young Lady.
However, the mysterious woman was even more terrifying than the Third Young Lady!
In fact, he was quite speechless.
He had finally gotten rid of the Taoists, but he did not expect an even more terrifying enemy to appear!
A hundred times more terrifying than the Taoists!
In any case, Ye Xuan was not a person who would sit and wait for death.
His top priority now was to improve his body to the Immortal State. If his body could reach the Immortal State, his overall strength would undergo a qualitative change!
Because both the Life Sword and the Instant Kill Sword required a powerful body!
In addition, his Sword Dao had a breakthrough and his Sword Domain had a new breakthrough. As long as his body had a breakthrough, he still had a fighting chance.
The only regret was that the Insanity Demon Bloodline had been sealed!
Otherwise, his chances of winning would be higher!
Thinking of this, he was infuriated!
He had fallen into that woman's trap!
Although the Immortal Bloodline was powerful, the Insanity Demon Bloodline focused on offense!
Moreover, the bloodline could pose a threat to her … but now, it was gone!
Although he had a headache over the Insanity Demon Bloodline, he missed it after losing it.
At that moment, Ye Xuan suddenly turned around and saw a woman standing not far away!
That mysterious woman!
The corner of Ye Xuan's mouth twitched. Damn it, that woman is here!
The mysterious woman looked at Ye Xuan and said with a smile, "Tempering your body with the Heavenly Tribulation Lightning can indeed improve your body."
Ye Xuan said in a deep voice, "What are you trying to do!?"
The mysterious woman blinked. "Do you need help?"
Ye Xuan quickly shook his head.
The corners of the mysterious woman's mouth lifted slightly. "I'll help you!"
As she spoke, she opened her palm. In her hand was a throbbing bolt of lightning, a dark red bolt of lightning!
Seeing this lightning, Ye Xuan's eyelids twitched. "What kind of lightning is this?"
The mysterious woman smiled and said: "Blood-colored Heavenly Lightning, I obtained it by chance, I will give it to you!"
After she finished speaking, she flicked her finger, and the crimson bolt of lightning directly entered the pool of lightning.
Boom!
In an instant, all the lightning within the pool was transformed into nothingness. At the same time, Ye Xuan was enveloped by countless bolts of blood red lightning!
"Ah!"
Within the Lightning Pool, Ye Xuan's shrill scream suddenly rang out.
At this moment, Ye Xuan felt as if his entire body was being pierced by thousands of needles.
Ouch!
The lightning was currently corroding his body!
The mysterious woman smiled and said: "It's just a little pain, just endure it!"
As she finished speaking, she turned around to look. Not far away, stood a woman.
Mu Xi!
The mysterious woman smiled and said: "Actually, I gave the Northern Wilderness Tribe a chance, two chances. The first was to follow me, the second, you can be like the Taoist Faction, not helping each other. Unfortunately, you have no choice!"
Mu Xi looked at the mysterious woman and smiled, "You killed dozens of my people just to frame Young Master Ye … If this is the chance that you are giving us, then I don't care!"
The mysterious woman smiled. "You are very strong-willed!"
Mu Xi shook her head and smiled, "Are you here to destroy the Northern Wilderness Tribe today?"
The mysterious woman blinked. "You think I can't do it?"
"You can try!"
At this moment, a voice suddenly rang out from the stone tablet.
The next moment, a shadow suddenly appeared in front of the mysterious woman. The shadow gradually solidified, revealing that it was a woman.
The woman was dressed in a long purple dress that reached the ground. A black cloud belt was tied around her waist, accentuating her slender waist.
Her silky hair cascaded down her back, domineering but not messy. Especially her pair of phoenix-like eyes, there was a hint of arrogance in the coldness, as if she was looking down on the world.
Exalted Goddess!
The Exalted Goddess looked at the mysterious woman. "I've been annoyed by you for a long time!"
The mysterious woman smiled and said: "Then come and hit me!"
The Exalted Goddess opened her palm and in an instant, a bolt of lightning fell from the clouds in the sky. The bolt of lightning landed directly on her palm, using her palm as a support, connecting heaven and earth.
Lightning in the palm!
In the sky, the mysterious woman smiled. "Are you going to fight?"
As she said that, she opened her hands and two balls of fire suddenly appeared in her hands!
One of the balls of fire was blood-red, the other was dark black.
The moment the two balls of fire appeared, the entire Northern Wilderness World became illusory, then slowly disappeared!
The world could not withstand the power of these two balls of fire!
In the sky, the mysterious woman suddenly fused the two balls of fire. Gradually, the two balls of fire turned into a flaming sword!
This sword, half of it was red fire, the other half was black fire.
Not far away, Mu Xi suddenly said, "Everyone, retreat."
Hearing Mu Xi's words, all the elites in the entire Northern Wilderness fled in all directions.
Mu Xi herself had also retreated hundreds of thousands of miles away!
In the entire Northern Wilderness, there were only three people left!
The mysterious woman, the Exalted Goddess, and Ye Xuan!
Ye Xuan wanted to leave too, but at that moment, he was already entangled by the bolt of lightning and there was no way he could escape!
At that moment, the Exalted Goddess clenched her right hand and floated up. The bolt of lightning in her hand was like a silver snake that swept across the sky towards the mysterious woman.
With a "chi" sound, the entire world was torn apart!
In the sky, the mysterious woman suddenly slashed down with her sword. A wave of fire swept out, turning the entire sky into a sea of fire!
The moment the sea of fire came into contact with the bolt of lightning —
Boom!
In the blink of an eye, the entire Northern Wilderness turned pitch-black!
In this pitch-black space, the bolt of lightning and the flames still existed. In the sea of fire, the bolt of lightning danced like a silver snake, tearing everything apart.
At that moment, the mysterious woman suddenly raised her sword and slashed at the bolt of lightning.
Boom!
The bolt of lightning shattered and turned into streaks of lightning that scattered all over the sky.
Below, the Exalted Goddess looked calm. She opened her palm and clenched it. "Gather!"
In an instant, the shattered lightning suddenly gathered and returned to its original state. Moreover, the aura it emitted was even stronger than before!
The Exalted God opened her left hand and closed her eyes slowly. She chanted silently and gradually, thick black clouds appeared in the sky. Then, countless lightning bolts condensed in the thick black clouds.
At that moment, the entire sky was filled with flashes of lightning. It was as if doomsday had arrived!
The Exalted Goddess suddenly opened her eyes. In her eyes, there was a flash of lightning. "Destroy!"
As soon as he finished speaking, the bolts of lightning suddenly shot towards the mysterious woman like a tidal wave.
In the distance, the mysterious woman held the Flaming Sword with a faint smile on her face. "Is that it?"
As soon as she finished speaking, she suddenly swung her sword.
Swoosh!
A beam of sword energy pierced through the air. In an instant, those terrifying lightning bolts turned into nothingness. The black hole in the entire Northern Wasteland Realm was shattered again. Countless amounts of dark matter energy exploded. However, the dark matter energy from the explosion was eventually absorbed by Ye Xuan, who was far away.
Because at that moment, Ye Xuan had activated his Dark Domain!
At that moment, he was madly absorbing the dark matter energy!
However, he was not having it easy either. This was because the shockwaves from the two women's attacks had landed on him. Even with his Daoist body, it was difficult for him to withstand the power of the two women. Fortunately, he had the Immortal Bloodline. Otherwise, he would not have been able to withstand it!
After the mysterious woman destroyed the lightning bolts with her sword, she suddenly disappeared on the spot. Below, the Exalted God suddenly took a step forward and pointed a finger at the tip of the flaming sword.
Boom!
An invisible force suddenly shook the surroundings. With the two of them as the center, everything within a radius of a million miles turned into nothingness. In the distance, Ye Xuan's eyes were wide open. His physical body was cracking inch by inch, but very quickly, his physical body began to recover at an extremely fast speed.
The Immortal Bloodline!
At that moment, Ye Xuan felt the terror of the Immortal Bloodline!
In the distance, the mysterious woman held the Exalted Goddess's finger and smiled. "Telekinesis!
How interesting! "
With that, she held the sword and spun it gently.
Boom!
The Exalted Goddess instantly retreated thousands of feet away. However, the moment she stopped, the space between the mysterious woman's eyebrows suddenly split open. Almost at the same time, the crack between her eyebrows returned to normal. However, behind her, a mysterious force spread out, covering a distance of a million miles. Wherever this mysterious force passed, everything turned into nothingness.
Fortunately, the Northern Wilderness was a remote area. Apart from the Divine City, there were no other forces within a radius of tens of millions of miles. Otherwise, the Exalted Goddess's mysterious attack would have been enough to destroy hundreds of millions of lives.
Seeing that the mysterious woman was unharmed, the Exalted Goddess's eyes turned serious for the first time. "How is this possible!"
The mysterious woman gently touched her eyebrows and smiled. "Is this your strongest attack?
It's very strong!
Unfortunately, even if this attack was ten times stronger, it still wouldn't be able to kill me!
Do you know why? "
The Exalted Goddess looked at the mysterious woman. "The power of your bloodline!"
The mysterious woman nodded and slowly walked towards the Exalted Goddess. "Yes.
Other than those three, no one can kill me with a single attack! "
As she spoke, her aura became stronger and stronger, almost multiplying by several times!
The Exalted Goddess said softly, "You didn't use your full strength just now!"
The mysterious woman smiled. "I used about 30% of my strength!"
The Exalted Goddess nodded. "I underestimated you!"
The mysterious woman smiled. "Don't worry, although I'm not a Swordsman, my sword is very fast. I guarantee that you will die painlessly!"
The Exalted Goddess looked at the mysterious woman. "Come on!"
As soon as she finished speaking, a mysterious force quietly gathered in the palm of her right hand.
The mysterious woman was about to draw her sword when Ye Xuan suddenly appeared in front of the Exalted Goddess.
The mysterious woman stopped in her tracks and looked at Ye Xuan. She smiled. "Are you going to fight me?"
Ye Xuan shook his head. "There's still a small gap between us."
The mysterious woman laughed. "A small gap … You're so fresh in admitting defeat!
You're just like your old man, thick-skinned! "
Ye Xuan looked at the mysterious woman. "Are you afraid of Qing 'er?"
The mysterious woman nodded. "I am!"
Ye Xuan said in a low voice, "You can't defeat her?"
The mysterious woman gently brushed her hair behind her ear with her left hand and smiled. "She can beat me up!"
The Exalted Goddess was puzzled. "Then why are you so against me?
Moreover, you're my aunt!
I'm not begging for mercy, I just don't understand. Can you explain it to me? "
The mysterious woman looked at Ye Xuan. "It has something to do with your mother!
It has something to do with you! "
Ye Xuan blinked. "Then go and look for my mother!"
The mysterious woman shook her head. "I can't kill your mother. Moreover, she's protected by your old man. I can't do anything to her!"
Ye Xuan jumped up in anger. "So you came to look for me?"
The mysterious woman smiled. "I'm a bully. Come and hit me!"
"I …"
Ye Xuan was so angry he almost died on the spot.
At this moment, the mysterious woman suddenly turned to look at the sky. She smiled. "I'll give you face. I won't kill her!"
With that, she turned and walked away.
The Exalted Goddess seemed to have noticed something. Her eyes narrowed. "Woman, what are you doing!"
The mysterious woman smiled. "Since the Northern Wilderness Tribe isn't going to help, I can only choose your enemy."
The Exalted Goddess suddenly tugged at Ye Xuan's hand. "Stop her!
Otherwise, you'll be finished! "
Ye Xuan was speechless.
..
!!
